original: ekasin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma/
analyzed: ekasin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyām viharati sma

original: p.1.2/.atha^āyuṣmān ānandaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātra^cīvaram ādāya śrāvastīṃ mahā^nagarīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
analyzed: ānandaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātra cīvaram ādāya śrāvastīm mahā nagarīm piṇḍāya prāvikṣat

original: atha^āyuṣmān ānandaḥ śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛta^bhakta^kṛtyo yenānyatamam udapānaṃ tena^upasaṃkrāntaḥ/
analyzed: atha āyuṣmān ānandaḥ śrāvastīm piṇḍāya caritvā kṛta bhakta kṛtyaḥ yena anyatamam udapānam tena upasaṃkrāntaḥ

original: p.1.3/.tena khalu samayena tasminn udapāne prakṛtir nāma mātaṅga^dārikā udakam uddharate sma/
analyzed: khalu samayena tasmin udapāne prakṛtiḥ nāma mātaṅga dārikā udakam uddharate sma

original: atha^āyuṣmān ānandaḥ prakṛtiṃ mātaṅga^dārikām etad avocat/
analyzed: atha āyuṣmān ānandaḥ prakṛtim mātaṅga dārikām etat avocat

original: p.1.4/.evaṃ kite prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikāyuṣmantam ānandam idam avocat/
analyzed: kite prakṛtiḥ mātaṅga dārikā āyuṣmantam ānandam idam avocat
mātaṅga dārikā aham asmi bhadanta ānanda

original: na^ahaṃ te bhagini kulaṃ vā jātiṃ vā pṛcchāmi/
analyzed: na aham te bhagini kulam vā jātim vā pṛcchāmi

original: api tu sacette parityaktaṃ pānīyaṃ dehi pāsyāmi/
analyzed: api tu saced te parityaktam pānīyam dehi pāsyāmi

original: p.1.5/.atha prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikāyuṣmantam ānandāya pānīyam adāt/
analyzed: prakṛtiḥ mātaṅga dārikā āyuṣmantam ānandāya pānīyam adāt
atha āyuṣmān ānandaḥ pānīyam pītvā prakrāntaḥ

original: p.1.6/.atha prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikāyuṣmanta ānandsya śarīre mukhe svare sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca nimittam udgṛhītvā yoniśo manasikāreṇāviṣṭā saṃrāgacittam  #
analyzed: prakṛtiḥ mātaṅga dārikā āyuṣmantaḥ ānandsya śarīre mukhe svare sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca nimittam udgṛhītvā yoniśas manasikāreṇa āviṣṭā saṃrāga cittam

original: āryo me ānandaḥ svāmī ayād iti/
analyzed: āryaḥ me ānandaḥ svāmī ayāt iti

original: mātā ca me mahā^vidyādharī sā śakṣyaty āryam ānandam ānayitum/
analyzed: mātā ca me mahā vidyādharī sā śakṣyati āryam ānandam ānayitum

original: p.2.1/.atha prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikā pānīyaghaṭam ādāya yena caṇḍāla^gṛhaṃ tena^upasaṃkramya pānīya^ghaṭam ekānte nikṣipya svāṃ jananīm idam
analyzed: prakṛtiḥ mātaṅga dārikā pānīya ghaṭam ādāya yena caṇḍāla gṛham tena upasaṃkramya pānīya ghaṭam ekānte nikṣipya svām jananīm idam

original: p.2.2/.yat khalv evam amba jānīyā ānando nāma śramaṇo mahāśramaṇa^gautamasya śrāvaka upasthāyakas tam ahaṃ svāminam icchāmi/
analyzed: khalu evam amba jānīyāḥ ānandaḥ nāma śramaṇaḥ mahāśramaṇa gautamasya śrāvakaḥ upasthāyakaḥ tam aham svāminam icchāmi

original: sthāpayitvā yo mṛtaḥ syād yo vā vīta^rāgaḥ/
analyzed: sthāpayitvā yaḥ mṛtaḥ syāt yaḥ vā vīta rāgaḥ

original: api ca rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ śramaṇa^gautamam atīva sevate bhajate paryupāsate/
analyzed: api ca rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ śramaṇa gautamam atīva sevate bhajate paryupāsate
yadi jānīyāt saḥ ayam caṇḍāla kulasya anarthāya pratipadyeta
śramaṇaḥ ca gautamaḥ vīta rāgaḥ śrūyate
vīta rāgasya mantrāḥ punar sarva mantrān abhibhavanti

original: p.2.4/.evam uktā prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikā mātaram idam avocat/
analyzed: uktā prakṛtiḥ mātaṅga dārikā mātaram idam avocat

original: sa ced amba śramaṇo gautamā vīta^rāgastasya^antikāc chramaṇam ānandaṃ na pratilapsye jīvitaṃ parityajeyaṃ sa cet pratilipsye jīvāmi/
analyzed: sa ced amba śramaṇaḥ gautamāḥ vīta rāgaḥ tasya antikāt śramaṇam ānandam na pratilapsye jīvitam parityajeyam sa ced pratilipsye jīvāmi

original: p.2.5/.mā te putri jīvitaṃ parityajasi ānayāmi śramaṇam ānandam/
analyzed: te putri jīvitam parityajasi ānayāmi śramaṇam ānandam

original: p.2.6 /.atha prakṛter mātaṅga^dārikāyā mātā madhye gṛhāṅganasya gomayenopalepanaṃ
analyzed: atha prakṛteḥ mātaṅga dārikāyāḥ mātā madhye gṛha aṅganasya gomayena upalepanam

original: kṛtvā vedīm ālipya darbhān saṃstīrya^agniṃ prajvālya^aṣṭaśatam arka^puṣpāṇāṃ gṛhītvā
analyzed: kṛtvā vedīm ālipya darbhān saṃstīrya agnim prajvālya aṣṭaśatam arka puṣpāṇām gṛhītvā

original: mantrān āvartayamānā ekaikam arka^puṣpaṃ parijapya agnau pratikṣipati sma /
analyzed: mantrān āvartayamānāḥ ekaikam arka puṣpam parijapya agnau pratikṣipati sma

original: icchayā devo varṣati vidyotati gajeti vismayaṃ mahā^rājasya samabhivardhāyituṃ devebhyo manuṣyebhyo gandharvebhyoḥ śikhi^grahā devā viśikhi^gra(@)
analyzed: icchayā devaḥ varṣati vidyotati gaja iti vismayam mahā rājasya samabhivardhāyitum devebhyaḥ manuṣyebhyaḥ gandharvebhyaḥ śikhigrahāḥ devāḥ viśikhigrahāḥ

original: hā devā ānandasya^āgamanāya saṃgamanāya kramaṇāya grahaṇāya juhomi svāhā/
analyzed: hā devāḥ ānandasya āgamanāya saṃgamanāya kramaṇāya grahaṇāya juhomi svāhā

original: sa vihārān niṣkramya yena caṇḍāla^gṛhaṃ tena^upasaṃkrāmati sma/
analyzed: sa vihārāt niṣkramya yena caṇḍālagṛham tena upasaṃkrāmati sma

original: p.3.3/.adrākṣīc caṇḍālī āyuṣmantam ānandaṃ dūrād eva^āgacchantaṃ/
analyzed: caṇḍālī āyuṣmantam ānandam dūrāt eva āgacchantam

original: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ prakṛtiṃ duhitaram idam avocat/
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ca punar prakṛtim duhitaram idam avocat

original: ayam asau putri śramaṇa ānanda āgacchati śayanaṃ prajñapaya/
analyzed: ayam asau putri śramaṇaḥ ānandaḥ āgacchati śayanam prajñapaya

original: p.3.4/.atha prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikā hṛṣṭa^tuṣṭā pramudita^manā āyuṣmata ānandasya śayyāṃ prajñapayati sma/
analyzed: prakṛtiḥ mātaṅga dārikā hṛṣṭa tuṣṭā pramudita manāḥ āyuṣmataḥ ānandasya śayyām prajñapayati sma

original: ekānta^sthitaḥ sa punar āyuṣmān ānandaḥ prārodīd/
analyzed: ekānta sthitaḥ sa punar āyuṣmān ānandaḥ prārodīt

original: vyasana^prāpto +aham asmi na ca me bhagavān samanvāharati/
analyzed: vyasana prāptaḥ aham asmi na ca me bhagavān samanvāharati

original: p.3.6/.atha bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandaṃ samanvāharati sma/

analyzed: samanvāhṛtya saṃbuddha mantraiḥ caṇḍāla mantrān pratihanti sma

original: p.4.1cd/.ītayo yatra śāmyanti bhayāni calitāni ca/
p.4.2ab/.tad vai devā namsyanti sarva^siddhāś ca yoginaḥ/
analyzed: vai devāḥ sarva siddhāḥ ca yoginaḥ

original: p.4.3/.atha^āyuṣmān ānandaḥ pratihata^caṇḍāla^mantraś caṇḍāla^gṛhān niṣkramya yena svako vihāras tena^upasaṃkramitum ārabdhaḥ/
analyzed: ānandaḥ pratihata caṇḍāla mantraḥ caṇḍāla gṛhāt niṣkramya yena svakaḥ vihāraḥ tena upasaṃkramitum ārabdhaḥ

original: ānandam āyuṣmantaṃ pratigacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ svāṃ jananīm idam avocat/
analyzed: ānandam āyuṣmantam pratigacchantam dṛṣṭvā ca punar svām jananīm idam avocat

original: ayam asau mātaḥ śramaṇa ānandaḥ pratigacchati/
analyzed: ayam asau mātar śramaṇaḥ ānandaḥ pratigacchati

original: niyataṃ putri śramaṇena gautamena samanvāhṛto bhaviṣyati/
analyzed: niyatam putri śramaṇena gautamena samanvāhṛtaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: kiṃ punar amba balavattarāḥ śramaṇasya gautamasya mantrā na^asmākaṃ/
analyzed: kim punar amba balavattarāḥ śramaṇasya gautamasya mantrāḥ na asmākam
balavattarāḥ śramaṇasya gautamasya mantrāḥ na asmākam

original: ye putri mantāḥ sarva^lokasya prabhavanti tān mantrān śramaṇo gautama ākāṅkṣamāṇaḥ pratihanti/
analyzed: ye putri mantāḥ sarva lokasya prabhavanti tān mantrān śramaṇaḥ gautamaḥ ākāṅkṣamāṇaḥ pratihanti

original: na punar lokaḥ prabhavati śramaṇasya gautamasya mantrān pratihantuṃ/
analyzed: na punar lokaḥ prabhavati śramaṇasya gautamasya mantrān pratihantum
upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāt

original: p.4.6/.ekānta^sthitam āyuṣmantam ānandaṃ bhagavān idam avocat/
udgṛhṇa tvam ānanda imāṃ ṣaḍakṣarīvidyāṃ dhāraya vācaya paryavāpnuhi/
analyzed: udgṛhṇa tvam ānanda imām ṣaḍakṣarī vidyām dhāraya vācaya paryavāpnuhi

original: ātmano hitāya sukhāya bhikṣūṇāṃ bhikṣuṇīnām upāsakānām upasikānāṃ hitāya sukhāya/
analyzed: ātmanaḥ hitāya sukhāya bhikṣūṇām bhikṣuṇīnām upāsakānām upasikānām hitāya sukhāya

original: iyam ānanda ṣaḍkṣarīvidyā ṣaḍbhiḥ samyak saṃbuddhair bhāṣitā caturbhiś ca mahā^rājaiḥ śakreṇa devānām indreṇa brahmaṇā ca sahāpatinā/
analyzed: iyam ānanda ṣaḍkṣarī vidyā ṣaḍbhiḥ samyak saṃbuddhaiḥ bhāṣitā caturbhiḥ ca mahā rājaiḥ śakreṇa devānām indreṇa brahmaṇā ca sahā patinā

original: tvam apy etarhy ānanda tāṃ dhāraya vācaya paryavāpnuhi/
analyzed: tvam api etarhi ānanda tām dhāraya vācaya paryavāpnuhi

original: p.5.1/.aṇḍare pāṇḍare kāraṇḍe keyūre +arci^haste khara^grīve bandhu^mati cīra^mati dharavidha cilimile viloḍaya viṣāṇi loke/
analyzed: pāṇḍare kāraṇḍe keyūre arci haste khara grīve bandhumati cīramati dhara vidha cilimile viloḍaya viṣāṇi loke

original: gola^mati gaṇḍavile cilimile sa^atinimne yathā saṃvibhakta^gola^mati gaṇḍa^vilāyai svāhā/
analyzed: gola mati gaṇḍavile cilimile sa ati nimne yathā saṃvibhakta gola mati gaṇḍavilāyai svāhā

original: p.5.2/.yaḥ kaś cid ānanda^ṣaḍakṣaryā vidyayā paritrāṇaṃ svastyayanaṃ kuryāt sa yadi vadha^arho bhavet daṇḍena mucyate/
analyzed: kaḥ cit ānanda ṣaḍakṣaryā vidyayā paritrāṇam svastyayanam kuryāt sa yadi vadha arhaḥ bhavet daṇḍena mucyate

original: daṇḍa^arhaḥ prahāreṇa prahāra^arhaḥ paribhāṣaṇayā paribhāṣaṇa^arho romaharṣaṇena romaharṣaṇa^arhaḥ punar eva mucyate/
analyzed: daṇḍa arhaḥ prahāreṇa prahāra arhaḥ paribhāṣaṇayā paribhāṣaṇa arhaḥ romaharṣaṇena romaharṣaṇa arhaḥ punar eva mucyate

original: p.5.3 /.na^aham ānanda taṃ samanupaśyāmi sa^deva^loke samāra^loke sabrahma^loke saśramaṇa^brāhmaṇikāyāṃ
analyzed: na aham ānanda tam samanupaśyāmi sa deva loke sa māra loke sa brahma loke sa śramaṇa brāhmaṇikāyām

original: prajāyāṃ sa^deva^mānuṣikāyāṃ sa^asurāyāṃ yas tv anayā ṣaḍakṣayaṃ vidyayā rakṣāyāṃ
analyzed: prajāyām sa deva mānuṣikāyām sa asurāyām yaḥ tu anayā ṣaṣ akṣayam vidyayā rakṣāyām

original: kṛtāyāṃ rakṣā^sūtre bāhau baddhe svastyayane kṛte +abhibhavituṃ śakroti varjayitvā
analyzed: kṛtāyām rakṣā sūtre bāhau baddhe svastyayane kṛte abhibhavitum śakroti varjayitvā

original: p.6.1 /.atha prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikā tasyā eva rātryā atyayāt śiraḥ^snātā +anāhata
analyzed: atha prakṛtiḥ mātaṅga dārikā tasyāḥ eva rātryāḥ atyayāt śiraḥ snātā anāhata

original: dūṣya^prāvṛtā muktā^mālya^ābharaṇā yena śrāvasto nagarī tena^upasaṃkramya nagara^dvāre
analyzed: dūṣya prāvṛtāḥ muktā mālya ābharaṇāḥ yena śrāvastaḥ nagarī tena upasaṃkramya nagara dvāre
niyatam anena mārgeṇa ānandaḥ bhikṣu rāgam iṣyati iti

original: p.6.2/.atha^āyuṣmān ānandaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātra^cīvaram ādāya śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
analyzed: ānandaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātra cīvaram ādāya śrāvastīm piṇḍāya prāvikṣat
dadarśa prakṛtiḥ mātaṅga dārikā āyuṣmantam ānandam

original: dūrata eva dṛṣṭvā ca punar āyuṣmantam ānandaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhā gacchantam anugacchati tiṣṭhantam anutiṣṭhati/
analyzed: dūratas eva dṛṣṭvā ca punar āyuṣmantam ānandam pṛṣṭhatas pṛṣṭhatas samanubaddhā gacchantam anugacchati tiṣṭhantam anutiṣṭhati

original: yad yad eva kulaṃ piṇḍāya praviśati tasya tasyaiva dvāre tūṣṇībhūtā tiṣṭhati āyuṣmantam
analyzed: yat yat eva kulam piṇḍāya praviśati tasya tasya eva dvāre tūṣṇībhūtā tiṣṭhati āyuṣmantam

original: pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhāṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punar jehrīymāṇarūpo +apragalbhāyamānarūpo duḥkhī durmanāḥ śīghraṃ śīghraṃ śrāvastyā vinirgamya  #
analyzed: pṛṣṭhatas pṛṣṭhatas samanubaddhām dṛṣṭvā ca punar a pragalbhāyamāna rūpaḥ duḥkhī durmanāḥ śīghram śīghram śrāvastyāḥ vinirgamya
upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāt

original: ekānta^sthita āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam idam avocat/
analyzed: ekānta sthitaḥ āyuṣmān ānandaḥ bhagavantam idam avocat

original: prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikā pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhā gacchantam anugacchati,
analyzed: prakṛtiḥ mātaṅga dārikā pṛṣṭhatas pṛṣṭhatas samanubaddhā gacchantam anugacchati

original: yad yad eva kulaṃ piṇḍāya praviśāmi tasya tasyaiva dvāre tūṣṇībhūtā tiṣṭhati/
analyzed: yat yat eva kulam piṇḍāya praviśāmi tasya tasya eva dvāre tūṣṇībhūtā tiṣṭhati

original: trāhi me bhagavan trāhi me sugata/
analyzed: trāhi me bhagavan trāhi me sugata

original: p.6.4/.evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam idam avocat/
analyzed: ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam idam avocat

original: atha bhagavān prakṛtiṃ mātaṅga^dārikām idam avocat/
analyzed: atha bhagavān prakṛtim mātaṅga dārikām idam avocat

original: hiṃ te prakṛte mātaṅga^dārike ānandena bhikṣuṇā/
analyzed: hiṃ te prakṛte mātaṅga dārike ānandena bhikṣuṇā
anujñātā asi prakṛte mātā pitṛbhyām ānandāya
anujñātā asmi bhagavan anujñātā asmi sugata

original: p.7.1/.atha prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikā bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ triḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato +antikāt
analyzed: prakṛtiḥ mātaṅga dārikā bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantam tris pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavataḥ antikāt
yena svakau mātā pitarau tena upasaṃkrāntā
upasaṃkramya mātā pitroḥ pādān śirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāt

original: ekānta^sthitā svakau mātā pitarāv idam avocat/
analyzed: ekānta sthitā svakau mātā pitarā idam avocat
sammukham me amba tāta śramaṇasya gautamasya ānandāya utsṛjatam

original: p.7.2/.atha prakṛter mātaṅga^dārikāyā mātāpitarau prakṛtim ādāya yana bhagavāms tena^upasaṃkrāntau/
analyzed: prakṛteḥ mātaṅga dārikāyāḥ mātā pitarau prakṛtim ādāya bhagavān tena aupasaṃkrāntau

original: uapsaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā^ekānte nyaṣīdatāṃ/
analyzed: upa saṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte nyaṣīdatām

original: atha prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā banditvā ekānte +asthād/
analyzed: atha prakṛtiḥ mātaṅga dārikā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā banditvā ekānte asthāt
imau tau bhagavat mātā pitarau āgatau

original: p.7.3/.atha bhagavān prakṛter mātaṅga^dārikāyā mātāpitarāv idam avoct/
analyzed: bhagavān prakṛteḥ mātaṅga dārikāyāḥ mātā pitarau idam avocat
anujñātā yuvābhyām prakṛtiḥ mātaṅga dārikā ānandāya iti

original: tena hi yūyaṃ prakṛtim apahāya gacchata svagṛham/
analyzed: tena hi yūyam prakṛtim apahāya gacchata sva gṛham

original: p.7.4/.atha prakṛter mātaṅga^dārikāyā mātāpitarau bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ triḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato +antikāt prakrāntau/
analyzed: prakṛteḥ mātaṅga dārikāyāḥ mātā pitarau bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantam tris pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavataḥ antikāt prakrāntau

original: p.7.5/.atha prakṛter mātaṅga^dārikāyā mātāpitarāv aciraprakrāntau viditvā bhagavān prakṛtiṃ mātaṅga^dārikām idm avocat/
analyzed: prakṛteḥ mātaṅga dārikāyāḥ mātā pitarau acira prakrāntau viditvā bhagavān prakṛtim mātaṅga dārikām idm avocat
arthikā asmi bhagavan arthikā asmi sugata

original: tena hi prakṛte ya ānandasya veśaḥ sa tvayā dhārayitavyaḥ/
analyzed: tena hi prakṛte yaḥ ānandasya veśaḥ sa tvayā dhārayitavyaḥ

original: p.8.1/.atha bhagavān prakṛtiṃ mātaṅga^dārikām idam avocat/
analyzed: bhagavān prakṛtim mātaṅga dārikām idam avocat

original: p.8.2/.evam ukte prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikā bhagavatā muṇḍā kāṣāya^prāvṛtā/
analyzed: ukte prakṛtiḥ mātaṅga dārikā bhagavatā muṇḍā kāṣāya prāvṛtā

original: atha bhagavān prakṛtiṃ mātaṅga^dārikām ehi bhikṣuṇīvādena pravrājayitvā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati sma,
analyzed: atha bhagavān prakṛtim mātaṅga dārikām ehi bhikṣuṇī vādena pravrājayitvā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati sma

original: yeyaṃ kathā dīrgha^rātraṃ saṃsārasamāpannānāṃ pratikūlā śravaṇīyā/
analyzed: yā iyam kathā dīrgharātram saṃsāra samāpannānām pratikūlā śravaṇīyā
dāna kathā śīla kathā svarga kathā kāmeṣu

original: ādīnavaṃ niḥsaraṇaṃ bhayaṃ saṃkleśavyavadānaṃ bodhipakṣāṃs tān dharmān bhagvān prakṛtyai bhikṣuṇyai saṃprakāśayati sma/
analyzed: ādīnavam niḥsaraṇam bhayam saṃkleśa vyavadānam bodhi pakṣān tān dharmān bhagvān prakṛtyai bhikṣuṇyai saṃprakāśayati sma

original: p.8.3 /.atha prakṛtir bhikṣuṇī bhagavatā dharmyaya kathayā saṃdarśitā samādāpitā
analyzed: atha prakṛtiḥ bhikṣuṇī bhagavatā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśitā samādāpitā

original: samuttejitā saṃpraharṣitā hṛṣṭa^cittā kalyāṇacittā muditacittā vinīvaraṇacittā ṛjucittā
analyzed: samuttejitā saṃpraharṣitā hṛṣṭa cittā kalyāṇa cittā mudita cittā vinīvaraṇa cittā ṛju cittā
akhila cittāḥ bhavyāḥ dharma deśitam ājñātum

original: p.9.1 /.yadā ca bhagavān jñātaḥ prakṛtiṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ hṛṣṭa^cittāṃ kalyāṇacittāṃ muditacittāṃ
analyzed: yadā ca bhagavān jñātaḥ prakṛtim bhikṣuṇīm hṛṣṭa cittām kalyāṇa cittām mudita cittām

original: vinivaraṇacittāṃ bhavyāṃ pratibalāṃ sāmutkarpikīṃ dharma^deśanām ājñātuṃ tadā yeyaṃ
analyzed: vinivaraṇa cittām bhavyām pratibalām sāmutkarpikīm dharma deśanām ājñātum tadā yā iyam
bhagavatām buddhānām catur ārya satya prativedhikī sāmutkarṣikī dharma deśanā

original: yad uta duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodho mārgaḥ,
analyzed: yat uta duḥkham samudayaḥ nirodhaḥ mārgaḥ

original: tāṃ bhagavān prakṛter bhikṣuṇyā vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati sma/
analyzed: tām bhagavān prakṛteḥ bhikṣuṇyāḥ vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati sma

original: p.9.2/.atha prakṛtibhikṣuṇī tasminn evāsane niṣaṇṇā caturārya^satyānyabhijñātāsit/
analyzed: prakṛti bhikṣuṇī tasmin eva āsane niṣaṇṇā catur ārya satyāni abhijñātā asit

original: tad yathā vastām apagatakālakaṃ rajanopagataṃ raṅga^udake prakṣiptaṃ samyag eva raṅgaṃ
analyzed: tat yathā vastām apagata kālakam rajana upagatam raṅga audake prakṣiptam samyak eva raṅgam

original: pratigṛhṇīyād evam eva prakṛtir bhikṣuṇī tasminnevāsane niṣaṇṇā caturārya^satyāni abhisamayati sma,
analyzed: pratigṛhṇīyāt evam eva prakṛtiḥ bhikṣuṇī tasmin eva āsane niṣaṇṇā catur ārya satyāni sma

original: tad yathā duḥkhaṃ sumudayaṃ nirodhaṃ mārgam/
p.9.3 /.atha prakṛtir bhikṣuṇī kṛṣṭa^dharmā prāpta^dharmā vidita^dharmā akopya^dharmā
analyzed: atha prakṛtiḥ bhikṣuṇī kṛṣṭa dharmā prāpta dharmā vidita dharmā a kopya dharmā
paryavasita dharma adhigata artha lābha saṃvṛttā tīrṇa kāṅkṣā vicikitsā vigata kathaṃkathā
vaiśāradya prāptā apara pratyayā an anya neyā śāstuḥ śāsane anu dharma cāriṇī

original: dharmeṣu bhagavataḥ pādayoḥ śirasā nipatya bhagavantam idam avocat /
analyzed: dharmeṣu bhagavataḥ pādayoḥ śirasā nipatya bhagavantam idam avocat

original: p.9.4/.atyayo me bhagavann atyayo me sugata/
yathā bālā yathā mūḍhā yathā +avyaktā yathā +akuśalā duṣprajña^jātīyā yāham ānandaṃ bhikṣuṃ svāmi^vādena samudācarṣaṃ/
analyzed: yathā bālāḥ yathā mūḍhāḥ yathā avyaktāḥ yathā akuśalāḥ duṣprajña jātīyāḥ yā aham ānandam bhikṣum svāmi vādena samudācarṣam
sa aham bhadanta atyayam atyayataḥ paśyāmi

original: atas tasyā mama bhagavann atyayam atyayato jānātu pratigṛhṇātu
analyzed: atas tasyāḥ mama bhagavan atyayam atyayataḥ jānātu pratigṛhṇātu

original: āyatyāṃ saṃvarāya sthitvā tvaṃ prakṛte +atyayam atyayato +adhyāgamaḥ/
analyzed: āyatyām saṃvarāya sthitvā tvam prakṛte atyayam atyayataḥ adhyāgamaḥ

original: yathā bālā yathā mūḍhā yathā +avyaktā yathā +akuśalā duṣprajña^jātīya tvam ānandaṃ bhikṣuṃ svāmi^vādena (10)
analyzed: yathā bālāḥ yathā mūḍhāḥ yathā avyaktāḥ yathā akuśalāḥ duṣprajña jātīya tvam ānandam bhikṣum svāmi vādena

original: yataś ca tvaṃ prakṛte +atyayaṃ jānāsi atyayaṃ paśyasi āyatyāṃ ca saṃvaram āpadyase,
analyzed: yatas ca tvam prakṛte atyayam jānāsi atyayam paśyasi āyatyām ca saṃvaram āpadyase

original: aham api te +atyayam atyayato gṛhṇāmi/ vṛddhir
analyzed: aham api te atyayam atyayataḥ gṛhṇāmi vṛddhiḥ

original: eva te prakṛte pratikāṅkṣatavyā kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ na hāniḥ/
analyzed: eva te prakṛte pratikāṅkṣatavyā kuśalānām dharmāṇām na hāniḥ

original: p.10.1/.atha prakṛtir bhikṣuṇī bhagavatā^abhinanditā anuśiṣṭā ekāvyapakṛṣṭā +apramattā ātāpinī smṛtim atī saṃprajānā prahitāni viviktāni viharati
analyzed: prakṛtiḥ bhikṣuṇī bhagavatā abhinanditā anuśiṣṭā ekā a vyapakṛṣṭā apramattā ātāpinī smṛtim atī saṃprajānā prahitāni viviktāni viharati

original: yad arthaṃ kula^duhitaraḥ keśān avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā^āgārād
analyzed: yat artham kula duhitaraḥ keśān avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi ācchādya samyak eva śraddhayā āgārāt

original: anāgārikāṃ pravrajanti tadanuttara^brahmacarya^paryavasānaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam
analyzed: anāgārikām pravrajanti tad anuttara brahmacarya paryavasānam dṛṣṭe eva dharme svayam

original: kṣīṇā me jātir uṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ na^aparamasmād bhavaṃ prajānāmi^iti/
analyzed: kṣīṇā me jātiḥ uṣitam brahmacaryam kṛtam karaṇīyam na aparamasmāt bhavam prajānāmi iti

original: p.10.2/.aśrauṣuḥ śrāvasteyakā brāhmaṇa^gṛhapatayo bhagavatā kila canḍāla^dārikā pravrājiteti/
analyzed: śrāvasteyakāḥ brāhmaṇa gṛhapatayaḥ bhagavatā kila canḍāla dārikā pravrājitā iti

original: kathaṃ hi nāma caṇḍāla^dārikā bhikṣūṇāṃ samyakcaryāṃ cariṣyati/
analyzed: katham hi nāma caṇḍāla dārikā bhikṣūṇām samyak caryām cariṣyati
bhikṣuṇīnām upāsakānām upāsikānām samyak caryām cariṣyati

original: kathaṃ hi nāma caṇḍāla^dārikā brahma^kṣatriya^gṛhapati^mahā^śāla^kuleṣu pravekṣyati/
analyzed: katham hi nāma caṇḍāla dārikā brahma kṣatriya gṛhapati mahāśāla kuleṣu pravekṣyati

original: p.11.1/.aśrauṣīd rājā prasenajit kauśalo bhagavatā caṇḍāla^dārikā pravrājiteti/
analyzed: rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ bhagavatā caṇḍāla dārikā pravrājitā iti

original: kathaṃ hi nāma caṇḍāla^dārikā bhikṣūṇāṃ samyak^caryāṃ cariṣyati/
analyzed: katham hi nāma caṇḍāla dārikā bhikṣūṇām samyak caryām cariṣyati
bhikṣuṇīnām upāsakānām upāsikānām samyak caryām cariṣyati
katham brāhmaṇa kṣatriya gṛhapati mahāśāla kuleṣu pravekṣyati

original: p.11.2/.vimṛṣya ca bhadaraṃ yānaṃ yojayitvā bhadraṃ yānam abhiruhya saṃbahulaiś ca śrāvasteyair brāhmaṇa^gṛhapatibhiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ  #
analyzed: ca bhadaram yānam yojayitvā bhadram yānam abhiruhya saṃbahulaiḥ ca śrāvasteyaiḥ brāhmaṇa gṛhapatibhiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ
yena jetavanam anāthapiṇḍadasya ārāmaḥ tena upasaṃkrāntaḥ

original: tasya khalu yāvatī yānasya bhūmis tāvad yānena gatvā sa yānād avatīrya pattikāya^parivṛtaḥ pattikāya^puraskṛtaḥ padbhyām eva^ārāmaṃ prāvikṣat/
analyzed: tasya khalu yāvatī yānasya bhūmiḥ tāvat yānena gatvā sa yānāt avatīrya pattikāya parivṛtaḥ pattikāya puraskṛtaḥ padbhyām eva ārāmam prāvikṣat

original: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
analyzed: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ

original: te +api saṃbahulāḥ śrāvasteyakā brāhmaṇa^kṣatirya^gṛhapatayo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā^ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
analyzed: te api saṃbahulāḥ śrāvasteyakāḥ brāhmaṇa kṣa tirya gṛhapatayaḥ bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ

original: apy aikatyā bhagavatā sārdhaṃ saṃmukhaṃ saṃrañjanīṃ saṃmodinīṃ vividhāṃ kathāṃ vyatisārya^ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
analyzed: api aikatyāḥ bhagavatā sārdham saṃmukham saṃrañjanīm saṃmodinīm vividhām kathām vyatisārya ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ
svaka svakāni mātā paitṛkāṇi nāma gotrāṇi anuśrāvya ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ

original: apy aikatya yena bhagavāṃs tena^añjaliṃ praṇamya^ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
analyzed: api aikatya yena bhagavān tena añjalim praṇamya ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ

original: apy aikatyās tūṣṇīṃ bhūtā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
analyzed: api aikatyāḥ tūṣṇīm bhūtāḥ ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ

original: p.11.3 /.atha bhagavān rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalam ārabhya teṣāṃ ca saṃbahulānāṃ
analyzed: atha bhagavān rājānam prasenajitam kauśalam ārabhya teṣām ca saṃbahulānām

original: śrāvasteyakānāṃ brāhmaṇa^kṣatriya^gṛhapatīnāṃ cetasā cittam ājñāya prakṛter bhikṣuṇyāḥ
analyzed: śrāvasteyakānām brāhmaṇa kṣatriya gṛhapatīnām cetasā cittam ājñāya prakṛteḥ bhikṣuṇyāḥ
pūrva nivāsam ārabhya bhikṣūnām antrayate sma

original: icchatha yūyaṃ bhikṣavas tathā^āgatasya sammukhaṃ prakṛter bhikṣuṇyāḥ pūrva^nivāsam ārabhya dharma^kathāṃ śrotum/
analyzed: icchatha yūyam bhikṣavaḥ tathāāgatasya sammukham prakṛteḥ bhikṣuṇyāḥ pūrva nivāsam ārabhya dharma kathām śrotum

original: etasya bhagavan kāla etasya sugata samayo yad bhagavān prakṛter bhikṣuṇyāḥ pūrva^nivāsam ārabhya dharma^kathāṃ kathāyet/
analyzed: etasya bhagavan kālaḥ etasya sugata samayaḥ yat bhagavān prakṛteḥ bhikṣuṇyāḥ pūrva nivāsam ārabhya dharma kathām kathāyet

original: tena hi bhikṣavaḥ śṛṇuta sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta bhāṣiṣye/
analyzed: tena hi bhikṣavaḥ śṛṇuta sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta bhāṣiṣye

original: evaṃ sādhu bhagavann iti te bhikṣavo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣuḥ/ bhagavāṃs
analyzed: evam sādhu bhagavan iti te bhikṣavaḥ bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣuḥ bhagavān

original: p.12.1/.bhūta^pūrvaṃ bhikṣavo +atīte +adhvani gaṅgā^taṭe +atimukta^kadalī^pāṭalaka^āmalakī vana^gahana^pradeśe tatra triśaṅkur nāma mātaṅga^rājaḥ  #
analyzed: bhikṣavaḥ atīte adhvani gaṅgā taṭe atimukta kadalī pāṭalaka āmalakī vana gahana pradeśe tatra triśaṅkuḥ nāma mātaṅga rājaḥ  /

original: sa punar bhikṣavas triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rajaḥ pūrva^janma^adhītān vedān samanusmarati sma sa^aṅga^upāṅgān sarahasyān sanighaṇṭa^kaiṭabhān sa^akṣara^prabhedān
analyzed: sa punar bhikṣavaḥ triśaṅkuḥ mātaṅga rajaḥ pūrva janma adhītān vedān samanusmarati sma sa aṅga aupāṅgān sa rahasyān sa nighaṇṭa kaiṭabhān sa akṣara prabhedān

original: padako vaiyākaraṇo lokāyata^yajña^mantre mahā^puruṣa^lakṣaṇe niṣṇāto niṣkāṅkṣo bhāṣyaṃ ca yathārdharmaṃ veda^vrata^padāny anuśrutaṃ ca bhāṣate
analyzed: padakaḥ vaiyākaraṇaḥ lokāyata yajña mantre mahāpuruṣa lakṣaṇe niṣṇātaḥ niṣkāṅkṣaḥ bhāṣyam ca veda vrata padāni anuśrutam ca bhāṣate

original: p.12.2/.tasya triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rājasya śārdūakarṇo nāma kumāro +abhūd utpannaḥ/
analyzed: triśaṅkuḥ mātaṅga rājasya śārdūakarṇaḥ nāma kumāraḥ abhūt utpannaḥ

original: rūpataś ca kulataś ca śīlataś ca guṇataś ca sarva^guṇaiś ca^upeto +abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ paramayā śubha^varṇa^puṣkalatayā samanvāgataḥ/
analyzed: rūpataḥ ca kulataḥ ca śīlataḥ ca guṇataḥ ca sarva guṇaiḥ ca aupetaḥ abhirūpaḥ darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ paramayā śubha varṇa puṣkala tayā samanvāgataḥ

original: śārdūlakarṇaṃ kumāraṃ pūrva^janmādhītān vedān adhyāpayati sma/
analyzed: śārdūlakarṇam kumāram pūrva janma adhītān vedān adhyāpayati sma

original: yad uta sa^aṅga^upāṅgān sarahasyān sanighaṇṭa^kaiṭabhān sa^akṣara^prabhedān itihāsa^pañca^mānanyāni ca śāstrāṇi bhāṣyaṃ ca yathā^dharmaṃ veda^vrata^padāni/
analyzed: yat uta sa aṅga aupāṅgān sa rahasyān sa nighaṇṭa kaiṭabhān sa akṣara prabhedān itihāsa pañcamān anyāni ca śāstrāṇi bhāṣyam ca yathādharmam veda vrata padāni

original: ayaṃ mama putraḥ śārdūlakarṇo nāma kumāraḥ/
analyzed: ayam mama putraḥ śārdūlakarṇaḥ nāma kumāraḥ

original: upeto rūpataś ca kulataś ca śīlataś ca guṇataś ca/
analyzed: upetaḥ rūpataḥ ca kulataḥ ca śīlataḥ ca guṇataḥ ca

original: darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ paramayā ca varṇa^puṣkalatayā samanvāgataḥ/
analyzed: darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ paramayā ca varṇa puṣkala tayā samanvāgataḥ

original: samayo +ayaṃ yan ny aham asya niveśana^dharmaṃ kariṣye/ tat kuto ny
analyzed: samayaḥ ayam yat ni aham asya niveśana dharmam kariṣye tat kutas ni

original: avaṃ śārdūlakarṇasya putrasya śīlavatīṃ guṇavatīṃ rūpavatīṃ pratirūpāṃ prajāvatīṃ labheyam iti/checked
analyzed: śārdūlakarṇasya putrasya śīlavatīm guṇavatīm rūpavatīm pratirūpām prajāvatīm labheyam iti checked

original: p.13.1/.tasmin khalu samaye puṣkarasārī nāma brāhmaṇa utkūṭaṃ nāma droṇa^mukhaṃ paribhuṅkte sma/
analyzed: khalu samaye puṣkarasārī nāma brāhmaṇaḥ utkūṭam nāma droṇa mukham paribhuṅkte sma

original: samapta^utsadaṃ sa^tṛṇa^kāṣṭha^udakaṃ dhānya^sahagataṃ rājñā +agnidattena brahma^deyaṃ dattam/
analyzed: samapta autsadam sa tṛṇa kāṣṭha audakam dhānya sahagatam rājñā agnidattena brahmadeyam dattam

original: p.13.2/.puṣkarasārī punar brāhmaṇa upetaḥ mātṛtaḥ pitṛtaḥ saṃśuddho gṛhiṇyāmanākṣipto jātivādena gotra^vādena yāvad āsaptamamātāmahapitāmahaṃ/
analyzed: punar brāhmaṇaḥ upetaḥ mātṛtaḥ pitṛtaḥ saṃśuddhaḥ gṛhiṇyām an ākṣiptaḥ jāti vādena gotra vādena yāvat ā saptama mātāmaha pitāmaham

original: yugapad upādhyāyo +adhyāpako mantra^dharas trayāṇāṃ vedānāṃ pāragaḥ sa^aṅga^upāṅgānāṃ
analyzed: yugapad upādhyāyaḥ adhyāpakaḥ mantradharaḥ trayāṇām vedānām pāragaḥ sa aṅga aupāṅgānām
sa rahasyānām sa nighaṇṭa kaiṭabhānām sa akṣara prabhedānām itihāsa pañcamānām sadṛśa vyākartā
loka āyata yajña mantra mahāpuruṣa lakṣaṇeṣu pāragaḥ
sphītam utkūṭam nāma droṇa mukham paribhuṅkte

original: p.13.3/.puṣkarasāriṇo brāhmaṇasya prakṛtir nāma māṇavikā duhitā bhūtā/
analyzed: brāhmaṇasya prakṛtiḥ nāma māṇavikā duhitā bhūtā

original: upetā rūpataś ca kulataś ca śīlataś ca guṇataś ca/
analyzed: upetāḥ rūpataḥ ca kulataḥ ca śīlataḥ ca guṇataḥ ca

original: sarva^guṇa^upetā +abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā paramayā varṇa^puṣkalatayā samanvāgatā śīlavatī guṇavatī/
analyzed: sarva guṇa aupetā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā paramayā varṇa puṣkala tayā samanvāgatā śīlavatī guṇavatī
asti uttarapūrveṇa autkūṭaḥ nāma droṇa mukhaḥ
sa ca autkūṭam droṇa mukham paribhṅkte

original: sasapta^utsadaṃ satṛṇa^kāṣṭha^udakaṃ dhānya^bhogaiḥ sahagataṃ rājñā +agnidattena brahma^deyaṃ dattam/
analyzed: sa sapta autsadam sa tṛṇa kāṣṭha audakam dhānya bhogaiḥ sahagatam rājñā agnidattena brahmadeyam dattam

original: p.14.1 /.tasya puṣkarasāriṇo brāhmaṇasya prakṛtir nāma māṇavikā duhitā upetā rūpataś
analyzed: tasya puṣkarasāriṇaḥ brāhmaṇasya prakṛtiḥ nāma māṇavikā duhitā upetā rūpataḥ

original: ca kulataś ca śīlataś ca sarva^guṇa^upetā +abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā paramayā
analyzed: ca kulataḥ ca śīlataḥ ca sarva guṇa opetā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā paramayā

original: śīlavatī guṇavatī putrasya me śārdūlakarṇasya pratirūpā patnī bhaviṣyatiti/
analyzed: śīlavatī guṇavatī putrasya me śārdūlakarṇasya pratirūpā patnī bhaviṣyati iti

original: p.14.2 /.atra triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rāja etam evārthaṃ bahulaṃ rātrau cintayitvā vitarkya
analyzed: atra triśaṅkuḥ mātaṅga rājaḥ etam eva artham bahulam rātrau cintayitvā vitarkya

original: tasyā eva rātryā atyayāt pratyūṣa^kāla^samaye sarva^śvetaṃ vaḍavā ratham abhiruhya
analyzed: tasyāḥ eva rātryāḥ atyayāt pratyūṣa kāla samaye sarva śvetam vaḍavā ratham abhiruhya
mahatā śvapāka gaṇena amātya gaṇena parivṛtaḥ caṇḍāla kula nagarāt niṣkramya auttarena

original: p.14.3 /.atha triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rāja utkūṭasya^uttarapūrveṇa sumanaskaṃ nāma^udyānaṃ
analyzed: atha triśaṅkuḥ mātaṅga rājaḥ utkūṭasya auttarapūrveṇa sumanaskam nāma audyānam

original: nānā^vṛkṣa^saṃcchannaṃ nānā^vṛkṣa^kusumitaṃ nānā^dvijanikūjitaṃ nandanam iva devānāṃ tad upasaṃkrāntaḥ /
analyzed: nānā vṛkṣa saṃcchannam nānā vṛkṣa kusumitam nānā dvija nikūjitam nandanam iva devānām tat upasaṃkrāntaḥ

original: brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī māṇavakān mantrān vācayitum ihāgamiṣyati^iti/
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī māṇavakān mantrān vācayitum iha āgamiṣyati iti

original: p.14.4/.atha brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī tasyā eva rātryā atyayāt sarva^śvetaṃ vaḍavāratham abhiruhya śiṣyagaṇaprivṛtaḥ pañca^mātrair māṇavaka^śateḥ  #
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī tasyāḥ eva rātryāḥ atyayāt sarva śvetam vaḍavā ratham abhiruhya śiṣya gaṇa privṛtaḥ pañca mātraiḥ māṇavaka śateḥ  /

original: p.15.1 /.adrākṣīt triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rājo brāhmaṇaṃ puṣkarasāriṇaṃ sūryam iva^udayantaṃ
analyzed: adrākṣīt triśaṅkuḥ mātaṅga rājaḥ brāhmaṇam puṣkarasāriṇam sūryam iva audayantam

original: tejasā jvalantam iva hutavahaṃ yajñam iva brāhmaṇa^parivṛtaṃ śakram iva deva^gaṇaparivṛtaṃ
analyzed: tejasā jvalantam iva hutavaham yajñam iva brāhmaṇa parivṛtam śakram iva deva gaṇa parivṛtam

original: haimavantam ivauṣadhibhiḥ samudram iva ratnaiś candram iva nakṣatrair vaiśravaṇam
analyzed: haimavantam iva oṣadhibhiḥ samudram iva ratnaiḥ candram iva nakṣatraiḥ vaiśravaṇam

original: iva yakṣa^gaṇair brahmāṇam iva deva^rṣigaṇaiḥ parivṛtaṃ śobhamānaṃ /
analyzed: iva yakṣa gaṇaiḥ brahmāṇam iva devarṣi gaṇaiḥ parivṛtam śobhamānam
ca enam pratyudgamya yathādharmam kṛtvā idam avocat

original: kāryaṃ ca te vakṣyāmi tac chrūyatāṃ/
analyzed: kāryam ca te vakṣyāmi tat śrūyatām

original: evam ukte brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī triśaṅkumātaṅga^rājam idam avocat/
analyzed: evam ukte brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī triśaṅku mātaṅga rājam idam avocat

original: p.15.3/.na hi bhos triśaṅko śakyaṃ brāhmaṇena saha bhoḥ kāraṃ kartuṃ/
analyzed: hi bhoḥ triśaṅko śakyam brāhmaṇena saha bhoḥ kāram kartum

original: p.15.4/.ahaṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin śaknomi bhoḥ kāraṃ kartuṃ/
analyzed: bhoḥ puṣkarasārin śaknomi bhoḥ kāram kartum

original: yacchakyaṃ me kartuṃ bhavati naiva tacchakyaṃ te kartuṃ/
analyzed: yat śakyam me kartum bhavati na eva tat śakyam te kartum

original: api tu catvāro bhoḥ puṣkarasārin puruṣasya kāryasamārambhāḥ pūrva^samārabdhā bhavanti/
analyzed: api tu catvāraḥ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin puruṣasya kārya samārambhāḥ pūrva samārabdhāḥ bhavanti

original: yad uta ātmārthaṃ vā parārthaṃ vātmīyārthaṃ (16)
analyzed: yat uta ātma artham vā para artham vā ātmīya artham
vā sarva bhūta saṃgraha artham vā

original: idaṃ ca^atra mahattaraṃ kāryaṃ yat te vyākhyāsyāmi tac chrūyatāṃ/ putrāya
analyzed: idam ca atra mahattaram kāryam yat te vyākhyāsyāmi tat śrūyatām putrāya

original: me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ duhitaram utsṛja bhāryā^arthāya/
analyzed: me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtim duhitaram utsṛja bhāryā arthāya
yāvantam kula śulkam manyase tāvantam dāsyāmi

original: p.16.1 /.idaṃ ca khalu punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkor mātaṅga^rājasya bhṛśaṃ brāhmaṇaḥ
analyzed: idam ca khalu punarvacanam śrutvā triśaṅkoḥ mātaṅga rājasya bhṛśam brāhmaṇaḥ

original: puṣkarasārī abhiṣaktaḥ kupitaś caṇḍībhūto +anāttamanāḥ kopaṃ ca kveṣaṃ ca mrakṣyaṃ
analyzed: puṣkarasārī abhiṣaktaḥ kupitaḥ caṇḍībhūtaḥ an ātta manāḥ kopam ca kveṣam ca mrakṣyam

original: ca tatpratyayāt saṃjanayitvā lalāṭe triśikhāṃ bhṛkuṭiṃ kṛtvā kaṇṭhaṃ dhamayitvā +akṣiṇī
analyzed: ca tad pratyayāt saṃjanayitvā lalāṭe tri śikhām bhṛkuṭim kṛtvā kaṇṭham dhamayitvā akṣiṇī

original: parivartya nakula^piṅgalāṃ dṛṣṭim utpādya triśaṅkuṃ mātaṅga^rājam idam avocat /
analyzed: parivartya nakula piṅgalām dṛṣṭim utpādya triśaṅkum mātaṅga rājam idam avocat

original: yastvaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ veda^pāragaṃ hīnaś caṇḍāla^yonijo bhūtvā icchasy avamardituṃ/
analyzed: yaḥ tvam brāhmaṇam vedapāragam hīnaḥ caṇḍāla yoni jaḥ bhūtvā icchasi avamarditum
prārthaya a prārthanīyām vāyum pāśena bandhaya

original: p.17.1ab/. na hi cāmī^karaṃ mūḍha bhaved bhasma kadācana/
analyzed: na hi cāmīkaram mūḍha bhavet bhasma kadācana

original: p.17.2ab/.caṇḍāla^yonijas tvaṃ hi dvijātiḥ punar apy ahaṃ/
analyzed: tvam hi dvijātiḥ punar api aham

original: p.17.2cd/.hīnaḥ śreṣṭhena sambandhaṃ mūḍha prāthayase kathaṃ//
p.17.3cd/.na hi śreṣṭhaḥ prahīnena sambandhaṃ kartum icchati//
analyzed: hi śreṣṭhaḥ prahīnena sambandham kartum icchati

original: p.17.4ab/.śreṣṭhāḥ śreṣṭhair hi sambandhaṃ kurvantīha dvijātayaḥ/
analyzed: śreṣṭhaiḥ hi sambandham kurvanti iha dvijātayaḥ

original: p.17.4cd/.vidyayā ye tu sampannāḥ saṃśuddhaś caraṇena ca//
analyzed: ye tu sampannāḥ saṃśuddhaḥ caraṇena ca

original: p.17.5ab/.jātyā caivān abhikṣiptā mantraiḥ paramatāṃ gatāḥ/
analyzed: ca evān abhikṣiptāḥ mantraiḥ parama tām gatāḥ

original: p.17.6ab/.nighaṇṭakaiṭabhān vedān brāhmaṇa ye hy adhīyate/
p.17.6cd/.tais tādṛśair hi sambandhaṃ kurvantīha dvijātayaḥ//
analyzed: tādṛśaiḥ hi sambandham kurvanti iha dvijātayaḥ

original: p.17.7ab/.na hi śreṣṭho hi hīnena sambandhaṃ kartum icchati/
analyzed: hi śreṣṭhaḥ hi hīnena sambandham kartum icchati

original: p.17.8ab/.yad asmābhiś ca sambandham iha tvaṃ kartum icchasi/
analyzed: asmābhiḥ ca sambandham iha tvam kartum icchasi

original: p.17.8ef/.gaccha tvaṃ vṛṣala kṣipraṃ kim asmān avamanyase//
analyzed: tvam vṛṣala kṣipram kim asmān avamanyase

original: p.18.1ab/.caṇḍālāḥ saha caṇḍālaiḥ pukkaśāḥ saha pukkaśaiḥ/
p.18.1cd/.kurvantīhaiva sambandhaṃ jātibhir jātir eva ca//
p.18.2ab/.brāhmaṇā brāhmaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ kṣatriyāḥ kṣatriyaiḥ saha/
p.18.2cd/.sārdhaṃ vaiśyās tathā vaiśyaiḥ śūdrāḥ śūdrais tathā saha//
analyzed: vaiśyāḥ tathā vaiśyaiḥ śūdrāḥ śūdraiḥ tathā saha

original: p.18.3cd/.na hi kurvanti caṇḍālāḥ sambandhaṃ brāhmaṇaiḥ saha//
analyzed: hi kurvanti caṇḍālāḥ sambandham brāhmaṇaiḥ saha

original: p.18.4cd/.kathaṃ hīnaś ca śreṣṭhena sambandhaṃ kartum icchasi//
analyzed: hīnaḥ ca śreṣṭhena sambandham kartum icchasi

original: p.18.5/.idaṃ punarvacanaṃ śrutvā brāhmaṇasya puṣkarasāriṇas triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rāja idam avocat/
analyzed: punarvacanam śrutvā brāhmaṇasya puṣkarasāriṇaḥ triśaṅkuḥ mātaṅga rājaḥ idam avocat

original: p.18.6cd/.brāhmaṇe vānya^jātau vā na viśeṣo +asti vai tathā//
analyzed: vā anya jātau vā na viśeṣaḥ asti vai tathā

original: p.18.7cd/.brāhmaṇe vānya^jātau vā na viśeṣo +asti vai tathā//
analyzed: vā anya jātau vā na viśeṣaḥ asti vai tathā

original: p.18.8cd/.bhitvā vā pṛthivīṃ jāto jāta^vedā yathāraṇeḥ//
analyzed: vā pṛthivīm jātaḥ jātavedāḥ yathā araṇeḥ

original: p.18.9cd/.śreṣṭhatve vṛṣalatve ca kiṃ vā paśyasi kāraṇaṃ//
analyzed: vṛṣala tve ca kim vā paśyasi kāraṇam
api mṛta utsṛṣṭaḥ jugupsyaḥ aśuciḥ ucyate

original: p.18.10cd/.varṇās tathā^eva vā^apy anye kā nu tatra viśeṣatā//
analyzed: tathā eva vā api anye kā nu tatra viśeṣa tā

original: p.19.1ab/.yat kiñ cit pāpakaṃ karma kilviṣaṃ kalir eva ca/
analyzed: kim cit pāpakam karma kilviṣam kaliḥ eva ca
dāruṇaiḥ ca api puṇyaḥ aham dvijāḥ

original: p.19.3cd/.mantrair hi prokṣitāḥ santaḥ svargaṃ gacchanty ajaiḍakāḥ//
analyzed: hi prokṣitāḥ santaḥ svargam gacchanti aja eḍakāḥ

original: p.19.4ab/.yady eṣa mārgaḥ svartāya kasmān na brāhmaṇā hy amī/
analyzed: eṣa mārgaḥ svartāya kasmāt na brāhmaṇāḥ hi amī

original: p.19.4cd/.ātmānam athavā bandhūn mantraiḥ saṃprokṣayanti vai//
p.19.5ab/.mātaraṃ pitaraṃ ca^eva bhrātaraṃ bhaginīṃ tathā/
analyzed: pitaram ca eva bhrātaram bhaginīm tathā

original: p.19.5cd/.putraṃ duhitaraṃ bhāryāṃ dvijā na prokṣayanty amī//
analyzed: duhitaram bhāryām dvijāḥ na prokṣayanti amī

original: p.19.6ab/.mitraṃ jñātiṃ sakhīṃ vā^api ye vā viṣayavāsinaḥ/
analyzed: jñātim sakhīm vā api ye vā viṣaya vāsinaḥ

original: p.19.6cd/.prokṣitās te +api vā mantraiḥ sarve yāsyanti sadgatiṃ//
analyzed: te api vā mantraiḥ sarve yāsyanti sat gatim

original: p.19.7ab/.sarve yajñaiḥ samāhutā gamiṣyanti satāṃ gatiṃ/
p.19.7cd/.paśubhiḥ kiṃ nu bho yaṣṭair ātmānaṃ kiṃ na yakṣyase//
analyzed: kim nu bho yaṣṭaiḥ ātmānam kim na yakṣyase

original: p.19.8ab/.na prokṣaṇair na mantraiś ca svargaṃ gacchanty ajaiḍakāḥ/
analyzed: prokṣaṇaiḥ na mantraiḥ ca svargam gacchanti aja eḍakāḥ

original: p.19.8cd/.na hy eṣa mārgaḥ svargāya mithyāprokṣaṇam ucyate//
analyzed: hi eṣa mārgaḥ svargāya mithyā prokṣaṇam ucyate

original: p.19.9ab/.brāhmaṇair audracittais tu paryāyo hy eṣa cintitaḥ/
analyzed: audracittaiḥ tu paryāyaḥ hi eṣa cintitaḥ

original: p.19.9cd/.māṃsaṃ khāditukāmais tu prokṣaṇaṃ kalpitaṃ paśoḥ//
analyzed: khāditu kāmaiḥ tu prokṣaṇam kalpitam paśoḥ

original: p.19.10ab/.anyac ca^ahaṃ pravakṣyāmi brāhmaṇair yat prakalpitaṃ/
analyzed: ca aham pravakṣyāmi brāhmaṇaiḥ yat prakalpitam

original: p.20.1cd/.brahmāghnatā ca catvāraḥ pātakā brāhmaṇeṣv amī//
p.20.2cd/.suvarṇaṃ yo hared vipraḥ sa tena +abrāhmaṇo bhavet//
analyzed: yaḥ haret vipraḥ sa tena abrāhmaṇaḥ bhavet

original: p.20.3cd/.surāṃ tu yaḥ pived vipraḥ sa tena^abrāhmaṇo bhavet//
analyzed: tu yaḥ pivet vipraḥ sa tena abrāhmaṇaḥ bhavet

original: p.20.4cd/.guru^dārāṃ tu yo gacchet sa tena^abrāhmaṇo bhavet//
analyzed: tu yaḥ gacchet sa tena abrāhmaṇaḥ bhavet

original: p.20.5ab/.na hanyād brāhmaṇaṃ hy ekaṃ hanyād anyān anekaśaḥ/
analyzed: hanyāt brāhmaṇam hi ekam hanyāt anyān anekaśas

original: p.20.5cd/.hayātta brāhmaṇaṃ yo vai sa tena^abrāhmaṇo bhavet//
analyzed: brāhmaṇam yaḥ vai sa tena abrāhmaṇaḥ bhavet

original: p.20.6ab/.ity ete pātakā hy uktā brāhmaṇeṣu catur^vidhāḥ/
analyzed: ete pātakāḥ hi uktāḥ brāhmaṇeṣu caturvidhāḥ
a brāhmaṇāḥ yena tatas anye a pātakāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: p.20.7ab/.kṛtvā caturṇam ekaikaṃ bhaved abrāhmaṇas tu saḥ/
analyzed: caturṇam ekaikam bhavet abrāhmaṇaḥ tu saḥ

original: p.20.7cd/.labhate na ca sāmīcīṃ brāhmaṇāṇāṃ samāgame/
p.20.7ef/.āsanaṃ ca^udakaṃ ca^eva vyutthānaṃ sa na ca^arhati//
analyzed: ca audakam ca eva vyutthānam sa na ca arhati

original: p.20.8ab/.tasya niḥsaranaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ brāhmaṇaiḥ patitasya tu/
p.20.8cd/.vrataṃ vai sa samādāya punar brāhmaṇatāṃ vrajet//
analyzed: vai sa samādāya punar brāhmaṇa tām vrajet

original: p.20.9cd/.khāṭvāṅgam ucchritaṃ kṛtvā mṛtaśīrṣe ca bhojanaṃ//
analyzed: ucchritam kṛtvā mṛta śīrṣe ca bhojanam

original: p.21.1cd/.pūrṇe dvādaśame varṣe punar brāhmaṇatāṃ vrajet//
analyzed: dvādaśame varṣe punar brāhmaṇa tām vrajet

original: p.21.2ab/.iti niḥsaraṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ brāhmaṇais tu tapasvibhiḥ/
p.21.3/ tad idaṃ brāhmaṇa te bravīmi,
saṃjñāmātrakam idaṃ lokasya yad idam ucyate brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra ity vā/
analyzed: saṃjñā mātrakam idam lokasya yat idam ucyate brāhmaṇaḥ iti vā kṣatriyaḥ iti vā vaiśyaḥ iti vā śūdraḥ iti vā

original: sarvam idam ekam eveti vijñaya putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ māṇavikāmanuprayaccha bhāryā^arthāya/
analyzed: sarvam idam ekam eva iti vijñaya putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtim māṇavikām anuprayaccha bhāryā arthāya
yāvantam kula śulkam manyase tāvantam anupradāsyāmi

original: idaṃ ca khalu punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkor mātaṅga^rājasya
analyzed: idam ca khalu punarvacanam śrutvā triśaṅkoḥ mātaṅga rājasya

original: brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī abhiṣaktaḥ kupitaś caṇḍībhūto +anāttamanāḥ kopaṃ ca dveṣaṃ ca catpratyayaṃ janayitvā lalāṭe triśikhāṃ bhṛkuṭiṃ kṛtvā
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī abhiṣaktaḥ kupitaḥ caṇḍībhūtaḥ an ātta manāḥ kopam ca dveṣam ca cat pratyayam janayitvā lalāṭe tri śikhām bhṛkuṭim kṛtvā

original: dhamayitvā +akṣiṇī parivartya nakula^piṅgalāṃ dūṣṭim utpādya triśaṅkuṃ mātaṅga^rājam idam avocat/
analyzed: dhamayitvā akṣiṇī parivartya nakula piṅgalām dūṣṭim utpādya triśaṅkum mātaṅga rājam idam avocat

original: p.22.1cd/.ekaiva jātir loke +asmin sāmānyā na pṛthag^vidhā//
analyzed: jātiḥ loke asmin sāmānyā na pṛthagvidhā

original: tad yathā deśa^dharme vā nagara^dharme vā grāma^dharme vā nigamadhama vā śulka^dharme vā āvāha^dharme vā vivāha^dharme vā pūrva^karmasu vā/
analyzed: tat yathā deśa dharme vā nagara dharme vā grāma dharme vā nigama dharme vā śulka dharme vā āvāha dharme vā vivāha dharme vā pūrva karmasu vā

original: yad uta brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ śūdra iti/
analyzed: yat uta brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyaḥ vaiśyaḥ śūdraḥ iti

original: teṣāṃ vivāha^dharmeṣu catasro bhāryā brāhmaṇasya bhavanti/
analyzed: teṣām vivāha dharmeṣu catasraḥ bhāryāḥ brāhmaṇasya bhavanti

original: śūdrasya av ekā bhāryā bhavati śūdrī eva/
analyzed: śūdrasya au ekā bhāryā bhavati śūdrī eva

original: evaṃ brāhmaṇasya vṛṣala catvāraḥ putrā bhavanti/
analyzed: evam brāhmaṇasya vṛṣala catvāraḥ putrāḥ bhavanti

original: tad yathā brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ śūdraś ceti/
analyzed: tat yathā brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyaḥ vaiśyaḥ śūdraḥ ca iti

original: śūdra iti/ śūdrasya tv eka eva putro bhavati yad uta śūdra eva/
analyzed: śūdraḥ iti śūdrasya tu ekaḥ eva putraḥ bhavati yat uta śūdraḥ eva

original: p.22.4/.te brāhmaṇāḥ punar vṛṣala brahmaṇaḥ putrāḥ/
p.22.5/.brahmaṇā^ayaṃ khalu vṛṣala lokaḥ sarva^bhūtāni nirmitāni/
analyzed: khalu vṛṣala lokaḥ sarva bhūtāni nirmitāni

original: p.23.1ab/.tasya jyeṣṭhā vayaṃ putrāḥ kṣatriyās tad anantaraṃ/
analyzed: jyeṣṭhāḥ vayam putrāḥ kṣatriyāḥ tat anantaram

original: p.23.2/.sa tvaṃ vṛṣala caturthe +api varṇe na saṃdṛśyase/
analyzed: tvam vṛṣala caturthe api varṇe na saṃdṛśyase

original: ahaṃ ca^agre varṇe śreṣṭhe varṇe parame varṇe pravare varṇe/
analyzed: aham ca agre varṇe śreṣṭhe varṇe parame varṇe pravare varṇe

original: paramārthaṃ ca saṃyogamākāṅkṣasi praṇaśya tvaṃ vṛṣala kṣipraṃ /
analyzed: parama artham ca saṃyogam ākāṅkṣasi praṇaśya tvam vṛṣala kṣipram

original: p.23.3/.idaṃ punarvacanaṃ śrutvā brāhmaṇasya puṣkarasāriṇas triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rāja idam avocat/
analyzed: punarvacanam śrutvā brāhmaṇasya puṣkarasāriṇaḥ triśaṅkuḥ mātaṅga rājaḥ idam avocat

original: idam atra brāhmaṇa śṛṇu yad bravīmi/
analyzed: idam atra brāhmaṇa śṛṇu yat bravīmi

original: p.23.4ab/.tasya jyeṣṭhā vayaṃ putrāḥ kṣatriyās tad anantaraṃ/
analyzed: jyeṣṭhāḥ vayam putrāḥ kṣatriyāḥ tat anantaram
trṛtīyakāḥ varṇāḥ śūdra nāmnā caturthakaḥ iti

original: p.23.5ab/.sapāda^jaṅghāḥ sanakhāḥ samāṃsāḥ sapārśvapṛṣṭhāś ca narā bhavanti/
analyzed: sa nakhāḥ sa māṃsāḥ sa pārśva pṛṣṭhāḥ ca narāḥ bhavanti

original: p.23.5cd/.ekāṃśato nāsti yato viśeṣo varṇāś ca catvāra ito na santi//
analyzed: na asti yatas viśeṣaḥ varṇāḥ ca catvāraḥ itas na santi

original: p.23.6ab/.atho viśeṣaḥ pravatosti kaścit tad brūhi yac ca^anumataṃ yathā te/
analyzed: viśeṣaḥ pravatoḥ asti kaścid tat brūhi yat ca anumatam yathā te

original: p.23.6cd/.atho viśeṣaḥ pravaro hi nāsti varṇāś ca catvāra ito na santi//
analyzed: viśeṣaḥ pravaraḥ hi na asti varṇāḥ ca catvāraḥ itas na santi

original: p.24.1ab/. yathā hi dāurukā bālāḥ krīḍamānā mahā^pathe/
analyzed: yathā hi dāurukāḥ bālāḥ krīḍamānāḥ mahāpathe

original: p.24.2cd/.na ca bālasya vacanāt pāṃśavo +annaṃ bhavanti hi//
analyzed: ca bālasya vacanāt pāṃśavaḥ annam bhavanti hi

original: p.24.3ab/.varṇās tathāiva catvāro yathā brāhmaṇa bhāṣase/
analyzed: tathā iva catvāraḥ yathā brāhmaṇa bhāṣase

original: p.24.3cd/.pāṃśupuñjābhidhānena yogo [yaḥ ko] py eṣa na vidyate//
analyzed: yogaḥ yaḥ kaḥ api eṣa na vidyate

original: p.24.4ab/.na keśena na karṇābhyāṃ na śīrṣaṇa na cakṣuṣā/
analyzed: keśena na karṇābhyām na śīrṣaṇā na cakṣuṣā

original: p.24.4cd/.na mukhena na nāsayā na grīvaya na bāhunā//
analyzed: mukhena na nāsayā na grīvayā na bāhunā
atha jañṅhābhyām pāṇi pāda nakhena ca

original: p.24.6ab/.na svareṇa na varṇena na sarvāṃśair na maithunaiḥ/
analyzed: svareṇa na varṇena na sarva aṃśaiḥ na maithunaiḥ

original: p.24.7ab/.yathā hi jātiṣv anyāsu liṅgaṃ yoniḥ pṛthak pṛthak/
analyzed: hi jātiṣu anyāsu liṅgam yoniḥ pṛthak pṛthak

original: p.24.7cd/.sāmānyaṃ kāraṇaṃ tatra kiṃ vā jātiṣu manyase//
analyzed: kāraṇam tatra kim vā jātiṣu manyase

original: p.24.8ab/.saśīrṣakāś ca^atha narāsthi^yuktāḥ sacarmakāḥ sendriyasodarāś ca/
analyzed: ca atha nara asthi yuktāḥ sa carmakāḥ sa indriya sodarāḥ ca

original: p.24.8cd/.ekāṃśato nāsti yato viśeṣo varṇā na yuktāś caturo +abhidhātuṃ//
analyzed: na asti yatas viśeṣaḥ varṇāḥ na yuktāḥ caturaḥ abhidhātum

original: p.24.9ab/.athāsti kaścit pravaro viśeṣas tad brūhi yaccānumataṃ yathā te/
analyzed: kaścid pravaraḥ viśeṣaḥ tat brūhi yat ca anumatam yathā te

original: p.24.9cd/.atho viśeṣaḥ pravaro +atra nāsti varṇā na yuktāś caturobhidhātuṃ//
analyzed: viśeṣaḥ pravaraḥ atra na asti varṇāḥ na yuktāḥ

original: p.25.1ab/.doṣo hy ayaṃ ca^atra bhaved ayukto yad yat tvayā ca^abhihitaṃ nidāne/
analyzed: hi ayam ca atra bhavet ayuktaḥ yat yat tvayā ca abhihitam nidāne

original: p.25.1cd/.śrutvā tu mattaḥ pratipadya saumya yac ca^atra manye śṛṇucodyamānaṃ//
analyzed: tu mattaḥ pratipadya saumya yat caatra manye śṛṇu codyamānam

original: p.25.2ab/.yac ca^atra yuktaṃ viṣamaṃ samaṃ vā tāt te pravakṣyāmi niyujyamānaḥ/
analyzed: ca atra yuktam viṣamam samam vā tāt te pravakṣyāmi niyujyamānaḥ

original: p.25.2cd/.doṣo hi yaś ca^api bhaved ayukto vakṣyāmi te hy uttarata^uttaraṃ ca/
analyzed: hi yaḥ ca api bhavet ayuktaḥ vakṣyāmi te hi ca

original: p.25.3ef/.śrutvā tu mattaḥ pratipadya saumya karma^adhipatyaprabhavā manuṣyāḥ//
analyzed: tu mattaḥ pratipadya saumya karma adhipatya prabhavāḥ manuṣyāḥ

original: p.25.4/.anumānam api te brāhmaṇa yadi pramāṇaṃ,
tatra yad bravīṣi brahmā eka iti tasmāt prajā api eka^jātyā eva/
analyzed: tatra yat bravīṣi brahmā ekaḥ iti tasmāt prajāḥ api eka jātyāḥ eva

original: yac ca vravīṣi brahmaṇā^ayaṃ lokaḥ sarva^bhūtāni ca nirmitāni^iti/
analyzed: yat ca vravīṣi brahmaṇā ayam lokaḥ sarva bhūtāni ca nirmitāni iti
sa ced te brāhmaṇaḥ idam pramāṇam

original: tad idaṃ te brāhmaṇa ayuktaṃ yad bravīṣi catvāro varṇā brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyā śūdrāś ceti/
analyzed: tat idam te brāhmaṇa ayuktam yat bravīṣi catvāraḥ varṇāḥ brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyāḥ vaiśyā śūdrāḥ ca iti

original: p.25.4/.api tu brāhmaṇa mithyā mama vaco bhavet yadi brāhmaṇa saṃvādena munuṣyajāter nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
analyzed: tu brāhmaṇa mithyā mama vacaḥ bhavet yadi brāhmaṇa saṃvādena munuṣya jāteḥ nānākaraṇam prajñāyate

original: yad uta śīrṣato vā mukhato vā karṇato vā nāsikāto vā (26)
analyzed: yat uta śīrṣataḥ vā mukhataḥ vā karṇataḥ vā nāsikātaḥ vā

original: bhrūto vā rūpato vā saṃsthānato vā varṇato vā ''kārato vā yonito vā ''hārato vā sambhāvato vā nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
analyzed: bhrūtaḥ vā rūpataḥ vā saṃsthānataḥ vā varṇataḥ vā kārataḥ vā yonitaḥ vā hārataḥ vā sambhāvataḥ vā nānākaraṇam prajñāyate

original: p.26.1/.tad yathā^api bhoḥ puṣkarasārin gavāś ca gardabho ṣṭramṛgapakṣyajaiḍakā^nāmaṇḍajajarāyujasaṃsvedajaupapādukānāṃnānā^karanaṃ prajñāyate/
analyzed: yathā api bhoḥ puṣkarasārin gavāḥ ca gardabha u ṣṭra mṛga pakṣya ja eḍakānām aṇḍa ja jarāyu ja saṃsveda ja upapādukānām nānā karanam prajñāyate

original: yad uta pādato +api mukhatopi varṇato +api saṃsthānato +api āhārato +api yonisambhavato +api nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate naca^evaṃ teṣāṃ caturṇāṃ  #
analyzed: yat uta pādataḥ api mukhataḥ api varṇataḥ api saṃsthānataḥ api āhārataḥ api yoni sambhavataḥ api nānākaraṇam prajñāyate na ca evam teṣām caturṇām

original: tat tasmāt sarvam idam ekam iti/
analyzed: tat tasmāt sarvam idam ekam iti
ca brāhmaṇa amīṣām phalgu vṛkṣāṇām āmrātaka jambu kharjūra panasa dālāvana tinduka mṛdvīka bījapūraka kapittha akṣoḍa nārikela tiniśa karañja ādīnām

original: yad uta mūlataś ca skandhataś ca tvagbhāgataś ca sārataś ca patrataś ca puṣpataś ca phalataś ca nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
analyzed: yat uta mūlataḥ ca skandhataḥ ca tvac bhāgataḥ ca sārataḥ ca patrataḥ ca puṣpataḥ ca phalataḥ ca nānākaraṇam prajñāyate

original: na ca^evaṃ caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
analyzed: na ca evam caturṇām varṇānām nānākaraṇam prajñāyate
yathā brāhmaṇa amīṣām sthala jānām vṛkṣāṇām sāra tamāla naktamāla karṇikāra saptaparṇa śirīṣa kovidāra syandana candana śiṃśapā eraṇḍa khadira ādīnām

original: p.26.4/.yad uta mūlataś ca skandhataś ca tvagbhāgataś ca gulmataś ca sārataś ca patrataś ca puṣpataś ca phalataś ca viśeṣa upalabhyate/
analyzed: uta mūlataḥ ca skandhataḥ ca tvac bhāgataḥ ca gulmataḥ ca sārataḥ ca patrataḥ ca puṣpataḥ ca phalataḥ ca viśeṣaḥ upalabhyate

original: na ca^evaṃ caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
analyzed: na ca evam caturṇām varṇānām nānākaraṇam prajñāyate

original: p.26.5/.tad yathā bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn amīṣāṃ kṣīravṛkṣāṇām udumbaraplakṣāśvatthanyagrodhavalgukety evam ādīnāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
analyzed: yathā bhoḥ puṣkarasārin amīṣām kṣīravṛkṣāṇām udumbara plakṣa aśvattha nyagrodha valgukā iti evam ādīnām nānākaraṇam prajñāyate

original: yad uta mūlataś ca skandhataś ca tvag bhāgataś ca sārataś ca patrataś ca puṣpataś ca phalataś ca nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
analyzed: yat uta mūlataḥ ca skandhataḥ ca tvac bhāgataḥ ca sārataḥ ca patrataḥ ca puṣpataḥ ca phalataḥ ca nānākaraṇam prajñāyate

original: na tv eva caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
analyzed: na tu eva caturṇām varṇānām nānākaraṇam prajñāyate

original: p.26.6 /.tad yathā puṣkarasārinn amīṣām api phalabaiṣajyavṛkṣāṇām āmalakīharītakīvibhītakī
analyzed: tat yathā puṣkarasārin amīṣām api phala baiṣajya vṛkṣāṇām āmalakī harītakī vibhītakī

original: pharasaka^ādīnām anyāsām api vividhānām oṣadhīnāṃ grāma^jānāṃ pārvatīyānāṃ tṛṇa^vanaspatīnāṃ
analyzed: anyāsām api vividhānām oṣadhīnām grāma jānām pārvatīyānām tṛṇa vanaspatīnām

original: yad uta mūlataś ca skandhataś ca (27)
analyzed: yat uta mūlataḥ ca skandhataḥ ca

original: gulmataś ca sārataś ca patrataś ca puṣpataś ca phalataś ca nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
analyzed: gulmataḥ ca sārataḥ ca patrataḥ ca puṣpataḥ ca phalataḥ ca nānākaraṇam prajñāyate

original: p.27.1/.tad yathā sthalajānāṃ puṣpa^vṛkṣāṇām atimuktaka^campaka^pāṭalānāṃ sumanā vārṣikādhanaṣkārika^ādīnāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
analyzed: yathā sthala jānām puṣpa vṛkṣāṇām atimuktaka campaka pāṭalānām sumanāḥ vārṣika dhanaṣkārika ādīnām nānākaraṇam prajñāyate

original: yad uto rūpato +api varṇato +api gandhato +api saṃsthānato +api nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
analyzed: yat uta u rūpataḥ api varṇataḥ api gandhataḥ api saṃsthānataḥ api nānākaraṇam prajñāyate

original: na tv eva caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
analyzed: na tu eva caturṇām varṇānām nānākaraṇam prajñāyate

original: p.27.2/.tad yathā brāhmaṇām īṣām api jalajānāṃ puṣpāṇāṃ padma^utpala^saugandhika^mṛdu^gandhika^ādīnāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
analyzed: yathā brāhmaṇām īṣām api jala jānām puṣpāṇām padma autpala saugandhika mṛdugandhika ādīnām nānākaraṇam prajñāyate

original: yad uta rūpataś ca gandhataś ca saṃsthānataś ca vaṇataś ca nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
analyzed: yat uta rūpataḥ ca gandhataḥ ca saṃsthānataḥ ca vaṇataḥ ca nānākaraṇam prajñāyate
na tu eva varṇānām nānākaraṇam prajñāyate

original: tad yathā puṣkarasārin amī brāhmaṇā iti kṣatriyā iti vaiśyā iti śūdrā iti/
analyzed: tat yathā puṣkarasārin amī brāhmaṇāḥ iti kṣatriyāḥ iti vaiśyāḥ iti śūdrāḥ iti
tasmāt ekam eva edam sarvam iti

original: p.27.3ab/.apy anyat te pravakṣyāmi brāhmaṇaiḥ kalpitaṃ yath/ā/
analyzed: anyat te pravakṣyāmi brāhmaṇaiḥ kalpitam yathā

original: p.27.3cd/.śiraḥ satāraṃ gaganam ākāśam udaraṃ tathā//
analyzed: sa tāram gaganam ākāśam udaram tathā

original: p.27.4ab/.parvatāś ca^apy ubhāv ūrū pādau ca dharaṇī^talaṃ/
analyzed: ubhau ūrū pādau ca dharaṇī talam

original: p.27.5ab/.aśrūṇy avocad varṣā +asya nadyaḥ prasrāvam eva ca/
analyzed: avocat varṣāḥ asya nadyaḥ prasrāvam eva ca

original: yasmād brahmaṇo brāhmaṇā utpannās tasmāt kṣatriyā api vaiśyā api śūdrā apy utpannāḥ/
analyzed: yasmāt brahmaṇaḥ brāhmaṇāḥ utpannāḥ tasmāt kṣatriyāḥ api vaiśyāḥ api śūdrāḥ api utpannāḥ

original: p.28.2ab/.evaṃ prasūtir yadi tatvataḥ syāt tato hi syād varṇa^kṛto viśeṣaḥ/
analyzed: prasūtiḥ yadi tatvataḥ syāt tatas hi syāt varṇa kṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ

original: p.28.2cd/.yadi brāhmaṇā brahma^lokaṃ vrajeyus trayaś ca varṇā na vrajeyuḥ svargaṃ/
analyzed: brāhmaṇāḥ brahma lokam vrajeyuḥ trayaḥ ca varṇāḥ na vrajeyuḥ svargam

original: p.28.2ef/.evaṃ bhaved varṇa^kṛto viśeṣo na cenna catvāro bhavanti varṇāḥ//
analyzed: bhavet varṇa kṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ na ced na catvāraḥ bhavanti varṇāḥ

original: p.28.3ab/.yasmād dhi varṇaś caturtha evaṃ prayāti svargaṃ svakṛtena karmaṇā/
analyzed: dhi varṇaḥ caturthaḥ evam prayāti svargam sva kṛtena karmaṇā

original: p.28.3cd/.yatas tapaś ca^ārṣam iha praśastaṃ tasmād dvijāter na viśeṣaṇaṃ syād//
analyzed: tapaḥ ca ārṣam iha praśastam tasmāt dvijāteḥ na viśeṣaṇam syāt

original: p.28.4ab/.yadi brāhmaṇaḥ syād ihaika eva dvijihvaś catuḥ^śravaṇas tathā^eva/
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ syāt iha ekaḥ eva dvi jihvaḥ catur śravaṇaḥ tathā eva

original: p.28.4cd/.catur^viṣāṇo bahupād dviśīrṣa evaṃ kṛte varṇa^kṛto viśeṣaḥ//
analyzed: bahu pād dvi śīrṣaḥ evam kṛte varṇa kṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ

original: p.29.1ab/.rāgaiś ca nāma paraghātanaṃ ca evaṃ prakāraṃ ca viheṭhanaṃ ca/
analyzed: ca nāma para ghātanam ca evam prakāram ca viheṭhanam ca

original: p.29.1cd/.sattvasya vai karmaṇo dhvaṃsanaṃ ca etāny akalyāṇakṛtāni vipraiḥ//
analyzed: vai karmaṇaḥ dhvaṃsanam ca etāni akalyāṇa kṛtāni vipraiḥ

original: p.29.2ab/.yuddhaṃ vivādṃ kalahāny abhīkṣṇaṃ goprokṣaṇaṃ cintitaṃ brāhmaṇair hi/
analyzed: vivādam kalahāni abhīkṣṇam go prokṣaṇam cintitam brāhmaṇaiḥ hi

original: p.29.2cd/.atharvaṇaḥ karmaṇā trāsanaṃ ca etāni mantrāṇi kṛtāni vipraiḥ//
analyzed: karmaṇā trāsanam ca etāni mantrāṇi kṛtāni vipraiḥ

original: p.29.3ab/.pāpecchatā bahu^jana^vañcanaṃ ca śāṭhyaṃ ca dhaurtyaṃ ca tathā^eva kalpaṃ/
analyzed: bahu jana vañcanam ca śāṭhyam ca dhaurtyam ca tathā eva

original: p.29.3cd/.evaṃ pareṣām ahitaṃ vicintya kadā ca te svargam ito vrajeyuḥ//
analyzed: pareṣām ahitam vicintya kadā ca te svargam itas vrajeyuḥ

original: p.29.4ab/.ye brāhmaṇā ugratapā vinītā vratena śīlena sadā hy upetāḥ/
analyzed: brāhmaṇāḥ ugra tapāḥ vinītāḥ vratena śīlena sadā hi upetāḥ

original: p.29.4cd/.ahiṃsakā ye dama saṃyame ratās te brāhmaṇā brahma^puraṃ vrajanti//
analyzed: ye saṃyame ratāḥ te brāhmaṇāḥ brahma puram vrajanti

original: p.29.5ab/.saha^asthi^māṃsaḥ sanakhaḥ sacarmā duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ mūtra^purīṣam ekaṃ/
analyzed: sa nakhaḥ sa carmā duḥkham sukham mūtra purīṣam ekam

original: p.29.5cd/.pañca^indriyair nāsti yato viśeṣas tasmān na vai varṇa^catuṣka eṣaḥ//
analyzed: na asti yatas viśeṣaḥ tasmāt na vai varṇa catuṣkaḥ eṣaḥ

original: p.29.6/.tad yathā nāma brāhmaṇa kasya^cit puruṣasya catvāraḥ putrā bhaveyuḥ/
analyzed: yathā nāma brāhmaṇa kasyacid puruṣasya catvāraḥ putrāḥ bhaveyuḥ

original: sa teṣāṃ nāmāni kuryān nandaka iti vā jīvaka iti vā aśoka iti vā śatāyur iti vā /
analyzed: sa teṣām nāmāni kuryāt nandakaḥ iti vā jīvakaḥ iti vā aśokaḥ iti vā śatāyuḥ iti vā

original: iṣṭāś ca (30) punar bho etasya puruṣasya putrā bhaveyuḥ/
analyzed: iṣṭāḥ ca punar bho etasya puruṣasya putrāḥ bhaveyuḥ
yaḥ śata āyuḥ sa varṣa śatam jīvet

original: p.30.1/.nāmataḥ punar brāhmaṇa teṣāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate na jātitaḥ/
analyzed: punar brāhmaṇa teṣām nānākaraṇam prajñāyate na jātitaḥ

original: iha khalu punar brāhmaṇa pitṛtaḥ putro jāyte/
analyzed: iha khalu punar brāhmaṇa pitṛtaḥ putraḥ jāyte
tasmāt ca tatra idam vyākaraṇam bhavati

original: p.30.2ab/.mātā bhastrā pituḥ putro yena jātaḥ sa eva saḥ/
analyzed: bhastrā pituḥ putraḥ yena jātaḥ saḥ eva saḥ

original: p.30.2cd/.yady evaṃ bho vijānāsi na te (putrā)
analyzed: evam bho vijānāsi na te putrā

original: p.30.3/.parīkṣasva brāhmaṇa saṃyageva ko +atra brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ śūtra iti/
analyzed: brāhmaṇa kaḥ atra brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyaḥ vaiśyaḥ śūtraḥ iti

original: p.30.4ab/.sarve kāṇāś ca kubjāś ca sarve +apasmāriṇopi vā/
analyzed: kāṇāḥ ca kubjāḥ ca sarve apasmāriṇaḥ api vā

original: p.30.4cd/.kilāsinaḥ kuṣṭhinaś ca gaurāḥ kṛṣṇāḥ pṛthak pṛthak//
analyzed: kuṣṭhinaḥ ca gaurāḥ kṛṣṇāḥ pṛthak pṛthak

original: p.30.5/.pratiṣṭhitāḥ samamajjānakhatvacapārśva^udaravaktrāḥ prajā hi tāḥ svakarmaṇā/
analyzed: sama majjā nakha tvaca pārśva audara vaktrāḥ prajāḥ hi tāḥ sva karmaṇā

original: evaṃ gate brāhmaṇa naiva bhavati viśeṣaḥ/
analyzed: evam gate brāhmaṇa na eva bhavati viśeṣaḥ

original: p.30.6/.yasmān na jāter viśeṣaṇo +asti tasmān na vai varṇa^catuṣka eva/
analyzed: na jāteḥ viśeṣaṇaḥ asti tasmāt na vai varṇa catuṣkaḥ eva

original: p.31.1/.tasmāt te brāhmaṇa bravīmi saṃjñāmātram idaṃ lokasya yad idaṃ brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra iti vā caṇḍāla iti
analyzed: te brāhmaṇa bravīmi saṃjñā mātram idam lokasya yat idam brāhmaṇaḥ iti vā kṣatriyaḥ iti vā vaiśyaḥ iti vā śūdraḥ iti vā caṇḍālaḥ iti

original: putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ duhitaram utsṛja bhāryā^arthāya yāvantaṃ kula^śulkaṃ manyase tāvantam anupradāsyāmi/
analyzed: putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtim duhitaram utsṛja bhāryā arthāya yāvantam kula śulkam manyase tāvantam anupradāsyāmi

original: p.31.2/.idaṃ punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkor mātaṅga^rājasya brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārīdam avocat/
analyzed: punarvacanam śrutvā triśaṅkoḥ mātaṅga rājasya brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārīdam avocat

original: adhyātmam api mṛgacakraṃ vā nakṣatra^gaṇo vā tithi^kramagaṇo vā tvayādhītaḥ/
analyzed: adhyātmam api mṛga cakram vā nakṣatra gaṇaḥ vā tithi krama gaṇaḥ vā tvayā adhītaḥ
athavā aṅga vidyā vā vastra vidyā
vā śivā vidyā śakuni vidyā vā tvayā adhītā

original: athavā rāhucairtaṃ vā śukra^caritaṃ vā grahacaritaṃ vā tvayādhītaṃ/
analyzed: athavā rāhu cairtam vā śukra caritam vā graha caritam vā tvayā adhītam

original: athavā lokāyateṃ bhavatā bhāṣyapravacanaṃ vā pakṣādhyāyo vā nyāyo vā tvayādhītaḥ/
analyzed: athavā bhavatā bhāṣya pravacanam vā pakṣādhyāyaḥ vā nyāyaḥ vā tvayā adhītaḥ

original: p.32.1/.evam ukte triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rāhaḥ puṣkarasāriṇaṃ brāhmaṇam etad avocat/
analyzed: ukte triśaṅkuḥ mātaṅga rāhaḥ puṣkarasāriṇam brāhmaṇam etat avocat

original: etac ca mayā brāhmaṇādhītaṃ bhūyaś ca^uttaraṃ /
analyzed: etat ca mayā brāhmaṇa adhītam bhūyas ca auttaram

original: yad api te brāhmaṇa evaṃ syād aham asmi mantreṣu pāraṃ prāpta iti/
analyzed: yat api te brāhmaṇaḥ evam syāt aham asmi mantreṣu pāram prāptaḥ iti

original: tatra te brāhmaṇa saha dharmeṇānumānaṃ pravakṣyāmi/
analyzed: tatra te brāhmaṇa saha dharmeṇa anumānam pravakṣyāmi

original: na khalv evaṃ brāhmaṇa prāthamakalpikānāṃ sattvānām etad abhavat/
analyzed: na khalu evam brāhmaṇa prāthamakalpikānām sattvānām etat abhavat

original: yad uta brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya
analyzed: yat uta brāhmaṇaḥ iti vā kṣatriyaḥ iti vā vaiśya

original: p.32.2/.atha brāhmaṇa sattvānāmasadṛśānāṃ ca^ubhayathā sadṛśānāṃ tato +anye sattvāḥ śālikṣetrāṇi kelāyanti gopāyanti vāpayanti vā/
analyzed: brāhmaṇa sattvānām asadṛśānām ca ubhayathā sadṛśānām tatas anye sattvāḥ śāli kṣetrāṇi kelāyanti gopāyanti vāpayanti vā
te amī kṣatriyāḥ iti saṃjñā udapādi

original: athātra brāhmaṇa tad anyatamānāṃ sattānām etad abhavat/
analyzed: atha atra brāhmaṇa tat anyatamānām sattānām etat abhavat

original: parigraho rogaḥ parigraho gaṇḍaḥ parigrahaḥ śalyaḥ/
analyzed: parigrahaḥ rogaḥ parigrahaḥ gaṇḍaḥ parigrahaḥ śalyaḥ
yat nu vayam sva parigraham apahāya araṇya āyatanam gatvā

original: tṛṇa^kāṣṭhaśākhāparṇapalāśakānupasaṃhṛtya tṛṇa^kuṭikāṃ vā parṇakuṭikāṃ vā kṛtvā praviśya dhyāyena iti/
analyzed: tṛṇa kāṣṭha śākhā parṇa palāśakān upasaṃhṛtya tṛṇa kuṭikām vā parṇa kuṭikām vā kṛtvā praviśya dhyāyena iti

original: p.32.3/.atha te sattvās taṃ svakaṃ parigraham apahāyāraṇyāyatanaṃ gatvā tṛṇa^kāṣṭhaśākhāpatraparṇapalāśakais tṛṇa^kuṭiṃ vā parṇakuṭikāṃ vā  #
analyzed: te sattvāḥ tam svakam parigraham apahāya araṇya āyatanam gatvā tṛṇa kāṣṭha śākhā patra parṇa palāśakaiḥ tṛṇa kuṭim vā parṇa kuṭikām vā
kṛtvā tatra eva praviśya dhyāyanti sma

original: te tatra sāyam āsanahetoḥ prāntavāṭikāṃ prātaraśanahetoś ca grāmaṃ piṇḍāya praviśanti sma/
analyzed: te tatra sāyam āsana hetoḥ prānta vāṭikām prātaraśana hetoḥ ca grāmam piṇḍāya praviśanti sma

original: p.32.4/.atha teṣāṃ grāma^vāsināṃ sattvānām etad abhavat/
analyzed: teṣām grāma vāsinām sattvānām etat abhavat

original: duṣkarakārakā vata bhoḥ sattvā ye svakaṃ parigraham utṛjya grāma^nigamajana^padebhyo bahir nirgatās teṣāṃ bahirmanaskā brāhyaṇā iti saṃjñā
analyzed: duṣkara kārakāḥ vata bhoḥ sattvāḥ ye svakam parigraham grāma nigama janapadebhyaḥ bahis nirgatāḥ teṣām bahis manaskāḥ brāhyaṇāḥ iti saṃjñā

original: te ca punar grāma^vāsinaḥ sattvās tān atīva satkurvanti sma/
analyzed: te ca punar grāma vāsinaḥ sattvāḥ tān atīva satkurvanti sma

original: p.33.1/.atha teṣām eva sattvānām anyatame sattvās tāni dhyānāny asaṃbhāvayanto grāmeṣv avatīrya mantra^padān svādhyāyanti sma/
analyzed: teṣām eva sattvānām anyatame sattvāḥ tāni dhyānāni a saṃbhāvayantaḥ grāmeṣu avatīrya mantra padān su ādhyāyanti sma

original: tāṃs te grāma^nivāsina āhuḥ --- na levalam ime sattvā ime +adhyāpakāḥ,
analyzed: tān te grāma nivāsinaḥ āhuḥ na levalam ime sattvāḥ ime adhyāpakāḥ

original: teṣām adhyāpakā iti loke saṃjñā udapādi/
analyzed: teṣām adhyāpakāḥ iti loke saṃjñā udapādi

original: p.33.2/.ayaṃ hetur ayaṃ pratyayo brāhmaṇānāṃ loke prādurbhāvāya/
analyzed: hetuḥ ayam pratyayaḥ brāhmaṇānām loke prādurbhāvāya

original: athānyatame sattvā viveka^kāla^pratisaṃyuktān karma^antān vividhān artha^pratisaṃyuktān kurvanti sma/
analyzed: atha anyatame sattvāḥ viveka kāla pratisaṃyuktān karma antān vividhān artha pratisaṃyuktān kurvanti sma

original: p.33.3/.athānyatame sattvāḥ kṣudreṇa karmaṇā jīvikāṃ kalpayanti sma/
analyzed: sattvāḥ kṣudreṇa karmaṇā jīvikām kalpayanti sma

original: p.33.4/.bhūta^pūrvaṃ brāhamṇa anyatamaḥ sattvo vadhūm ādāya ratham āruhyānyatam asminn araṇyapradeśe gataḥ/
analyzed: brāhamṇaḥ anyatamaḥ sattvaḥ vadhūm ādāya ratham āruhya anyatam asmin araṇya pradeśe gataḥ

original: tasmān mātaṅgama [mā tvaṃ gamaḥ] iti saṃjñā udapādi/
analyzed: tasmāt mātaṅgama mā tvam gamaḥ iti saṃjñā udapādi

original: p.33.5/.kṣetraṃ karṣanti ye teṣāṃ karṣakā iti saṃjñā prvṛttā/
analyzed: karṣanti ye teṣām karṣakāḥ iti saṃjñā prvṛttā

original: bhāṣyeṇa ca parṣadaṃ rañjayati dharmeṇa śīlabratasamācāreṇa samyak,
analyzed: bhāṣyeṇa ca parṣadam rañjayati dharmeṇa śīla brata samācāreṇa samyak

original: p.33.6/.tato +anye sattvā vāṇijyayā jīvikāṃ kalpayanti teṣāṃ vaṇija iti saṃjñā (34) udapādi/
analyzed: anye sattvāḥ vāṇijyayā jīvikām kalpayanti teṣām vaṇijaḥ iti saṃjñā udapādi
tatas ca anye sattvāḥ pravrajanti sma

original: pravrajitvā parān jayanti kleśān jayanti^iti teṣāṃ pravrajitā iti loke saṃjñā udapādi/
analyzed: pravrajitvā parān jayanti kleśān jayanti iti teṣām pravrajitāḥ iti loke saṃjñā udapādi

original: p.34.1/.api tu brāhmaṇa ekaiva saṃjñā loka udapādi/
analyzed: tu brāhmaṇe ekā eva saṃjñā loke udapādi

original: śukaḥ paṇḍitaś ca vedān vibhajati sma/
analyzed: śukaḥ paṇḍitaḥ ca vedān vibhajati sma

original: tad yathā puṣyo bahv^ṛcānāṃ paṃktiś chantogānām eka^viṃśatir adhvaryavaḥ/
analyzed: tat yathā puṣyaḥ bahvṛcānām paṃktiḥ chantogānām ekaviṃśatiḥ adhvaryavaḥ

original: tad yathā śuklā valkalā māṇḍavyā iti/
analyzed: tat yathā śuklāḥ valkalāḥ māṇḍavyāḥ iti

original: paṃktir ety ekā bhūtvā sa^aśīti^sahasradhā bhinnā/
analyzed: paṃktiḥ eti ekā bhūtvā sa aśīti sahasradhā bhinnā

original: tad yathā śīlavalkā araṇemikā laukākṣāḥ kauthumā brahma^samā mahā^samā mahā^yāgikāḥ sa^atyam ugrāḥ samanta^vedāḥ/
analyzed: tat yathā śīlavalkāḥ araṇemikāḥ laukākṣāḥ kauthumāḥ brahma samāḥ mahā samāḥ mahāyāgikāḥ saatyam ugrāḥ samanta vedāḥ

original: paṃktir ity ekā bhūtvā sa^aśīti sahasradhā bhinnā/
analyzed: paṃktiḥ iti ekā bhūtvā sa aśīti sahasradhā bhinnā

original: ete brāhmaṇā eka^viṃśaty adhvaryavo bhūtvā eka^uttaraśatadhā bhinnāḥ/
analyzed: ete brāhmaṇāḥ ekaviṃśatī adhvaryavaḥ bhūtvā ekauttaraśatadhā bhinnāḥ

original: tad yathā kaṭhāḥ kaṃinā vājasaneyino jātukarṇāḥ proṣṭhapadā ṛṣayaḥ/
analyzed: tat yathā kaṭhāḥ kaṃināḥ vājasaneyinaḥ jātukarṇāḥ proṣṭhapadāḥ ṛṣayaḥ

original: tatra daśa kaṭhā daśa kaṇimā ekādaśa vājasaneyinaḥ/
analyzed: tatra daśa kaṭhāḥ daśa kaṇimāḥ ekādaśa vājasaneyinaḥ
kratuḥ ekaḥ ṣoḍaśa auttara dvādaśa śatadhā bhinnaḥ

original: p.36.4/.anumānam api brāhmaṇa pramāṇaṃ pratītya etāni dvādaśa^bhedaśatāni ṣoḍaśabhedāś ca ye brāhmaṇaiḥ paurāṇaiḥ samyag dṛṣṭāḥ/
analyzed: api brāhmaṇa pramāṇam pratītya etāni dvādaśa bheda śatāni ṣoḍaśa bhedāḥ ca ye brāhmaṇaiḥ paurāṇaiḥ samyak dṛṣṭāḥ

original: chandasi vā vyākaraṇe vā lokāyate vā (37)
analyzed: chandasi vā vyākaraṇe vā lokāyate vā
pada mīmāṃsāyām vā na ca eṣām ūha apohaḥ prajñāyate

original: yad uta eka^jātyo nāmeti viditvā bandhur bhavitum arhati/
analyzed: yat uta ekajātyaḥ nāma iti viditvā bandhuḥ bhavitum arhati

original: tat te vrāhmaṇa bravīmi saṃjñāmātrakam etal lokasya yad uta brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya
analyzed: tat te vrāhmaṇa bravīmi saṃjñā mātrakam etat lokasya yat uta brāhmaṇaḥ iti vā kṣatriya

original: iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra iti vā/
analyzed: iti vā vaiśyaḥ iti vā śūdraḥ iti vā

original: putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ duhitaram utsṛja bhāryā^arthāya yāvantaṃ kula^śulkaṃ manyase tāvantam anupradāsyāmi/
analyzed: putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtim duhitaram utsṛja bhāryā arthāya yāvantam kula śulkam manyase tāvantam anupradāsyāmi

original: p.37.1/.idaṃ punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkor mātaṅga^rājasya brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī tuṣṇīṃbhūto madgubhūtaḥ srastaskandho +adhomukho niṣpratibhaḥ  #
analyzed: punarvacanam śrutvā triśaṅkoḥ mātaṅga rājasya brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī tuṣṇīṃbhūtaḥ madgu bhūtaḥ srasta skandhaḥ adhomukhaḥ niṣpratibhaḥ

original: p.37.2/.dadarśa triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rājo brāhmaṇaṃ puṣkarasāriṇaṃ tṛṣṇīṃbhūtaṃ madgubhūtaṃ srasta^skandham adhomukhaṃ niṣpratibhaṃ pradhyānaparaṃ
analyzed: triśaṅkuḥ mātaṅga rājaḥ brāhmaṇam puṣkarasāriṇam tṛṣṇīṃbhūtam madgu bhūtam srasta skandham adhomukham niṣpratibham pradhyāna param

original: yad api te brāhmaṇa evaṃ syād asadṛśena saha sambandho bhaviṣyati^iti/
analyzed: yat api te brāhmaṇaḥ evam syāt asadṛśena saha sambandhaḥ bhaviṣyati iti
na punar tvayā brāhmaṇa evam draṣṭavyam
ye pramāṇa śruti śīla praññā ādayaḥ guṇāḥ

original: lokasya te mama putrasya śārdūlakarṇasya saṃvidyante/
analyzed: lokasya te mama putrasya śārdūlakarṇasya saṃvidyante

original: yad api te brāhmaṇa evaṃ syāt --- ye vājapiyaṃ yajñaṃ yajanti/
analyzed: yat api te brāhmaṇaḥ evam syāt ye vājapiyam yajñam yajanti

original: aśvamedhaṃ puruṣa^medhaṃ śāmyaprāśaṃ nirargaḍaṃ yajñaṃ yajanti,
analyzed: aśvamedham puruṣamedham śāmyaprāśam nirargaḍam yajñam yajanti

original: sarve te kāyasya bhedātsugatau svarga^loke deveṣūpapadyanta iti/
analyzed: sarve te kāyasya bhedāt sugatau svarga loke deveṣu upapadyante iti
na punar brāhmaṇa tvayā evam draṣṭavyam

original: vājapeyaṃ brāhmaṇa yajñaṃ yajamānā aśvamedhaṃ puruṣa^medhaṃ
analyzed: vājapeyam brāhmaṇa yajñam yajamānāḥ aśvamedham puruṣamedham

original: śāmyaprāśaṃ nirargaḍaṃ yajñaṃ ca yajamānā bahudhā mantrān pravartayantaḥ prāṇihiṃsāṃ ca pravartayanti/
analyzed: śāmyaprāśam nirargaḍam yajñam ca yajamānāḥ bahudhā mantrān pravartayantaḥ prāṇi hiṃsām ca pravartayanti

original: tasmāt te brāhmaṇa bravīmi na hy eṣa mārgaḥ svargāya/
analyzed: tasmāt te brāhmaṇa bravīmi na hi eṣa mārgaḥ svargāya

original: ahaṃ te brāhmaṇa mārgaṃ svargāya vyākhāmi/ tac chṛṇu/
analyzed: aham te brāhmaṇa mārgam svargāya tat śṛṇu

original: p.38.1cd/.praśaṃsāṃ vitta^lābhaṃ ca pretya svarge ca modanaṃ//
analyzed: vitta lābham ca pretya svarge ca modanam

original: p.38.2/.yair brāhmaṇa itaḥ pūrvaṃ vājapeyo yajña iṣṭaḥ/
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ itas pūrvam vājapeyaḥ yajñaḥ iṣṭaḥ

original: yair aśvamedho yaiḥ puruṣa^medho yaiḥ śāmyaprāśo yair nirargaḍo yajña iṣṭaḥ,
analyzed: yaiḥ aśvamedhaḥ yaiḥ puruṣamedhaḥ yaiḥ śāmyaprāśaḥ yaiḥ nirargaḍaḥ yajñaḥ iṣṭaḥ

original: parigṛhītas tair nirargalaṃ ca kāmaiḥ kāmaḥ/
analyzed: parigṛhītaḥ taiḥ nirargalam ca kāmaiḥ kāmaḥ

original: ye brāhmaṇa itaḥ paścād vājapeyaṃ yajñaṃ yakṣyanti ye +aśvamedhaṃ puruṣa^medhaṃ ye śāmyaprāśaṃ nirargaḍaṃ yajñaṃ yakṣyanti te nirarthakaṃ mahā^vighātaṃ
analyzed: ye brāhmaṇaḥ itas paścāt vājapeyam yajñam yakṣyanti ye aśvamedham puruṣamedham ye śāmyaprāśam nirargaḍam yajñam yakṣyanti te nirarthakam mahā vighātam

original: p.38.3/.tasmāt te brāhmana bravīmi --- ehi tvaṃ mayā sārdhaṃ sambandhaṃ yojayasvā/
analyzed: te brāhmana bravīmi ehi tvam mayā sārdham sambandham yojayasva

original: dharmeṇa hi caṇḍālā ajugupsanīyā bhavanti/ api ca/
analyzed: dharmeṇa hi caṇḍālāḥ a jugupsanīyāḥ bhavanti api ca

original: p.39.1ab/.śraddhā śīlaṃ tapastyāgaḥ śrutir jñānaṃ dayaiva ca/
analyzed: śīlam tapaḥ tyāgaḥ śrutiḥ jñānam dayā eva ca
sarva vedānām svarga vrata padāni vai

original: tad ebhir aṣṭābhiḥ prakāraiḥ svargagamanam iṣyate/
analyzed: tat ebhiḥ aṣṭābhiḥ prakāraiḥ svarga gamanam iṣyate

original: ye prāyeṇa jānanti viśeṣeṇa khalv apy anekair vividhari yajñaiḥ/
analyzed: ye prāyeṇa jānanti viśeṣeṇa khalu api anekaiḥ yajñaiḥ

original: aṣṭau cemā brāhmaṇa nirdiṣṭā mātṛtulyā bhaginyo loke pravartante/
analyzed: aṣṭau ca imāḥ brāhmaṇa nirdiṣṭāḥ mātṛ tulyāḥ bhaginyaḥ loke pravartante

original: p.39.3/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin brāhmaṇānāṃ saptagotrāṇi vyākhyāsyāmi tāni śrūyantāṃ/
analyzed: khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin brāhmaṇānām sapta gotrāṇi vyākhyāsyāmi tāni śrūyantām

original: tad yathā gautamā vātsyāḥ kautsāḥ kauśikāḥ kāśyapā vāśiṣṭhā māṇḍavyā ity etāni brāhmaṇa saptagotrāṇi/
analyzed: tat yathā gautamāḥ vātsyāḥ kautsāḥ kauśikāḥ kāśyapāḥ vāśiṣṭhāḥ māṇḍavyāḥ iti etāni brāhmaṇa sapta gotrāṇi

original: atra ye gautamās te kauthumāste gargās te bharadvājāsta ārṣṭiṣeṇās te vaikhānasās te (40)
analyzed: atra ye gautamāḥ te kauthumāḥ te gargāḥ te bharadvājāḥ te ārṣṭiṣeṇāḥ te vaikhānasāḥ te

original: te maitreyās te bhārgavās te sāvarṇyā ste salolās te bahujātāḥ/
analyzed: te maitreyāḥ te bhārgavāḥ te sāvarṇyāḥ te salolāḥ te bahu jātāḥ

original: tatra ye kautsās te maudgalyāyanās te gauṇāyanās te lāṅgalāste lagnāste daṇḍalagnāste soma^bhuvāḥ[vah}/
analyzed: tatra ye kautsāḥ te maudgalyāyanāḥ te gauṇāyanāḥ te lāṅgalāḥ te lagnāḥ te daṇḍa lagnāḥ te

original: tatra ye kauśikās te kātyāyanās te darbhakātyāyanās te valkalinas te pakṣiṇas te laukākṣās te lohita^āyanāḥ (lohityāyanāḥ) /
analyzed: tatra ye kauśikāḥ te kātyāyanāḥ te darbhakātyāyanāḥ te valkalinaḥ te pakṣiṇaḥ te laukākṣāḥ te lohitaāyanāḥ lohityāyanāḥ

original: tatra ye kāśyapās te maṇḍanās te iṣṭās te śauṇḍāyanās te rocaneyās
analyzed: tatra ye kāśyapāḥ te maṇḍanāḥ te iṣṭāḥ te śauṇḍāyanāḥ te rocaneyāḥ

original: tatra ye vaḥśiṣṭhās te jātukarṇyās te dhānyāyanās te pārāśarās te vyāghranakhās ta āṇḍāyanasta aupamanyavāḥ/
analyzed: tatra ye vaḥśiṣṭhāḥ te jātukarṇyāḥ te dhānyāyanāḥ te pārāśarāḥ te vyāghranakhāḥ te āṇḍāyanaḥ te aupamanyavāḥ

original: tatra ye māṇḍavyās te bhāṇḍāyanās te dhaumrāyaṇās te kātyāyanās te khalv avāhanās te sugandhārāyaṇās te kāpiṣṭhalāyanāḥ/
analyzed: tatra ye māṇḍavyāḥ te bhāṇḍāyanāḥ te dhaumrāyaṇāḥ te kātyāyanāḥ te khalu avāhanāḥ te sugandhārāyaṇāḥ te kāpiṣṭhalāyanāḥ

original: p.40.1/.ity etāni brāhmaṇa evam ekonapañcāśad gotrāṇi brāhmaṇaiḥ paurāṇaiḥ samyag dṛṣṭāni chandasi vyākaraṇe padamīmāṃsāyāṃ/
analyzed: etāni brāhmaṇe evam ekonapañcāśat gotrāṇi brāhmaṇaiḥ paurāṇaiḥ samyak dṛṣṭāni chandasi vyākaraṇe pada mīmāṃsāyām

original: anyāni ca gotrāṇi vistarato mayā vācitāni/
analyzed: anyāni ca gotrāṇi vistarataḥ mayā vācitāni

original: p.40.2/.yad utaikatvam iti viditvā bhavān bandhur bhavitum arhati/
analyzed: uta ekatvam iti viditvā bhavān bandhuḥ bhavitum arhati

original: tasmāt te brāhmaṇa bravīmi sāmānyaṃ saṃjñāmātrakam idaṃ lokasya yad uta brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra iti vā/
analyzed: tasmāt te brāhmaṇa bravīmi sāmānyam saṃjñā mātrakam idam lokasya yat uta brāhmaṇaḥ iti vā kṣatriyaḥ iti vā vaiśyaḥ iti vā śūdraḥ iti vā

original: pppppputrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃduhitaram utsṛja bhāryā^arthāya/
analyzed: me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃduhitaram utsṛja bhāryā arthāya
yāvantam kula śulkam manyase tāvantam anupradāsyāmi

original: p.41.1/.idaṃ punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkor mātaṅga^rājasya brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī tṛṣṇīṃ bhūto madgubhūtaḥ srastaskandho +adhomukho niṣpratibhaḥ  #
analyzed: punarvacanam śrutvā triśaṅkoḥ mātaṅga rājasya brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī tṛṣṇīm bhūtaḥ madgu bhūtaḥ srasta skandhaḥ adhomukhaḥ niṣpratibhaḥ  /

original: adrākṣīt triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rājaḥ puṣkarasāriṇaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ tūṣṇīṃ bhūtaṃ madgubhūtaṃ srastaskandham abhomukhaṃ niṣpratibhaṃ pradhyānaparaṃ sthitaṃ/
analyzed: adrākṣīt triśaṅkuḥ mātaṅga rājaḥ puṣkarasāriṇam brāhmaṇam tūṣṇīm bhūtam madgu bhūtam srasta skandham abhomukham niṣpratibham pradhyāna param sthitam

original: p.41.2ab/.yādṛśaṃ vāpyate bījaṃ tādṛśaṃ labhyate phalaṃ/
p.41.2cd/.prajāpater hi caikatve nirviśeṣo bhavaty ataḥ//
analyzed: hi ca ekatve nirviśeṣaḥ bhavati atas

original: p.41.3ab/.na ca^indriyāṇāṃ nānātvaṃ kriyābhedaś ca dṛśyate/
analyzed: ca aindriyāṇām nānātvam kriyā bhedaḥ ca dṛśyate

original: p.41.3cd/.brāhmaṇe vānya^jātau vā naiṣāṃ kiñcid viśiṣyate//
analyzed: vā anya jātau vā na eṣām kiñcid viśiṣyate

original: p.41.4ab/.na hy ātmanaḥ samutkarṣaḥ śreṣṭha tvam iha yujyate/
analyzed: hi ātmanaḥ samutkarṣaḥ śreṣṭha tvam iha yujyate

original: p.41.5cd/.bhavet te bhaginī bhāryā naitad brāhmaṇa yujyate//
analyzed: te bhaginī bhāryā na etat brāhmaṇa yujyate

original: p.41.6ab/.yadi tāvad ayaṃ loko brahmaṇā janitaḥ svayaṃ/
analyzed: tāvat ayam lokaḥ brahmaṇā janitaḥ svayam

original: p.41.7ab/.atha vaiśyasya vaiśyā vai śūdrā śūdrasya vā punaḥ/
analyzed: vaiśyasya vaiśyā vai śūdrā śūdrasya vā punar

original: p.41.7cd/.na bhāryā bhaginī yuktā brahmaṇā janitā yadi//
analyzed: bhāryā bhaginī yuktā brahmaṇā janitā yadi

original: p.41.8ab/.na sattvā brahmaṇo jātāḥ kleśajāḥ karmajāstvamī/
analyzed: sattvāḥ brahmaṇaḥ jātāḥ kleśa jāḥ karma jāḥ tu amī

original: p.41.8cd/.nīcaiś ca^uccaiś ca dūśyante sattvā nānā^āśrayāḥ pṛthak//
analyzed: ca auccaiḥ ca dūśyante sattvāḥ nānā āśrayāḥ pṛthak

original: p.41.9ab/.teṣāṃ ca jātisāmānyād brāhmaṇe kṣatriye tathā/
analyzed: ca jāti sāmānyāt brāhmaṇe kṣatriye tathā

original: p.41.9cd/.atha vaiśye ca śūdre ca samaṃ jñānaṃ pravartate//
analyzed: vaiśye ca śūdre ca samam jñānam pravartate

original: p.42.1cd/.itihāso nighaṇṭaś ca kutaś chando nirarthakaṃ//
p.42.2ab/.asmākam apy adhyayane maitrī vidyā tathā śikhī/
analyzed: api adhyayane maitrī vidyā tathā śikhī

original: p.42.3ab/.manojavā ca gāndhārī ghorī vidyā vaśaṅkarī/
p.42.6cd/.na hy asau brāhmaṇīputraḥ kiṃ vā brāhmaṇa manyase//
analyzed: hi asau brāhmaṇī putraḥ kim vā brāhmaṇa manyase
tejasvinam bhīṣmam pañca abhijñam mahā tapam

original: p.43.2ab/.na hy asau brāhmaṇīputraḥ kiṃ vā brāhmaṇa vakṣyasi//
analyzed: hi asau brāhmaṇī putraḥ kim vā brāhmaṇa vakṣyasi

original: p.43.2cd/.kṣatriyā reṇukā nāma jajñe rāmaṃ mahā^muniṃ/
analyzed: reṇukā nāma jajñe rāmam mahā munim
ca vinītam ca sarva śāstra viśāradam

original: p.43.3ab/.na hy asau brāhmaṇīputraḥ kiṃ vā brāhmaṇa vakṣyasi//
analyzed: hi asau brāhmaṇī putraḥ kim vā brāhmaṇa vakṣyasi

original: p.43.4ab/.paṇḍitāś ca vinītāś ca loke ca;
p.43.4cd/.na hi te brāhmaṇīputrāḥ kiṃ vā brāhmaṇa vakṣyasi//
analyzed: hi te brāhmaṇī putrāḥ kim vā brāhmaṇa vakṣyasi

original: p.43.5ab/.saṃjñā kṛteyaṃ lokasya brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyās tathā/
analyzed: kṛtā iyam lokasya brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyāḥ tathā

original: p.43.5cd/.vaiśyāx ca^eva tathā śūdrāḥ saṃjñeyaṃ saṃprakīrtitā//
analyzed: ca eva tathā śūdrāḥ saṃjñā iyam saṃprakīrtitā

original: p.43.6/.tasmāt te brāhmaṇa bravīmi saṃjñāmātrakam idaṃlokasya yad uta brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdara iti vā/
analyzed: te brāhmaṇa bravīmi saṃjñā mātrakam idaṃlokasya yat uta brāhmaṇaḥ iti vā kṣatriyaḥ iti vā vaiśyaḥ iti vā śūdaraḥ iti vā

original: putrāya me (44) śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ duhitaram anuprayaccha bharyarthāya/
analyzed: putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtim duhitaram anuprayaccha bharyarthāya
yāvantam kula śulkam manyase tāvantam anupradāsyāmi

original: p.44.1/.idaṃ ca punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkor mātaṅga^rājasya bbrāhmaṇaḥ puskarasārī triśaṅkuṃ mātaṅga^rājam idam avocat/
analyzed: ca punarvacanam śrutvā triśaṅkoḥ mātaṅga rājasya brāhmaṇaḥ puskarasārī triśaṅkum mātaṅga rājam idam avocat

original: tad yathā vātsyāḥ kautsyā bharadvājāś ca/
analyzed: tat yathā vātsyāḥ kautsyāḥ bharadvājāḥ ca

original: atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin sotpattikāṃ sāvitrīṃ pravakṣyāmi/
analyzed: atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin sa utpattikām sāvitrīm pravakṣyāmi

original: p.44.5/.bhūta^pūrvaṃ brāhmaṇātīte +adhvani vasur nāma ṛṣir bhūva/
analyzed: brāhmaṇa atīte adhvani vasuḥ nāma ṛṣiḥ bhūva
pañca abhijñaḥ ugra tejāḥ mahā anubhāvaḥ dhyānānām lābhī

original: tena tatra takṣakaduhitā kapilā nāma āsāditā bhāryā^arthaṃ/
analyzed: tena tatra takṣaka duhitā kapilā nāma āsāditā bhāryā artham

original: sa tatra saṃrakta^cittas tayā kanyayā sārdhaṃ maithunam agacchat/
analyzed: sa tatra saṃrakta cittaḥ tayā kanyayā sārdham maithunam agacchat

original: sa ṛṣi (45) ṛddhyā bhraṣṭo dhyānebhyo vañcitaḥ/
analyzed: saḥ ṛṣiḥ ṛddhyā bhraṣṭaḥ dhyānebhyaḥ vañcitaḥ

original: ṛddhiparihīnaḥ sa vipratisārī ātmano duścaritaṃ vigarhamāṇas tasyāṃ
analyzed: ṛddhi parihīnaḥ sa vipratisārī ātmanaḥ duścaritam vigarhamāṇaḥ tasyām

original: velāyāṃ sāvitrīṃ bhāṣate sma/ tad yathā/
analyzed: velāyām sāvitrīm bhāṣate sma tat yathā

original: tat savitur vareṇyaṃ bhargo devasya dhīmahi/
analyzed: tat savituḥ vareṇyam bhargaḥ devasya dhīmahi

original: p.45.2/.iti hi brāhmaṇa ajñāna^śodhanārtham imam eva mantraṃ sa brāhmaṇo divā^rātraṃ japati sma/
analyzed: hi brāhmaṇa ajñāna śodhana artham imam eva mantram sa brāhmaṇaḥ divārātram japati sma

original: p.45.3cd/.gambhīrāv abhāse tatra hy ātmārāmas taporataḥ/
analyzed: abhāse tatra hi ātma ārāmaḥ tapaḥ rataḥ

original: p.45.4/.devasya śreṣṭhakaṃ bhījanam apanābhyo paviṣṭa imaṃmantram ajapat/
p.46.2ab/.kāmā hi loke paramāḥ prajānāṃ kleśaprahāṇe bhūtā antarāyāḥ/
analyzed: hi loke paramāḥ prajānām kleśa prahāṇe bhūtāḥ antarāyāḥ

original: p.46.2cd/.tasmād bhavantaḥ prajahantu kāmān tato +atulaṃ prāpsy atha brahma^lokaṃ/
analyzed: bhavantaḥ prajahantu kāmān tatas atulam prāpsi atha brahma lokam

original: p.46.3/.itīyaṃ brāhmaṇa brahmaṇā sahāpatinā sāvitrī bhāṣitā,
śrūyatāṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatra^vaṃśaṃ kathayiṣyāmi/ tad yathā/
analyzed: śrūyatām bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatra vaṃśam kathayiṣyāmi tat yathā

original: p.46.5 /.kṛttikā rohiṇī mṛgaśirā ārdrā punarvashḥ puṣyaḥ aśleṣā maghā pūrvaphalgunī
analyzed: kṛttikā rohiṇī mṛgaśirā ārdrā punarvashḥ puṣyaḥ aśleṣā maghā pūrvaphalgunī

original: uttaraphalgunī hastā citrā svātī viśākhā anurādhā jyeṣṭhā mūlā pūrvāṣāḍhā uttarāṣāḍhā
analyzed: uttara phalgunī hastā citrā svātī viśākhā anurādhā jyeṣṭhā mūlā pūrvāṣāḍhā uttarāṣāḍhā

original: abhijit śravaṇā dhaniṣṭhā śatabhiṣā pūrvabhādrapadā uttarabhādrapadā revatī aśvinī bharaṇī /
analyzed: abhijit śravaṇā dhaniṣṭhā śatabhiṣā pūrvabhādrapadā uttarabhādrapadā revatī aśvinī bharaṇī
iti etāni bhoḥ puṣkarasārin aṣṭāviṃśati nakṣatrāṇī

original: p.46.6/.kati^tārakāṇi kati^saṃsthānāni kati^muhūrta^yogāni kim^āhārāṇi kiṃ^daivatāni kiṃ^gotrāṇi/
analyzed: kati saṃsthānāni kati muhūrta yogāni kimāhārāṇi kiṃdaivatāni kiṃgotrāṇi
