original: p.46.7/.kṛttikā bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatraṃ ṣaṭtāraṃ kṣura^saṃsthānaṃ triṃśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ (47)
analyzed: bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatram ṣaṣ tāram kṣura saṃsthānam triṃśat muhūrta yogam
dadhi āhāram agni daivatam vaiśyāyanīyam gotreṇa

original: rohiṇī^nakṣatraṃ pañca^tārakaṃ śakaṭākṛti^saṃsthānaṃ pañca^catvāriṃśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ mṛgamāṃsāhāraṃ prajāpati^daivataṃ bhāradvājaṃ gotreṇa/
analyzed: rohiṇī nakṣatram pañca tārakam śakaṭa ākṛti saṃsthānam pañcacatvāriṃśat muhūrta yogam mṛga māṃsa āhāram prajāpati daivatam bhāradvājam gotreṇa
mṛgaśirā nakṣatram tri tāram mṛgaśīrṣa saṃsthānam triṃśat muhūrta yogam
phala mūla āhāram soma daivatam mṛgāyaṇīyam gotreṇa

original: ārdra^nakṣatram eka^tāraṃ tilaka^saṃsthānaṃ pañca^daśa^muhūrta^yogaṃ sarpirmaṇḍāhāraṃ sūrya^daivataṃ hārītītāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
analyzed: ārdra nakṣatram eka tāram tilaka saṃsthānam pañcadaśa muhūrta yogam sarpiḥ maṇḍa āhāram sūrya daivatam hārītītāyanīyam gotreṇa
punarvasu nakṣatram dvi tāram pada saṃsthānam pañcacatvāriṃśat muhūrta yogam madhyam
puṣya nakṣatram tri tāram vardhamāna saṃsthānam triśat muhūrta yogam
madhumaṇḍa āhāram bṛhaspati daivatam aupamanyavīyam gotreṇa

original: aśleṣā^nakṣatram eka^tāraṃ tilaka^saṃsthānaṃ pañca^daśa^muhūrta^yogaṃ pāyasa^bhojanaṃ sarpa^daivataṃ maitrāyaṇīyaṃ gotreṇa/
analyzed: aśleṣā nakṣatram eka tāram tilaka saṃsthānam pañcadaśa muhūrta yogam pāyasa bhojanam sarpa daivatam maitrāyaṇīyam gotreṇa
bhoḥ puṣkarasārin sapta nakṣatrāṇi pūrva dvārakāṇi

original: pañca^tāraṃ nadī^kubja^saṃsthānaṃ triśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ tila^kṛsarāhāraṃ pitṛdaivataṃ piṅgalāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
analyzed: pañca tāram nadī kubja saṃsthānam triśat muhūrta yogam tila kṛsara āhāram pitṛ daivatam piṅgalāyanīyam gotreṇa

original: pūrvaphalgunī^nakṣatraṃ dvitāraṃ padaka^saṃsthānaṃ triśan muhūrta^yogaṃ vilvabhojanaṃ bhavadevataṃ gautamīyaṃ gotreṇa/
analyzed: pūrvaphalgunī nakṣatram dvi tāram padaka saṃsthānam triśat muhūrta yogam vilva bhojanam bhava devatam gautamīyam gotreṇa

original: padaka^saṃsthānaṃ pañca^catvāriṃśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ godhūmamatsyāhāram aryamādaivataṃ kauśikaṃ gotreṇa/
analyzed: padaka saṃsthānam pañcacatvāriṃśat muhūrta yogam godhūma matsya āhāram aryamā daivatam kauśikam gotreṇa

original: hasta^nakṣatraṃ pañca^tāraṃ hasta^saṃsthānaṃ triṃśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ śyāmākabhojanaṃ sūrya^daivataṃ kāśyapaṃ gotreṇa/
analyzed: hasta nakṣatram pañca tāram hasta saṃsthānam triṃśat muhūrta yogam śyāmāka bhojanam sūrya daivatam kāśyapam gotreṇa

original: citrā^nakṣatram eka^tāraṃ tilaka^saṃsthānaṃ triṃśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ mudgakṛsaraghṛta^pūpāhāraṃ tvaṣṭṛdaivataṃ kātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
analyzed: citrā nakṣatram eka tāram tilaka saṃsthānam triṃśat muhūrta yogam mudga kṛsara ghṛta pūpa āhāram tvaṣṭṛ daivatam kātyāyanīyam gotreṇa

original: p.48.1/.svātī^nakṣatram eka^tāraṃ tilaka^saṃsthānaṃ pañca^daśa^muhūrta^yogaṃ mudgakṛsaraphalāhāraṃ vāyudaivataṃ kātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
analyzed: eka tāram tilaka saṃsthānam pañcadaśa muhūrta yogam mudga kṛsara phala āhāram vāyu daivatam kātyāyanīyam gotreṇa

original: viśākhā^nakṣatraṃ dvitāraṃ viṣāṇa^saṃsthānaṃ pañca^catvāriṃśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ tila^puṣpāhāram indrāgnidaivataṃ śāṃkhāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
analyzed: viśākhā nakṣatram dvi tāram viṣāṇa saṃsthānam pañcacatvāriṃśat muhūrta yogam tila puṣpa āhāram indra agni daivatam śāṃkhāyanīyam gotreṇa

original: p.49.1.ity etāni bhoḥ puṣkarasārin sapta^nakṣatrāṇi dakṣiṇādvārakāṇi/
analyzed: etāni bhoḥ puṣkarasārin sapta nakṣatrāṇi dakṣiṇā dvārakāṇi

original: p.49.2/.anurādhā^nakṣatraṃ catustāraṃ ratnābalī^saṃsthānaṃ triśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ surāmāṃsāhāraṃ mitradaivatam ālaṃbāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
analyzed: catur tāram ratnābalī saṃsthānam triśat muhūrta yogam surā māṃsa āhāram mitra daivatam ālaṃbāyanīyam gotreṇa

original: jyeṣṭhā^nakṣatraṃ tritāraṃ yavamadhya^saṃsthānaṃ pañca^daśa^muhūrta^yogaṃ śāliyavāgubhojanam indradaivataṃ dīrghakātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
analyzed: jyeṣṭhā nakṣatram tri tāram yava madhya saṃsthānam pañcadaśa muhūrta yogam śāli yavāgu bhojanam indra daivatam dīrghakātyāyanīyam gotreṇa

original: mūla^nakṣatraṃ saptatāraṃ vṛścika^saṃsthānaṃ triśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ mūlaphalāhāraṃ nairṛtidaivataṃ
analyzed: mūlanakṣatram sapta tāram vṛścika saṃsthānam triśat muhūrta yogam mūla phala āhāram nairṛti daivatam

original: pūrvāṣāḍhā^nakṣatraṃ catustāraṃ govikrama^saṃsthānaṃ triśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ nyagrodhakaṣāyāhāraṃ toyadaivataṃ darbhakātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
analyzed: pūrvāṣāḍhā nakṣatram catur tāram govikrama saṃsthānam triśat muhūrta yogam nyagrodha kaṣāya āhāram toya daivatam darbhakātyāyanīyam gotreṇa

original: uttarāṣāḍhā^nakṣatraṃ catustāraṃ gajavikrama^saṃsthānaṃ pañca^catvāriṃśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ madhu^lājāhāraṃ viśva^daivataṃ maudgalāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
analyzed: uttara āṣāḍhā nakṣatram catur tāram gajavikrama saṃsthānam pañcacatvāriṃśat muhūrta yogam madhula aja āhāram viśva daivatam maudgalāyanīyam gotreṇa
abhijit nakṣatram tri tāram gośīrsa saṃsthānam ṣaṣ muhūrta yogam
vāyu āhāram brahma daivatam brahmāvatīyam gotreṇa

original: śravaṇā^nakṣatraṃ tritāraṃ yavamadhya^saṃsthānaṃ triṃśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ pakṣimāṃsāhāraṃ viṣṇudaivataṃ kātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
analyzed: śravaṇā nakṣatram tri tāram yava madhya saṃsthānam triṃśat muhūrta yogam pakṣi māṃsa āhāram viṣṇu daivatam kātyāyanīyam gotreṇa

original: p.50.1/.ity etāni bhoḥ puṣkarasārin sapta^nakṣatrāṇi paścimadvārakāṇi/
analyzed: etāni bhoḥ puṣkarasārin sapta nakṣatrāṇi paścima dvārakāṇi

original: p.50.2/.dhaniṣṭhā^nakṣatraṃ catustāraṃ śakuna^saṃsthānaṃ triṃśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ kulatthapūpāhāraṃ vasudaivataṃ kauṇḍinyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
analyzed: catur tāram śakuna saṃsthānam triṃśat muhūrta yogam kulattha pūpa āhāram vasu daivatam kauṇḍinyāyanīyam gotreṇa

original: śatabhiṣā^nakṣatram eka^tāraṃ tilaka^saṃsthānaṃ pañca^daśa^muhūrta^yogaṃ yavāgubhojanaṃ varuṇadaivataṃ tāṇḍyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
analyzed: śatabhiṣā nakṣatram eka tāram tilaka saṃsthānam pañcadaśa muhūrta yogam yavāgu bhojanam varuṇa daivatam tāṇḍyāyanīyam gotreṇa
pūrvabhādrapadā nakṣatram dvi tāram padaka saṃsthānam triṃśat muhūrta yogam māṃsa rudhira āhāram
uttara bhādrapadā nakṣatram dvi tāram padaka saṃsthānam pañcacatvāriṃśat muhūrta yogam
māṃsa āhāram aryamā daivatam dhyānadrāhyāyaṇīyam gotreṇa

original: revatī^nakṣatram eka^tāraṃ tilaka^saṃsthānaṃ triśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ dadhyāhāraṃ pūṣadaivatam aṣṭabhaginīyaṃ gotreṇa/
analyzed: revatī nakṣatram eka tāram tilaka saṃsthānam triśat muhūrta yogam dadhi āhāram pūṣa daivatam aṣṭa bhaginīyam gotreṇa
aśvinī nakṣatram dvi tāram turagaśīrṣa saṃsthānam
triṃśat muhūrta yogam madhu pāyasa bhojanam gandharva daivatam maitrāyāṇīyam gotreṇa

original: bharaṇī^nakṣatraṃ tritāraṃ bhaga^saṃsthānaṃ triṃśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ tila^taṇḍūlāhāraṃ yamadaivataṃ bhārgavīyaṃ gotreṇa/
analyzed: bharaṇī nakṣatram tri tāram bhaga saṃsthānam triṃśat muhūrta yogam tila taṇḍūla āhāram yama daivatam bhārgavīyam gotreṇa

original: p.51.1/.ity etāni bhoḥ puṣkarasārin sapta^nakṣatrāṇi uttara^dvārakāṇi/
analyzed: etāni bhoḥ puṣkarasārin sapta nakṣatrāṇi uttara dvārakāṇi

original: p.51.2/.amīṣāṃ bhoḥ pppuṣkarasārinn aṣṭāviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ ṣaṇ^nakṣatrāṇi pañca^catvāriṃśan^muhūrta^yogāni/
analyzed: bhoḥ pppuṣkarasārin aṣṭāviṃśatīnām nakṣatrāṇām ṣaḍ nakṣatrāṇi pañcacatvāriṃśat muhūrta yogāni

original: rohiṇī punarvasu uttaraphalgunī viśākhā uttarāṣāḍhā uttarabhādrapadā ceti/
analyzed: rohiṇī punarvasu uttara phalgunī viśākhā uttarāṣāḍhā uttarabhādrapadā ca iti

original: ārdrā aśleṣā svātī jyeṣṭhā śatabhiṣā ceti/
analyzed: ārdrā aśleṣā svātī jyeṣṭhā śatabhiṣā ca iti

original: p.52.1/.amīṣāṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin saptānāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ pūrva^dvārikāṇāṃ kṛttikā prathamā nāmāśleṣā paścimā nāma/
analyzed: bhoḥ puṣkarasārin saptānām nakṣatrāṇām pūrvadvārikāṇām kṛttikā prathamā nāma āśleṣā paścimā nāma

original: amīṣāṃ saptānāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ dakṣiṇa^dvārikāṇāṃ maghā prathamā nāma viśākhā paścimā nāma/
analyzed: amīṣām saptānām nakṣatrāṇām dakṣiṇadvārikāṇām maghā prathamā nāma viśākhā paścimā nāma

original: amīṣāṃ paścimadvārikāṇāṃ saptānāṃ nakṣatrāṇām anurādhā prathamā nāma śravaṇā paścimā nāma/
analyzed: amīṣām paścimadvārikāṇām saptānām nakṣatrāṇām anurādhā prathamā nāma śravaṇā paścimā nāma

original: amīṣāṃ saptānāṃ nakṣatrāṇām uttara^dvārikāṇāṃ dhaniṣṭhā prathamā
analyzed: amīṣām saptānām nakṣatrāṇām uttaradvārikāṇām dhaniṣṭhā prathamā

original: p.53.2/.amīṣāṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn aṣṭāviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ sapta balāni/
analyzed: bhoḥ puṣkarasārin aṣṭāviṃśatīnām nakṣatrāṇām sapta balāni

original: yad uta trīṇi pūrvāṇi viśākhānurādhā punarvashḥ svātiś ca/
analyzed: yat uta trīṇi pūrvāṇi viśākhā anurādhā punarvashḥ svātiḥ ca

original: yad uta trīṇi uttarāṇi rohiṇī ceti/
analyzed: yat uta trīṇi uttarāṇi rohiṇī ca iti

original: śravaṇā dhaniṣṭhā śatabhiṣā jyeṣṭhā mūlā iti/
analyzed: śravaṇāḥ dhaniṣṭhā śatabhiṣāḥ jyeṣṭhāḥ mūlāḥ iti

original: yad uta kṛttikā mṛgaśirā puṣyā aśvinī ceti/
analyzed: yat uta kṛttikā mṛgaśirā puṣyāḥ aśvinī ca iti

original: p.52.3/.amīṣāṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn aṣṭaviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ trayo yogā bhavanti/
analyzed: bhoḥ puṣkarasārin aṣṭaviṃśatīnām nakṣatrāṇām trayaḥ yogāḥ bhavanti

original: tatra nakṣatraṃ yadi purastād gacchati candraś ca pṛṣṭhataḥ,
analyzed: tatra nakṣatram yadi purastāt gacchati candraḥ ca pṛṣṭhatas
ayam ucyate ṛṣabha anusārī yogaḥ iti

original: yad uta candraḥ purastād gacchati nakṣatraṃ ca pṛṣṭhataḥ,
analyzed: yat uta candraḥ purastāt gacchati nakṣatram ca pṛṣṭhatas
yadi punar candraḥ nakṣatram ca ubhau
tadā ayam ucyate yuga naddhaḥ yogaḥ iti

original: p.53.1/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin grahān pravakṣyāmi tac chrūyatāṃ/
analyzed: khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin grahān pravakṣyāmi tat śrūyatām

original: tad yathā śukro bṛhaspatiḥ śanaiścaro budho +aṅgārakaḥ sūryas tārādhipatiś ceti/
analyzed: tat yathā śukraḥ bṛhaspatiḥ śanaiścaraḥ budhaḥ aṅgārakaḥ sūryaḥ tārādhipatiḥ ca iti

original: p.53.2/.evaṃ viparivartamāne loke nakṣatreṣu pravibhakteṣu kathaṃ rātridivasānāṃ hrāso vṛddhiś ca bhavati/ tad ucyate/
analyzed: viparivartamāne loke nakṣatreṣu pravibhakteṣu katham rātri divasānām hrāsaḥ vṛddhiḥ ca bhavati tat ucyate

original: p.53.3/.hemantānāṃ dvitīye māsi rohiṇyām aṣṭamyāṃ dvādaśa^muhūrto divaso bhavati/
analyzed: dvitīye māsi rohiṇyām aṣṭamyām dvādaśa muhūrtaḥ divasaḥ bhavati

original: grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse rohiṇyām aṣṭamyām aṣṭādaśa^muhūrto divaso bhavati/
analyzed: grīṣmāṇām paścime māse rohiṇyām aṣṭamyām aṣṭādaśa muhūrtaḥ divasaḥ bhavati

original: varṣāṇāṃ paścime māse rohiṇyām aṣṭamyāṃ catur^daśa^muhūrto divaso bhavati/
analyzed: varṣāṇām paścime māse rohiṇyām aṣṭamyām caturdaśa muhūrtaḥ divasaḥ bhavati

original: p.54.2/.tad yathā bhoḥ puṣkarasārin striyā nātidīrghahrasvaḥ kartinyāḥ sūtrodyāmaḥ/
analyzed: yathā bhoḥ puṣkarasārin striyāḥ na ati dīrgha hrasvaḥ kartinyāḥ sūtra udyāmaḥ
viṃśati adhikam tat kṣaṇa śatam ekaḥ kṣaṇaḥ

original: etena kramasambandhena triṃśan^muhūrtam ekaṃ rātridivasam anumīyate/
analyzed: etena krama sambandhena triṃśat muhūrtam ekam rātri divasam anumīyate

original: p.54.3/.āditya udayati ṣaṇṇavati^pauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ caturojā nāma muhūrto bhavati/
analyzed: udayati ṣaṇṇavati pauruṣāyām chāyāyām caturojāḥ nāma muhūrtaḥ bhavati

original: ṣaṣṭipauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ śveto nāma muhūrto bhavati/
analyzed: ṣaṣṭi pauruṣāyām chāyāyām śvetaḥ nāma muhūrtaḥ bhavati

original: dvādaśa^pauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ samṛddho nāma muhūrto bhavati/
analyzed: dvādaśa pauruṣāyām chāyāyām samṛddhaḥ nāma muhūrtaḥ bhavati

original: ṣaṭpauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ śarapatho nāma muhūrto bhavati/
analyzed: ṣaṣ pauruṣāyām chāyāyām śarapathaḥ nāma muhūrtaḥ bhavati

original: p.55.1/.pañca^pauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyām atisamṛddho nāma muhūrto bhavat/
catuḥ^pauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyām udgato nāma muhūrto bhavati/
analyzed: catur pauruṣāyām chāyāyām udgataḥ nāma muhūrtaḥ bhavati

original: tripauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ sumukho nāma muhūrto bhavati/
analyzed: tri pauruṣāyām chāyāyām sumukhaḥ nāma muhūrtaḥ bhavati

original: sthite madhyāhne vajrako nāma muhūrto bhavati/
analyzed: sthite madhyāhne vajrakaḥ nāma muhūrtaḥ bhavati

original: parivṛtte madhyāhne tripuruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ rohito nāma muhūrto bhavati/
analyzed: parivṛtte madhyāhne tri puruṣāyām chāyāyām rohitaḥ nāma muhūrtaḥ bhavati

original: p.55.2/.catuḥ^pauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ balo nāma muhūrto bhavati/

analyzed: ṣaṣ pauruṣāyām chāyāyām sarvarasaḥ nāma muhūrtaḥ
dvādaśa paruṣāyām chāyāyām vasuḥ nāma muhūrtaḥ
ṣaṣṭi pauruṣāyām chāyāyām sundaraḥ nāma muhūrtaḥ

original: avataramāṇa āditye ṣaṇṇavati^pauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ parabhayo nāma muhūrto bhavati/
analyzed: avataramāṇaḥ āditye ṣaṇṇavati pauruṣāyām chāyāyām parabhayaḥ nāma muhūrtaḥ bhavati

original: p.55.4/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin rātryā muhūrtāni vyākhyāsyāmi/
analyzed: khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin rātryāḥ muhūrtāni vyākhyāsyāmi

original: atikrānte +ardharātre brahmā nāma muhūrtaḥ/ ditir nāma
analyzed: atikrānte ardharātre brahmā nāma muhūrtaḥ ditiḥ nāma

original: iti bhoḥ puṣkarasārin imāni triśan muhūrtāni yair aho^rātraṃ prajñāyate/
analyzed: iti bhoḥ puṣkarasārin imāni triśat muhūrtāni yaiḥ ahorātram prajñāyate
viṃśati uttara bhāga śatam kṣaṇasya tad kṣaṇaḥ

original: tad yathā striyā nātidīrghahrasvaḥ kartinyāḥ sūtrodyāmaḥ/
analyzed: tat yathā striyāḥ na ati dīrgha hrasvaḥ kartinyāḥ sūtra udyāmaḥ
viṃśati uttara kṣaṇa śatam tad kṣaṇasya ekaḥ kṣaṇaḥ
catur ojāḥ śvetaḥ samṛddhaḥ śara pathaḥ atisamṛddhaḥ udgataḥ

original: sumukho vajrako rohito balo vijayaḥ sarva^raso vasuḥ sundaraḥ para^bhayaḥ/
raudras tārāvacaraḥ saṃyamaḥ sāṃpraiyako +annanto gardabho rākṣaso +avayavo brahmā ditir arko vidhamano āgneya ātapāgnir abhijit/
analyzed: raudraḥ tārāvacaraḥ saṃyamaḥ sāṃpraiyakaḥ annantaḥ gardabhaḥ rākṣasaḥ avayavaḥ brahmā ditiḥ arkaḥ vidhamanaḥ āgneyaḥ ātapāgniḥ abhijit

original: p.57.2ab/.kālotpattim api te brāhmaṇa vakṣyāmi śṛṇu/
p.57.2cd/.kālasya kiṃ pramāṇam iti tad ucyate/
p.57.4/.nāḍikāyāḥ punaḥ kiṃ pramāṇaṃ/ tad ucyate/

analyzed: tad haraṇataḥ dve pala śate bhavataḥ
upari catur aṅgulā suvarṇa śalākā kartavyā
vṛtta parimaṇḍalā samā antāt catur asrā āyatā

original: yadā ca^evaṃ śīryeta tat toyaṃ ghaṭasya tadaikā nāḍikā/
analyzed: yadā ca evam śīryeta tat toyam ghaṭasya tadā ekā nāḍikā

original: etena nālikāpramāṇena vibhakte dve nāḍika eko muhūrtaḥ/
analyzed: etena nālikā pramāṇena vibhakte dve nāḍike ekaḥ muhūrtaḥ

original: etena bho brāhmaṇa triṃśan muhūrtāḥ/ yai
analyzed: etena bho brāhmaṇa triṃśan muhūrtāḥ yai

original: p.58.2/.etena punarakṣinimeṣeṇa ṣoḍaśakoṭayo +aṣṭapañcāśac ca śata^sahasrāṇi aṣṭāśīti^sahasrāṇi sa evaṃ māpitaḥ/
analyzed: punar akṣi nimeṣeṇa ṣoḍaśa koṭayaḥ aṣṭapañcāśat ca śata sahasrāṇi aṣṭāśīti sahasrāṇi saḥ evam māpitaḥ
tat ca brāhmaṇa kāla utpattiḥ vyākhyātā

original: p.59.1/.paramāṇūnāṃ koṭiśata^sahasrāṇi catur^viṃśatiś caikonatriṃśatkoṭi^sahasrāṇi dvādaśa ca śata^sahasrāṇi/
analyzed: koṭi śata sahasrāṇi caturviṃśatiḥ ca ekonatriṃśat koṭi sahasrāṇi dvādaśa ca śata sahasrāṇi

original: dve koṭī pañca^viṃśatiś ca sahasrāṇi pañca^śatāny aṣṭau ca paramāṇavaḥ/
analyzed: dve koṭī pañcaviṃśatiḥ ca sahasrāṇi pañca śatāni aṣṭau ca paramāṇavaḥ
evam māpitā brāhmaṇa suvarṇasya parimāṇa autpattiḥ

original: paramāṇūnām aṣṭakoṭayaḥ saptacatvāriṃśac ca śata^sahasrāṇi sapta ca sahasrāṇi dve śate +aśītiś ca paramāṇavaḥ/
analyzed: paramāṇūnām aṣṭa koṭayaḥ saptacatvāriṃśat ca śata sahasrāṇi sapta ca sahasrāṇi dve śate aśītiḥ ca paramāṇavaḥ

original: evaṃ māpitaṃ brāhmaṇa palasya parimāṇam iti/
analyzed: evam māpitam brāhmaṇa palasya parimāṇam iti
māgadhakayā tulayā prastha asya parimāṇam piṇḍitam

original: dve koṭiśate tisraś ca koṭaya ekonatiṃśac ca śata^sahasrāṇi catuḥsaptati (60)
analyzed: dve koṭi śate tisraḥ ca koṭayaḥ ekonatiṃśat ca śata sahasrāṇi catuḥsaptati

original: sahasrāṇi sapta ca śatāni viṃśatiś ca paramāṇavaḥ/
analyzed: sahasrāṇi sapta ca śatāni viṃśatiḥ ca paramāṇavaḥ
evam māpitā brāhmaṇa rasa mānasya autpattiḥ iti
ekonatriṃśati palāni eka karṣeṇa ūnāni māgadhaḥ prasthaḥ

original: koṭiśatam aṣṭapañcāśac ca koṭayo dvir aśītiś ca śata sahasrāṇi eka^ṣaṣṭiś ca sahasrāṇi pañca^śatāni triṃśac ca paramāṇavaḥ/
analyzed: koṭi śatam aṣṭapañcāśat ca koṭayaḥ dvis aśītiḥ ca śata sahasrāṇi ekaṣaṣṭiḥ ca sahasrāṇi pañcaśatāni triṃśat ca paramāṇavaḥ

original: evaṃ māpitaṃ brāhmaṇa dhānyasya parimāṇam iti/
analyzed: evam māpitam brāhmaṇa dhānyasya parimāṇam iti

original: atha khalu bho brāhmaṇa nakṣatra^vyākaranaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
analyzed: atha khalu bho brāhmaṇa nakṣatravyākaranam nāma adhyāyam vyākhyāsyāmi

original: rohiṇyāṃ jātaḥ subhago bhavati bhogavāṃś ca/
analyzed: rohiṇyām jātaḥ subhagaḥ bhavati bhogavān ca
ārdrāyām jātaḥ utsaḥ anna pānānām bhavati

original: punarvasau jātaḥ kṛṣimān bhavati gorakṣaś ca/
analyzed: punarvasau jātaḥ kṛṣimān bhavati gorakṣaḥ ca
bhavati uttara phalgunyām jātaḥ upavāsa śīlaḥ bhavati
citrāyām jātaḥ nṛtya gīta kuśalaḥ bhavati

original: uttarāṣāḍhāyāṃ jāto bhakteśvaraḥ kulīnaś ca bhavati/
analyzed: uttara āṣāḍhāyām jātaḥ bhakta īśvaraḥ kulīnaḥ ca bhavati

original: atha bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatra^nirdeśaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi tac chrūyatāṃ /
analyzed: atha bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatranirdeśam nāma adhyāyam vyākhyāsyāmi tat śrūyatām

original: p.62.2ab/.kṛttikāsu niviṣṭaṃ vai nagaraṃ jvalati śriyā/
p.62.3ab/.rohiṇyāṃ tu niviṣṭaṃ vai nagaraṃ tad vinirdiśet/
analyzed: tu niviṣṭam vai nagaram tat vinirdiśet
atra janaḥ bhūyāt prabhūta dhana sañcayaḥ

original: p.62.4ab/.mṛgaśīrṣe niviṣṭaṃ tu strībhir gobhir dhanais tathā/
analyzed: niviṣṭam tu strībhiḥ gobhiḥ dhanaiḥ tathā

original: p.62.4cd/.mālyabhogaiś ca saṅkīrṇam adbhutaiś ca puraskṛtaṃ//

analyzed: matsya māṃsāni bhakṣya bhojya dhanāni ca

original: p.63.2ab/.punarvasau niviṣṭe tu nagaraṃ dīpyate śriyā/
p.63.3ab/.srīmatpuṣye niviṣṭe tu prajā duṣṭā prasīdati/
p.63.3cd/.yuktāḥ śriyā ca dharmiṣṭhās tathiva cirajīvinaḥ//

analyzed: ca dīrgha āyuḥ dhana dhānya rasa anvitāḥ

original: p.63.4cd/.vanaspatis tathā kṣipraṃ puṣyet tatra punaḥ punaḥ//
analyzed: tathā kṣipram puṣyet tatra punar punar
duḥkha bhājaḥ ca nivasanti nara adhamāḥ

original: p.63.6ab/.maghāyāṃ ca niviṣṭe tu vidyāvanto mahā^dhanāḥ/
p.64.1ab/.phalgunyāṃ tu striyo mālyaṃ bhojanācchādanaṃ śubhaṃ/
analyzed: tu striyaḥ mālyam bhojana ācchādanam śubham

original: p.64.2ab/.uttarāyāṃ tu phālgunyāṃ dhānyāni ca dhanāni ca/
analyzed: tu phālgunyām dhānyāni ca dhanāni ca

original: p.64.2cd/.mūrkhā janā jitāḥ strībhir niviṣṭe nagare bhavet//
analyzed: janāḥ jitāḥ strībhiḥ niviṣṭe nagare bhavet

original: p.64.3ab/.haste ca viniviṣṭe tu vidyāvanto mahā^dhanāḥ/
p.64.3cd/.parasparaṃ ca rucitaṃ śayanaṃ nagare bhavet//
p.64.4ab/.citrāyāṃ ca niviṣṭe tu strī^jitāḥ sarva^mānavāḥ/
analyzed: ca niviṣṭe tu strī jitāḥ sarva mānavāḥ

original: p.64.4cd/.śrīmat^kāntaṃ ca nagaraṃ jvalantaṃ tad vinirdiśet//

analyzed: pure niviṣṭe tu prabhūta dhana sañcayāḥ

original: p.64.5cd/.lubdhāḥ krūrāś ca mūrkhāś ca prabhūtā nagare bhavet//
analyzed: krūrāḥ ca mūrkhāḥ ca prabhūtāḥ nagare bhavet

original: p.64.6ab/.viśākhāyāṃ niviṣṭaṃ tu nagaraṃ jvalati śriyā/

analyzed: sanniviṣṭam tu bahu ratna dhana anvitaiḥ
sa niviṣṭam tu puram dhānya dhana anvitam
tu puram syāt dhana dhānya bhāj

original: p.65.3cd/.lubdhāḥ krūrāś ca mūrkhāś ca nivasanti narādhamāḥ//
analyzed: krūrāḥ ca mūrkhāḥ ca nivasanti nara adhamāḥ
tu uttarāyām ca dhana dhānya samuccayaḥ

original: p.65.5ab/.abhijiti niviṣṭe tu nagare tatra moditāḥ/

analyzed: niviṣṭam tu puram dhānya dhana anvitam

original: p.65.7ab/.dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ niviṣṭaṃ tu strī^jitaṃ puram ādiśet/
analyzed: niviṣṭam tu strī jitam puram ādiśet
proṣṭhapada adhyakṣe narāḥ tatra sukha priyāḥ

original: p.66.2cd/.pūrṇaṃ ca dhana^dhānyābhyāṃ ratnāḍhyaṃ ca vinirdiśet//
analyzed: ca dhana dhānyābhyām ratna āḍhyam ca vinirdiśet

original: p.66.3ab/.pure niviṣṭe raivatyāṃ sundarī janatā bhavet/

analyzed: ca eva gāvaḥ ca prabhūta dhana dhānya tā

original: p.66.4ab/.aśvinyāṃ viniviṣṭaṃ tu nagaraṃ śivam ādiśet/

analyzed: duḥkha bhājaḥ ca vasanti puruṣa adhamāḥ

original: p.66.6ab/.purāṇi rāṣṭraṇi tathā gṛhāṇi nakṣatra^yogaṃ prasamīkṣya vidvān/
analyzed: rāṣṭraṇi tathā gṛhāṇi nakṣatra yogam prasamīkṣya vidvān

original: p.66.6cd/.iṣṭe praśaste ca niveśayet tu pūrve ca janme +adhigataṃ mayedaṃ//
analyzed: praśaste ca niveśayet tu pūrve ca janme adhigatam mayā idam
nakṣatrāṇām sthāna nirdeśam nāma adhyāyam pravakṣyāmi
puṣya nakṣatram sarveṣām avadāta vadāta vasanānām

original: p.68.1/.ayaṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatrāṇāṃ sthāna^nirdeśa^vyākaraṇo nāma^adhyāyaḥ/

analyzed: bhoḥ triśaṅko ṛtu varṣam nāma adhyāyam

original: p.68.3/.kṛttikāsu grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati catuḥṣaṣṭy^āḍhakāni pravarṣati/
analyzed: grīṣmāṇām paścime māse yadi atra devaḥ pravarṣati catuḥṣaṣṭi āḍhakāni pravarṣati
śravaṇā yukta proṣṭhapadāyām agni udakaḥ varṣārātraḥ bhavati
agni bhayam śastra bhayam ca audaka bhayam ca bhavati

original: p.69.1/.rohiṇyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati eka^viṃśatyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
analyzed: grīṣmāṇām paścime māse yadi atra devaḥ pravarṣati ekaviṃśati āḍhakāni pravarṣati

original: eṣa ca varṣārātraḥ sāroparodhaḥ sasyaṃ ca saṃpādayati/
analyzed: eṣa ca varṣārātraḥ sāra uparodhaḥ sasyam ca saṃpādayati
dvau ca atra rogau prabalau bhavataḥ
caura bahulāḥ ca atra diśaḥ bhavanti

original: p.69.2/.mṛgaśirasi grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati catuḥṣaṣṭy^āḍhakāni pravarṣati/
analyzed: grīṣmāṇām paścime māse yadi atra devaḥ pravarṣati catuḥṣaṣṭi āḍhakāni pravarṣati
kṣemiṇaḥ su nītikāḥ ca diśaḥ bhavanti

original: p.70.1/.ārdrāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati aṣṭādaśāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
analyzed: grīṣmāṇām paścime māse yadi atra devaḥ pravarṣati aṣṭādaśa āḍhakāni pravarṣati
caura bahulāḥ ca atra diśaḥ bhavanti
trayaḥ ca atra rogāḥ prabalāḥ bhavanti

original: p.70.2/.punarvasau grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati/
analyzed: grīṣmāṇām paścime māse yadi atra devaḥ pravarṣati

original: p.71.1/.puṣye grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati dvātriṃśadāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
analyzed: grīṣmāṇām paścime māse yadi atra devaḥ pravarṣati dvātriṃśat āḍhakāni pravarṣati

original: gaṇḍāḥ piṭakāḥ pāmāni ca / ity uktaṃ
analyzed: gaṇḍāḥ piṭakāḥ pāmāni ca iti uktam

original: p.71.2/.aśleṣāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati eka^viṃśatyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
analyzed: grīṣmāṇām paścime māse yadi atra devaḥ pravarṣati ekaviṃśati āḍhakāni pravarṣati

original: saṃvignāś ca^atra jñānino rājānaś ca bhavanti/
analyzed: saṃvignāḥ ca atra jñāninaḥ rājānaḥ ca bhavanti
jāyā patikānām rāja amātyānām ca virodhaḥ bhavati

original: p.71.3/.maghāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati catuḥṣaṣṭy^āḍhakāni (72)
analyzed: grīṣmāṇām paścime māse yadi atra devaḥ pravarṣati catuḥṣaṣṭi āḍhakāni
mṛga pakṣi paśu manuṣyāṇām ca atra garbhāḥ vinaśyanti
jana maraṇam ca atra bhaviṣyati iti

original: p.72.1/.pūrvaphalgunyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati catuḥṣaṣṭy^āḍhakāni pravarṣati/
analyzed: grīṣmāṇām paścime māse yadi atra devaḥ pravarṣati catuḥṣaṣṭi āḍhakāni pravarṣati

original: tac ca sasyaṃ janayitvā para^cakra^pīḍitā manuṣyā na sukhenopabhuñjate/
analyzed: tat ca sasyam janayitvā para cakra pīḍitāḥ manuṣyāḥ na sukhena upabhuñjate

original: paśūnāṃ maṇuṣyāṇāṃ ca^atra garbhāḥ sukhino bhavanti/
analyzed: paśūnām maṇuṣyāṇām ca atra garbhāḥ sukhinaḥ bhavanti

original: p.72.2/.uttaraphalgunyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati aśītyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
analyzed: grīṣmāṇām paścime māse yadi atra devaḥ pravarṣati aśīti āḍhakāni pravarṣati
eṣaḥ varṣaḥ sarva sasyāni ca sampādayati
nikṣipta śastrāḥ ca atra rājānaḥ bhavanti

original: p.72.3/.haste grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati ekonapañcāśadāḍhakāni (73)
analyzed: grīṣmāṇām paścime māse yadi atra devaḥ pravarṣati ekonapañcāśat āḍhakāni

original: patitāni ca sasyāni janasyārasāgrāṇi anudagrāṇi alpa^sārāṇy alpodakāni/
analyzed: patitāni ca sasyāni janasya a rasa agrāṇi an udagrāṇi alpa sārāṇi alpa udakāni

original: p.73.1/.citrāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati catuḥṣaṣṭy^āḍhakāni pravarṣati/
analyzed: grīṣmāṇām paścime māse yadi atra devaḥ pravarṣati catuḥṣaṣṭi āḍhakāni pravarṣati
sāra uparodhaḥ tatas paścāt varṣam saṃjanayati

original: p.73.2/.svātyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati eka^viṃśatyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
analyzed: grīṣmāṇām paścime māse yadi atra devaḥ pravarṣati ekaviṃśati āḍhakāni pravarṣati

original: p.73.3/.viśākhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati aśītyāḍhakāni (74)
analyzed: grīṣmāṇām paścime māse yadi atra devaḥ pravarṣati aśīti āḍhakāni
rājānaḥ ca atra chidra yuktāḥ bhavanti
agni dāhāḥ ca atra prabalāḥ bhavanti
daṃṣṭriṇaḥ ca atra balavantaḥ api kṣayam gacchanti

original: p.74.1/.anurādhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati ṣaṣṭyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
analyzed: grīṣmāṇām paścime māse yadi atra devaḥ pravarṣati ṣaṣṭi āḍhakāni pravarṣati

original: p.74.2/.jyeṣṭhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati ṣoḍaśāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
analyzed: grīṣmāṇām paścime māse yadi atra devaḥ pravarṣati ṣoḍaśa āḍhakāni pravarṣati

original: p.74.3/.mūle grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati catuṣaṣṭyāḍhakāni (75)
analyzed: grīṣmāṇām paścime māse yadi atra devaḥ pravarṣati catuṣaṣṭi āḍhakāni
caura bahulāḥ ca atra diśaḥ bhavanti
trayaḥ ca atra vyādhayaḥ balavantaḥ bhavanti
vāta gaṇḍaḥ pārśva śūlam akṣi rogaḥ ca
puṣpa phalāni ca atra samṛddhāni bhavanti

original: nikṣiptaśastrāś ca^atra rājāno bhavanti/ uktaṃ mūle/
analyzed: nikṣipta śastrāḥ ca atra rājānaḥ bhavanti uktam mūle

original: p.75.1/.pūrvasyām āṣāḍhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati ṣaṣṭyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
analyzed: āṣāḍhāyām grīṣmāṇām paścime māse yadi atra devaḥ pravarṣati ṣaṣṭi āḍhakāni pravarṣati
dvau ca atra rogau prabalau bhavataḥ

original: p.75.2/.uttarasyām āṣāḍhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati pūrṇam āḍhakaśataṃ pravarṣati/
analyzed: āṣāḍhāyām grīṣmāṇām paścime māse yadi atra devaḥ pravarṣati pūrṇam āḍhaka śatam pravarṣati
agra udakā ca atra varṣā bhavati
trayaḥ ca atra rogāḥ prabalāḥ bhavanti

original: p.75.3/.abhijiti grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra pravarṣati catuḥṣaṣṭy^āḍhākāni (76)
analyzed: grīṣmāṇām paścime māse yadi atra pravarṣati catuḥṣaṣṭi āḍhākāni

original: p.76.1/.śravaṇe tu grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati catuṣṣaṣṭyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
analyzed: tu grīṣmāṇām paścime māse yadi atra devaḥ pravarṣati catuṣṣaṣṭi āḍhakāni pravarṣati

original: p.76.2/.dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati eka^pañcāśadāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
analyzed: grīṣmāṇām paścime māse yadi atra devaḥ pravarṣati ekapañcāśat āḍhakāni pravarṣati

original: p.76.3/.śatabhiṣāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati ṣoḍaśāḍhakāni (77)
analyzed: grīṣmāṇām paścime māse yadi atra devaḥ pravarṣati ṣoḍaśa āḍhakāni

original: manuṣyā dārakadārikāś ca skandhe kṛtvā deśa^antaraṃ gacchanti/
analyzed: manuṣyāḥ dāraka dārikāḥ ca skandhe kṛtvā deśa antaram gacchanti

original: p.77.1/.pūrvasyāṃ bhādrapadāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati catuḥṣaṣṭy^āḍhakāni pravarṣati/
analyzed: bhādrapadāyām grīṣmāṇām paścime māse yadi atra devaḥ pravarṣati catuḥṣaṣṭi āḍhakāni pravarṣati
varṣā mukhe ca atra ekonaviṃśati rātrikaḥ avagrahaḥ bhavati
etāḥ ca varṣāḥ bahu caurāḥ bhavanti
dvau ca atra mahā vyādhī bhavataḥ

original: p.77.2/.uttarasyāṃ bhādrapadāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati pūrṇam āḍhakaśataṃ pravarṣati/
analyzed: bhādrapadāyām grīṣmāṇām paścime māse yadi atra devaḥ pravarṣati pūrṇam āḍhaka śatam pravarṣati
catvāraḥ ca atra vyādhayaḥ prabalāḥ bhavanti
tat yathā kukṣi rogaḥ akṣi rogaḥ

original: etāś ca varṣāḥ puṣpāṇi phalāni ca sampādayanti/
analyzed: etāḥ ca varṣāḥ puṣpāṇi phalāni ca sampādayanti

original: p.78.1/.revatyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati eka^ṣaṣṭyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
analyzed: grīṣmāṇām paścime māse yadi atra devaḥ pravarṣati ekaṣaṣṭi āḍhakāni pravarṣati
nikṣipta śastra daṇḍāḥ ca rājānaḥ bhavanti
deva nakṣatra samāyuktāḥ ca janapadāḥ bhavanti

original: p.78.2/.aśvinyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati aṣṭacatvāriṃśadāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
analyzed: grīṣmāṇām paścime māse yadi atra devaḥ pravarṣati aṣṭacatvāriṃśat āḍhakāni pravarṣati
bhaya samāyuktāḥ ca atra janapadāḥ bhavanti

original: p.79.1/.bharaṇyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati pūrṇam āḍhakaśataṃ pravarṣati/
analyzed: grīṣmāṇām paścime māse yadi atra devaḥ pravarṣati pūrṇam āḍhaka śatam pravarṣati
rājānaḥ ca atra anyonya ghātakāḥ bhavanti

original: p.79.3/.amīṣāṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn aśṭāviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ rāhugrahe phalavipākaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
analyzed: bhoḥ puṣkarasārin a śṭāviṃśatīnām nakṣatrāṇām rāhu grahe phala vipākam vyākhyāsyāmi

original: p.79.4./kṛttikāsu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin yadi candra^graho bhavati kaliṅgamagadhānām upapīḍā bhavati/
analyzed: bhoḥ puṣkarasārin yadi candra grahaḥ bhavati kaliṅga magadhānām upapīḍā bhavati

original: yadi rohiṇyāṃ candra^graho bhavati prajānām upapīḍā bhavati/
analyzed: yadi rohiṇyām candra grahaḥ bhavati prajānām upapīḍā bhavati

original: yadi mṛgaśirasi candra^graho bhavati videhānāṃ janapadānām upapīḍā bhavati/
analyzed: yadi mṛgaśirasi candra grahaḥ bhavati videhānām janapadānām upapīḍā bhavati

original: evam ārdrāyāṃ punarvasau puṣye ca vaktavyaṃ/
analyzed: evam ārdrāyām punarvasau puṣye ca vaktavyam

original: aśleṣāyāṃ yadi candra^graho bhavati nāgānāṃ haimavatānāṃ
analyzed: aśleṣāyām yadi candra grahaḥ bhavati nāgānām haimavatānām

original: yadi maghāsu candra^graho bhavati gauḍikānām upapīḍā bhavati/
analyzed: yadi maghāsu candra grahaḥ bhavati gauḍikānām upapīḍā bhavati

original: yadi pūrvaphalgunyāṃ somo gṛhyate caurāṇām upapīḍā (80) bhavati/
analyzed: yadi pūrvaphalgunyām somaḥ gṛhyate caurāṇām upapīḍā bhavati

original: yady uttaraphalgunyāṃ somo gṛhyate +avantīnām upapīḍā bhavati/
analyzed: yadi uttaraphalgunyām somaḥ gṛhyate avantīnām upapīḍā bhavati

original: yadi hasteṣu somo gṛhyate saurāṣṭrikāṇām upapīḍā bhavati/
analyzed: yadi hasteṣu somaḥ gṛhyate saurāṣṭrikāṇām upapīḍā bhavati

original: yadi citrāyāṃ somo gṛhyate pakṣiṇāṃ dvipadānāṃ ca pīḍā bhavati/
analyzed: yadi citrāyām somaḥ gṛhyate pakṣiṇām dvipadānām ca pīḍā bhavati

original: yady anurādhāsu somo gṛhyate vaṇijānām upapīḍā bhavati śākaṭikānāṃ ca/
analyzed: yadi anurādhāsu somaḥ gṛhyate vaṇijānām upapīḍā bhavati śākaṭikānām ca

original: yadi jyeṣṭhāyāṃ somo gṛhyate dauvālikānāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
analyzed: yadi jyeṣṭhāyām somaḥ gṛhyate dauvālikānām pīḍā bhavati

original: yadi mūle somo gṛhyate +adhvagānāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
analyzed: yadi mūle somaḥ gṛhyate adhvagānām pīḍā bhavati

original: yadi pūrvāṣāḍhāyāṃ somo gṛhyate +avantīnāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
analyzed: yadi pūrvāṣāḍhāyām somaḥ gṛhyate avantīnām pīḍā bhavati

original: yady uttarāṣāḍhāyāṃ somo gṛhyate kāmbojakānāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
analyzed: yadi uttarāṣāḍhāyām somaḥ gṛhyate kāmbojakānām pīḍā bhavati

original: yady abhijiti somo gṛhyate dakṣiṇāpathikānāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
analyzed: yadi abhijiti somaḥ gṛhyate dakṣiṇāpathikānām pīḍā bhavati

original: yadi śravaṇeṣu somo gṛhyate caurāṇāṃ ghātakānāṃ ca^upapīḍā bhavati/
analyzed: yadi śravaṇeṣu somaḥ gṛhyate caurāṇām ghātakānām ca aupapīḍā bhavati

original: yadi dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ somo gṛhyate kurupāñcālanāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
analyzed: yadi dhaniṣṭhāyām somaḥ gṛhyate kuru pāñcālanām pīḍā bhavati

original: yadi śatabhiṣāyāṃ somo gṛhyate maulikānām ātharvaṇikānāṃ ca pīḍā bhavati/
analyzed: yadi śatabhiṣāyām somaḥ gṛhyate maulikānām ātharvaṇikānām ca pīḍā bhavati

original: yadi pūrvabhādrapadāyāṃ somo gṛhyate gāndhikānāṃ yavana^kāmbojakānāṃ ca pīḍā
analyzed: yadi pūrvabhādrapadāyām somaḥ gṛhyate gāndhikānām yavana kāmbojakānām ca pīḍā

original: yadi revatyāṃ somo gṛhyate nāvikānāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
analyzed: yadi revatyām somaḥ gṛhyate nāvikānām pīḍā bhavati

original: yadi bharaṇyāṃ somo gṛhyate bharukacchānāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
analyzed: yadi bharaṇyām somaḥ gṛhyate bharu kacchānām pīḍā bhavati

original: p.81.1/.evaṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatre candra^graho bhavati tasya tasya deśasya pīḍā bhavati/
analyzed: bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatre candra grahaḥ bhavati tasya tasya deśasya pīḍā bhavati
iti uktaḥ rāhu graha phala vipāka adhyāyaḥ

original: p.81.3cd/.ṣaṭtārāṃ kṛttikāṃ vidyād āśrayaṃ tāsu kārayet/
p.81.4ab/.sarpirviloḍayet tatra gavāṃ veśma ca kārayet/
p.81.4cd/.ajaiḍakāś ca kretavyā gavāṃ ca vṛṣam utsṛjet//
analyzed: ca kretavyāḥ gavām ca vṛṣam utsṛjet

original: p.81.5ab/.aśmasāramayaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ sarvam atra tu kārayet/
p.82.1ab/.gṛhaṃ ca māpayet atra tathā +avāsaṃ prakalpayet/
analyzed: ca māpayet atra tathā avāsam prakalpayet

original: p.82.1cd/.navaṃ ca chādayed vastraṃ krayaṇaṃ na^atra kārayet//
analyzed: ca chādayet vastram krayaṇam na atra kārayet
atha atra eva vidvān na eva prayojayet

original: p.82.3ab/.śastrāṇi kṣurakarmāṇi sarvāṇy atra tu kārayet/
analyzed: kṣura karmāṇi sarvāṇi atra tu kārayet

original: p.82.3cd/.tejasāni ca bhāṇḍāni kārayec ca krīṇīta ca//
analyzed: ca bhāṇḍāni kārayet ca krīṇīta ca

original: p.82.4ab/.āyuṣyaṃ ca śiraḥ^snānāṃ strīṇāṃ viṣkambhaṇāni ca/
p.82.4cd/.pravarṣaṇaṃ ced devasya na^atra vairaṃ praśāmyati//
analyzed: ced devasya na atra vairam praśāmyati

original: p.82.5cd/.āyuṣmāṃś ca yaśasvī ca yajña^śīlo +atra jāyate//kṛttikāsu
analyzed: ca yaśasvī ca yajña śīlaḥ atra jāyate kṛttikāsu

original: p.82.6cd/.kṣetravastuvihārāṃś ca navaṃ veśma ca kārayet//
p.82.7ab/.prayojayec cakrān vārān dāsāṃś ca^eva gṛhe paśūn/
analyzed: cakrān vārān dāsān ca eva gṛhe paśūn

original: p.83.1ab/.ṛṇaṃ na dadyāt tatra^eva vairam atra tu vardhate/
analyzed: na dadyāt tatra eva vairam atra tu vardhate

original: p.83.1cd/.saṃgrāmaṃ ca surāyogaṃ dvayam eva vivarjayet//
analyzed: ca surā yogam dvayam eva vivarjayet

original: p.83.2ab/.pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya janma ca^atra praśasyate/
analyzed: ca devasya janma ca atra praśasyate
paśumān dhanyaḥ mahā bhogaḥ atra jāyaterohiṇyām

original: p.83.3ab/.saumyaṃ mṛgaśiro vidyād ṛju tisraś ca tārakāḥ/
analyzed: mṛgaśiraḥ vidyāt ṛju tisraḥ ca tārakāḥ

original: p.83.3cd/.mṛdūni yāni karmāṇi tāni sarvāṇi kārayet/
p.83.3ef/.yāni karmāṇi rohiṇyāṃ tāni sarvāṇi kārayet//
p.83.3ab/.sakṣīrān vāpayed vṛkṣān bījāni kṣīravanti ca/
p.83.4cd/.uṣṭrāṃś ca balīvardāṃś ca damayed api kṛṣṭaye//
analyzed: ca balīvardān ca damayet api kṛṣṭaye

original: p.83.5ab/.ācchādayen navaṃ vāsaś ca^alaṅkāraṃ ca kārayet/
analyzed: navam vāsaḥ ca alaṅkāram ca kārayet

original: p.83.5cd/.dvijātīnāṃ tu karmāṇi sarvāṇy evātra kārayet//
analyzed: tu karmāṇi sarvāṇi eva atra kārayet

original: p.83.6ab/.pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya suvṛṣṭiṃ ca^atra nirdiśet/
analyzed: ca devasya su vṛṣṭim ca atra nirdiśet

original: p.83.6cd/.svapnaśīlas tathā trāsī medhāvī sa ca jāyate//
analyzed: tathā trāsī medhāvī sa ca jāyate

original: p.84.1ab/.ārdrāyāṃ mṛgayed arthān bhadraṃ karma ca kārayet/
analyzed: mṛgayet arthān bhadram karma ca kārayet

original: prathamāṃ vṛṣṭiṃ vikrīṇīyāc ca na^atra gāṃ/
analyzed: prathamām vṛṣṭim vikrīṇīyāt ca naatra gām

original: p.84.4ab/.punarvasau tu yukte +atra kuryād vai vrata^dhāraṇaṃ/
analyzed: tu yukte atra kuryāt vai vrata dhāraṇam

original: p.84.5cd/.punaḥ punar yadīccheta tatra karmāṇi kārayet//
analyzed: punar yadi iccheta tatra karmāṇi kārayet

original: p.85.1ab/.cikitsanaṃ na kurvīta yadīcchen na parābhavaṃ/
analyzed: na kurvīta yadi icchet na parābhavam

original: p.85.1cd/.pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya janma ca^atra praśasyate//
analyzed: ca devasya janma ca atra praśasyate

original: p.85.2ab/.alīlaś ca^atra jāyeta strī^lolaś ca^api mānavaḥ/
analyzed: ca atra jāyeta strī lolaḥ ca api mānavaḥ
ca na ekatra arpita cittaḥ saḥ ucyate

original: p.85.3ab/.dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ puṣye nityaṃ prayojayet/
p.85.5cd/.purohitaṃ ca kurvīta dhvaja^agraṃ ca prakārayet//
analyzed: ca kurvīta dhvaja agram ca prakārayet

original: p.85.6cd/.na ca rogo na cauraś ca kṣemaṃ ca^atra sadā bhavet//
analyzed: ca rogaḥ na cauraḥ ca kṣemam ca atra sadā bhavet
nitya yuktaḥ san sarva karmāṇi sādhayet

original: p.85.7cd/.vaireṇātropanāhaiś ca ye janās tān vivarjayet/
p.85.7ef/.āyuṣmāṃś ca yaśasvī ca mahā^bhogaḥ prajāyate//puṣye//
analyzed: ca yaśasvī ca mahā bhogaḥ prajāyate puṣye
nadī bandham sandhi karma ca kārayet

original: p.86.2ef/.krodhanaḥ svapnaśīlaś ca kuhakaś ca^atra jāyate//aśleṣāyāṃ//
analyzed: svapna śīlaḥ ca kuhakaḥ ca atra jāyate aśleṣāyām
kurvīta su mukham ca atra kārayet
pitṛ devebhyaḥ śrāddham ca eva atra kārayet

original: p.86.5cd/.suhṛc ca dvārikaś ca^eva rasa^kāmaś ca jāyate/
analyzed: ca dvārikaḥ ca eva rasa kāmaḥ ca jāyate
bahu putraḥ ca strī kāmaḥ bhakta lolupaḥ

original: p.86.6ab/.saṃgrāmaṃ jīyate tatra yadi pūrvaṃ pravartate/
p.86.6cd/.dāruṇāni ca karmāṇi tāni vidvān vivarjayet//maghāsu//
analyzed: ca karmāṇi tāni vidvān vivarjayet maghāsu

original: p.87.3cd/.bhāgaṃ ye ca^upajīvanti teṣāṃ karma prayojayet//
analyzed: ye ca eva upajīvanti teṣām karma prayojayet
a keśaḥ subhagaḥ ca atra jāyate

original: p.87.4ef/.naṣṭaṃ viddhaṃ kṛtaṃ ca^api na tad asti^iti nirdiśet//
analyzed: viddham kṛtam ca api na tat asti iti nirdiśet

original: p.87.5cd/.medhāvī darśanīyaś ca yaśasvī ca^atra jāyate//
analyzed: darśanīyaḥ ca yaśasvī ca atra jāyate

original: p.87.6ab/.athātra naṣṭaṃ dagdhaṃ vā sarvam asti^iti nirdiśet/
analyzed: naṣṭam dagdham vā sarvam asti iti nirdiśet

original: p.88.2cd/.cauryaṃ ca sidhyate tatra tac ca vidvān vivarjayet//
analyzed: ca sidhyate tatra tat ca vidvān vivarjayet

original: p.88.3ab/.pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya varṣā viśrāvaṇī bhavet/
p.88.3cd/.athātra jātaṃ jānīyāc chūraṃ cauraṃ vicakṣaṇaṃ/
p.88.4ab/.citrāyām āhataṃ vastraṃ bhūṣaṇāni ca kārayet/
p.88.4cd/.rājānaṃ bhūṣitaṃ paśyet senāvyūhaṃ ca darśayet//
analyzed: bhūṣitam paśyet senā vyūham ca darśayet

original: p.88.5ab/.hiraṇyaṃ rajataṃ dravyaṃ nagarāṇi ca māpayet/
p.88.6ab/.gaṇakānāṃ ca vidyāṃ ca vādyaṃ nartanagāyanaṃ/
analyzed: ca vidyām ca vādyam nartana gāyanam

original: p.88.6cd/.pūrvikāṃ rūpakārāṃś ca rathakārāṃś ca śikṣayet/
p.88.6ef/.citra^karāṃś ca lekhakān pustakarma ca kārayet//
analyzed: ca lekhakān pusta karma ca kārayet
darśanīyaḥ ca citra akṣaḥ bhakta lolupaḥ

original: p.89.2ab/.mṛdu^śīlaś ca bhīruś ca calacittaḥ kutūhalī/
analyzed: ca bhīruḥ ca cala cittaḥ kutūhalī

original: p.89.2cd/.āyuṣmān subhagaś ca^eva strī^lolaś ca^atra jāyate//citrāyāṃ//
analyzed: subhagaḥ ca eva strī lolaḥ ca atra jāyate citrāyām

original: p.89.3ab/.svātyāṃ prayojayed yodhān aśvān aśvatarīṃ kharān/
p.89.4cd/.āvāhaṃś ca vivāhaṃś ca sauhṛdyaṃ ca^atra kārayet//
analyzed: ca vivāhan ca sauhṛdyam ca atra kārayet

original: p.89.5ab/.nirvāsanam amitrāṇāṃ svayaṃ na pravased gṛhāt/

analyzed: roga bahulaḥ cala cittaḥ ca jāyate svātau

original: p.89.7ab/.śālayas tila^māṣāś ca ye ca vṛkṣāḥ suśākhinaḥ/
analyzed: tila māṣāḥ ca ye ca vṛkṣāḥ su śākhinaḥ

original: p.90.1ab/.ropayet tān viśākhāsu gṛhakarma ca kārayet/
p.90.1cd/.śiraḥ^snānāni kurvīta medhyaṃ prāyaś ca kārayet//
p.90.2cd/.manasvī darśanīyaś ca medhāvī ca^atra jāyate/
analyzed: darśanīyaḥ ca medhāvī ca atra jāyate
alpa sutaḥ ca eva durbhagaḥ bhakta lolupaḥ viśākhāsu

original: p.90.3ab/.anurādhāsu kurvīta mitraiḥ sadbhiś ca saṅgatiṃ/

analyzed: mṛdu karmāṇi mādhuryam ca atra kārayet

original: p.90.4ab/.kṣauraṃ ca kārayet atra śastra^karmāṇi kārayet/
p.90.4cd/.saṃyuktāntaprayogāṃś ca sandhiṃ kuryāc ca nityaśaḥ/

analyzed: paryupataptam vā su alpa āyasena ayāsam vinirdiśet
ca atra dharma śīlaḥ ca jāyate
pūrva kārī syāt rājānam ca abhiṣiñcayet

original: p.90.6cd/.nagaraṃ nigamaṃ grāmaṃ māpayed ārabheta ca/
p.90.6ef/.kṣatriyāṇāṃ ca rājñāṃ ca sarvakarmāṇi kārayet//
analyzed: ca rājñām ca sarva karmāṇi kārayet

original: p.91.1cd/.āyuṣmāṃś ca yaśasvī ca vidvatsu ca kutūhalī//
analyzed: ca yaśasvī ca vidvatsu ca kutūhalī

original: p.91.2ab/.prāsādam ārohec ca^atra gajam aśvaṃ rathaṃ tathā/
analyzed: ārohet ca atra gajam aśvam ratham tathā
paryupataptam vā kleśena eva iti nirdiśet

original: p.91.3cd/.dāruṇāny atra sidhyanti tāni vidvān vivarjayet/

analyzed: tu mūla jātāni mūla kandālukāni api

original: p.91.4cd/.sūlādyāni ca sarvāṇi bījāny atra prayojayet//
p.91.5ab/.ṛṇaṃ vai yat purāṇaṃ syād artho ca^asyāgrataḥ sthitaḥ/
analyzed: vai yat purāṇam syāt ca asya agratas sthitaḥ

original: p.91.5cd/.mūle siddhartham ārabhyaṃ tathā sarvaṃ varāṅgakaṃ//
p.91.6cd/.nadīṣu snapanaṃ ca^eva mūle sarvān prayojayet//
analyzed: snapanam ca eva mūle sarvān prayojayet

original: p.92.1ab/.dāruṇāny atra sidhyanti maṅgalāni ca kārayet/
p.92.1cd/.kiṇvayogān surāyogān na kuryāc chatrubhiḥ saha//
analyzed: surā yogāt na kuryāt śatrubhiḥ saha

original: p.92.2ab/.dhana^vān bahu^putraś ca mūlavān atra jāyate/
analyzed: bahu putraḥ ca mūlavān atra jāyate

original: p.92.2cd/.athātra naṣṭaṃ dagdhaṃ vā naitad asti^iti nirdiśet/
analyzed: naṣṭam dagdham vā na etat asti iti nirdiśet
ca devasya su vṛṣṭim abhinirdiśet mūle

original: p.92.3ab/.āṣāḍhāyāṃ ca pūrvasyāṃ saritaś ca sarāṃsi ca/
analyzed: ca pūrvasyām saritaḥ ca sarāṃsi ca

original: p.92.4ab/.utpādyāni ca puṣpāṇi tathā mūlaphalāni ca/
analyzed: ca puṣpāṇi tathā mūla phalāni ca

original: p.92.4cd/.ārāmāṃś ca prakurvīta bhaikṣakāṃś ca prayojayet/
p.92.4ef/.yāni ca^ugrāṇi karmāṇi sidhyanty atra tu tāni ca//
analyzed: ca augrāṇi karmāṇi sidhyanti atra tu tāni ca

original: p.92.5ab/.naṣṭaṃ paryupataptaṃ vā naitad asti^iti nirdiśet/
analyzed: paryupataptam vā na etat asti iti nirdiśet
puṇya śīlaḥ ca darśanīyaḥ atra jāyate
sarva vāsāṃsi navam na ācchādayet iti

original: p.93.1ab/.na saṃhared bhedayed vā vāstukarma na sidhyati/
analyzed: saṃharet bhedayet vā vāstu karma na sidhyati

original: p.93.1c/.śreṇavindhaṃ ca rājā nu samayaṃ ca^atra kārayet//
analyzed: ca rājā nu samayam ca atra kārayet

original: p.93.2ab/.pragalbhaś ca sabhāśīlaḥ kṛtī ca^atra prajāyate/
analyzed: ca sabhāśīlaḥ kṛtī ca atra prajāyate

original: p.93.4/.abhijiti na kurvīta brahma^devasya hy arcanaṃ//abhijiti//
analyzed: na kurvīta brahma devasya hi arcanam abhijiti

original: p.93.5ab/.śravaṇe na ca kurvīta sarvāḥ saṃgrāmikāḥ kriyāḥ/
analyzed: na ca kurvīta sarvāḥ saṃgrāmikāḥ kriyāḥ

original: p.93.5cd/.gītaśikṣādhyayanaṃ ca na cireṇa hi sidhyati//
p.93.6cd/.dvijātīnāṃ tu karmāṇi sarvāṇy eva prayojayet//
p.94.7ab/.bali^kṛtyāni kurvīta darśayec ca balāny api/

analyzed: arogī balavān yajña śīlaḥ atra jāyate

original: p.94.8cd/.naṣṭaṃ ca labhyate tatra śravanasthe niśākare//śravaṇe//
analyzed: ca labhyate tatra śravana sthe niśākareśravaṇe

original: p.94.10cd/.śreṣṭhinaṃ sthāpayed deśe gaṇādhyakṣaṃ gaṇeśv api//
analyzed: sthāpayet deśe gaṇādhyakṣam gaṇa īśu api

original: p.94.11ab/.medhāvī ca yaśasvī ca mahā^bhogī mahā^dhanaḥ//
analyzed: ca yaśasvī ca mahā bhogī mahādhanaḥ

original: p.94.11cd/.bahv^apatyo mṛdur dānto mahā^ātmā ca^atra jāyate/
analyzed: mṛduḥ dāntaḥ mahā ātmā ca atra jāyate

original: p.94.11c/.pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya vidyāc ca^atra suvṛṣṭitāṃ//
analyzed: ca devasya vidyāt ca atra su vṛṣṭi tām

original: p.94.12cd/.kīrtikarma ca kurvīta sidhyanty ātharvaṇāni ca//
p.94.13ab/.prasārayec ca paṇyāni śauṇḍikaṃ ca prayojayet/
p.94.13cd/.adadhiṃ khānāyet tatra tila^māṣāṃś ca vāpayet//
analyzed: khānāyet tatra tila māṣān ca vāpayet

original: p.95.1cd/.ādeyaṃ ca tadā +adadyād vyayaṃ ca^atra na kārayet//
analyzed: ca tadā adadyāt vyayam ca atra na kārayet

original: p.95.2cd/.bhiṣakkarma ca kurvīta bhaiṣajyāni ca saṃharet//
p.95.3ab/.nidhiṃ vā khānayet tatra nidadhyād api vā nidhiṃ/
analyzed: vā khānayet tatra nidadhyāt api vā nidhim

original: p.95.3cd/.dhanaṃ ca^atra prayuñjīta bhiṣakkarma ca śikṣayet//
analyzed: ca atra prayuñjīta bhiṣakkarma ca śikṣayet

original: p.95.4ab/.athātra mṛgayen naṣṭaṃ labhyate tac cirād api/
analyzed: mṛgayet naṣṭam labhyate tat cirāt api

original: p.95.4cd/.arogī krodhanaś ca^atra svapnaśīlaś ca jāyate/
analyzed: krodhanaḥ ca atra svapna śīlaḥ ca jāyate
vā na etat asti iti nirdiśet
mahā bhogaḥ jñātīnām ca sadā priyaḥ
akrūra karmā niḥkrohaḥ ca atra jāyate

original: p.95.6ef/.pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya caṇḍāṃ vṛṣṭiṃ samādiśet//
p.96.1cd/.na ca dakṣinato gacchet puraṃ ca^atra pradāpayet//
analyzed: ca gacchet puram ca atra pradāpayet

original: p.96.2ab/.āyuṣmāṃś ca yaśasvī ca dhanavāṃś ca^atra jāyate/
analyzed: ca yaśasvī ca dhanavān ca atra jāyate

original: p.96.2cd/.atra^api triguṇaṃ vinded ādānaṃ yadi vā vyayaṃ/
analyzed: triguṇam vindet ādānam yadi vā vyayam

original: p.96.3cd/.koṣṭha^āgārāṇi kurvīta kiṇvaṃ ca^atra na kārayet//
analyzed: kurvīta kiṇvam ca atra na kārayet

original: p.96.4ab/.surākarma ca kurvīta hiraṇyaṃ govrajāni ca/
analyzed: ca kurvīta hiraṇyam go vrajāni ca

original: p.96.4cd/.gosaṅghaṃ sthāpayec ca^atra gośālāṃ ca^atra kārayet/
analyzed: sthāpayet ca atra go śālām ca atra kārayet

original: p.96.4ef/.ācchādayen navaṃ vastraṃ hiraṇyam api dhārayet//

analyzed: dāna śīlaḥ ca daridraḥ ca anasūyakaḥ

original: p.96.5cd/.jñātīnāṃ sevako nityaṃ dharma^jñaś ca^atra jāyate/
analyzed: sevakaḥ nityam dharma jñaḥ ca atra jāyate
naṣṭa lābham ca revatyām abhinirdiśet revatyām

original: p.97.1ab/.strī^puṃsam aśvinā yuñjyād aśvaśālāṃ ca kārayet/
analyzed: aśvinā yuñjyāt aśva śālām ca kārayet

original: p.97.1cd/.aśvān prayojayed atra rathaṃ ca^atra prayojayet//
analyzed: prayojayet atra ratham ca atra prayojayet

original: p.97.2ab/.ṛṇaḥ prayogaḥ kartavyo bījāny atra pravāpayet/
p.97.2cd/.yānāni ca hayān damyān dantinaś ca prayojayet//
analyzed: ca hayān damyān dantinaḥ ca prayojayet

original: p.97.3ab/.bhaiṣajyaṃ bhojayed atra bhiṣakkarma ca kārayet/
p.97.3cd/.medhāvī darśanīyaś ca rāja^yogyaś ca sampadā//
analyzed: darśanīyaḥ ca rāja yogyaḥ ca sampadā

original: p.97.4ab/.arogo balavāṃc chūraḥ subhago hy atra jāyate/
analyzed: balavān śūraḥ subhagaḥ hi atra jāyate

original: p.97.5cd/.bhṛtyāṃś ca bhṛtakāṃś ca^api vṛṇuyād darśayet tathā//
analyzed: ca bhṛtakān ca api vṛṇuyāt darśayet tathā

original: p.97.6ab/.bhūtiṃ ca^upanayed atra bhāryāṃ ca na vivāhayet/
analyzed: ca aupanayet atra bhāryām ca na vivāhayet
pāpa cāritraḥ kadaryaḥ ca atra jāyate
lubdhaḥ ca para vyāhāra gocaraḥ bharaṇyām

original: p.98.3ab/.teṣāṃ madhye yadā sarve śasyāny oṣadhayo +api ca/
analyzed: madhye yadā sarve śasyāni oṣadhayaḥ api ca

original: p.98.3cd/.vanaspatayaś ca pīḍyante yatrāsau tiṣṭhate grahaḥ/
analyzed: ca pīḍyante yatra asau tiṣṭhate grahaḥ

original: p.98.5/.catvāri bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatrāṇi dhruvāṇi bhavanti tāni vyākhyāsyāmi/
analyzed: bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatrāṇi dhruvāṇi bhavanti tāni vyākhyāsyāmi

original: yāni ca^anyāni uktāni karmāṇi tāni kārayet/
analyzed: yāni caanyāni uktāni karmāṇi tāni kārayet

original: p.99.1ab/.atha naṣṭaṃ dagdhaṃ vā viddhaṃ ca^api hṛtaṃ ca vā/
analyzed: naṣṭam dagdham vā viddham ca api hṛtam ca vā

original: p.99.1cd/.evam abhinirdiṣṭāṃ vā svasti kṣipraṃ bhaviṣyati//
p.99.2ab/.athātra jāto dhanyo +asau vidyātmā ca yaśasvī ca/
analyzed: jātaḥ dhanyaḥ asau vidyā ātmā ca yaśasvī ca

original: p.99.3/.catvāri bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatrāṇi kṣiprāni bhavanti/
tad yathā puṣyo hastābhijid aśvino ceti/
analyzed: tat yathā puṣyaḥ hasta abhijit aśvino ca iti

original: eṣu kṣiprāṇi karmāṇi kārayec ca vicakṣaṇaḥ/
analyzed: eṣu kṣiprāṇi karmāṇi kārayet ca vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: svādhyāyaṃ mantra^samārambhaṃ pravāsa^prasthānaṃ gāś ca turaṅgān apy atra yojayet/
analyzed: svādhyāyam mantra samārambham pravāsa prasthānam gāḥ ca turaṅgān api atra yojayet
dhūyāṇi yukta karmāṇi ca oṣadhī karmāṇi ca

original: athātra naṣṭaṃ dagdhaṃ vā viddhaṃ vā svasti bhaviṣyati^iti vaktavyaṃ/
analyzed: atha atra naṣṭam dagdham vā viddham vā svasti bhaviṣyati iti vaktavyam
mahā bhogam tathā ca mahat uttamam

original: p.99.6cd/.kṣatriyaṃ dānaśīlaṃ ca brahmaṇaṃ ca purohitaṃ//iti/
analyzed: dāna śīlam ca ca purohitam iti

original: p.99.7/.pañca khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatrāni dāruṇāni bhavanti/tad yathā/
analyzed: khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatrāni dāruṇāni bhavanti tat yathā

original: p.99.8ab/.maghā trīṇi ca pūrvāṇi bharaṇī ceti pañcamī/
analyzed: trīṇi ca pūrvāṇi bharaṇī ca iti pañcamī

original: p.99.8cd/.athātra dagdhaṃ naṣṭaṃ vā viddhaṃ vā na bhaviṣyati//
analyzed: dagdham naṣṭam vā viddham vā na bhaviṣyati
nava aṃśāḥ ṣaṣ grāsāḥ dvi kṣetrāṇi

original: kṛttikā ca maghā mūlā grīṇi pūrvāṇi/
analyzed: kṛttikā ca maghā mūlā grīṇi pūrvāṇi

original: mṛgaśirā puṣyā hastā citrā anurādhā śravaṇā dhaniṣṭhā revatī
analyzed: mṛgaśirā puṣyā hastā citrā anurādhā śravaṇā dhaniṣṭhā revatī

original: imāni nava nakṣatrāṇi paścād bhāgīyāni triṃśan^muhūrta^yogāni kṣetrāṇi ca/
analyzed: imāni nava nakṣatrāṇi paścāt bhāgīyāni triṃśat muhūrta yogāni kṣetrāṇi ca

original: p.100.1/.api ca brāhmaṇa śubhāś ca muhūrtā bhavanti/
analyzed: ca brāhmaṇa śubhāḥ ca muhūrtāḥ bhavanti

original: saṃprayuktanakṣatreṣu sarveṣu yadā śubha^muhūrta^samāpattayo bhavanti tadā śobhanā bhavanti/
analyzed: saṃprayukta nakṣatreṣu sarveṣu yadā śubha muhūrta samāpattayaḥ bhavanti tadā śobhanāḥ bhavanti

original: yadā +aśubha^muhūrtasamāpattayo bhavanti tadā na śobhanā bhavanti/
analyzed: yadā aśubha muhūrta samāpattayaḥ bhavanti tadā na śobhanāḥ bhavanti

original: yadā tu punaḥ śubhāś ca^aśubhāś ca samāpattayo bhavanti tadā sādhāranā bhavanti/
analyzed: yadā tu punar śubhāḥ ca aśubhāḥ ca samāpattayaḥ bhavanti tadā sādhāranāḥ bhavanti

original: p.100.2/.athātra kathaṃ rātridivasānāṃ hrāso vṛddhir vā bhavati^iti tad ucyate/
analyzed: katham rātri divasānām hrāsaḥ vṛddhiḥ vā bhavati iti tat ucyate

original: varṣāṇāṃ prathame māse puṣya^nakṣatram amāvāsyāṃ bhavati/
analyzed: varṣāṇām prathame māse puṣya nakṣatram amāvāsyām bhavati
ṣoḍaśa aṅgula kāṣṭhasya madhyāhne ardha aṅgulāyām chāyāyām ādityaḥ parivartate

original: dvitīye māse maghā +amāvāsyāṃ bhavati bhādrapadā pūrṇamāsyāṃ/
analyzed: dvitīye māse maghā amāvāsyām bhavati bhādrapadā pūrṇamāsyām

original: varṣāṇāṃ tṛtīye māse phalgunyam amāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati/
analyzed: varṣāṇām tṛtīye māse phalgunyam amāvāsyāyām bhavati

original: varṣāṇāṃ caturthe māse citrām amāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati kṛttikā pūrṇamāsyāṃ/
analyzed: varṣāṇām caturthe māse citrām amāvāsyāyām bhavati kṛttikā pūrṇamāsyām
hemantānām dvitīye māse amāvāsyām jyeṣṭhā bhavati
rātriḥ daśa aṅgulāyām chāyāyām ādityaḥ parivartate

original: (102) hemantānāṃ tṛtīye māse pūrvāṣāḍhām avāsyāṃ bhavati/
analyzed: hemantānām tṛtīye māse pūrvāṣāḍhām avāsyām bhavati

original: p.102.1/.grīṣmāṇāṃ prathame māse uttarabhādrapadām āvāsyayaṃ bhavati/

analyzed: citrā pūrṇamāsyām caturdaśa muhūrtaḥ divasaḥ bhavati
grīṣmāṇām dvitīye māse aśvinī amāvāsyāyām bhavati

original: grīṣmānāṃ tṛtīye māse kṛttikām amāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati/
analyzed: grīṣmānām tṛtīye māse kṛttikām amāvāsyāyām bhavati

original: bhavati/ grīṣmāṇāṃ caturthe māse mṛgaśirā amāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati/
analyzed: bhavati grīṣmāṇām caturthe māse mṛgaśirāḥ amāvāsyāyām bhavati
madhyāhne dvi aṅgulāyām chāyāyām ādityaḥ parivartate
anveṣaṇataḥ muhūrta viśeṣaṇaiḥ sarvāṇi ca etāni nakṣatāṇi
bhāga anubhagena amāvāsyayam pūrṇamāsyam ca yujyante
tatra tṛtīye varṣe adhikaḥ māsaḥ yujyate
ṣaṇṇām māsānām ahar rātrāṇi samāni bhavanti

original: ṣaṇ^māsād divaso māse māse samam eva
analyzed: ṣaṣ māsāt divasaḥ māse māse samam eva

original: hīyate/ ṣaṇ^māsād rātrir māse māse parihīyate/
analyzed: hīyate ṣaṣ māsāt rātriḥ māse māse parihīyate

original: e udakaparimāṇasya hrāso vṛddhiś ca bhavati/
analyzed: udaka parimāṇasya hrāsaḥ vṛddhiḥ ca bhavati
sūrya gatyā candra gatyā ca samudra audaka velā abhivṛddhiḥ bhavati

original: atra gaṇanāpratijāgaraṇāsmaram ity evam eṣa saṃvatsaro vyākhyāto bhavati/
analyzed: atra gaṇanā pratijāgaraṇa a smaram iti evam eṣa saṃvatsaraḥ vyākhyātaḥ bhavati

original: p.104.2/.candra ādityaḥ śukro bṛhaspatiḥ śanaiścaro +aṅgārako budhaś ca/
analyzed: ādityaḥ śukraḥ bṛhaspatiḥ śanaiścaraḥ aṅgārakaḥ budhaḥ ca

original: evaṃ śanaiścaro budho +aṅgārakaḥ śukraś ca^ime maṇḍala^cāriṇaḥ/
analyzed: evam śanaiścaraḥ budhaḥ aṅgārakaḥ śukraḥ ca eme maṇḍala cāriṇaḥ

original: p.104.3/.bharaṇī kṛttikā rohiṇī mṛgaśirā etat sādhāraṇaṃ prathamaṃ maṇḍalaṃ/
analyzed: kṛttikā rohiṇī mṛgaśirāḥ etat sādhāraṇam prathamam maṇḍalam

original: ārdrā punarvasuḥ puṣyo +aśleṣā etat sādhāranaṃ dvitīyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ/
analyzed: ārdrā punarvasuḥ puṣyaḥ aśleṣāḥ etat sādhāranam dvitīyam maṇḍalam

original: maghā atha phalgunadvayaṃ hasto citrā etat sādhāraṇaṃ tṛtīyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ/
analyzed: maghāḥ atha phalguna dvayam hastaḥ citrāḥ etat sādhāraṇam tṛtīyam maṇḍalam

original: svātī viśākhā anurādhā etat sādhāraṇaṃ caturthaṃ maṇḍalaṃ/
analyzed: svātī viśākhā anurādhāḥ etat sādhāraṇam caturtham maṇḍalam

original: abhijic chravaṇā dhaniṣṭhā śatabiṣā ubhe bhādrapade caitat sādhāraṇaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ maṇḍalaṃ/
analyzed: abhijit śravaṇā dhaniṣṭhā śatabiṣāḥ ubhe bhādrapade ca etat sādhāraṇam ṣaṣṭham maṇḍalam

original: revatī avinī caitat sādhāraṇaṃ saptamaṃ maṇḍalaṃ/
analyzed: revatī avinī ca etat sādhāraṇam saptamam maṇḍalam

original: saṃvatsaram eteṣu yad yan nakṣatra^maṇḍalaṃ pīḍayati tasya tasya janapadasya sattvasya vā pīḍā nirdeṣṭavyā/
analyzed: saṃvatsaram eteṣu yat yat nakṣatra maṇḍalam pīḍayati tasya tasya janapadasya sattvasya vā pīḍā nirdeṣṭavyā

original: nairṛto varuṇo vāyavo bhargo devo raudro vicārī ca/
analyzed: nairṛtaḥ varuṇaḥ vāyavaḥ bhargaḥ devaḥ raudraḥ vicārī ca

original: p.105.2/.athātra śrāvaṇe māse pūrṇe +aṣṭādaśa^muhūrte divase sūrya^udaye ca caturojā nāma muhūrto bhavati/
analyzed: śrāvaṇe māse pūrṇe aṣṭādaśa muhūrte divase sūrya odaye ca caturojāḥ nāma muhūrtaḥ bhavati

original: rohitasya ca muhūrtasya balasya ca^antare madhyāhno bhavati/
analyzed: rohitasya ca muhūrtasya balasya ca antare madhyāhnaḥ bhavati

original: sūryāvatāre tu vicārī nāma muhūrto bhavati/
analyzed: sūryāvatāre tu vicārī nāma muhūrtaḥ bhavati

original: dvādaśa^muhūrtāyāṃ rātrāv avatīrṇe sūrye ṣaṣṭhe muhūrte nayamano nāma muhūrto bhavati/
analyzed: dvādaśa muhūrtāyām rātrau avatīrṇe sūrye ṣaṣṭhe muhūrte nayamanaḥ nāma muhūrtaḥ bhavati

original: ātāpāgnir evaṃ nāma muhūrto rātryavasāne bhavati/
analyzed: ātāpa agniḥ evam nāma muhūrtaḥ rātri avasāne bhavati

original: māse pūrṇe saptadaśa^muhūrte divase sūrya^udaye ca caturojā evaṃ nāma muhūrtā bhavati/
analyzed: māse pūrṇe saptadaśa muhūrte divase sūrya audaye ca caturojāḥ evam nāma muhūrtā bhavati

original: trayodaśa^muhūrtāyāṃ rātrāv avatīrṇe sūrye vicārī nāma muhūrto bhavati/
analyzed: trayodaśa muhūrtāyām rātrau avatīrṇe sūrye vicārī nāma muhūrtaḥ bhavati

original: ardha^rātre mahā^bhayo vāyāvo nāma muhūrto bhavati/
analyzed: ardharātre mahābhayaḥ vāyāvaḥ nāma muhūrtaḥ bhavati

original: p.106.1/.rātryavasāne ātapāgnir evaṃ nāma muhūrto bhavati/
analyzed: ātapa agniḥ evam nāma muhūrtaḥ bhavati

original: aśvayuje māse pūrṇe ṣoḍaśa^muhūrto divaso bhavati/
analyzed: aśvayuje māse pūrṇe ṣoḍaśa muhūrtaḥ divasaḥ bhavati

original: samudgatasya ca muhūrtasya abhijitasya ca^antare madhyāhno bhavati/
analyzed: samudgatasya ca muhūrtasya abhijitasya ca antare madhyāhnaḥ bhavati

original: sūryāvatāre bhargo devo nāma muhūrto bhavati/
analyzed: sūryāvatāre bhargaḥ devaḥ nāma muhūrtaḥ bhavati

original: p.106.2/.catur^daśa^muhūrtāyāṃ rātrāv avatīrṇe sūrye raudro nāma muhūrto bhavati/
analyzed: rātrau avatīrṇe sūrye raudraḥ nāma muhūrtaḥ bhavati

original: abhijitasya ca muhūrtasya bhīṣamāṇasya ca muhūrtasya antareṇa^ardha^rātraṃ bhavati/
analyzed: abhijitasya ca muhūrtasya bhīṣamāṇasya ca muhūrtasya antareṇa ardharātram bhavati

original: rātryavasāne ātapāgnir evaṃ nāma muhūrto bhavati/
analyzed: rātri avasāne ātapa agniḥ evam nāma muhūrtaḥ bhavati

original: p.106.3/.kārttike māse pūrṇe divasaḥ samarātrir bhavati/
analyzed: māse pūrṇe divasaḥ sama rātriḥ bhavati
pañcadaśa muhūrtaḥ divasaḥ bhavati pañcadaśa muhūrtaḥ rātriḥ

original: samāne +ahorātre sūrya^udaye caturojā evaṃ nāma muhūrto bhavati/
analyzed: samāne ahar rātre sūrya odaye catur ojāḥ evam nāma muhūrtaḥ bhavati

original: rātrāv avatīrṇamātra sūrye bhrgo devo nāma muhūrto bhavati/
analyzed: rātrau avatīrṇa mātra sūrye bhrgaḥ devaḥ nāma muhūrtaḥ bhavati

original: rātryavasāne ātapāgnir evaṃ nāma muhūrto bhavati/
analyzed: rātri avasāne ātapa agniḥ evam nāma muhūrtaḥ bhavati

original: p.107.1/.mārgaśīrṣe māse ca pūrṇe catur^daśa^muhūrte divase sūrya^udaye caturojā evaṃ nāma muhūrto bhavati/
analyzed: māse ca pūrṇe caturdaśa muhūrte divase sūrya audaye caturojāḥ evam nāma muhūrtaḥ bhavati

original: viratasya saṃmukhasya ca muhūrtasya^antare madhyāhno bhavati/
analyzed: viratasya saṃmukhasya ca muhūrtasya antare madhyāhnaḥ bhavati
sūrya avatāre varuṇaḥ nāma muhūrtaḥ bhavati

original: ṣoḍaśa^muhūrtāyāṃ rātrāv avatīrṇamātre sūrye saṃtāpanaḥ saṃyamo nāma muhūrto bhavati/
analyzed: ṣoḍaśa muhūrtāyām rātrau avatīrṇa mātre sūrye saṃtāpanaḥ saṃyamaḥ nāma muhūrtaḥ bhavati
rākṣasasya abhijitasya ca muhūrtasya antare ardharātram

original: bhavati/ rātryavasāne ātapāgnir evaṃ nāma muhūrto bhavati/
analyzed: bhavati rātri avasāne ātapa agniḥ evam nāma muhūrtaḥ bhavati

original: p.107.2/.pauṣamāse pūrṇe trayodaśa^muhūrte divase sūrya^udaye caturojā evaṃ nama muhūrto bhavati/
analyzed: pūrṇe trayodaśa muhūrte divase sūrya udaye catur ojāḥ evam muhūrtaḥ bhavati

original: saptadaśa^muhūrtāyāṃ rātrāv avatīrṇamātre sūrye varuṇo nāma muhūrto bhavati/
analyzed: saptadaśa muhūrtāyām rātrau avatīrṇa mātre sūrye varuṇaḥ nāma muhūrtaḥ bhavati

original: rātryavasāne ātapāgnir evaṃ nāma muhūrto bhavati/
analyzed: rātri avasāne ātapa agniḥ evam nāma muhūrtaḥ bhavati

original: p.107.3/.māgha^māse pūrṇe dvādaśa^muhūrte divase sūrya^udaye caturojā nāma muhūrto bhavati/
analyzed: pūrṇe dvādaśa muhūrte divase sūrya odaye caturojāḥ nāma muhūrtaḥ bhavati

original: sāvitrasya ca viratasya ca muhūrtasya^antareṇa madhyāhno bhavati/
analyzed: sāvitrasya ca viratasya ca muhūrtasya antareṇa madhyāhnaḥ bhavati

original: aṣṭādaśa^muhūrtāyāṃ rātrāv avatīrṇamātre sūrye nairṛto nāma muhūrto bhavati/
analyzed: aṣṭādaśa muhūrtāyām rātrau avatīrṇa mātre sūrye nairṛtaḥ nāma muhūrtaḥ bhavati

original: gardabhasya muhūrtasya ca rākṣasasya ca^antaram ardha^rātraṃ bhavati/
analyzed: gardabhasya muhūrtasya ca rākṣasasya ca antaram ardha rātram bhavati
ātapa agniḥ evam nāma muhūrtaḥ bhavati

original: evam eteṣāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ muhūrtānāṃ caritaṃ vicaritaṃ ca jñātavyaṃ/
analyzed: evam eteṣām nakṣatrāṇām muhūrtānām caritam vicaritam ca jñātavyam

original: p.108.2/.yathāmadhyaṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ rātrivaśena divasavaśena ca^utkarṣāpakarṣau kartavyau/
analyzed: nakṣatrāṇām rātri vaśena divasa vaśena ca autkarṣa apakarṣau kartavyau

original: hīyamāne vardhamāne vā divase vā māse vā pūrṇe +ardha^māse vā/
analyzed: hīyamāne vardhamāne vā divase vā māse vā pūrṇe ardha māse vā

original: dvitīyā ṣaṣṭhī navamī dvādaśī caturdaśī atra^antare divase kalā vardhate rātrau kalā hīyate/
analyzed: dvitīyā ṣaṣṭhī navamī dvādaśī caturdaśī atra antare divase kalā vardhate rātrau kalā hīyate

original: p.108.4cd/.āpo indraś ca vāyuś ca tathāgnir bhagavān api//
analyzed: indraḥ ca vāyuḥ ca tathā agniḥ bhagavān api

original: p.108.5ab/.trayas tu te yatra bhavanti pakṣe ṣaḍeka^māse tu bhavanti vegāḥ/
analyzed: tu te yatra bhavanti pakṣe ṣaṣ eka māse tu bhavanti vegāḥ

original: p.108.5cd/.parasya cakrasya nidarśanaṃ syāt prakampate yatra mahī tv abhīkṣṇaṃ//
analyzed: cakrasya nidarśanam syāt prakampate yatra mahī tu abhīkṣṇam

original: p.109.2cd/.adhyardhaṃ tu pañca^pañcāśan māghe rātriśataṃ smṛtaṃ/
analyzed: tu pañcapañcāśat māghe rātri śatam smṛtam

original: p.109.3ab/.ardhyardhaṃ phālgune māse caitre triṃśat tu rātrayaḥ/
analyzed: phālgune māse caitre triṃśat tu rātrayaḥ

original: p.109.4ab/.yadā sarveṣu māseṣu satataṃ kampate mahī/
p.109.4cd/.vṛkṣās tathā calanti sma jalaṃ vā yadi kampate/
analyzed: tathā calanti sma jalam vā yadi kampate

original: p.109.4ef/.parvataḥ parṇavat kamped bhayam atra vinirdiśet//
analyzed: parṇa vat kampet bhayam atra vinirdiśet

original: p.110.1ab/.nagarāṇy atha vā grāmā ghoṣā ye ca^atra saṃśritāḥ/
analyzed: atha vā grāmāḥ ghoṣāḥ ye caatra saṃśritāḥ
bhavanti vijana araṇya bhūtāḥ mṛga āśrayāḥ

original: p.110.2ab/.aṭavyaḥ saṃpravartante daśa varṣāṇi pañca ca/
p.110.3ab/.kṛttikāsu caled bhūmir grāmeṣu nagareṣu vā/
p.110.3cd/.abhīkṣṇaṃ mucyate hy agnir dahate satṛnālayān//
p.110.5ab/.ye jātā ye ca saṃvṛddhā ye ca taṃ grāmam āśritāḥ/
analyzed: jātāḥ ye ca saṃvṛddhāḥ ye ca tam grāmam āśritāḥ

original: p.110.6cd/.proptaṃ śasyaṃ na roheta bhavet phalasya kṛcchratā//
analyzed: śasyam na roheta bhavet phalasya kṛcchra tā

original: p.111.1ab/.gurviṇīnāṃ ca nārīṇāṃ garbho nipīḍyate bhṛśaṃ/
p.111.2ab/.mahā^ātmānaś ca rājānaḥ śrīmantaś ca narottamāḥ/
analyzed: ca rājānaḥ śrīmantaḥ ca nara uttamāḥ

original: p.111.4ab/.soma^pītāś ca ye viprā vānaprasthāś ca tāpasāḥ/
analyzed: ca ye viprāḥ vānaprasthāḥ ca tāpasāḥ

original: p.111.5ab/.ārdrāyāṃ calitā bhūmir vṛkṣā naśyanti kṣīriṇaḥ/
p.111.6ab/.kūpakhāḥ parikhākhāś ca pāpakā ye ca taskarāḥ/
analyzed: parikhā ākhāḥ ca pāpakāḥ ye ca taskarāḥ

original: p.111.7ab/.punarvasau caled bhūmir maṇḍalaṃ kuṇḍikā^api ca/
analyzed: calet bhūmiḥ maṇḍalam kuṇḍikā api ca

original: p.112.1ab/.puṣyeṇa ca caled bhūmir brāhmaṇā nāyakās tathā/
analyzed: ca calet bhūmiḥ brāhmaṇāḥ nāyakāḥ tathā

original: p.112.1cd/.duraṅgamā vāṇijakāḥ sārthavāhāś ca ye narāḥ//
p.112.2ab/.pārthivāḥ pārvatīyāś ca ye ca tad bhaktigocarāḥ/
analyzed: pārvatīyāḥ ca ye ca tat bhakti gocarāḥ

original: p.112.3ab/.aśleṣāyāṃ caled bhūmir nāgāḥ sarve sarīsṛpāḥ/
p.112.4ab/.vaidyā visakarāś ca^api ye ca satvā darīśrayāḥ/
analyzed: visakarāḥ ca api ye ca satvāḥ darīśrayāḥ
calitā bhūmiḥ mahā rājaḥ atra tapyate

original: p.112.5ef/.yajñāś ca deva^kṛtyaṃ ca sarvam atra nivartate//
analyzed: ca deva kṛtyam ca sarvam atra nivartate

original: p.112.6ab/.ye jātā ye ca saṃvṛddhā ye ca^anye +apy agrapaṇḍitāḥ/
analyzed: jātāḥ ye ca saṃvṛddhāḥ ye ca anye api agra paṇḍitāḥ

original: p.112.6cd/.gandharvāś ca vinaśyanti narā ye ca mahā^kulāḥ/
analyzed: ca vinaśyanti narāḥ ye ca mahā kulāḥ

original: p.112.7ab/.phalgunyāṃ calitā bhūmir ṛtur vyāvartate tadā/
p.112.7cd/.triyagvātaś ca^eva vāti kṛtaṃ naśyati śāśvataṃ/
analyzed: ca eva vāti kṛtam naśyati śāśvatam

original: p.113.4cd/.gaṇamukhyā mahā^mātrāḥ senādhyakṣāś ca ye narāḥ//
p.113.6cd/.kumāryaḥ sarva^ratnaṃ ca sasyānāṃ bīja^kaiḥ saha//
analyzed: sarva ratnam ca sasyānām bījakaiḥ saha

original: p.113.8ab/.svātau pracalitā bhūmiś caurā ye ca kuśīlakāḥ/
analyzed: pracalitā bhūmiḥ caurāḥ ye ca kuśīlakāḥ
ye ca tat karma ratāḥ abhyarthita mūṣakāḥ
calet bhūmiḥ mahā śaila kṣayaḥ bhavet

original: p.114.2ab/.anurādhe caled bhūmir dasyūnām anayo mahān/
p.114.2cd/.viṭā dyūta^karāś ca^eva granthibhedāś ca ye narāḥ//
analyzed: dyūta karāḥ ca eva granthibhedāḥ ca ye narāḥ

original: p.114.3ab/.andhrāḥ puṇḍrāḥ pulindāś ca bhaye tiṣṭhanty anāśritāḥ//
analyzed: puṇḍrāḥ pulindāḥ ca bhaye tiṣṭhanti anāśritāḥ

original: p.114.3cd/.mitrabhedaś ca balavān tadā jagati jāyate//
p.114.4cd/.vāyasā vṛṣabhā vyāḍās tathā caṇḍamṛgāś ca ye//
analyzed: vṛṣabhāḥ vyāḍāḥ tathā caṇḍamṛgāḥ ca ye

original: p.114.5cd/.pratyarthikena śīghreṇa ye ca tad bhaktibhājanāḥ/
analyzed: śīghreṇa ye ca tat bhakti bhājanāḥ

original: p.114.6cd/.grahāśrayāḥ piśācāś ca ye ca sattvā darīśrayāḥ/
analyzed: piśācāḥ ca ye ca sattvāḥ darīśrayāḥ

original: p.115.1ab/.durbhikṣaṃ ca karoty āśu dhānyam alpa^udakaṃ bhavet/
analyzed: ca karoti āśu dhānyam alpa audakam bhavet
calet bhūmiḥ jala jāḥ matsya śuktikāḥ
ca mahā vidyā karāḥ ca ye

original: p.115.4ab/.uttarasyāṃ caled bhūmiḥ śilpinām anayo mahān/
p.115.5ab/.daridrā dhaninaś ca^api śilpino vividhā; api/
analyzed: dhaninaḥ ca api śilpinaḥ vividhāḥ api
ca ghnanti sa cala sthāvarāṇi ca

original: p.115.6ab/.vaiṣṇave calitā bhūmis tadeti yad anīpsitaṃ/
analyzed: calitā bhūmiḥ tadā iti yat anīpsitam

original: p.116.2ab/.kuśaṇḍāḥ śaradaṇḍāś ca ye narā rāja^pūjitāḥ/
analyzed: śara daṇḍāḥ ca ye narāḥ rāja pūjitāḥ

original: p.116.3ab/.dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ caled bhūmir dhaninā manayo mahān/
p.116.4cd/.pārikūlāś ca bhojyāś ca hy anye sannāgarā; api/
analyzed: ca bhojyāḥ ca hi anye sat nāgarāḥ api

original: p.116.5ab/.vāruṇye calitā bhūmir audakeṣv anayo mahān/

analyzed: aśva khara uṣṭrāḥ ca sparśam arcchanti dāruṇam

original: p.116.6ab/.tadāsau vīrakān madrān bāhlīkān kekayān api/
p.117.1ab/.sājena calitā bhūmī rākṣasān ghātakāṃs tathā/
p.117.2ab/.vaṇijyajīvino vaiśyān śūdrāṃś ca karītīn api/
p.117.2cd/.yavanān mālavādyāṃś ca granthibhedāṃś ca nāśayet//
analyzed: mālava ādyān ca granthibhedān ca nāśayet

original: p.117.3ab/.ahirbudhnye caled bhūmir vaṇijām anayo mahān/
p.117.3cd/.dharme ratāś ca ye siddhā ye ca śauktikakarmiṇaḥ//
analyzed: ratāḥ ca ye siddhāḥ ye ca śauktika karmiṇaḥ

original: p.117.4ab/.śibīn vatsān tathā vātsyān kṣatriyān ārjunāyanān/
p.117.5ab/.revatyāṃ calitā bhūmiḥ saṃgrāmaḥ syāt sudāruṇaḥ/
analyzed: calitā bhūmiḥ saṃgrāmaḥ syāt su dāruṇaḥ

original: p.117.5cd/.grāma^ghātāś ca vartante grāmo grāmaṃ ca hiṃsati//
analyzed: ca vartante grāmaḥ grāmam ca hiṃsati

original: p.117.6cd/.sudhanvān abhisārāṃś ca sarva^senāṃś ca nirdahet//
analyzed: abhisārān ca sarva senān ca nirdahet

original: p.118.1ab/.aśvinyāṃ calitā bhūmir aśvānām anayo mahān/
p.118.1cd/.grāma^ghātāś ca vartante bhrātā bhrātṝn jighāṃsati//
p.118.2ab/.yā ca^atra gabham ādhatte ye ca jātāś ca tān iha/
analyzed: ca atra gabham ādhatte ye ca jātāḥ ca tān iha

original: p.118.2cd/.trīṇi varṣāṇy ato duḥkham upaiti ca nirantaraṃ//
analyzed: varṣāṇi atas duḥkham upaiti ca nirantaram

original: p.118.3ab/.sahitāś citra^garbhāś ca ye hy anye ca^aṅganājanāḥ/
analyzed: citragarbhāḥ ca ye hi anye ca aṅganā janāḥ

original: p.118.3cd/.ārjunāyanā rājanyāḥ suṣṭhu trīṃś ca^api hiṃsati//
analyzed: rājanyāḥ suṣṭhu trīn ca api hiṃsati

original: p.118.4ab/.bharaṇyāṃ calitā bhūmiś caurāṇām anayo mahān/
p.118.4cd/.viṭā dyūta^karāś ca^eva granthibhedāś ca ye narāḥ//
analyzed: dyūta karāḥ ca eva granthibhedāḥ ca ye narāḥ

original: p.118.5cd/.antāvaśāyinaḥ pāpāś caranti ye tu durjanāḥ/
p.118.6ab/.vepitāyāṃ tu medinyāṃ bhaved rūpam anantaraṃ/

analyzed: hi aṅjana saṃkāśaḥ mahā parvata sannibhaḥ

original: p.119.1cd/.indraś na varṣate tatra maharṣer vacanaṃ yathā//
analyzed: na varṣate tatra mahā ṛṣeḥ vacanam yathā

original: p.119.1ef/.[evaṃ nigaditaṃ nārthair indraś ca^atra pravarṣati//]
analyzed: nigaditam na arthaiḥ indraḥ ca atra pravarṣati
abhrāḥ hi sandhyāyām grastvā candra divākarau

original: p.119.3cd/.lakṣaṇaṃ tādṛśaṃ dṛṣṭvā vidyāt tānn indrakampitān/
analyzed: tādṛśam dṛṣṭvā vidyāt tān indra kampitān

original: p.119.3ef/.sa nirdeśo bhavet tatra maharṣer vacanaṃ yathā//
analyzed: nirdeśaḥ bhavet tatra mahā ṛṣeḥ vacanam yathā

original: p.119.4cd/.vyavahārāṃś ca kurvīran nirbhayās tatra vāṇijāḥ/
p.119.5ab/.vepitāyāṃ tu medinyāṃ bhaved rūpam anantaraṃ/
p.120.1cd/.anulomaṃ ca saṃyānti carantaḥ paścimāṃ diśaṃ//

analyzed: abhrāḥ ca sandhyāyām grastvā candra divākarau

original: p.120.3ab/.lakṣaṇaṃ tādṛśaṃ dṛṣṭvā vidyāt tāñ jalakampitān/
analyzed: tādṛśam dṛṣṭvā vidyāt tām jala kampitān

original: p.120.3cd/.sa nirdeśo bhavet tatra maharṣer vacanaṃ yathā//
analyzed: nirdeśaḥ bhavet tatra mahā ṛṣeḥ vacanam yathā

original: p.120.4cd/.sthāpyante tatra bījāni nimne naśyanti vai tadā//
analyzed: tatra bījāni nimne naśyanti vai tadā
jalena api naśyeyuḥ rajasā api vā

original: p.120.6ab/.vepitāyāṃ tu medinyāṃ bhaved rūpam anantaraṃ/
p.120.7ab/.dṛśyate kapilā sandhyā candra^sūryau tu lohitāu/
analyzed: kapilā sandhyā candra sūryau tu lohitau

original: p.121.1ab/.tato bhavati nirdeśo maharṣer vacanaṃ yathā/
analyzed: bhavati nirdeśaḥ mahā ṛṣeḥ vacanam yathā

original: p.121.4ab/.kampitāyāṃ tu medinyāṃ bhaved rūpam anantaraṃ/
p.121.5ab/.sandhyā ca lohitā bhāti candra^sūryau tu lohitau/
analyzed: ca lohitā bhāti candra sūryau tu lohitau

original: p.121.6ab/.agnir dahati kāṣṭhāni rakṣitāni dhanāni ca/
p.121.6cd/.dṛśyante dhūmaśikharāḥ śastraṃ ca svidyate bhṛśaṃ//
analyzed: dhūma śikharāḥ śastram ca svidyate bhṛśam

original: p.121.7ab/.vīṇāś ca divi dṛśyante navamāsān na varṣati/
analyzed: ca divi dṛśyante nava māsān na varṣati

original: p.121.8a/.jayati; ahani pūrve kṣatriyān pārthivāṃś ca/

analyzed: ā aparaahṇe go paśūn vaiśya śūdrān

original: p.122.2b/.striyam api ca napuṃsaś ca^ardha^rātreṣv anantān/
analyzed: api ca napuṃsaḥ ca ardharātreṣu anantān
sura pakṣam raudra karma anta kṛṣṇe

original: p.122.3c/.viduṣi ca mṛdu^bhāvaṃ vindate yo hy adhīte/
analyzed: ca mṛdu bhāvam vindate yaḥ hi adhīte
bhavati nṛpa pūjyaḥ bāhmaṇaḥ deva darśī

original: p.123.3/.atha bhoḥ puṣkarasārin amīṣām aṣṭāviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ roga^utpattiṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāmi/
analyzed: bhoḥ puṣkarasārin amīṣām aṣṭāviṃśatīnām nakṣatrāṇām rogautpattim nāma adhyāyam vyākhyāmi

original: p.123.4ab/.kṛttikāsu^utthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
p.123.4cd/.catūrātraṃ bhaved vyādhis tataś ca^ūrdhvaṃ vimucyate//
analyzed: bhavet vyādhiḥ tatas ca ūrdhvam vimucyate

original: p.123.5ab/.agnir hi devatā tatra dadhnā hy asya baliṃ haret/
analyzed: hi devatā tatra dadhnā hi asya balim haret

original: p.123.6ab/.rohiṇyām utthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
analyzed: utthitaḥ vyādhiḥ striyāḥ vā puruṣasya vā

original: p.123.6cd/.pañca^rātraṃ bhaved vyādhis tataś ca^ūrdhvaṃ vimucyate//
analyzed: bhavet vyādhiḥ tatas ca ūrdhvam vimucyate

original: p.123.7ab/.devaḥ prajāpatis tatra śuddhamālyair baliṃ haret/
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ tatra śuddha mālyaiḥ balim haret

original: p.123.8ab/.vyādhir mṛgaśirobhutaḥ striyo vā puruṣasya vā/
p.123.8cd/.aṣṭa^rātraṃ bhaved vyādhis tataś ca^ūrdhvaṃ vimucyate//
analyzed: bhavet vyādhiḥ tatas ca ūrdhvam vimucyate

original: p.123.9ab/.somo hi devatā tatra maṇḍena tu baliṃ haret/
analyzed: hi devatā tatra maṇḍena tu balim haret

original: p.124.1ab/.(124) ādrāyām utthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
analyzed: ādrāyām utthitaḥ vyādhiḥ striyāḥ vā puruṣasya vā

original: p.124.1cd/.daśa^rātraṃ bhaved vyādhis tataś ca^ūrdhvaṃ vimucyate//
analyzed: bhavet vyādhiḥ tatas ca ūrdhvam vimucyate

original: p.124.2ab/.rudro hi devatā tatra pāyasena baliṃ haret/
analyzed: hi devatā tatra pāyasena balim haret

original: p.124.3ab/.punarvasau bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
analyzed: bhavet vyādhiḥ striyāḥ vā puruṣasya vā

original: p.124.3cd/.aṣṭa^rātraṃ bhaved vyādhis tataś ca^ūrdhvaṃ vimucyate//
analyzed: bhavet vyādhiḥ tatas ca ūrdhvam vimucyate

original: p.124.4ab/.ādityo devatā tatra gandha^mālyair baliṃ haret/
analyzed: devatā tatra gandha mālyaiḥ balim haret

original: p.124.5ab/.puṣye samutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
analyzed: samutthitaḥ vyādhiḥ striyāḥ vā puruṣasya vā

original: p.124.6ab/.devo bṛhaspatis tatra gandha^mālyair baliṃ haret/
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ tatra gandha mālyaiḥ balim haret

original: p.124.7ab/.aśleṣāyāṃ bhaved vyādhiḥ striyo vā puruṣasya vā/
analyzed: bhavet vyādhiḥ striyaḥ vā puruṣasya vā

original: p.124.7cd/.na taṃ vaidyāś cikitsantu sarpas tatra tu daivataḥ//
analyzed: tam vaidyāḥ cikitsantu sarpaḥ tatra tu daivataḥ

original: p.124.8ab/.maghā^samutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
p.124.8cd/.aṣṭa^rātraṃ bhaved vyādhis tataś ca^ūrdhvaṃ vimucyate//
analyzed: bhavet vyādhiḥ tatas ca ūrdhvam vimucyate

original: p.124.9ab/.pitaro devatās tatra kṛsareṇa baliṃ haret/
p.124.10ab/.pūrvaphālgunījā vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
p.124.10cd/.sapta^rātraṃ bhaved vyādhis tataś ca^ūrdhvaṃ vimucyate//
analyzed: bhavet vyādhiḥ tatas ca ūrdhvam vimucyate

original: p.125.1ab/.(125) aryamā devatā tatra gandha^mālyair baliṃ haret/ %bhaga
analyzed: aryamā devatā tatra gandha mālyaiḥ balim haret bhaga

original: p.125.2ab/.uttarāyāṃ bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
analyzed: bhavet vyādhiḥ striyāḥ vā puruṣasya vā

original: p.125.2cd/.na taṃ vaidyāś cikitsantu bhago py atra tu devatā//%aryaman
analyzed: tam vaidyāḥ cikitsantu atra tu devatā aryaman

original: p.125.3ab/.hastenāpy utthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
analyzed: utthitaḥ vyādhiḥ striyāḥ vā puruṣasya vā

original: p.125.3cd/.pañca^rātraṃ bhaved vyādhis tataś ca^ūrdhvaṃ vimucyate//
analyzed: bhavet vyādhiḥ tatas ca ūrdhvam vimucyate

original: p.125.4ab/.ravir hi devatā tatra gandha^puṣpair baliṃ haret/
analyzed: hi devatā tatra gandha puṣpaiḥ balim haret

original: p.125.5ab/.citrāyām uttthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
analyzed: uttthitaḥ vyādhiḥ striyāḥ vā puruṣasya vā

original: p.125.5cd/.aṣṭa^rātraṃ bhaved vyādhis tataś ca^ūrdhvaṃ vimucyate//
analyzed: bhavet vyādhiḥ tatas ca ūrdhvam vimucyate

original: p.125.6ab/.tvaṣṭā hi devatā tatra ghṛtam udgair baliṃ haret/
analyzed: hi devatā tatra ghṛtam udgaiḥ balim haret

original: p.125.7ab/.svātyāṃ samutthito vyādiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
analyzed: samutthitaḥ vyādiḥ striyāḥ vā puruṣasya vā

original: p.125.8ab/.devatā^atra bhaved vāyuś citra^mālyair baliṃ haret/
analyzed: bhavet vāyuḥ citra mālyaiḥ balim haret

original: p.125.9ab/.viśākhāyāṃ bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
analyzed: bhavet vyādhiḥ striyāḥ vā puruṣasya vā

original: p.126.1ab/.(126) indrāgnī^devate tatra gandha^mālyair baliṃ haret/
analyzed: indra agnī devate tatra gandha mālyaiḥ balim haret

original: p.126.2ab/.anurādhā^utthito vyādiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
p.126.2cd/.ardha^māsaṃ bhaved vyādhis tataś ca^ūrdhvaṃ vimucyate//
analyzed: bhavet vyādhiḥ tatas ca ūrdhvam vimucyate

original: p.126.3ab/.mitro hi devatā tatra ghṛta^pātraṃ baliṃ haret/
analyzed: hi devatā tatra ghṛta pātram balim haret

original: p.126.4ab/.jyeṣṭhāyām utthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
analyzed: utthitaḥ vyādhiḥ striyāḥ vā puruṣasya vā
hi bhavet vyādhiḥ ahar rātra trayodaśa

original: p.126.5ab/.indro hi devatā tatra gandha^mālyair baliṃ haret/
analyzed: hi devatā tatra gandha mālyaiḥ balim haret

original: p.126.6ab/.mūle samutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
analyzed: samutthitaḥ vyādhiḥ striyāḥ vā puruṣasya vā

original: p.126.6cd/.māsiko hi bhaved vyādhis tataś ca^ūrdhvaṃ vimucyate//
analyzed: hi bhavet vyādhiḥ tatas ca ūrdhvam vimucyate

original: p.126.7ab/.nairṛtir devatā tatra madya^māṃsair baliṃ haret/
analyzed: devatā tatra madya māṃsaiḥ balim haret

original: p.126.8ab/.pūrvāṣāḍhe bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
analyzed: bhavet vyādhiḥ striyāḥ vā puruṣasya vā

original: p.126.8cd/.sāṃkleśiko bhaved vyādhir aṣṭau māsān na saṃśayaḥ//
analyzed: bhavet vyādhiḥ aṣṭau māsān na saṃśayaḥ

original: p.126.9ab/.āpo hi devatās tatra kṛsareṇa baliṃ haret/
analyzed: hi devatāḥ tatra kṛsareṇa balim haret

original: p.126.10ab/.uttarāyāṃ bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
analyzed: bhavet vyādhiḥ striyāḥ vā puruṣasya vā

original: p.126.10cd/.sapta^rātraṃ bhaved vyādhis tataś ca^ūrdhvaṃ vimucyate//
analyzed: bhavet vyādhiḥ tatas ca ūrdhvam vimucyate

original: p.126.11ab/.viśvo hi devatā tatra pāyasena baliṃ haret/
analyzed: hi devatā tatra pāyasena balim haret

original: p.127.1ab/.(127) abhijid utthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
analyzed: abhijit utthitaḥ vyādhiḥ striyāḥ vā puruṣasya vā

original: p.127.1cd/.ṣaṇ^māsān saṃbhaved vyādhis tataś ca^ūrdhvaṃ vimucyate//
analyzed: saṃbhavet vyādhiḥ tatas ca ūrdhvam vimucyate

original: p.127.2ab/.viṣṇuś ca devatā tatra dadhi^maṇḍaṃ baliṃ haret/
analyzed: ca devatā tatra dadhimaṇḍam balim haret

original: p.127.3ab/.śravaṇena^utthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
p.127.3cd/.guruko hi bhaved vyādhiḥ pūrṇaṃ dvādaśa^māsikaṃ//
analyzed: hi bhavet vyādhiḥ pūrṇam dvādaśa māsikam

original: p.127.4ab/.viṣṇur hi devatā tatra gandha^mālyair baliṃ haret/
analyzed: hi devatā tatra gandha mālyaiḥ balim haret

original: p.127.5ab/.dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
analyzed: bhavet vyādhiḥ striyāḥ vā puruṣasya vā

original: p.127.5cd/.guruko he bhaved vyādhiḥ pūrṇamāsān trayodaśa//
p.127.6ab/.vasavo devatās tatra ghṛta^mālyair baliṃ haret/
analyzed: devatāḥ tatra ghṛta mālyaiḥ balim haret

original: p.127.7ab/.śatabhiṣā^utthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
p.127.8ab/.varuṇo devatā tatra pāyasena baliṃ haret/
p.127.9ab/.pūrvabhadra^utthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
p.127.9cd/.na taṃ vaidyāś cikitsantu ahirbudhnyo +atra daivataḥ//
analyzed: tam vaidyāḥ cikitsantu ahirbudhnyaḥ atra daivataḥ

original: p.127.10ab/.uttarabhādrajo vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
p.127.10cd/.sapta^rātraṃ bhaved vyādhis tataś ca^ūrdhvaṃ vimucyate//
analyzed: bhavet vyādhiḥ tatas ca ūrdhvam vimucyate

original: p.128.1ab/.(128) aryamā devatā tatra gandha^mālyair baliṃ haret/
analyzed: aryamā devatā tatra gandha mālyaiḥ balim haret

original: p.128.2ab/.revatyām utthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
analyzed: utthitaḥ vyādhiḥ striyāḥ vā puruṣasya vā

original: p.128.3ab/.pūṣā hi devatā tatra gandha^mālyair baliṃ haret/
analyzed: hi devatā tatra gandha mālyaiḥ balim haret

original: p.128.4ab/.aśvinyām utthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
analyzed: utthitaḥ vyādhiḥ striyāḥ vā puruṣasya vā

original: p.128.5ab/.gandharvo devatā tatra yāvakena baliṃ haret/ %gandharva/
analyzed: devatā tatra yāvakena balim haret gandharva

original: p.128.6ab/.bharaṇyām utthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
analyzed: utthitaḥ vyādhiḥ striyāḥ vā puruṣasya vā

original: p.128.6cd/.na taṃ vaidyāś cikitsantu yamas tatra tu daivataḥ/
analyzed: tam vaidyāḥ cikitsantu yamaḥ tatra tu daivataḥ

original: p.128.7ab/.śīlaṃ rakṣatu medhāvī tataḥ svargaṃ gamiṣyati//
p.128.8/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin bandhana^nirmokṣaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
analyzed: khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin bandhananirmokṣam nāma adhyāyam vyākhyāsyāmi

original: p.129.1/.kṛttikāsu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin baddho vā ruddho vā tri^rātreṇa mokṣyati^iti vaktavyaḥ/
analyzed: bhoḥ puṣkarasārin baddhaḥ vā ruddhaḥ vā tri rātreṇa mokṣyati iti vaktavyaḥ

original: rohiṇyāṃ baddho vā ruddho vā tri^rātreṇa mokṣyati^iti/
analyzed: rohiṇyām baddhaḥ vā ruddhaḥ vā tri rātreṇa mokṣyati iti

original: mṛgaśirasi baddho vā ruddho vā eka^viṃśati rātreṇa mokṣyati^iti/
analyzed: mṛgaśirasi baddhaḥ vā ruddhaḥ vā ekaviṃśati rātreṇa mokṣyati iti

original: ārdrāyāṃ baddho vā ruddho vā +ardha^māsena mokṣyati^iti/
analyzed: ārdrāyām baddhaḥ vā ruddhaḥ vā ardha māsena mokṣyati iti

original: punarvasau ruddho vā baddho vā sapta^rātrena/
analyzed: punarvasau ruddhaḥ vā baddhaḥ vā sapta rātrena

original: śravaṇe dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ śatabhiṣāyāṃ pūrvabhadrapade uttarabhādrapade revatyāṃ
analyzed: śravaṇe dhaniṣṭhāyām śatabhiṣāyām pūrvabhadrapade uttarabhādrapade revatyām

original: bharaṇyāṃ baddho vā ruddho vā parikleśam avāpsyati^iti vaktavyaḥ/
analyzed: bharaṇyām baddhaḥ vā ruddhaḥ vā parikleśam avāpsyati iti vaktavyaḥ

original: p.129.4/.mūrdhni tu yasyās tilako +asti sūkṣmaḥ snigdho bhavet padma^samāna^varṇaḥ/
analyzed: tu yasyāḥ tilakaḥ asti sūkṣmaḥ snigdhaḥ bhavet padma samāna varṇaḥ

original: p.129.5/.rājā tu tasyā bhavati^iha bhartā stana^upariṣṭāt pratibimbam āhuḥ//
analyzed: tu tasyāḥ bhavati iha bhartā stana upariṣṭāt pratibimbam āhuḥ

original: p.130.1ab/.śīrṣe tu yasyās tilaka^alakaḥ syāt sūkṣmo bhaved añjana^cūrṇa^varṇaḥ/
analyzed: tu yasyāḥ syāt sūkṣmaḥ bhavet añjana cūrṇa varṇaḥ

original: p.130.1cd/.senāpatis tasyā bhaved dhi bhartā stana^antare +asyāḥ pratibimbakaṃ syāt//
analyzed: tasyāḥ bhavet hi bhartā stana antare asyāḥ pratibimbakam syāt

original: p.130.2ab/.bhrūvontare +asyās tilaka^alakaḥ syād duṣcāriṇīṃ tāṃ pramadāṃ vadanti/
analyzed: asyāḥ tilaka alakaḥ syāt duṣcāriṇīm tām pramadām vadanti

original: p.130.2cd/.pañca^eva tasyāḥ patayo bhavanti bahv^anna^pānaṃ labhate ca nārī//
analyzed: tasyāḥ patayaḥ bhavanti bahu anna pānam labhate ca nārī

original: p.131.1ab/.gaṇḍasya nāsādikam adhyadeśe bhavec ca bimbaṃ tilakasya yasyāḥ/
analyzed: nāsā ādikam adhyadeśe bhavet ca bimbam tilakasya yasyāḥ

original: p.131.1cd/.tāṃ śoka^bhājaṃ pramadāṃ vadanti romapradeśe pratibimbam āhuḥ//
analyzed: śoka bhājam pramadām vadanti roma pradeśe pratibimbam āhuḥ

original: p.131.2ab/.karṇe tu yasyās tilaka^alakaḥ syād bahu^śrutāṃ tāṃ pramadāṃ vadanti/
analyzed: tu yasyāḥ syāt bahu śrutām tām pramadām vadanti

original: p.131.2cd/.bahu^śrūtāṃ tāṃ śrutidhāriṇīṃ ca trike tu yasyāḥ pratibimbakaṃ syāt//
analyzed: tām śruti dhāriṇīm ca trike tu yasyāḥ pratibimbakam syāt

original: p.131.3ab/.yasya^uttaroṣṭhe tilaka^alakaḥ syāt tāṃ bhinna^satyāṃ pramadāṃ vadanti/
analyzed: tilakaalakaḥ syāt tām bhinna satyām pramadām vadanti

original: p.131.3cd/.kṛcchreṇa sā vai labhate hi vṛttim ūrau tu tasyās tila^bimbam āhuḥ//
analyzed: sā vai labhate hi vṛttim ūrau tu tasyāḥ tila bimbam āhuḥ

original: p.132.1ab/.yasyā +adharoṣṭhe tilaka^alakaḥ syād duścāriṇīṃ tāṃ pramadāṃ vadanti/
analyzed: adhara uṣṭhe tilaka alakaḥ syāt duścāriṇīm tām pramadām vadanti
