original: p.132.1cd/.miṣṭa^anna^pānaṃ bahu ṛcchate sā tathā hi guhye pratibimbakaṃ syāt//
analyzed: bahu ṛcchate sā tathā hi guhye pratibimbakam syāt

original: p.132.2ab/.cibuke tu yasyās tilaka^alakaḥ syād duścāriṇīṃ tāṃ pramadāṃ vadanti/
analyzed: tu yasyāḥ syāt duścāriṇīm tām pramadām vadanti

original: p.132.2cd/.miṣṭa^anna^pānaṃ bahu sā labheta guhye dvitīyaṃ pratibimbakaṃ syāt//
analyzed: bahu sā labheta guhye dvitīyam pratibimbakam syāt
bhoḥ puṣkarasārin tilaka adhyāyaḥ nāma adhyāyaḥ

original: p.132.4/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatra^janma^guṇaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
analyzed: khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatrajanmaguṇam nāma adhyāyam vyākhyāsyāmi

original: p.132.5b/.bhavec chūras tathā caṇḍaḥ priya^vādī ca mānavaḥ//
analyzed: chūraḥ tathā caṇḍaḥ priya vādī ca mānavaḥ

original: p.132.6a/.rohiṇyāṃ puruṣo jāto dhanavān dharmikas tathā/
p.132.6b/.vyavasāyī sthiraḥ śūro dhruvaṃ ca^asya sadā mukhaṃ//
analyzed: sthiraḥ śūraḥ dhruvam ca asya sadā mukham

original: p.133.1ab/.jāto mṛgaśire yas tu mṛduḥ saumyas tu mānavaḥ/
analyzed: mṛgaśire yaḥ tu mṛduḥ saumyaḥ tu mānavaḥ

original: p.133.1cd/.darśanīyo bhavec ca^asau strī^kāntas tu viśeṣataḥ//
analyzed: bhavet ca asau strī kāntaḥ tu viśeṣataḥ
tu hiṃsā ātmā caṇḍaḥ parama jalpakaḥ

original: p.133.2cd/.rodrakarmā bhavec ca^asāv īścaraś ca śatair mahān//
analyzed: bhavet ca asau īścaraḥ ca śataiḥ mahān

original: p.133.3ab/.jātaḥ punarvasau yas tu hy alolo buddhimān naraḥ/
analyzed: punarvasau yaḥ tu hi alolaḥ buddhimān naraḥ

original: p.133.3cd/.dharma^śīlo bhavec ca^asau jāta^krodhaś ca mānavaḥ//
analyzed: bhavet ca asau jāta krodhaḥ ca mānavaḥ

original: p.133.4ab/.puṣyeṇa puruṣo jātas tejasvī brāhmaṇo bhavet/
p.133.4cd/.kṣatriyaś ca bhaved rājā vaiśya^sūdrau ca pūjitau//
analyzed: ca bhavet rājā vaiśya sūdrau ca pūjitau

original: p.133.5ab/.śvasanaḥ krodhanaḥ krūro hy aśleṣā^sambhavo naraḥ/

analyzed: śrāddha karaḥ bahu bhāgyaḥ tathā eva ca

original: p.133.6cd/.dhanavān dhānyavān bhogī maghāsu puruṣo bhavet//
p.133.7ab/.pūrvaphālgunī^jātas tu yaḥ kaścit puruṣo bhavet/
p.133.8ab/.uttarāyāṃ tu phālgunyāṃ jāto bhavati bhogavān/
p.133.8cd/.divyajñānaś ca vijñāne puruṣaḥ subhago bhavet//
p.133.9ab/.haste jātaś ca śuddha^ātmā vikrānto mṛdu^bhojanaḥ/
analyzed: jātaḥ ca śuddha ātmā vikrāntaḥ mṛdu bhojanaḥ
ca kurute asteya karmā bhavet asau
jātaḥ citrāakṣaḥ tathā citra kathā karaḥ
bahu strīkaḥ citra śīlaḥ bhavet naraḥ

original: p.134.1ab/.svātyāṃ ca puruṣo jāto bandhuś lāghī cicakṣaṇaḥ/
analyzed: ca puruṣaḥ jātaḥ bandhuḥ lāghī cicakṣaṇaḥ
pāna śauṇḍaḥ ca mitra kārī vicāravān

original: p.134.2ab/.viśākhāsu naro jātas tejasvī dravyavān mahān/
p.134.2cd/.śūro vikramavān dakṣaḥ subhagaś ca bhaved asau//
analyzed: vikramavān dakṣaḥ subhagaḥ ca bhavet asau

original: p.134.3cd/.śuciś ca^eva kṛta^jñaś ca dharma^ātmā ca bhavec ca saḥ//
analyzed: ca eva kṛtajñaḥ ca dharma ātmā ca bhavet ca saḥ

original: p.134.5cd/.dṛḍho vīro bhavec ca^asau kilviṣī ca sa mānavaḥ//
analyzed: vīraḥ bhavet ca asau kilviṣī ca sa mānavaḥ

original: p.134.6cd/.matsya^māṃsa^priyaś ca^api ghātakaḥ syāt sa mānavaḥ//
analyzed: ca api ghātakaḥ syāt sa mānavaḥ

original: p.134.7ab/.sa^anukrośaś ca dātā ca vidyāniṣṭhaḥ suhṛjjanaḥ/
analyzed: ca dātā ca vidyā niṣṭhaḥ suhṛd janaḥ

original: p.134.7cd/.viśvadaive naro jāto bhaved api ca niścitaḥ//
analyzed: naraḥ jātaḥ bhavet api ca niścitaḥ

original: p.134.8ab/.ācāryaḥ śāstra^kartā ca viśvāsī ca kriyāparaḥ/
analyzed: śāstra kartā ca viśvāsī ca kriyā paraḥ
ca c citra dravyaḥ ca mānavaḥ

original: p.135.1ab/.vāruṇe yadi nakṣatre jāto bhavati mānavaḥ/
p.135.1cd/.paruṣo kveṣaśīlaś ca parivādī ca sarvaśaḥ//
analyzed: kva iṣa śīlaḥ ca parivādī ca sarvaśas

original: p.135.2ab/.jāto bhādrapadāyāṃ tu pūrvasyām iha mānavaḥ/
p.135.3cd/.medhāvī bahv apatyaś ca dharma^śīlo mahā^dhanaḥ//
analyzed: bahu apatyaḥ ca dharma śīlaḥ mahādhanaḥ
puruṣaḥ jātaḥ dharma ātmā jñāti sevakaḥ
alpa dhanaḥ nityam dāyakaḥ na anusūyakaḥ

original: p.135.5cd/.mahā^jana^priyaś ca^api śūraś ca subhagaś ca saḥ//
analyzed: ca api śūraḥ ca subhagaḥ ca saḥ
dātu kāmaḥ ca paratas ca aupajīvakaḥ
vikārāḥ dṛśyante sūrya candra graha ādiṣu

original: u1.2ab/.māghasya prathame pakṣe śailo vā pārthivā yadi/
analyzed: prathame pakṣe śailaḥ vā pārthivāḥ yadi

original: u1.2ef/.vidyuto vā^atha dṛśyante tadā vidyāj jana^kṣayaṃ//
analyzed: vā atha dṛśyante tadā vidyāt jana kṣayam

original: u1.3ab/.aśvinyām arkato dhūmo nirgacchann api chādayet/

analyzed: māgha māse tu pīta sūryaḥ atha dṛśyate

original: u1.4cd/.samantād vadhyate rāṣṭraṃ madhye durbhikṣam ādiśet//
u1.5cd/.naśyanti karvaṭās tatra yadi devo na varṣati//
analyzed: karvaṭāḥ tatra yadi devaḥ na varṣati

original: u1.6ab/.caitra^māse yadā puṣye sūrye kṛṣṇāṃ pradṛśyate/
u1.7cd/.saṃgrāmaṃ tatra jānīyād ubhau ghātyete pārthivau//

analyzed: candra sūryau vā jyaiṣṭhe bharaṇi jyeṣṭhayoḥ

original: u1.8cd/.sa^amātyo vadhyate rājā rāṣṭre durbhikṣam ādiśet//

analyzed: tad rāṣṭram ṣaṣ māsān pīḍyate tadā
ca sa amātyaḥ putra dāreṇa vadhyate
durbhikṣa kalaha rogān ca atra vinirdiśet

original: u1.12ab/.māse +atha śrāvaṇe mūle candra^sūryau na bhāsataḥ/
analyzed: atha śrāvaṇe mūle candra sūryau na bhāsataḥ

original: u1.12cd/.sphuliṅgāś ca^atra dṛśyante vidyād roga^bhayaṃ mahat//
analyzed: ca atra dṛśyante vidyāt roga bhayam mahat

original: u1.15ab/.ravivad bhāti tad^rāṣṭraṃ vinaśyeta punaḥ punaḥ/
analyzed: bhāti tat rāṣṭram vinaśyeta punar punar

original: u1.15cd/.rājñāṃ vidyād dhatānāṃ vai bhūmiḥ pāstyati śoṇitaṃ//
u1.16ab/.bharaṇyāṃ māgha^māse tu kṛṣṇo vāyuḥ samutthitaḥ/
analyzed: māgha māse tu kṛṣṇaḥ vāyuḥ samutthitaḥ

original: u1.16cd/.chādayec candra^sūryau tu śīghraṃ rāṣṭraṃ vinaśyati//
analyzed: candra sūryau tu śīghram rāṣṭram vinaśyati

original: u1.17ab/.māse tu phālgune vāyuḥ pāṃśuvarṣaṃ savidyutaṃ/
analyzed: tu phālgune vāyuḥ pāṃśu varṣam sa vidyutam

original: u1.18ab/.saha^ādityena candre +atha yadā kaścid grahaś caret/
analyzed: candre atha yadā kaścid grahaḥ caret

original: u1.18cd/.vāyur vā viṣamo vātii vidyād rāja^vadhaṃ tadā//
analyzed: vā viṣamaḥ vidyāt rāja vadham tadā

original: u1.23ab/.śrāvaṇe vāyavaḥ pītāḥ sadā kṛṣṇaṃ nabhas^talaṃ/
u1.24ab/.śrāvaṇe varṣate hy agniḥ pūrvabhādrapade divā/
u1.25ab/.yadā bhādrapade māse nabhaḥ syāc channa^garjitaṃ/(p.138)

analyzed: vāta vṛṣṭiḥ syāt āgatya auttarām diśam

original: u1.26cd/.pātayec ca^evam āghātaṃ kṛtsnaṃ rāṣṭraṃ vinaśyati//
analyzed: ca evam āghātam kṛtsnam rāṣṭram vinaśyati

original: u1.27ab/.kārttike śukla^trayodaśyāṃ yadā candre dhanur bhavet/
analyzed: śukla trayodaśyām yadā candre dhanuḥ bhavet

original: u1.27cd/.samantān naśyate rāṣṭraṃ madhye durbhikṣam ādiśet//
u1.28ab/.ulkā^pātā hy aśanayo māgha^māse bhavanti vā/
analyzed: hi aśanayaḥ māgha māse bhavanti vā

original: u1.29cd/.bhavec chabdas tadākāśe tad^rāṣṭraṃ naśyate laghu//
analyzed: chabdaḥ tad ākāśe tad rāṣṭram naśyate laghu

original: u1.30ab/.svātyāṃ caitre yadā varṣaṃ niruddhaṃ vāta^varṣitaṃ/
analyzed: caitre yadā varṣam niruddham vāta varṣitam
tad ākāśam para cakra bhayam bhavet

original: u1.32ab/.āṣāḍhe māsi puṣye +atha dṛśyante vyogni vidyutaḥ/
analyzed: māsi puṣye atha dṛśyante vyogni vidyutaḥ

original: u1.33ab/.śrāvaṇe tu yadā mūle bahu devaḥ pravarṣati/
analyzed: tu yadā mūle bahu devaḥ pravarṣati

original: u1.34ab/.māse bhādrapade yatra nirghātaḥ patati kṣitau/

analyzed: vāyavaḥ vānti mahat roga bhayam tadā

original: u1.35ab/.māse bhādrapade puṣye vidigbhyo niścared dhvaniḥ/
u1.35cd/.kṣatriyaḥ kupyate kṣipraṃ vipakṣā tu datā prajā//
analyzed: kupyate kṣipram vipakṣā tu datā prajā

original: u1.36ab/.bharaṇyām aśvayuje śabda upariṣṭād bhaved yadi/

analyzed: ca utsṛjet pāṃśum tāpasānām mahat bhayam

original: u1.37ab/.kārttike tu yadā^ārdrāyāṃ śabdaḥ śrayeta bhairavaḥ/
analyzed: tu yadā ārdrāyām śabdaḥ śrayeta bhairavaḥ

original: u1.38cd/.vātāturas tadā rāṣṭre vyādhir bhavati dāruṇaḥ//
u1.39ab/.pauṣa^māse yadā svātyāṃ śabdo bhavati bhairavaḥ/
u1.40ab/.māghe śukle tu nirghāto nityaṃ śāmyed vasundharāṃ/
analyzed: śukle tu nirghātaḥ nityam śāmyet vasundharām

original: u1.42ab/.pūrvabhādrapadāyāṃ tu caitre kampet kṣitir divā/
u1.42cd/.tasmin varṣe ca tadrāṣṭre parasainyān mahad^bhayaṃ//
analyzed: varṣe ca tad rāṣṭre para sainyāt mahat bhayam

original: u1.43ab/.pūrvāyāṃ ced āṣāḍhāyāṃ rātrau caitre ca niścalet/
analyzed: ced āṣāḍhāyām rātrau caitre ca niścalet

original: u1.43cd/.asibhir hanyate rājā hanyate ca mahā^janaḥ//
u1.44ab/.vaiśākhe kampitā bhūmiḥ kṛṣṇa^pakṣe hy abhīkṣṇaśaḥ/
analyzed: kampitā bhūmiḥ kṛṣṇa pakṣe hi abhīkṣṇaśas

original: u1.44cd/.anāvṛṣṭyā tu durbhikṣaṃ māsān ṣaṭ tatra nirdiśet//
analyzed: tu durbhikṣam māsān ṣaṭ tatra nirdiśet

original: u1.45ab/.jyeṣṭhe māse bharaṇyāṃ tu divā kamped vasundharā/
u1.46ab/.jyeṣṭhe māse yadā mūle rātrau bhūmiḥ prakampate/
analyzed: māse yadā mūle rātrau bhūmiḥ prakampate

original: u1.46cd/.pratyanto vadhyate rājā rāṣṭre baliṃ samādiśet//
u1.47cd/.śasyaṃ vinaśyate tatra kalikarma ca jāyate//
analyzed: vinaśyate tatra kali karma ca jāyate

original: u1.48cd/.jvaleyuḥ prapateyur vā naśyed rāṣṭraṃ tadā laghu//
analyzed: prapateyuḥ vā naśyet rāṣṭram tadā laghu

original: u1.49ab/.caityā yatra prakampante hasanti ca namanti ca/
analyzed: yatra prakampante hasanti ca namanti ca

original: u1.49cd/.sarāṣṭraḥ kṣitipas tatra na cirān nāśam arcchati//
analyzed: kṣitipaḥ tatra na cirāt nāśam arcchati

original: u1.50cd/.sadā parājito rājā caura^rāṣṭre ca vadhyate//
analyzed: parājitaḥ rājā caura rāṣṭre ca vadhyate

original: u1.51cd/.dvāraṃ vā nagarasya^atha bhūyiṣṭhaṃ naśyate prajā//
analyzed: vā nagarasya atha bhūyiṣṭham naśyate prajā

original: u1.52ab/.vāme vā kaṣīṇe candroḥ śṛṅge tiṣṭhed bṛhaspatiḥ/
analyzed: vā kaṣīṇe candroḥ śṛṅge tiṣṭhet bṛhaspatiḥ

original: u1.54cd/.jñeyaṃ roga^bhayaṃ ghoraṃ durbhikṣaṃ ca^atra nirdiśet//
analyzed: roga bhayam ghoram durbhikṣam ca atra nirdiśet

original: u1.55ab/.rāhuṇā nigṛhītas tu ca^ullkayā hanyate śaśī/
u1.56ab/.yasya caiva^atha nakṣatre śaśī sūryo vigṛhyate/
analyzed: ca eva atha nakṣatre śaśī sūryaḥ vigṛhyate

original: u1.56cd/.rāhuṇā kṣitiyo rājyaiḥ saha pīḍām avāpnuyāt//
u1.57ab/.rājño vai ca^atha nakṣatre candraṃ ketur yadā viśet/
analyzed: vai ca atha nakṣatre candram ketuḥ yadā viśet

original: u1.59ab/.bṛhaspatiś ca śukraś ca lohita^aṅgaḥ śanaiścaraḥ/
u1.61ab/.maghāyāṃ lohita^aṅgo vā śravaṇe vā bṛhaspatiḥ/
analyzed: lohita aṅgaḥ vā śravaṇe vā bṛhaspatiḥ
saṃvatsara trīṇi bhayam vidyāt sa māgaram

original: u1.62ab/.tiṣṭhec chukro +atha rohiṇyāṃ jyeṣṭhe māse kathaṃcana/
analyzed: chukraḥ atha rohiṇyām jyeṣṭhe māse kathaṃcana

original: u1.63cd/.somo vā raviṇā sārdhaṃ para^cakra^bhayaṃ tadā//
analyzed: vā raviṇā sārdham para cakra bhayam tadā

original: u1.64ab/.kākāḥ śyenāś ca bṛdhrāś ca vaseyuḥ sahitā mudā/
analyzed: śyenāḥ ca bṛdhrāḥ ca vaseyuḥ sahitāḥ mudā

original: u1.64cd/.maithunaṃ vāritaṃ veyuḥ paraiḥ saha raṇas tadā//
analyzed: vāritam veyuḥ paraiḥ saha raṇaḥ tadā

original: u1.65cd/.para^cakreṇa yuddhaṃ tu bhavec ca^api punaḥ punaḥ/.
analyzed: yuddham tu bhavet ca api punar punar
prasūyate yatra catur hastā catu stanī

original: u1.66cd/.strīṇām eva bhavet tatra maraṇaṃ hy atidāruṇaṃ//
analyzed: eva bhavet tatra maraṇam hi ati dāruṇam

original: u1.67ab/.garbha^sthā dārakā yatra hasanti ca vadanti ca/
analyzed: dārakāḥ yatra hasanti ca vadanti ca

original: u1.68ab/.eka^pādāṃ stripādāṃś ca catur^aṅgāṃs tathā^eva ca/
analyzed: stri pādān ca catur aṅgān tathā eva ca

original: u1.68cd/.nāryo yatra prasūyante rājño vyasanam ādiśet//
u1.69cd/.pramadā yatra deśe tu rājā tatra vinaśyati//
analyzed: yatra deśe tu rājā tatra vinaśyati

original: u1.70cd/.pramadā yatra sūyante rāṣṭraṃ tatra vinaśyati//
u1.71ab/.kharāś ca mahiṣāś ca^api paśavo +atha tathāvidhāḥ/
analyzed: ca mahiṣāḥ ca api paśavaḥ atha tathāvidhāḥ

original: u1.71cd/.dvi^tri^śīrṣāḥ prasūyante deśe yatra sa naśyati//
u1.72cd/.jāyante yatra deśe tu sa deśo laghu naśyati//
analyzed: yatra deśe tu sa deśaḥ laghu naśyati

original: u1.73ab/.pādāv ubhau yadā vaiśyā gurviṇī saṃprasūyate/
u1.74cd/.rājā vā rājāmātyo vā saha deśena naśyati//
analyzed: vā rāja amātyaḥ vā saha deśena naśyati

original: u1.75cd/.trinetras trimukho vā^api vidyāt tatra mahad^bhayaṃ//
analyzed: tri mukhaḥ vā api vidyāt tatra mahat bhayam

original: u1.76ab/.saukareṇa tu vakreṇa śarīraṃ mānuṣaṃ yadi/
u1.76cd/.sūtaṃ catur^diśaṃ rāṣṭraṃ hanyāt tatra na saṃśayaḥ//
analyzed: caturdiśam rāṣṭram hanyāt tatra na saṃśayaḥ

original: u1.77ab/.ādityasya tu rūpeṇa mānuṣo yatra jāyate/
u1.78ab/.uttānaśāyī bālas tu deśaṃ yatra dvijottamaḥ/
u1.78cd/.dṛṣṭaḥ pravyāharan vedān kṣipraṃ deśo vinaśyatei//
u1.79ab/.kukṣiṃ bhitvā yadā bālo garbhān niṣkramate svayaṃ/
analyzed: bhitvā yadā bālaḥ garbhāt niṣkramate svayam

original: u1.79cd/.atrāṇāṃ mātaraṃ kṛtvā sa deśo naśyate laghu//
analyzed: mātaram kṛtvā sa deśaḥ naśyate laghu

original: u1.80cd/.strīṇāṃ garbhāt prasūyante deśe tu bhayam ādiśet//
analyzed: garbhāt prasūyante deśe tu bhayam ādiśet
gārdabham ca atha saukaram ca ardha vigraham

original: u1.81cd/.gāvo yatra prasūyante nirdiśed bhayam āgataṃ//

analyzed: dīrgha nakhaḥ yatra su kṛṣṇaḥ paruṣa chaviḥ

original: u1.83cd/.sajano jāyate yatra rāṣṭraṃ sādhipatiṃ dahet//
analyzed: jāyate yatra rāṣṭram sa adhipatim dahet

original: u1.84cd/.śuṣyeta sakalaṃ śasyaṃ janaś ca vilayaṃ vrajet/
analyzed: sakalam śasyam janaḥ ca vilayam vrajet

original: u1.85cd/.svayaṃ kṣubhyeta tad^rāṣṭraṃ vinaśyeta na saṃśayaḥ//
analyzed: kṣubhyeta tat rāṣṭram vinaśyeta na saṃśayaḥ

original: u1.86ab/.phale phalaṃ yadā paśyet puṣpe vā puṣpam āśritaṃ/
analyzed: phalam yadā paśyet puṣpe vā puṣpam āśritam

original: u1.86cd/.garbhāḥ sraveyur nārīṇāṃ yuvarājaś ca vadhyate//
u1.87ab/.akāle pādapā yatra puṣpyanti ca phalanti ca/(p.143)
u1.87cd/.latā gulmo +atha vallī vā deśe tatra bhayaṃ bhavet//
analyzed: gulmaḥ atha vallī vā deśe tatra bhayam bhavet

original: u1.88cd/.kūjamānaṃ pataṅgaṃ vā tadā vidyān mahad^bhayaṃ//
analyzed: pataṅgam vā tadā vidyāt mahat bhayam

original: u1.89ab/.vṛkṣāṇāṃ maṇḍapānāṃ vā chāyā na parivartate/
u1.91ab/.anāvartaṃ yadā puṣpaṃ phalaṃ ca^api pradṛśyate/
analyzed: yadā puṣpam phalam ca api pradṛśyate

original: u1.91cd/.vināśaṃ tasya deśasya durbhikṣaṃ kalahaṃ vadet//
u1.92ab/.sthānāsthānaṃ gatā vṛkṣā dṛśyeyur yatra kutracit/
u1.93cd/.śastraṃ mūrcchayate tatra taskaraiś ca^api pūrvavat//
analyzed: mūrcchayate tatra taskaraiḥ ca api pūrvavat

original: u1.94ab/.kampate rudate śāstā gacchan vā yatra dṛśyate/
analyzed: rudate śāstā gacchan vā yatra dṛśyate

original: u1.95ab/.devatā yatra deśe tu nṛtyanti ca hasanti ca/
analyzed: yatra deśe tu nṛtyanti ca hasanti ca

original: u1.95cd/.aśrūṇi pātayeyur vā tadā vidyān mahad^bhayaṃ//
analyzed: pātayeyuḥ vā tadā vidyāt mahat bhayam

original: u1.96ab/.devatā yatra krīḍanti jvalanti nimiṣanti vā/
u1.96cd/.caleyur athavā yatra kṣiti^po +anyo bhavet tadā//
analyzed: athavā yatra kṣitipaḥ anyaḥ bhavet tadā

original: u1.97ab/.śivaliṅaṃ yadā kamped gagane vā^atha dṛśyate/
analyzed: yadā kampet gagane vā atha dṛśyate

original: u1.97cd/.nimajjate dharaṇyāṃ vā dhruvaṃ rāja^vadho bhavet//
analyzed: dharaṇyām vā dhruvam rāja vadhaḥ bhavet

original: u1.99ab/.acalo vā calet sthānāc calaṃ vā^apy acalaṃ bhavet/
analyzed: vā calet sthānāt calam vā api acalam bhavet

original: u1.99cd/.amātyo hanti rājānaṃ kalahaṃ ca^atra nirdiśet//
analyzed: hanti rājānam kalaham ca atra nirdiśet

u1.101ab/.varṣate kusumaṃ yatra rakta^vindum atha^api vā/
analyzed: kusumam yatra rakta vindum atha api vā

original: u1.101cd/.prāṇino vividhān vā^api vidyāc caura^bhayaṃ tadā//
analyzed: vividhān vā api vidyāt caura bhayam tadā

original: u1.102cd/.nagarāṇy atha dhūmyante kṣipraṃ rājā vinaśyati//
u1.103ab/.indur vā dīpa^vṛkso vā dīpo yatra na dīpyate/
analyzed: vā dīpa vṛksaḥ vā dīpaḥ yatra na dīpyate

original: u1.103cd/.rājyakāmaḥ kumāro vā kṣubhyed viṭapako +api vā//
analyzed: kumāraḥ vā kṣubhyet viṭapakaḥ api vā

original: u1.104cd/.astraṃ vā^api gṛhaṃ dahyād rājño vyasanam ādiśet//
u1.105ab/.pated antaḥpure vidyud vṛkṣe vā^apy āśrame tathā/
analyzed: antaḥpure vidyut vṛkṣe vā api āśrame tathā

original: u1.105cd/.puri caityacchāyāyāṃ vā rājārthe patitā hi sā//
analyzed: caitya chāyāyām vā rāja arthe patitā hi sā

original: u1.106cd/.vāyasaḥ kurute nīḍaṃ sa^amātyo dhvaṃsate nṛpaḥ//
analyzed: kurute nīḍam sa amātyaḥ dhvaṃsate nṛpaḥ

original: u1.110cd/.śoṇitaṃ sakarakaṃ syāt tadā vidyāt parād bhayaṃ//
analyzed: sa karakam syāt tadā vidyāt parāt bhayam

original: u1.111ab/.vidyuc ca patate ghorā karakāṇāṃ ca varṣaṇaṃ/
analyzed: ca patate ghorā karakāṇām ca varṣaṇam

original: u1.113cd/.gaganaṃ dahyate tatra loka^pīḍā jvareṇa ca//
analyzed: dahyate tatra loka pīḍā jvareṇa ca
dhūmra varṇāyām dṛśyeta induḥ ca bhāskaraḥ

original: u1.116ab/.nāpsu majjati na^apy agnau pūrvavac ca na dṛśyate/
analyzed: majjati na api agnau pūrvavat ca na dṛśyate

original: u1.116cd/.agnir utpatsyate tatra koṣṭha^āgāraṃ daheta saḥ//

analyzed: saṃharet kṣipram agnitaḥ su mahat bhayam

original: u1.118ab/.jalaṃ jājvalyamānaṃ tu matsyo nirdahati svayaṃ/
u1.118cd/.anāvṛṣṭiṃ tadā brūyād durbhikṣaṃ ca mahad^bhayaṃ//
analyzed: tadā brūyāt durbhikṣam ca mahat bhayam

original: u1.119cd/.cakra^dvaye +api durbhikṣaṃ rāṣṭre rogaṃ ca nirdiśet//
analyzed: api durbhikṣam rāṣṭre rogam ca nirdiśet

original: u1.120ab/.triśīrṣaḥ pañca^śīrṣo vā yadā sarpo +atha dṛśyate/
analyzed: pañca śīrṣaḥ vā yadā sarpaḥ atha dṛśyate

original: u1.121ab/.kuśūlo yatra dṛśyeta kampayan tu vasundharāṃ/

analyzed: naśyeyuḥ ye ca anye dhana sañcayāḥ

original: u1.122ab/.sarpa; udyata^śīrṣas tu yudhyate puruṣaiḥ saha/
analyzed: udyata śīrṣaḥ tu yudhyate puruṣaiḥ saha

original: u1.122cd/.cakra^dvayād rogataś ca vidyāt tatra mahad^bhayaṃ//
analyzed: rogataḥ ca vidyāt tatra mahat bhayam

original: u1.124cd/.tatas taṃ na cirāt paśyet saṃgrāmaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ//
analyzed: tam na cirāt paśyet saṃgrāmam pratyupasthitam

original: u1.125ab/.kākaḥ śyenaś ca gṛdhro vā yasya nīyeta mūrdhani/(146)
analyzed: śyenaḥ ca gṛdhraḥ vā yasya nīyeta

original: u1.126ab/.prāsādāś ca prakampante śaraṇāni gṛhāṇi ca/
u1.129ab/.vṛkṣāḥ sarpāḥ prakampeyur mucyeyus tvaco vā tathā/
analyzed: sarpāḥ prakampeyuḥ mucyeyuḥ tvacaḥ vā tathā

original: u1.129cd/.sarvasmin eva rāṣṭre tu vidyāc chatru^bhayaṃ mahat//
analyzed: eva rāṣṭre tu vidyāt śatru bhayam mahat

original: u1.130ab/.dine hy ulkā^prayuktir vā jvalantī yadi dṛśyate/
analyzed: hi ulkā prayuktiḥ vā jvalantī yadi dṛśyate

original: u1.131ab/.asiṃ prajvalitaṃ paśyet tomaraṃ cakram eva ca/
analyzed: prajvalitam paśyet tomaram cakram eva ca

original: u1.132ab/.dīrgham ucchvasate vā +aśvaḥ aśrūṇi ca nipātayet/
analyzed: ucchvasate vā aśvaḥ aśrūṇi ca nipātayet

original: u1.132cd/.pādena karṣate śīghraṃ yuddhe rāja^vadho dhruvaṃ//
analyzed: karṣate śīghram yuddhe rāja vadhaḥ dhruvam

original: u1.133ab/.kākaś ced gṛham āruhya hā putra; iti vāśati/
analyzed: ced gṛham āruhya hā putraḥ iti vāśati

original: u1.134ab/.anagnau jāyate dhūmaḥ sthale padmāni vā yadā/
analyzed: jāyate dhūmaḥ sthale padmāni vā yadā

original: u1.134cd/.vināśaṃ tasya deśasya niyamāc chīghram ādiśet//
u1.135ab/.āravanti yadā ghoraṃ meghā vṛkamṛgās tathā/
analyzed: yadā ghoram meghāḥ vṛka mṛgāḥ tathā

original: u1.135cd/.vināśaṃ tasya deśasya vidyāc chīghram upasthitaṃ//
u1.136cd/.gṛhāḥ śūnyodakena^api śuṣkās tatra bhayaṃ bhavet//
analyzed: śūnya udakena api śuṣkāḥ tatra bhayam bhavet

original: u1.138cd/.anyad vā^api praharaṇaṃ parebhyo jāyate bhayaṃ//
analyzed: vā api praharaṇam parebhyaḥ jāyate bhayam

original: u1.140ab/.narāṇāṃ pramadānāṃ ca rati^harṣo na jāyate/
analyzed: pramadānām ca rati harṣaḥ na jāyate

original: u1.140cd/.sarvatra śoka^cintā vā mahat tatra bhayaṃ bhavet//
analyzed: śoka cintā vā mahat tatra bhayam bhavet

original: u1.141cd/.nadīṃ bhitvā nikuñjānvā sa deśo naśyate +acirāt//
u1.142ab/.yatrauṣadhyaś ca virasā jalaṃ ca parihīyate/

analyzed: deśam tam utsṛṣṭam devatā ṛṣi sādhubhiḥ

original: u1.143ab/.matsyāḥ kūrmāś ca sarpāś ca mriyante yatra jāṅgalāḥ/
analyzed: kūrmāḥ ca sarpāḥ ca mriyante yatra jāṅgalāḥ

original: u1.144ab/.apūrvāḥ pakṣiṇo yatra sthale vāriṇi; eva vā/
analyzed: pakṣiṇaḥ yatra sthale vāriṇi eva vā

original: u1.145ab/.mahā^patho yadā kakṣaiḥ prasṛtair apatho bhavet/
u1.148/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin puruṣa^pinyādhyāyaṃ vyākhāmi tac chrūyatāṃ/

analyzed: tatra su kugṛṣṭyāḥ aṣṭa aṅgula pramāṇayā dvādaśa akṣa gṛṣṭayaḥ sva śarīram
eka akṣa gṛṣṭiḥ śīrṣa mūrdhni eka pāda talam bhavet

original: catur^daśa gṛṣṭayo nakṣatrāṇāṃ padaṃ yatra saṃdṛśyate/
analyzed: caturdaśa gṛṣṭayaḥ nakṣatrāṇām padam yatra saṃdṛśyate

original: u2.1ab/.kṛttikāyāṃ hi jātasya mukhe vai catur^aṅgulaḥ/
u2.2ab/.bhogavān yaśasā yuktaḥ paṇḍito jvalati śriyā/
u2.2cd/.kṛttikāsv atha jātasya bhavaty etad dhi lakṣaṇaṃ//
analyzed: atha jātasya bhavati etat hi lakṣaṇam
eva ayam yasya vai catur aṅgulaḥ

original: u2.3cd/.rohiṇyāṃ jātakaḥ so +api vidvān dharma^rataḥ sadā//
analyzed: jātakaḥ saḥ api vidvān dharma rataḥ sadā
bhoga sampannaḥ hrī yuktaḥ ca api sarvatas

original: u2.5ab/.grīvāyām ardha^gṛṣṭyā tu dāho yasya pradṛśyate/
analyzed: ardha gṛṣṭyā tu dāhaḥ yasya pradṛśyate

original: u2.5cd/.mṛgaśīrṣe hy asau jātaḥ śūro bhoga^samarpitaḥ//
analyzed: hi asau jātaḥ śūraḥ bhoga samarpitaḥ

original: u2.6ab/.ardha^dvitīya^gṛṣṭyā tu pinyo vāme hi yasya tu/
analyzed: tu pinyaḥ vāme hi yasya tu

original: u2.6cd/.ārdrāyāṃ krodhano jāto mūrkho gopatikaś ca saḥ//
analyzed: krodhanaḥ jātaḥ mūrkhaḥ gopatikaḥ ca saḥ

original: u2.7ab/.vāme kakṣe vraṇo yasya kṛṣṇaś ca^eva punarvasau/
analyzed: kakṣe vraṇaḥ yasya kṛṣṇaḥ ca eva punarvasau
puṣye jātaḥ asau dṛśyate vara lakṣaṇaḥ

original: u2.8cd/.cakra^madhye ca haste ca sūryaś candro virājate//
analyzed: ca haste ca sūryaḥ candraḥ virājate
ca kāyena jita kleśaḥ api nāyakaḥ

original: u2.10ab/.hṛdaye yasya dāhaḥ syād śleṣāyāṃ kali^priyaḥ/
u2.10cd/.duḥśīlo duḥkhasaṃvāso maithunābhir ataś ca saḥ//
analyzed: duḥkha saṃvāsaḥ maithunābhiḥ atas ca saḥ

original: u2.11ab/.adha; urasi pṛṣṭhe vā yasya vraṇaḥ pradṛśyate/
analyzed: urasi pṛṣṭhe vā yasya vraṇaḥ pradṛśyate

original: u2.11cd/.maghāyāṃ dhanavān jāto mahā^ātma dhārmiko naraḥ//

analyzed: śaṭhaḥ ca māyāvī manda puṇyaḥ alpa medhasaḥ

original: u2.15ab/.vyaṃjane yasya pinyas tu dṛśyate niyamenahi/
u2.15cd/.citrā^jātaḥ sa ced rogī nṛtyagītaratas tathā//
analyzed: sa ced rogī nṛtya gīta rataḥ tathā

original: u2.16cd/.jātaḥ svātyām asau lubdho guṇadviṣṭo hy apaṇḍitaḥ//
analyzed: svātyām asau lubdhaḥ guṇa dviṣṭaḥ hi apaṇḍitaḥ
śūraḥ jita mitraḥ nityam saukhya parāyaṇaḥ
dhṛtyā ca sampannaḥ acyutaḥ svar upapadyate

original: u2.20ab/.adho yasya^iha ca^ūrubhyāṃ pinyo jyeṣṭhe sa jāyate/
analyzed: yasya iha caūrubhyām pinyaḥ jyeṣṭhe sa jāyate

original: u2.20cd/.alpa^ayur apriyo duḥkhī duḥśīlaḥ kṛpaṇas tathā//
u2.21ab/.jānubhyām ūrdhvataḥ sūkṣmo vraṇo yasya^iha dṛśyate/(p.150)
u2.21cd/.mūlena bhāgyavān jātaḥ svagṛhaṃ nāśayel laghu//
analyzed: bhāgyavān jātaḥ sva gṛham nāśayet laghu

original: u2.23cd/.yadi dṛśyet sa medhāvī bhogavān syāj jana^priyaḥ//
analyzed: dṛśyet sa medhāvī bhogavān syāt jana priyaḥ

original: u2.24ab/.dvitīyaḥ pinyo dṛśyeta dhanavān bhogavān sadā/

analyzed: tathā arogaḥ acyutaḥ svargam ca gacchati

original: u2.25ab/.dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ ca jaṅghāyāṃ kṛṣṇaḥ pinyaḥ pradṛśyate/

analyzed: manda rāgaḥ ca prājñaḥ bhoga vivarjitaḥ

original: u2.26ab/.dvikugṛṣṭyā ca jaṅghāyāṃ kṛṣṇaḥ pinyaḥ pradṛśyate/
u2.26cd/.mūrkhaḥ śatabhiṣāyāṃ tu mriyate hy adakena saḥ//
analyzed: śatabhiṣāyām tu mriyate hi adakena saḥ

original: u2.27ab/.adho jaṅghāṃ kugṛṣṭyā tu pūrvabhādrapade vraṇaḥ/
analyzed: jaṅghām ku gṛṣṭyā tu pūrvabhādrapade vraṇaḥ

original: u2.27cd/.paropatāpako mūrkho daridraś caura; ity api//
u2.28ab/.kuguṣṭyā yasya pinyaḥ syāj jāto bhādrapada^uttare/
analyzed: yasya pinyaḥ syāt jātaḥ bhādrapada auttare

original: u2.29ab/.ubhayoḥ pādayoḥ sūkṣmaḥ pinyo yasya pradṛśyate/
u2.29cd/.revatyāṃ jāyate nīco nāpitaḥ sa havaty api//
analyzed: jāyate nīcaḥ nāpitaḥ sa havati api

original: u2.30cd/.arogo balavān nityam aśvinyāṃ jāta; eva saḥ//
analyzed: balavān nityam aśvinyām jātaḥ eva saḥ

original: u2.31ab/.atha pāṇitale pinyo bharaṇyām akṣayaḥ smṛtaḥ/
analyzed: pāṇi tale pinyaḥ bharaṇyām akṣayaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: u2.32ab/.nakṣatrāṇāṃ padaṃ hy etad yena caryā prajāyate/
analyzed: padam hi etat yena caryā prajāyate

original: u2.32cd/.etad dhi loka^prajñānaṃ loko yatra samāśritaḥ//
analyzed: dhi loka prajñānam lokaḥ yatra samāśritaḥ

original: u2.33/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin piṭakādhyāyaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhāsyāmi/
analyzed: khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin piṭakādhyāyam nāma adhyāyam vyākhāsyāmi
ūrdhvam pravakṣyāmi sarva sthāna gatam punar

original: u3.1cd/.strīṇāṃ ca puruṣāṇāṃ ca piṭakaṃ sarva^karmakaṃ//
u3.2ab/.lābha^alābhaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃ tathā/
u3.2cd/.prājñā yenābhijānanti taṃ ca sarvaṃ nibodhatāṃ//
analyzed: yena abhijānanti tam ca sarvam nibodhatām

original: u3.3ab/.tatrābhighātadagdhā vā tilās tad rūpakā; api/
u3.5cd/.yadā savarṇa^piṭako mūrdhni rājā mahān smṛtaḥ/
analyzed: savarṇa piṭakaḥ mūrdhni rājā mahān smṛtaḥ

original: u3.6ab/.śīrṣe tu dhana^dhānyābhyāṃ kāntaye subhagāya ca/
analyzed: tu dhana dhānyābhyām kāntaye subhagāya ca

original: u3.8ab/.aśrūpātaḥ dhruvaṃ śokaḥ śravaṇe goṣu nāśakaḥ/

analyzed: putra lābham vastra lābham dhruvam vadet

original: u3.10cd/.cibuke hanudeśe ca dhanaṃ gāvaḥ satāṃ śriyaḥ//
analyzed: hanu deśe ca dhanam gāvaḥ satām śriyaḥ

original: u3.11ab/.gale tu dānam āpnoti pānam ābharaṇāni ca/
analyzed: tu dānam āpnoti pānam ābharaṇāni ca

original: u3.12ab/.jāto +ayaṃ śiraso mūle hanuni ca dhana^kṣayaḥ/
analyzed: ayam śirasaḥ mūle hanuni ca dhana kṣayaḥ

original: u3.13cd/.pārśve tu sukha^śayyāyai stane tu sutajanyatā//
analyzed: tu sukha śayyāyai stane tu suta janya tā

original: u3.14cd/.bāhvoḥ śatru^vināśāya yuktaṃ strī^lābha; eva ca//
analyzed: śatru vināśāya yuktam strī lābhe eva ca

original: u3.15ab/.dadāty ābharaṇaṃ jātaḥ prabāhvoḥ kurpare kṣudhā/
u3.16ab/.saubhagaṃ dhana^lābhaṃca jātaḥ pāṇau dadāti ca/
analyzed: dhana lābham ca jātaḥ pāṇau dadāti ca

original: u3.16cd/.puṣpito hy ekadeśe tu daśaneṣu nakheṣu ca//
analyzed: hi eka deśe tu daśaneṣu nakheṣu ca

original: u3.18ab/.jaghane vyasanaṃ vidyān nārya dauḥśīlyam eva ca/
analyzed: vyasanam vidyāt na ārya dauḥśīlyam eva ca

original: u3.18cd/.putrotpattis tu vṛṣaṇe liṅge bhāryā tu śobhanā//
analyzed: tu vṛṣaṇe liṅge bhāryā tu śobhanā
sukha bhāgi tvam sphici ca api dhana kṣayaḥ

original: u3.20ab/.jānau śatru^bhayaṃ vidyāt tathā^eva ca dhana^kṣayaṃ/
analyzed: śatru bhayam vidyāt tathā eva ca dhana kṣayam

original: u3.20cd/.jānu^saṃdhau vijānīyān meḍhrake hy atha jātakaiḥ/

analyzed: jñāna lābham ca putra janma vinirdiśet

original: u3.21ab/.strī^lābhaṃ vakṣasi ca^eva bhaved anyo nirarthakaḥ/

original: u3.21cd/.jaṅghāyāṃ parasevā tu paradeśāt tu bhujyate//
analyzed: para sevā tu para deśāt tu bhujyate

original: u3.22ab/.maṇibandhe tu piṭako bandhanaṃ nirdiśed dhruvaṃ/(p.153)
u3.22cd/.parivādhaṃ sa labhate bandhanaṃ ca na saṃśayaḥ/
analyzed: sa labhate bandhanam ca na saṃśayaḥ

original: u3.22ef/.pārśve gulphe ca jānīyāc chastreṇa maraṇaṃ dhruvaṃ//
analyzed: gulphe ca jānīyāt śastreṇa maraṇam dhruvam

original: u3.24ab/.yasya pāda^tale jātas tathā hasta^tale +api ca/
analyzed: pāda tale jātaḥ tathā hasta tale api ca

original: u3.24cd/.dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ sutā gāvaḥ striyo yānāni ca^apnuyāt//

original: u3.25ab/.snigdhaṃ snigdheṣu vijñeyaṃ caleṣu ca calaṃ phalaṃ/
analyzed: snigdheṣu vijñeyam caleṣu ca calam phalam

original: u3.25cd/.sthāna^sthe vipulaṃ dadyāt phalaṃ nṛṇāṃ śubhodayaṃ//
analyzed: vipulam dadyāt phalam nṛṇām śubha udayam

original: u3.26ab/.vivarṇo viparītaś ca phalaṃ sarvaṃ prayacchati/
u3.26cd/.puṃsāṃ madhye ye snigdhāś ca deśe dakṣiṇataś ca ye/
analyzed: madhye ye snigdhāḥ ca deśe dakṣiṇatas ca ye

original: u3.26ef/.tathā ca^abhyantare ca^eva sthāne tu pratipūjitāḥ//

original: u3.27ab/.strīṇāṃ mṛduṣu deśeṣu vaktrān teṣu ca parvataḥ/
analyzed: mṛduṣu deśeṣu vaktrān teṣu ca parvataḥ

original: u3.27cd/.tattvaṃ vijñāya pinyānaṃ sthānaṃ varṇaṃ ca janma ca//
analyzed: vijñāya pinyānam sthānam varṇam ca janma ca

original: u3.28ab/.sthāna^asthānaṃ ca matimān vikāraṃ gatim eva ca/
analyzed: ca matimān vikāram gatim eva ca

original: u3.28cd/.ādiśet tu naraḥ paścād yatha^evaṃ samudāhṛtaṃ//

original: u3.29ab/.vāmabhāge tu nārīṇāṃ vijñeeyāḥ piṭakāḥ śubhāḥ/

analyzed: tu manuṣyāṇām bhavanti hi artha sādhakāḥ

original: u3.30ab/.viparītās tu piṭakā moghās tu bahavaḥ smṛtāḥ/

original: u3.30cd/.yathoktānaṃ ca sandhisthāḥ sarve viphaladāḥ smṛtāḥ//

original: u3.31ab/.siddhāḥ dhruvā vraṇā bhidyās tathā sadyaḥ^kṛtāś ca ye/
analyzed: dhruvāḥ vraṇāḥ bhidyāḥ tathā sadyaḥkṛtāḥ ca ye

original: u3.32cd/.ity āha bhagavāṃs triśaṅkuḥ śiṣyebhyo nitya^darśanaṃ//

analyzed: bhoḥ puṣkarasārin piṭaka adhyāya nāma adhyāyaḥ

analyzed: khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin svapna adhyāyam vyākhyāsyāmi

original: u4.1ab/.śubha^aśubhaṃ ca svapnānāṃ yat phalaṃ samudāhṛtaṃ/
u4.1ef/.yas tu paśyati svapna^ante kuṭumbaṃ tasya vardhate//
analyzed: tu paśyati svapna ante kuṭumbam tasya vardhate

original: u4.2cd/.suvarṇaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ ca^eva kuṭumbaṃ tasya vardhate/
analyzed: vṛṣabham ca eva kuṭumbam tasya vardhate

original: u4.3ab/.sārasāṃś ca śukān haṃsān krauñcān śvetāṃś ca pakṣiṇaḥ/
analyzed: ca śukān haṃsān krauñcān śvetān ca pakṣiṇaḥ

original: u4.3cd/.yas tu paśyati svapne vai kuṭumbaṃ tasya vardhate/
analyzed: tu paśyati svapne vai kuṭumbam tasya vardhate

original: u4.4ab/.samṛddhāni ca śasyāni navāni surabhīṇi ca/
u4.4cd/.padminīṃ puṣpitāṃ ca^api purṇa^kumbhāṃs tathā^eva ca//
analyzed: puṣpitām ca api purṇa kumbhān tathā eva ca

original: u4.5ab/.prasannam udakaṃ ca^eva puṣpāṇi vividhāni ca/
analyzed: udakam ca eva puṣpāṇi vividhāni ca

original: u4.5cd/.yas tu paśyati svapna^ante kuṭumbaṃ tasya vardhate//
analyzed: tu paśyati svapna ante kuṭumbam tasya vardhate

original: u4.6ab/.pāṇau pāde +atha vā jānau śasterṇa dhanuṣā^api vā/
analyzed: pāde atha vā jānau dhanuṣā api vā

original: u4.7cd/.yas tu paśyati svapna^ante kuṭumbaṃ tasya vardhate//
analyzed: tu paśyati svapna ante kuṭumbam tasya vardhate

original: u4.9ab/.patitaś ca^aruhed bhūyas tatrasthaś ca vibudhyate/(p.155)

original: u4.10ab/.goyutaṃ ca rathaṃ svapne hayaṃ vā yo +abhirohati/
analyzed: ca ratham svapne hayam vā yaḥ abhirohati

original: u4.12ab/.āsane śayane yane śarīre +atha gṛhe kṣayaḥ/
analyzed: śayane yane śarīre atha gṛhe kṣayaḥ

original: u4.12cd/.yeṣām ārohaṇaṃ śastaṃ teṣām ārohaṇāt kṣayaḥ/
u4.12ef/.yeṣām ārohaṇād doṣās teṣām ārohaṇād guṇāḥ//
u4.13ab/.tri^sāhasraṃ bhavet kaṇṭhe daśa śīrṣasya chedane/

analyzed: śata sahasram vā labhate śīrṣa bhakṣaṇe
nadīm hradam vā api śūnya āgāra praveśanam

original: u4.14cd/.śuṣka^udapāna^ṃ tu labhate svapne dṛṣṭvā dhruvaṃ bhayaṃ//
analyzed: tu labhate svapne dṛṣṭvā dhruvam bhayam

original: u4.15cd/.ajāṃ vā paśyataḥ svapne vyādhi^kleśaṃ vinirdiśet//
analyzed: vā paśyataḥ svapne vyādhi kleśam vinirdiśet

original: u4.16ab/.kākaṃ śyenam ulūkaṃ vā gṛdhraṃ vā^apy atha vartakaṃ/
analyzed: śyenam ulūkam vā gṛdhram vā api atha vartakam

original: u4.16cd/.mayūraṃ paśyataḥ svapne tasya vyasanam ādiśet//
u4.17ab/.nagnaṃ paśyati hy ātmānaṃ pāṃśunā dhvastam eva vā/
analyzed: paśyati hi ātmānam pāṃśunā dhvastam eva vā

original: u4.18ab/.kuṇḍthāḥ striyo +atha saṃlokya caurān dyūta^karāṃs tathā/
analyzed: striyaḥ atha saṃlokya caurān dyūta karān tathā

original: u4.18cd/.kuśīlāṃś cāraṇān dhūrtān svapne dṛṣṭvā dhruvaṃ bhayaṃ//
analyzed: cāraṇān dhūrtān svapne dṛṣṭvā dhruvam bhayam

original: u4.19cd/.udvartanaṃ vā kurvāṇaḥ svapna^ante rogam arcchati//
analyzed: vā kurvāṇaḥ svapna ante rogam arcchati

original: u4.20ab/.dhvajaṃ chatraṃ vitānaṃ vā svapna^ante yasya dhāryate/
analyzed: chatram vitānam vā svapna ante yasya dhāryate

original: u4.22ab/.manuṣyaṃ bhūmi^bhāgaṃ vā svapna^ante grasate yadi/
analyzed: bhūmi bhāgam vā svapna ante grasate yadi

original: u4.22cd/.hradaś ca vā samudro +ayaṃ mahad^aiśvaryam āpnuyāt//

original: u4.23ab/.dhanuḥ praharaṇaṃ śastraṃ raktam ābharaṇaṃ dhvajaṃ/

analyzed: vā labhet svapne dhana lābham vinirdiśet

original: u4.24ab/.prapātaṃ parvataṃ tālaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ kuñjaraṃ hayaṃ/

analyzed: nagaram dvāram candra ādityau sa tārakau

original: u4.24ef/.svapne prapatitau dṛṣṭvā rājñāṃ vyasanam ādiśet//

analyzed: astam gatam dṛṣṭvā rājñaḥ vyasanam ādiśet

original: u4.26cd/.valmīkaṃ bhasma^rāśiṃ vā svapne vyasanam ādiśet//
analyzed: bhasma rāśim vā svapne vyasanam ādiśet

original: u4.27ab/.kṛṣṇa^vastrā tu yā nārī kālī kāmayate naraṃ/
analyzed: tu yā nārī kālī kāmayate naram

original: u4.28ab/.tamasi praviśet svapne śambhor vā ca^amaraṃ tathā/
analyzed: praviśet svapne śambhoḥ vā caamaram tathā

original: u4.28cd/.vṛkṣād vā prapatet svapne maraṇaṃ tasya nirdiśet//
analyzed: vā prapatet svapne maraṇam tasya nirdiśet

original: u4.29ab/.vṛkṣāṃ kāṣṭhaṃ tṛṇaṃ vā^api virucaṃ yas tu paśyati/
analyzed: kāṣṭham tṛṇam vā api virucam yaḥ tu paśyati

original: u4.29cd/.svapne śīrṣaṃ śarīraṃ vā maraṇaṃ tasya nirdiśet//
analyzed: śīrṣam śarīram vā maraṇam tasya nirdiśet

original: u4.30ab/.devo vā varṣate yatra yatra ca^eva^aśaniḥ patet/
analyzed: vā varṣate yatra yatra ca eva aśaniḥ patet

original: u4.30cd/.bhūmir vā kampate yatra svapne vyasanam ādiśet//
analyzed: vā kampate yatra svapne vyasanam ādiśet

original: u4.31ab/.candra^ādityau yadi svapne khaṇḍau bhinnau ca paśyati/
analyzed: yadi svapne khaṇḍau bhinnau ca paśyati

original: u4.31cd/.patitau patamānau vā cakṣus tasya vinaśyati//
u4.33cd/.labdhvā tu puruṣaḥ svapne dhana^nāśaṃ samarcchati//
analyzed: tu puruṣaḥ svapne dhana nāśam samarcchati

original: u4.34ab/.gāyantī vā hasantī vā nṛtyantī vā vibudhyate/
analyzed: vā hasantī vā nṛtyantī vā vibudhyate
atha anyaiḥ vā krīḍet jaya parājaye

original: u4.36cd/.krīḍed akuśalāṅkair vā svapne dṛṣṭvā dhruvaṃ kaliḥ//
analyzed: akuśala aṅkaiḥ vā svapne dṛṣṭvā dhruvam kaliḥ

original: u4.37ab/.āsane śayane yane vāstre sābharaṇe gṛhe/
analyzed: śayane yane vā astre sa ābharaṇe gṛhe
ambhasi ca ādarśe chāyām paśyati na ātmanaḥ

original: u4.39cd/.utpadyate dhruvaṃ tasya skandha^nyāso na saṃśayaḥ//
analyzed: dhruvam tasya skandha nyāsaḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: u4.40ab/.abhīkṣṇaṃ varṣate devo jalaṃ pāṃśum atha^api vā/
analyzed: varṣate devaḥ jalam pāṃśum atha api vā

original: u4.40cd/.aṅgāraṃ vā^api varṣeta maraṇaṃ tatra nirdiśet//
analyzed: vā api varṣeta maraṇam tatra nirdiśet

original: u4.41cd/.rajju jālena vā svapne para^cakrād vinirdiśet//
analyzed: jālena vā svapne para cakrāt vinirdiśet
vā svapne para cakra udgamaḥ bhavet

original: u4.43cd/.gāyate hasate ca^eva prahāraṃ tasya nirdiśet//
analyzed: hasate ca eva prahāram tasya nirdiśet

original: u4.44cd/.pariṣvajet naraṃ svapne bandhanaṃ tasya nirdiśet//
u4.45ab/.kṛṣṇa^sarpo yadi svapne hy abhirohati yaṃ naraṃ/
analyzed: yadi svapne hi abhirohati yam naram

original: u4.45cd/.gātrāṇi veṣṭayed vā^api bandhanaṃ tasya nirdiśet//
analyzed: veṣṭayet vā api bandhanam tasya nirdiśet

original: u4.46ab/.latābhiḥ sthāṇu^vṛndair vā yantrai vā parivāryate/(p.158)
u4.46cd/.svapna^ante puruṣo yas tu bandhanaṃ tasya nirdiśet//
analyzed: puruṣaḥ yaḥ tu bandhanam tasya nirdiśet

original: u4.47cd/.yasya chidyeran svapna^ante bandhanāt sa vimucyate//
analyzed: chidyeran svapna ante bandhanāt sa vimucyate

original: u4.48ab/.viṣamāṇi ca nimnāni parvatān nagarāṇi ca/
u4.48cd/.yas tu paśyati svapna^ante kṣipraṃ kleśād vimucyate//
analyzed: tu paśyati svapna ante kṣipram kleśāt vimucyate

original: u4.49ab/.pūtanā vā piśācā vā duścalā malinā^atha vā/
analyzed: vā piśācāḥ vā duścalāḥ malināḥ atha vā

original: u4.49cd/.evaṃrūpāṇi rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā svapne dhruvaṃ kaliḥ//
u4.50ab/.susnātaṃ ca suveśaṃ ca sugandhaṃ śukla^vāsasaṃ/
analyzed: ca su veśam ca su gandham śukla vāsasam

original: u4.50cd/.puruṣaṃ vā^atha nārīṃ vā dṛṣṭvā svapne mahat^sukhaṃ//
analyzed: vā atha nārīm vā dṛṣṭvā svapne mahat sukham

original: u4.51ab/.tṛṇaṃ vṛkṣama atho kāṣṭhaṃ virūḍhaṃ yatra dṛśyate/
analyzed: vṛkṣam atha u kāṣṭham virūḍham yatra dṛśyate

original: u4.51cd/.gṛhe vā yadi vā kṣetre kṣipraṃ dravya^kṣayo bhavet//
analyzed: vā yadi vā kṣetre kṣipram dravya kṣayaḥ bhavet

original: u4.52cd/.naro vā labhate nārīṃ nārī vā labhate naraṃ//
analyzed: vā labhate nārīm nārī vā labhate naram
śuklam atho vastram śukla gandha anulepitam

original: u4.53cd/.svapna^ante yas tu paśyeta strī^lābhaṃ tasya nirdiśet//
analyzed: yaḥ tu paśyeta strī lābham tasya nirdiśet

original: u4.54ab/.yas tu hy annāni paśyeta bhūṣaṇaṃ nigaḍais tathā/
analyzed: tu hi annāni paśyeta bhūṣaṇam nigaḍaiḥ tathā

original: u4.54cd/.naras tu labhate bhāryāṃ nārī vā labhate patiṃ//
analyzed: tu labhate bhāryām nārī vā labhate patim

original: u4.55ab/.mekhalāṃ karṇikāṃ mālāṃ strīṇām ābharaṇāni ca/
u4.55cd/.labdhvā naro labhed bhāryāṃ nārī ca labhate patiṃ//
analyzed: naraḥ labhet bhāryām nārī ca labhate patim
vṛṣabham nāgam candra ādityau sa tārakau

original: u4.56cd/.abhivadeta yā nārī patiṃ sā labhate +acirāt//
analyzed: yā nārī patim sā labhate acirāt

original: u4.57ab/.eṣām anyatamaḥ kuṣau praviśec ca yadi striyāḥ/
analyzed: anyatamaḥ kuṣau praviśet ca yadi striyāḥ
kāle sarva pūrṇa aṅgam śrīmat putram prasūyate

original: u4.58ab/.phalāni ca samagrāṇi vanāni haritāni ca//
u4.59cd/.labdhā nārī tu svapna^ante śrīmat^putraṃ prasūyate//
analyzed: nārī tu svapna ante śrīmat putram prasūyate

original: u4.60ab/.upāyana^sūtrayor antaḥ sajjaṃ tatra tu piṇḍakaṃ/
u4.60cd/.svapne yā labhate nārī sā^api putraṃ prasūyate/
analyzed: yā labhate nārī sā api putram prasūyate

original: u4.60ef/.yamaṃ tu bhājanaṃ ca^api yamaṃ tu sā prasūyate//
analyzed: tu bhājanam ca api yamam tu sā prasūyate

original: u4.61ab/.mlāyantīm atha grīṣmān te taruṇīm ātmikām api/
analyzed: atha grīṣmān te taruṇīm ātmikām api

original: u4.61cd/.śuṣkāṃ dṛṣṭvā tathā svapne svapakṣa^maraṇaṃ bhavet//
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tathā svapne sva pakṣa maraṇam bhavet

original: u4.62ab/.bāhavo yasya vardhante cakṣur aṅgulayo +api vā/
analyzed: yasya vardhante cakṣuḥ aṅgulayaḥ api vā

original: u4.62cd/.jñātayo tasya vardhante śatruṇāṃ maraṇaṃ bhavet//
u4.63ab/.badhyante bāhavo yasya cakṣuś ca vyākulaṃ bhavet/
analyzed: bāhavaḥ yasya cakṣuḥ ca vyākulam bhavet

original: u4.63cd/.bāhur vā prapated yasya sva^pakṣa^maranaṃ bhavet//
analyzed: vā prapatet yasya sva pakṣa maranam bhavet

original: u4.64ab/.devo vā yadi vā preto nāryā vastraṃ phalāni vā/
analyzed: vā yadi vā pretaḥ nāryāḥ vastram phalāni vā

original: u4.64cd/.svapne prayacchate yasyāḥ putras tasyāḥ prajāyate//
u4.65ab/.apakṛṣṭo rudanyo vā nagno +atha malinaḥ kṛśaḥ/
analyzed: rudanyaḥ vā nagnaḥ atha malinaḥ kṛśaḥ

original: u4.66ab/.carma yantraṃ gaṇitaṃ vā kīlaṃ vā^atha kilāṭakaṃ/
analyzed: yantram gaṇitam vā kīlam vā atha kilāṭakam

original: u4.66cd/.svapne labdhvā ca prāpnu[jānī]yād dhruvaṃ vastra^āgamo bhavet//
analyzed: labdhvā ca prāpnujānīyāt dhruvam vastra āgamaḥ bhavet

original: u4.67ab/.amānuṣo +atha rājā vā devaḥ preto +atha brāhmaṇaḥ/
analyzed: atha rājā vā devaḥ pretaḥ atha brāhmaṇaḥ

original: u4.67cd/.svapne yathā te jalpa^nti sa tathā^artho bhaviṣyati//
analyzed: yathā te jalpanti sa tathāarthaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: u4.68cd/.yac ca^anusmarate dṛṣṭvā yac ca^api bahu paśyati//
analyzed: ca anusmarate dṛṣṭvā yat ca api bahu paśyati

original: u4.69cd/.viṣamaṃ vā tathā^adhvānaṃ chidraṃ vā pratipadyate//
analyzed: vā tathā adhvānam chidram vā pratipadyate

original: u4.70ab/.agniṃ prajvalitaṃ taptaṃ śamitvā tu praśasyate/(p.160)
u4.70cd/.gṛhāṇāṃ karaṇaṃ śastaṃ bhedanaṃ na praśasyate//
u4.71ab/.nirmalaṃ gaganaṃ śastaṃ sameghaṃ na praśasyate//
analyzed: gaganam śastam sa megham na praśasyate

original: u4.71cd/.prasannam udakaṃ śastaṃ kaluṣaṃ na praśasyate/
u4.72ab/.adhvānaṃ gamanaṃ śastaṃ na kvacit saṃnivartanaṃ/
u4.73ab/.māṃsasya darśanaṃ sādhu bhakṣaṇaṃ na praśasyate/
u4.73cd/.madyasya darśanaṃ śastaṃ pānaṃ tu na praśasyate//
analyzed: darśanam śastam pānam tu na praśasyate

original: u4.74ab/.pṛthivī haritā śastā vivarṇā na praśasyate/
u4.75ab/.svapneṣu ruditaṃ śastaṃ hasitaṃ na praśasyate/
u4.76ab/.mālyasya darśanaṃ śastaṃ dhāraṇaṃ na praśasyate/
u4.76cd/.gātraṃ vikartitaṃ sādhu prokṣitaṃ na praśasyate//
u4.77cd/.vyādhito malinaḥ śasto bhūṣito na praśasyate/
u4.78ab/.dhūmrā ghanā dundubhi^śaṅkha^śabdo vāto +abhra^vṛṣṭiś ca tathā samantāt/
analyzed: ghanāḥ dundubhi śaṅkha śabdaḥ vātaḥ abhra vṛṣṭiḥ ca tathā samantāt

original: u4.78cd/.sarva^sthirāṇāṃ ca calaś ca yaḥ syād ye ca^antare doṣa^kṛtā vikārāḥ//
analyzed: ca calaḥ ca yaḥ syāt ye ca antare doṣa kṛtāḥ vikārāḥ

original: u4.79ab/.pūrveṣu rūpeṣu yathāvad iṣṭā rāja^rṣayo deva^gaṇāś ca sarve/
analyzed: rūpeṣu yathāvat iṣṭāḥ rājarṣayaḥ deva gaṇāḥ ca sarve

original: u4.80ab/.yat pūrva^rūpeṣu bhavet praśastaṃ duḥsvapnam etāni śamaṃ nayanti/
analyzed: pūrvarūpeṣu bhavet praśastam duḥsvapnam etāni śamam nayanti

original: u4.80cd/.gāvaḥ pradānaṃ dvija^pūjanaṃ ca duḥsvapnam etena parijitaṃ syāt//
analyzed: pradānam dvija pūjanam ca duḥsvapnam etena parijitam syāt

original: u4.81ab/.devaṃ ca yaṃ bhaktigato manuṣyas taṃ tu parāṃś ca^arcayituṃ yateta/(p.161)
analyzed: ca yam bhakti gataḥ manuṣyaḥ tam tu parān

original: u4.81cd/.svapnaṃ tu dṛṣṭvā prathame pradoṣe saṃvatsara^ante +asya vipākam āhuḥ//
analyzed: tu dṛṣṭvā prathame pradoṣe saṃvatsara ante asya vipākam āhuḥ

original: u4.82ab/.ṣaṇ^māsikaṃ yac ca bhaved dvitīye ṣaṭpākṣikaṃ yat tu bhavet tṛtīye/
analyzed: yat ca bhavet dvitīye ṣaṣ pākṣikam yat tu bhavet tṛtīye

original: u4.82cd/.adhyardha^māse taram eva yat syāt phalec caturthe rajanī^prabhāte//
analyzed: taram eva yat syāt phalet caturthe rajanī prabhāte
vā tila pātra dānam śānti kriyāḥ svastyayana prayogāḥ

original: u4.83cd/.pūjā gurūṇāṃ parimiṣṭam annaṃ duḥsvapnam etāni vināśayanti//
analyzed: gurūṇām parimiṣṭam annam duḥsvapnam etāni vināśayanti

original: atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn aparam api svapna^adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
analyzed: atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin aparam api svapna adhyāyam vyākhyāsyāmi

original: u5.1cd/.nimittaṃ yādṛśaṃ yasya śṛṇu vakṣyāmi tatvataḥ//
u5.2ab/.jāgrato yadi vā trasto divā svapnāni paśyati/
analyzed: yadi vā trastaḥ divā svapnāni paśyati

original: u5.2cd/.na tu bhayaṃ bhavet tasya jānīyād eva buddhimān//
analyzed: tu bhayam bhavet tasya jānīyāt eva buddhimān

original: u5.3ab/.yasya tu yo bhavec chatrur yasya vidheyam icchati/
analyzed: tu yaḥ bhavet śatruḥ yasya vidheyam icchati

original: u5.3cd/.svapne tu kalahaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣipraṃ prītir bhaviṣyati//
analyzed: tu kalaham dṛṣṭvā kṣipram prītiḥ bhaviṣyati
pur ime yāme yaḥ adrākṣīt sukha duḥkha dam

original: u5.4cd/.adhvānaṃ cira^kālena tathā hy eṣa nivartate//
analyzed: cira kālena tathā hi eṣa nivartate

original: u5.5ab/.madhyame bhavate naiva kṣipraṃ bhavati paścime/
analyzed: bhavate na eva kṣipram bhavati paścime

original: u5.6ab/.dṛṣṭvā jalacarān matsyān evaṃ jānīta buddhimān/
u5.6cd/.yat kiñcid ārabhiṣyāmi kṣipram eva bhaviṣyati//
u5.7ab/.campāyāṃ dhṛṣaṇaṃ haste dhṛṣet svapna^antareṣu vā/
analyzed: dhṛṣaṇam haste dhṛṣet svapna antareṣu vā

original: u5.8ab/.sarvāṇi khalu pānāni madhurāṇi sukhāni ca/
u5.8cd/.yas tu pibati svapna^ante sa ca lābhaiḥ prayujyate//
analyzed: tu pibati svapna ante sa ca lābhaiḥ prayujyate

original: u5.9cd/.pratibuddhas tu jānīyāt śatrur eva pramūrcchati//
u5.10ab/.upari kākā gṛdhrāś ca dhāvanty upari yānti ca/
analyzed: kākāḥ gṛdhrāḥ ca dhāvanti upari yānti ca
para gṛha śvānaḥ dvāre mūtram prakurvate

original: u5.11cd/.pratibuddho vijānīyād bhāryā me jāram icchati//
u5.12ab/.ekaś ca dharaṇau pādo dvitīyaḥ śirasi sthitaḥ/
analyzed: ca dharaṇau pādaḥ dvitīyaḥ śirasi sthitaḥ

original: u5.13ab/.samudraṃ yadi paśyed vā pātum icchati tajjalaṃ/
analyzed: yadi paśyet vā pātum icchati tat jalam

original: u5.14ab/.vṛkṣaṃ parvatam āruhya nāgaṃ ca turagaṃ tathā/
analyzed: parvatam āruhya nāgam ca turagam tathā

original: u5.15ab/.yas tu svapna^antare paśyet pitṝn yān iha ca^anyathā/
analyzed: tu svapna antare paśyet pitṝn yān iha ca anyathā

original: u5.15cd/.tathā mātā pitā ca^eva tasya jīvanti te ciraṃ//
analyzed: mātā pitā ca eva tasya jīvanti te ciram
tu svapna antare paśyet keśa śmaśrū vikartitam

original: u5.17ab/.ānanaṃ ca^udake dṛṣṭvā madhye +agnau ca vidhāvitaṃ/
analyzed: ca audake dṛṣṭvā madhye agnau ca vidhāvitam

original: u5.19ab/.caurāṇām api sāmagrīṃ svapna^ante yas tu paśyati/
analyzed: api sāmagrīm svapna ante yaḥ tu paśyati

original: u5.20ab/.kṛṣṇa^sarpa^gṛhītaṃ tu svapna^ante yas tu paśyati/
analyzed: tu svapna ante yaḥ tu paśyati

original: u5.21cd/.yas tu ca^ābharaṇaṃ paśyed bandhu^vargo bhaviṣyati//
analyzed: tu ca ābharaṇam paśyet bandhu vargaḥ bhaviṣyati
ca gṛha prākāre dhāvati iha parasparam

original: u5.23ab/.yas tu svapna^antare paśyec ca^ātmānam agnitāpitaṃ/
analyzed: tu svapna antare paśyet ca ātmānam agni tāpitam
tṛṇam ca eva bahu bhāram abhīkṣṇaśas

original: u5.26ab/.yastu bānara^yuktena gacchate pur imāṃ diśaṃ/
analyzed: bānara yuktena gacchate pur imām diśam

original: u5.26cd/.pratibuddho vijānīyād rātrir eṣā hy apaścimā//

analyzed: vijānīyāt ārya dharma āgamaḥ hi saḥ

original: u5.28ab/.sumanāṃ vārṣikaṃ [kīṃ] ca^eva kumudāny utpalāni ca/
analyzed: vārṣikam kīm ca eva kumudāni utpalāni ca

original: u5.29cd/.pratibuddho vijānīyād yakṣā me hy anukampakāḥ//
u5.31cd/.yas tu svapna^antare paśyet subhikṣaṃ tatra nirdiśet//
analyzed: tu svapna antare paśyet subhikṣam tatra nirdiśet

original: u5.32ab/.suvarṇaṃ ca tathā rūpyaṃ muktāhāraṃ tathāiva ca/
analyzed: ca tathā rūpyam muktā hāram tathā iva ca

original: u5.32cd/.yas tu svapna^antare paśyan nidhiṃ tatra vinirdiśet//
analyzed: tu svapna antare paśyan nidhim tatra vinirdiśet

original: u5.33ab/.bandhanaṃ bahu dṛṣṭvā tu chedanaṃ kuṭṭanaṃ tathā/
analyzed: bahu dṛṣṭvā tu chedanam kuṭṭanam tathā

original: u5.35/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin māsa^parīkṣā^nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
analyzed: khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin māsa parīkṣā nāma adhyāyam vyākhyāsyāmi

original: u6.1/.yadi phālgune māse nirghoṣa upari bhavet manuṣyāṇāṃ maraṇaṃ codayati/
analyzed: phālgune māse nirghoṣaḥ upari bhavet manuṣyāṇām maraṇam codayati

original: yadi devo garjati prathamaṃ mahā^sasyāni bhavanti/
analyzed: yadi devaḥ garjati prathamam mahā sasyāni bhavanti

original: u6.2/.yadi caitre māse devo garjati tadā sarva^sasya^samutpattiṃ codayati/
analyzed: caitre māse devaḥ garjati tadā sarva sasya samutpattim codayati

original: yadi candra^graho bhavati mahān sannipāto bhavati/
analyzed: yadi candra grahaḥ bhavati mahān sannipātaḥ bhavati

original: yadi nīhāraṃ bhūmiṃ chādayati subhikṣaṃ codayati/
analyzed: yadi nīhāram bhūmim chādayati subhikṣam codayati

original: u6.3/.yadi vaiśākhe māse devo garjati subhikṣaṃ codayati/
analyzed: vaiśākhe māse devaḥ garjati subhikṣam codayati

original: yadi pūrve paścime śaṅkhe candra^graho bhavati kṣemaṃ codayati/
analyzed: yadi pūrve paścime śaṅkhe candra grahaḥ bhavati kṣemam codayati

original: yadi ca^ulkā^pāto bhavati yasmiṃś ca janapade nipatati tatra deśe pradhāna^puruṣasya vināśo bhavati/
analyzed: yadi ca aulkā pātaḥ bhavati yasmin ca janapade nipatati tatra deśe pradhānapuruṣasya vināśaḥ bhavati

original: u6.4/.yadi jeyṣṭhe māse devo garjati rogaṃ codayati/
analyzed: jeyṣṭhe māse devaḥ garjati rogam codayati

original: yadi sūrya^graho bhavati manuṣyāṇāṃ vināśaṃ codayati/
analyzed: yadi sūrya grahaḥ bhavati manuṣyāṇām vināśam codayati

original: pūrve paścime vā śaṅkhe yadi candrasya sūryasya kiñcin nimittaṃ lakṣyate tadā kṣemaṃ codayati/
analyzed: pūrve paścime vā śaṅkhe yadi candrasya sūryasya kiñcid nimittam lakṣyate tadā kṣemam codayati

original: yadi madhya^rātrau candra^graho bhavati manuṣyāṇām anyonya^ghātaṃ codayati/
analyzed: yadi madhyarātrau candra grahaḥ bhavati manuṣyāṇām anyonya ghātam codayati

original: yadi ca^upari nirghoṣo bhavati adhyakṣa^puruṣasya pīḍāṃ codayati/
analyzed: yadi ca aupari nirghoṣaḥ bhavati adhyakṣa puruṣasya pīḍām codayati

original: u6.5/.āṣāḍhe māse yadi sūrya^graho rucira^ābhāso bhavati subhikṣaṃ codayati/
analyzed: māse yadi sūrya grahaḥ rucira ābhāsaḥ bhavati subhikṣam codayati
yadi candra grahaḥ bhavati rogam codayati

original: u6.6/.śrāvaṇa^māse yadi sūrya^graho bhavati rājyaṃ parivartate/
analyzed: yadi sūrya grahaḥ bhavati rājyam parivartate

original: yadi candra^graho bhavati prathame māse durbhikṣaṃ codayati/
analyzed: yadi candra grahaḥ bhavati prathame māse durbhikṣam codayati

original: yadi (p.165) tārakā yatra deśe patanti tatra yuddhaṃ codayati/
analyzed: yadi tārakāḥ yatra deśe patanti tatra yuddham codayati

original: yadi ca^atiśayaṃ bhūmi^cālo bhavati rogaṃ codayati/
analyzed: yadi ca atiśayam bhūmicālaḥ bhavati rogam codayati

original: yadi nirghoṣo bhavati tatra gṛhe yo gṛha^svāmī bhavati tasya vināśaṃ codayati/
analyzed: yadi nirghoṣaḥ bhavati tatra gṛhe yaḥ gṛha svāmī bhavati tasya vināśam codayati

original: atra ca māse +abhinavaṃ prāvaraṇaṃ na prāvaritavyaṃ/
analyzed: atra ca māse abhinavam prāvaraṇam na prāvaritavyam

original: u6.7/.yady aśvayuje māse devo garjati manuṣyāṇāṃ vināśanaṃ codayati/
analyzed: aśvayuje māse devaḥ garjati manuṣyāṇām vināśanam codayati
yadi sūrya auparāgaḥ bhavati mahā puruṣa vināśam codayati

original: yadi pūrve yāme candrasya nimittaṃ dṛśyate subhikṣaṃ codayati/
analyzed: yadi pūrve yāme candrasya nimittam dṛśyate subhikṣam codayati

original: tatra ca manuṣyā anyonyaṃ vadhayiṣyanti^iti codayati/
analyzed: tatra ca manuṣyāḥ anyonyam vadhayiṣyanti iti codayati

original: u6.8/.yadi kārttike māse devo varṣati mahad^ākulaṃ codayati/
analyzed: kārttike māse devaḥ varṣati mahat ākulam codayati

original: yady eka^antarūpaṃ vāto vāti tatra ca manuṣyā jalena vibhramiṣyanti/
analyzed: yadi eka anta rūpam vātaḥ vāti tatra ca manuṣyāḥ jalena vibhramiṣyanti

original: yadi pūrve yāme utpāto bhavati mahā^varṣaṃ bhavati/
analyzed: yadi pūrve yāme utpātaḥ bhavati mahā varṣam bhavati

original: u6.9/.yadi mārgaśīrṣe māsi devo garjati śasya^vināśo bhavati/
analyzed: mārgaśīrṣe māsi devaḥ garjati śasya vināśaḥ bhavati

original: yadi ca^ākāśe nirghoṣo bhavati yat pūrva^bhāgīyā manuṣyās teṣām āmayaṃ codayati/
analyzed: yadi ca ākāśe nirghoṣaḥ bhavati yat pūrvabhāgīyāḥ manuṣyāḥ teṣām āmayam codayati

original: yadi bhūmi^cālo bhavati yas tatra janapade pradhāna^puruṣo sa vadhān mokṣyati/
analyzed: yadi bhūmicālaḥ bhavati yaḥ tatra janapade sa vadhāt mokṣyati

original: u6.10/.yadi pauṣe māse devo garjati prathame yāme janapada^nāśo bhavati/
analyzed: pauṣe māse devaḥ garjati prathame yāme janapada nāśaḥ bhavati

original: prathame yāme ca yadi candra^uparāgo bhavati lohita^varṇaś ca dṛśyate udaka^āgamaṃ codayati/
analyzed: prathame yāme ca yadi candra auparāgaḥ bhavati lohita varṇaḥ ca dṛśyate udaka āgamam codayati
yadi sūrya grahaḥ bhavati śuddha puruṣaṇām

original: yadi tārakāḥ patantyo vidṛśyante tatra janapade ākulaṃ codayati/
analyzed: yadi tārakāḥ patantyaḥ vidṛśyante tatra janapade ākulam codayati

original: yaty ākāśe nirghoṣo bhavati manuṣyāṇāṃ maraṇaṃ codayati/
analyzed: yati ākāśe nirghoṣaḥ bhavati manuṣyāṇām maraṇam codayati

original: yadi dvitīye nirghoṣo bhavati amnuṣyāś caurair hanyante/
analyzed: yadi dvitīye nirghoṣaḥ bhavati amnuṣyāḥ cauraiḥ hanyante

original: yady atraiva māse tārakā utsṛṣṭā na candro dṛsyate sasyaṃ saṃcodayati/
analyzed: yadi atra eva māse tārakāḥ utsṛṣṭāḥ na candraḥ sasyam saṃcodayati

original: yadi bhūmi^cālo bhavati mahāmanuṣyasya maraṇaṃ bhavati/
analyzed: yadi bhūmicālaḥ bhavati mahā manuṣyasya maraṇam bhavati

original: u6.12/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin khañjarīṭaka^jñānaṃ^nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
analyzed: khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin khañjarīṭakajñānam nāma adhyāyam vyākhyāsyāmi

original: u7.3ab/.tatra sarve pravarteyur yatra yeṣu bhaved bhavet/
analyzed: sarve pravarteyuḥ yatra yeṣu bhavet bhavet
bahu cela tvam gomayeṣu prabandha tā
bahu cela tvam kardame bahu bhakṣa tā

original: u7.4cd/.kṛkare svalpa^celatvaṃ purīṣe tu dṛśaṃ śravaḥ//
analyzed: su alpa cela tvam purīṣe tu dṛśam śravaḥ

original: u7.5ab/.bhasme vivādam aphalaṃ vālukāyāṃ tu saṃbhramaḥ/

analyzed: tu sammānam padmeṣu bahu vitta tā
artha anuguṇam proktam puṣpeṣu priya saṃamaḥ

original: u7.6cd/.pakṣayā carate vyādhiḥ patito mṛtyum ādiśet//
u7.7cd/.vṛkṣa^agre vidyate pānaṃ gṛheṣv atha ... lasaḥ//
u7.9ab/.gavāṃ pṛṣṭhe dhruvaṃ siddhir aśvapṛṣṭhe dhruvaṃ jayaḥ/
analyzed: pṛṣṭhe dhruvam siddhiḥ aśva pṛṣṭhe dhruvam jayaḥ

original: u7.9cd/.avikānām ajānāṃ ca pṛṣṭhe sarvatra śasyate//
u7.10ab/.uṣṭrapṛṣṭhe ghruvaṃ kleśaḥ śvānapṛṣṭhe ca vidravaḥ/(p.167)
u7.10cd/.pṛṣṭhe ca gardabhasya^iha maraṇaṃ na^atra saṃśayaḥ//
analyzed: ca gardabhasya iha maraṇam na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: u7.11ab/.kīle tu maraṇaṃ vidyād yūpa^agre ca na saṃśayaḥ/
analyzed: tu maraṇam vidyāt yūpa agre ca na saṃśayaḥ

original: u7.11cd/.kumbha^sthāne śmaśāne vā mṛto vā yatra dṛśyate//
analyzed: śmaśāne vā mṛtaḥ vā yatra dṛśyate
su alpa kakṣeṣu prasaktaḥ kalahaḥ bhavet

original: u7.13cd/.sameṣu samake kṣetre samān varṇān vinirdiśet/

analyzed: na atikā cintā tathā asthiṣu dhana kṣayaḥ

original: u7.14ef/.tāṃ diśaṃ gamanaṃ vidyād yathā tasya tathā punaḥ//
analyzed: diśam gamanam vidyāt yathā tasya tathā punar

original: u7.15ab/.kīṭā vā^atha pataṅgā vā bhayaṃ yad iha dṛśyate/
analyzed: pataṅgāḥ vā bhayam yat iha dṛśyate

original: u7.16ab/.apāṃ samīpe gajamastake vā sūrya^udaye brāhmaṇa^sannidhau vā/
analyzed: samīpe gajamastake vā sūrya udaye brāhmaṇa sannidhau vā

original: u7.16cd/.mukhya prakāśe +apy ahimastake vā yaḥ paśyate khañjanakaṃ sa dhanyaḥ//
analyzed: prakāśe api ahi mastake vā yaḥ paśyate khañjanakam sa dhanyaḥ

original: u7.17ab/.mātaṅga^rājo matimāṃs triśaṅkuḥ provāca tattvaṃ kañjanaṃ ca śāstraṃ/
analyzed: matimān triśaṅkuḥ provāca tattvam kañjanam ca śāstram

original: u7.17cd/.snigdhe sarukṣe viṣame same ca ādeśa yad doṣa^guṇair yathoktaiḥ/
analyzed: sa rukṣe viṣame same ca yat doṣa guṇaiḥ yathā uktaiḥ

original: u7.17ef/.tamādiśet tatra samīkṣya vidvān śubha^aśubhaṃ tatphalam ādiśec ca//
analyzed: tatra samīkṣya vidvān śubha aśubham tad phalam ādiśet ca

original: u7.19/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin śivā^rutaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃvyākhyāsyāmi/
analyzed: khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin śivārutam nāma adhyāyam vyākhyāsyāmi

original: teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ tapasā vīryeṇa ca imaṃ śivā^rutaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhāmi/
analyzed: teṣām sarveṣām tapasā vīryeṇa ca imam śivārutam nāmaadhyāyam vyākhāmi

original: yādṛśaṃ ca yathā vāśet teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ vāśān śṛṇotha me/
analyzed: yādṛśam ca yathā vāśet teṣām sarveṣām vāśān śṛṇotha me

original: pūrvasyāṃ diśi yadi vāśet śivā pūrva^mukhaṃ sthitvā trīn vārān vāśed vṛddhiṃ nivedayati/
analyzed: pūrvasyām diśi yadi vā āśet śivā pūrva mukham sthitvā trīn vārān vā āśet vṛddhim nivedayati

original: caturo vārān yadi vāśed atra maṅgalaṃ nivedayati/
analyzed: caturaḥ vārān yadi vā āśet atra maṅgalam nivedayati
pañca vārān vā āśet varṣām nivedayati
ṣaṣ vārān vā āśet para cakra bhayam nivedayati
aṣṭa vārān vā āśet priya samāgamam nivedayati
abhīkṣṇam vā āśet para cakra bhayam nivedayati

original: u8.3/.dakṣiṇāyāṃ dakṣiṇa^mukhaṃ sthitvā trivārān vāśed `atṛ atṛ' kurute maraṇaṃ tatra nivedayati/
analyzed: dakṣiṇa mukham sthitvā tri vārān vāśet atṛ atṛ kurute maraṇam tatra nivedayati

original: caturo vārān vāśati dakṣiṇa^mukhaṃ sthitvā dakṣiṇāyā eva diśāyāḥ priya^samāgamaṃ nivedayati/
analyzed: caturaḥ vārān vāśati dakṣiṇa mukham sthitvā dakṣiṇāyāḥ eva diśāyāḥ priya samāgamam nivedayati
pañca vārān vā āśet artham nivedayati
ṣaṣ vārān vā āśet siddhim nivedayati
sapta vārān vā āśet vivāda kalaham nivedayati

original: u8.4/.paścimāyāṃ paścima^abhimukhaṃ sthitvā śivā trivārān vāśati maraṇaṃ nivedayati/
analyzed: paścima abhimukham sthitvā śivā tri vārān vāśati maraṇam nivedayati
ṣaṣ vārān vāśati anna pānam nivedayati
aṣṭa vārān vāśati artha siddhim nivedayati

original: u8.5/.uttarasyāṃ diśi uttara^abhimukhaṃ sthitvā trivārān vāśati puruṣasya prasthitasya nirarthakaṃ gamanaṃ bhavati/
analyzed: diśi uttara abhimukham sthitvā tri vārān vāśati puruṣasya prasthitasya nirarthakam gamanam bhavati
catur vārān vāśati rāja pratibhayam nivedayati
aṣṭa vārān vāśati rāja kula daṇḍam nivedayati
yakṣa rākṣasa piśāca kumbhāṇḍa bhayam nivedayati

original: u8.6/.diśi vidiśi ca^eva giri^prāgbhāreṣu śikhareṣu nirdeśaṃ taṃ ca śṛṇotha me/
analyzed: vidiśi ca eva giri prāgbhāreṣu śikhareṣu nirdeśam tam ca me
amūm tuṣyet pipāsā ārtā vidyā siddhyai tathā eva ca
na ca śṛgāla bhaye śivā vā

original: me sameti apramattena smṛtimatā pūjayitavyā śivā nityaṃ/
analyzed: me sameti apramattena smṛtimatā pūjayitavyā śivā nityam

original: evaṃ ``sarve +arthās tasya sidhyanti triśaṅkor vacanaṃ yathā'' /
analyzed: evam sarve arthāḥ tasya sidhyanti triśaṅkoḥ vacanam yathā
krauṣṭrikaḥ yadi vāśati artha lambham nivedayati

original: ūrdhva^mukho yadi vāśati varṣāṃ tatra nivedayati/
analyzed: ūrdhva mukhaḥ yadi vāśati varṣām tatra nivedayati

original: dvipathe yadi vāśati pūrva^mukhaṃ sthitvā artha^lābhaṃ nivedayati/
analyzed: dvipathe yadi vāśati pūrva mukham sthitvā artha lābham nivedayati

original: dakṣiṇa^abhimukho yadi vāśati yathā priya^samāgamanaṃ nivedayati/
analyzed: dakṣiṇa abhimukhaḥ yadi vāśati yathā priya samāgamanam nivedayati

original: dvipathe paścima^abhimukho yadi vāśati kalahaṃ vivādaṃ vigrahaṃ maraṇaṃ ca nivedayati/
analyzed: dvipathe paścima abhimukhaḥ yadi vāśati kalaham vivādam vigraham maraṇam ca nivedayati

original: kūpakaṇṭhake yadi vāśati arthaṃ tatra nivedayati/
analyzed: kūpa kaṇṭhake yadi vāśati artham tatra nivedayati

original: atimṛdukaṃ yadi vāśati vyādhikaṃ tatra nivedayati/
analyzed: ati mṛdukam yadi vāśati vyādhikam tatra nivedayati

original: gītahāreṇa yadi vāśati artham anarthaṃ ca nivedayati/
analyzed: gīta hāreṇa yadi vāśati artham anartham ca nivedayati

original: tribhir vārair arthaṃ caturbhir anarthaṃ pañcabhiḥ priya^samāgamaṃ ṣaḍbhir bhojanaṃ saptabhir bhayam aṣṭabhir vigrahaṃ vivādaṃ ca/
analyzed: tribhiḥ vāraiḥ artham caturbhiḥ anartham pañcabhiḥ priya samāgamam ṣaḍbhiḥ bhojanam saptabhiḥ bhayam aṣṭabhiḥ vigraham vivādam ca

original: u8.9/.``atha bhūyaḥ pravakṣyāmi anupūrvaṃ śṛṇotha me'' /
nānā^āhāre yadi vāśati mārge saṃsthitasya^api sarvaṃ vakṣyāmi taṃ śṛṇotha me/
analyzed: nānā āhāre yadi vāśati mārge saṃsthitasya api sarvam vakṣyāmi tam śṛṇotha me

original: saṃprasthitasya puruṣasya śivā vāśati vā yā pūrva^mukhaṃ sthitvā kṣipra^gamanam artha^siddhiṃ nivedayati/
analyzed: saṃprasthitasya puruṣasya śivā vāśati vā yā pūrva mukham sthitvā kṣipra gamanam artha siddhim nivedayati

original: atha dakṣiṇa^mukhaṃ vāśati yā artha^siddhiṃ nivedayati/
analyzed: atha dakṣiṇa mukham vāśati yā artha siddhim nivedayati

original: atha saṃprasthitasya vāśati yā purataḥ sthitvā upakleśaṃ nivedayati/
analyzed: atha saṃprasthitasya vāśati yā puratas sthitvā upakleśam nivedayati

original: atha dakṣiṇe vāśati yadi dakṣiṇa^mukhā eva diśaḥ (p.170)
analyzed: atha dakṣiṇe vāśati yadi dakṣiṇa mukhāḥ eva diśaḥ

original: paścimato yadi vāśati caurato +ahitam asya duḥkha^daurmanasyaṃ nivedayati/
analyzed: paścimatas yadi vāśati caurataḥ ahitam asya duḥkha daurmanasyam nivedayati

original: atha mārge vrajato dakṣiṇato vāśati mahā^vyādhim anarthaṃ caurā muṣanti tan nivedayati/ glānasya
analyzed: atha mārge vrajataḥ dakṣiṇatas vāśati mahā vyādhim anartham caurāḥ muṣanti tat nivedayati glānasya
na sa cikitsitum śakyaḥ mṛtyu dūtena coditaḥ

original: glānasya yadi vāśati uttara^mukhaṃ sthitvā ārogyadhana^lābhaṃ ca nivedayati/
analyzed: glānasya yadi vāśati uttara mukham sthitvā ārogya dhana lābham ca nivedayati

original: atha mūrdhnā vāśati yā upakreśaṃ nivedayati/
analyzed: atha mūrdhnā vāśati yā upakreśam nivedayati

original: atha paścimamukhaṃ sthitvā yā anyonyaṃ vyāharate yama^śāsanaṃ [nivedayati]/
analyzed: atha paścima mukham sthitvā yā anyonyam vyāharate yama śāsanam nivedayati

original: u8.10/.śivā purataḥ puruṣasya mārga^prayātasya yadi vāśati,
analyzed: puratas puruṣasya mārga prayātasya yadi vāśati

original: mārgaṃ vrajato +asya śivā vāmena^āgatya gacchate dakṣiṇa^mukhaṃ kṣema^mārgaṃ vijānīyād artha^siddhiṃ ca nivedayati/
analyzed: mārgam vrajataḥ asya śivā vāmena āgatya gacchate dakṣiṇa mukham kṣema mārgam vijānīyāt artha siddhim ca nivedayati

original: mārge vrajataḥ puruṣasya śivā vāmena^āgatya puratā vāśati yā tathā sabhayaṃ mārgaṃ vijñāpayati/
analyzed: mārge vrajataḥ puruṣasya śivā vāmena āgatya puratā vāśati yā tathā sa bhayam mārgam vijñāpayati

original: dakṣiṇāṃ diśaṃ vāmaṃ gatvā vāmataḥ parivarteta ``na tan mārgeṇa gantavyaṃ triśaṅku^vacanaṃ yathā'' /
analyzed: dakṣiṇām diśam vāmam gatvā vāmatas parivarteta na tat mārgeṇa gantavyam triśaṅku vacanam yathā

original: purataḥ śivā gatvā agrataś ca niṣīdati sabhayaṃ mārgaṃ vijānīyāt/
analyzed: puratas śivā gatvā agratas ca niṣīdati sa bhayam mārgam vijānīyāt

original: śivā purata āgatya vāmena parivartate bhayam etīha+a tena^api bhayaṃ jānīyād vicakṣaṇaḥ/
analyzed: śivā puratas āgatya vāmena parivartate bhayam eti iha tena api bhayam jānīyāt vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: senāyām āvāhitāyāṃ śivā vaśati paścimaṃ nivartanaṃ nivedayati/
analyzed: senāyām āvāhitāyām śivā paścimam nivartanam nivedayati

original: senāyāṃ vraja^mānāyāṃ śivā āgacched agrataḥ senājayaṃ nivedayati/
analyzed: senāyām vrajamānāyām śivā āgacchet agratas senājayam nivedayati

original: sārthasya vrajamānasya śivā gacchaty agrataḥ kṣemamārgaṃ nivedayati/
analyzed: sārthasya vrajamānasya śivā gacchati agratas kṣema mārgam nivedayati

original: puruṣasya pathi vrajato vāmato vāśati mārgaṃ nivedayati/
analyzed: puruṣasya pathi vrajataḥ vāmatas vāśati mārgam nivedayati
tad mārgeṇa hi gantavyam triśaṅku vacanam yathā
nagarasya api caitya sthāne tathā eva ca

original: pūrveṇa^uttareṇa^api śivā vāśati kṣemaṃ tatra nivedayati/
analyzed: pūrveṇa auttareṇa api śivā vāśati kṣemam tatra nivedayati

original: dakṣiṇe paścime yadi vāśati yā bhayaṃ tatra nivedayati/
analyzed: dakṣiṇe paścime yadi vāśati yā bhayam tatra nivedayati

original: u8.12ab/.vāmato na praśaṃsanti tathā^eva vidiśāsu ca/
analyzed: na praśaṃsanti tathā eva vidiśāsu ca

original: u8.13ab/.adharāṃ tu bhayaṃ vakṣye triśaṅku^vacanaṃ yathā//
analyzed: tu bhayam vakṣye triśaṅku vacanam yathā
ca eva artha siddhiḥ ca cintitavyam vicakṣaṇaiḥ
tu praśamam yānti triśaṅku vacanam yathā
śivārutasya aupacāraḥ diś vidiśāsu nimittāḥ grahītavyāḥ

original: yaḥ śivāyā divaso bhavati sa divaso jñātavyaḥ/
analyzed: yaḥ śivāyāḥ divasaḥ bhavati sa divasaḥ jñātavyaḥ
puṣpa gandha mālya aupahāraḥ tad divase upapādayitavyaḥ

original: u8.16/.yat kiñcit kāryam ārabhiṣyati tatsarvaṃ nivedayati/
analyzed: kiñcid kāryam ārabhiṣyati tat sarvam nivedayati
devyai sarjja rasaḥ guggulu ca dhūpayitavyam

original: u9.2cd/.tatra jātaṃ sukhataraṃ dvitīyā jñānam antare//
u9.3ab/.tṛtīyā sā lekhā yatra pradeśinyā pravartate/
u9.4cd/.dviniḥsṛto viśuddha^ātmā jīved varṣaśataṃ hi saḥ//
analyzed: viśuddha ātmā jīvet varṣa śatam hi saḥ

original: u9.5ab/.triṃśat tribhāgena jāyīyād ardhe pañcāśad āyuṣaḥ/
analyzed: tri bhāgena jāyīyāt ardhe pañcāśat āyuṣaḥ
tri aṃśa bhāgeṣu atyanta anugate śatam

original: u9.8ab/.dīrghāyuṣaṃ vijānīyād dīrghalekhā tu yā bhavet/
analyzed: vijānīyāt dīrgha lekhā tu yā bhavet

original: u9.8cd/.hrasvāyuṣaṃ vijānīyād dhrasvalekhā tu yā bhavet//
analyzed: vijānīyāt dhrasva lekhā tu yā bhavet

original: u9.9cd/.divā tu janma nirdiṣṭam aṅguṣṭha^yavake dhravaṃ//
analyzed: tu janma nirdiṣṭam aṅguṣṭha yavake dhravam

original: u9.10ab/.avyakto yavako yatra tatra lagnaṃ vinirdiśet/
u9.11ab/.divasaṃ janma nirdiśed rātrau strī^saṃjñako bhavet/(p.173)
u9.11cd/.rātriḥ sandhyā samākhyātā bhāgair anyair na saṃśayaḥ/
analyzed: sandhyā samākhyātā bhāgaiḥ anyaiḥ na saṃśayaḥ
udayam teṣām ahar rātra antikam vadet

original: u9.13ab/.yavamālā ca matsyaḥ syād aṅguṣṭha^yavako ratau/
analyzed: ca matsyaḥ syāt aṅguṣṭha yavakaḥ ratau

original: u9.14ab/.yasya syād yavakaś ca^api ca^apo vā svastikas tathā/
analyzed: syāt yavakaḥ ca api caapaḥ vā svastikaḥ tathā

original: u9.14cd/.taleṣu yeṣu dṛśyante dhanyās te puruṣā hy amī//
analyzed: yeṣu dṛśyante dhanyāḥ te puruṣāḥ hi amī

original: u9.15ab/.matsyo dhānyaṃ bhaved bhogāyāmiṣādau yave dhanaṃ/
analyzed: dhānyam bhavet bhogāya āmiṣa ādau yave dhanam
jānīyāt mīna ādau na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: u9.16ab/.patākābhir dhvajair vā^api śaktibhis tomarais tathā/
analyzed: dhvajaiḥ vā aapi śaktibhiḥ tomaraiḥ tathā

original: u9.17ab/.prekṣyante śākhyā pañca haste catvāra eva ca/
analyzed: śākhyā pañca haste catvāraḥ eva ca

original: u9.17cd/.kṣatriyo vā bhaved bhogī rājabhiś ca^api satkṛtaḥ//
analyzed: vā bhavet bhogī rājabhiḥ ca api satkṛtaḥ

original: u9.18ab/.vaiśyo +atha kṣatriyo vāgmī dhana^dhānyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ/
analyzed: atha kṣatriyaḥ vāgmī dhana dhānyam na saṃśayaḥ
vipula bhāgī syāt parva śīlaḥ atha naiṣṭhikaḥ

original: u9.19ab/.satatam abhipūjyaḥ syāt sarveṣāṃ ca priyaṃvadaḥ/
u9.19cd/.viśīlaḥ śīlakuñco vā bahubhir na bahus tathā//
analyzed: śīla kuñcaḥ vā bahubhiḥ na bahuḥ tathā

original: u9.20ab/.śyāmavarṇā +atha bhinnā vā sā lekhā duḥkhabhāginī/
analyzed: atha bhinnā vā sā lekhā duḥkha bhāginī

original: u9.20cd/.ktilekhā yasya dṛśyante yasya pūrṇāḥ karathitāḥ/
u9.20ef/.mahā^bhogo mahā^vidvān jīved varṣaśataṃ ca saḥ//
u9.21cd/.taleṣu yasya dṛśyante taṃ vidyāt pṛthivīpatiṃ//
u9.22ab/.bhagas tu bhāgyāya dhvajaiḥ patākair hastyaśvamālāṅkuśataś ca rājā/
analyzed: tu bhāgyāya dhvajaiḥ patākaiḥ hasti aśva mālā aṅkuśataḥ ca rājā

original: u9.22cd/.matsyo nu pānāya yavo dhanāya vedis tu yajñāya gavāṃ ca goṣṭhaḥ//
analyzed: nu pānāya yavaḥ dhanāya vediḥ tu yajñāya gavām ca goṣṭhaḥ

original: u9.23ab/.anāmikāparva atikramed yadi kaniṣṭhikā varṣaśataṃ sa jīvati/
analyzed: atikramet yadi kaniṣṭhikā varṣa śatam sa jīvati

original: u9.23cd/.sametvaśītir varṣāṇi saptabhir yathā nadīnāṃ bharitāya nirdiśed//
analyzed: varṣāṇi saptabhiḥ yathā nadīnām bharitāya nirdiśet

original: u9.24ab/.śarīravarṇa^prabhavāṃ tu lekhāṃ savaiśikhāṃ varṇa^vihīnakāṃ ca/
analyzed: tu lekhām sa vaiśikhām varṇa vihīnakām ca
nīca uttama madhyamānām dāridyaḥ madhye caratām vijānatām

original: u9.25ab/.abhyañjanodvartana satkarī[ṣaira]dhyakṣa cūrṇaiś ca vimṛjya pāṇiṃ/
analyzed: sat karīṣaiḥ adhyakṣa cūrṇaiḥ ca vimṛjya pāṇim

original: u9.25cd/.prakṣālya caika^antaraghṛṣṭa^lekhām ekāgracittas tu karaṃ parīkṣet//
analyzed: ca eka antara ghṛṣṭa lekhām ekāgra cittaḥ tu karam parīkṣet

original: u9.26ab/.valayasamanarādhipaṃ bhajantyaḥ samanugatā maṇibandhane tu tisraḥ/
u9.26cd/.dvir api ca [sa] bhava^antare mahā^ātmā vippuladhana^śriya āha vastra^lābhaḥ//
analyzed: api ca sa bhava antare mahāātmā vippula dhana śriyaḥ āha vastra lābhaḥ

original: u9.27ab/.dadati satatam unnatas tu pāṇir bhavati cirāya tu dīrghapīnapāṇiḥ/
analyzed: satatam unnataḥ tu pāṇiḥ bhavati cirāya tu dīrgha pīna pāṇiḥ
śirā viruddha pāṇiḥ dhanam adhigacchati māṃsa gūḍha pāṇiḥ

original: u9.28ab/.sudṛśa[kara^talaiś ca]sādhavaste kuṭilakṛtair vinimīlitaiś ca dhūrtāḥ/
analyzed: ca sādhavaḥ te kuṭilakṛtaiḥ vinimīlitaiḥ ca dhūrtāḥ

original: u9.28cd/.bhavati rudhirasannibhaḥ suraktaś ciram iha piṇḍitapāṇirīśvaraḥ syāt//
analyzed: rudhira sannibhaḥ su raktaḥ ciram iha piṇḍita pāṇiḥ īśvaraḥ syāt
śilā aravindaiḥ jvalana kaṣāya suvarṇa pāṇi rāji

original: u9.29cd/.bhavati bahu^dhano nigūḍhapāṇiś ciram iha jīvati pāna^bhoga^bhogī//
analyzed: bahu dhanaḥ nigūḍha pāṇiḥ ciram iha jīvati pāna bhoga bhogī

original: u9.30ab/.subhaga iha tathoṣṇadīrghapāṇir dhruvam iha śītalapāṇikas tu śaṇṭhaḥ/
analyzed: iha tathā uṣṇa dīrgha pāṇiḥ dhruvam iha śītala pāṇikaḥ tu śaṇṭhaḥ

original: u9.30cd/.iha hi bahu^dhano balena yuktaḥ sutanu susañcitapāṇirekhako yaḥ//
analyzed: hi bahu dhanaḥ balena yuktaḥ su tanu su sañcita pāṇi rekhakaḥ yaḥ

original: u9.31ab/.dhanam upanayatīha pāṇilekhā kṛta^janitā jalavac ca yā sudīrghā/(p.175)
analyzed: upanayati iha pāṇi lekhā kṛta janitā jala vat ca yā

original: u9.31cd/.jalavadanugatā suvarṇa^varṇā dhanam adhigacchati nimnaśonnatā yā//
analyzed: suvarṇa varṇā dhanam adhigacchati nimnaśas unnatā yā

original: u9.32ab/.dhanam upalabhate surakta^pāṇir vipulamatho ca nirantarāṅguliḥ syāt/
analyzed: upalabhate su rakta pāṇiḥ vipulam atho ca nirantara aṅguliḥ syāt

original: u9.32cd/.bali^puruṣam api tyajeddhi vittaṃ ditavivaśā ca viśīrṇavarṇa^lekhā//
analyzed: api tyajet hi vittam dita vivaśā ca viśīrṇa varṇa lekhā

original: u9.33ab/.apagataghṛta^varṇa^pāṇilekho bhavati naro dhanavān balena yuktaḥ/
u9.33cd/.asubhṛti sadṛśā bhavet tathā bhūṣaṇa^vṛta[rūpavatī śubhā]eka^bhāryā//
analyzed: sadṛśā bhavet tathā bhūṣaṇa vṛta rūpavatī śubhā eka bhāryā

original: u9.34ab/.bhavati bahu^dhano dhanair vihīnaḥ śrutam adhigamya viśālapāṇilekhaḥ/
analyzed: bahu dhanaḥ dhanaiḥ vihīnaḥ śrutam adhigamya viśāla pāṇi lekhaḥ
ahi nīla nirmalābhiḥ kara tala rājibhiḥ īśvaraḥ sa dhanyaḥ

original: u9.36/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin vāyasa^rutaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhāsyāmi tac chrūyatāṃ/
analyzed: khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin vāyasarutam nāma adhyāyam vyākhāsyāmi tat śrūyatām

original: u10.1cd/.jayam parājayaṃ ca^eva lābha^alābhaṃ tathā^eva ca//
analyzed: parājayam ca eva lābha alābham tathā eva ca

original: u10.3ab/.devāḥ pravadanti śreṣṭhā vāyasānāṃ namā namaḥ/
u10.6cd/.asūpaṃ nirdiśed bhojyaṃ guḍamiśraṃ tu gorasaṃ//
analyzed: nirdiśet bhojyam guḍa miśram tu gorasam
sarpiṣā miśram tatra vidyāt na saṃśayaḥ

original: u10.8ab/.rūkṣaṃ nirgharṣate tuṇḍaṃ śiraś ca parimārjati/
u10.8cd/.saphalaṃ vṛkṣam āsthāya dhruvaṃ māṃsena bhojanaṃ//
u10.9cd/.vyādhena ca hataṃ māṃsaṃ nivedayati bhojanaṃ//

analyzed: saṃgrāma bhayam tatra vidyāt na saṃśayaḥ

original: u10.11ab/.śuṣkavṛkṣe niṣīditvā kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vyāharet/
u10.11cd/.kalahaṃ sumahat kṛtvā na ca^arthaṃ tatra sidhyati//
analyzed: su mahat kṛtvā na ca artham tatra sidhyati

original: u10.12ab/.kṣīravṛkṣe niṣīditvā kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vyāharet/
u10.12cd/.krameṇa yugamātreṇa na ccārthaṃ tatra sidhyati//
analyzed: yuga mātreṇa na ca artham tatra sidhyati
sanniveda iti tatra caura bhayam bhavet

original: u10.14cd/.pṛṣṭhena darśayed bhāraṃ kṣudhāpīḍāṃ ca nirdiśet//
analyzed: darśayet bhāram kṣudhā pīḍām ca nirdiśet

original: u10.15ab/.pakṣaṃ vidhūyamāno yaḥ paśyan pathasya vāśati/
u10.15cd/.na tatra gamanaṃ kuryāc cauraiḥ patham upadrutaṃ//
analyzed: tatra gamanam kuryāt cauraiḥ patham upadrutam

original: u10.16ab/.rajjuṃ vā phalakaṃ vā^api yadi karṣati vāyasaḥ/
analyzed: vā phalakam vā api yadi karṣati vāyasaḥ

original: u10.16cd/.na tatra gamanaṃ śreyaś cauraiḥ patham upadrutaṃ//
analyzed: tatra gamanam śreyaḥ cauraiḥ patham upadrutam

original: u10.17ab/.gomaye śuṣkakāṣṭhe vā yadi vāśati vāyasaḥ/
analyzed: śuṣka kāṣṭhe vā yadi vāśati vāyasaḥ

original: u10.17cd/.kalahaḥ kuvaco vyādhir na ca^arthaṃ tatra sidhyati//
analyzed: kuvacaḥ vyādhiḥ na ca artham tatra sidhyati

original: u10.18ab/.tṛṇaṃ vā yadi vā kāṣṭhaṃ darśayec ca yadā khagaḥ/(p.177)
analyzed: vā yadi vā kāṣṭham darśayet ca yadā

original: u10.18cd/.purataḥ śuṣkapāṇis tu tatra caura^bhayaṃ bhavet//
analyzed: śuṣka pāṇiḥ tu tatra caura bhayam bhavet

original: u10.19ab/.sārthopari niṣīditvā kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vyāharet/

analyzed: sārtha madhye asmin caura sainyam na saṃśayaḥ

original: u10.20ab/.yadā pradakṣiṇaṃ trastaṃ vāśanti vividhaṃ khagāḥ/
u10.21ab/.bhītas trastaḥ parītaś ca yas tu vyāharate khagaḥ/
analyzed: trastaḥ parītaḥ ca yaḥ tu vyāharate khagaḥ

original: u10.21cd/.paribādhan diśaḥ sarvās tatra bhayam upasthitaṃ//
u10.22ab/.gacchantaṃ samanugacchet puraḥ sthitvā tu vyāharet/
u10.22cd/.na tatra gamanaṃ kkuryān mārgam atra praśātanaṃ//
analyzed: tatra gamanam kkuryāt mārgam atra praśātanam

original: u10.23ab/.vāstumadhye pratisthāne kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vyāharet/
analyzed: prati sthāne kṣāmam dīnam ca vyāharet

original: u10.23cd/.vyādhiṃ tatra vijānīyād vāse vā gṛha^svāmināṃ//
analyzed: tatra vijānīyāt vāse vā gṛha svāminām

original: u10.24ab/.śakaṭasya yathā śabdaṃ viśrabdhaṃ vāśati vāyasaḥ/

analyzed: ghaṭake ca eva sthālika piṭhareṣu vā

original: u10.25cd/.niṣaṇṇo vāśate kākaḥ prasiddhaṃ gamanaṃ dhruvaṃ//
u10.26ab/.āsane śayane vā^api sthito vāśati vāyasaḥ/
analyzed: śayane vā api sthitaḥ vāśati vāyasaḥ

original: u10.28ab/.brahma^sthāne niṣīditvā kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vāśati/
u10.28cd/.sandhisthāne harec cauras tatra vai nāsti saṃśayaḥ//
analyzed: haret cauraḥ tatra vai na asti saṃśayaḥ
vācam vadet tasya artha lābham vinirdiśet

original: u10.31cd/.yasya yasya haret tasya dravya^lābhaṃ vinirdiśet//
analyzed: yasya haret tasya dravya lābham vinirdiśet

original: u10.32cd/.kāṣṭhaṃ vā vāyasā yatra gṛham āropayanti ca/
analyzed: vā vāyasāḥ yatra gṛham āropayanti ca

original: u10.32ef/.nigadanty atra vijānīyād yācakāt tu mahā^bhayaṃ//
analyzed: atra vijānīyāt yācakāt tu mahā bhayam

original: u10.33ab/.nīlaṃ pītaṃ lohitaṃ ca pratisaṃharaṇāni ca/
u10.33cd/.nigṛhṇanti yatra kākā vyādhiṃ tatra vinirdiśet//
u10.34ab/.grāmante bhayam ākhyāti kāko vā vāśati dhruvaṃ/
analyzed: bhayam ākhyāti kākaḥ vā vāśati dhruvam

original: u10.34cd/.pratyekato vā vāśanti vidyāt tatra mahā^bhayaṃ//
analyzed: vā vāśanti vidyāt tatra mahā bhayam

original: u10.35cd/.niṣīdan saphale vṛkṣe sa vaden māṃsa^bhojanaṃ//
analyzed: sa phale vṛkṣe sa vadet māṃsa bhojanam

original: u10.36ab/.yasya śīrṣe niṣīditvā karṇaṃ karṣati vāyasaḥ/

analyzed: ca audake ca eva snigdha deśeṣu vāśati

original: u10.41ab/.prakāre toraṇa^agre vā yadi vāśati vāyasaḥ/
analyzed: toraṇa agre vā yadi vāśati vāyasaḥ

original: u10.41cd/.abhīkṣṇaṃ gharṣate tuṇḍaṃ saṃgrāmaṃ tatra nirdiśet//
u10.42ab/.maṇḍalāni vāvartāni bahir vā nagarasya ca/
u10.42cd/.vairaṃ ca vigrahaṃ ghoraṃ tatra ca^eva vinirdiśet//
analyzed: ca vigraham ghoram tatra ca eva vinirdiśet

original: u10.43ab/.grāme vā nagare vā^api kurvate yatra maṇḍalaṃ/(p.179)
analyzed: vā nagare vā api kurvate yatra

original: u10.44ab/.pūrveṇa ca^eva grāmasya yadā sūyati vāyasī/
analyzed: ca eva grāmasya yadā sūyati vāyasī

original: u10.45ab/.purastād dakṣiṇe pārśve yadi sūyati vāyasī/
u10.45cd/.varṣati prathame māse paścād devo na varṣati/
analyzed: prathame māse paścāt devaḥ na varṣati

original: u10.47cd/.madhyamaṃ ca bhaved varṣaṃ madhya^śasyaṃ ca jāyate//
analyzed: ca bhavet varṣam madhya śasyam ca jāyate

original: u10.48cd/.aśanir nipatet tatra bhayaṃ ca mṛgapakṣīṇāṃ//
analyzed: nipatet tatra bhayam ca mṛga pakṣīṇām

original: u10.51ab/.yadā tu madhye vṛkṣasya nilayaṃ karoti vāyasī/
analyzed: tu madhye vṛkṣasya nilayam karoti vāyasī

original: u10.52ab/.skandha^mūle tu vṛkṣasya yadā sūyati vāyasī/
u10.52cd/.anāvṛṣṭir bhaved ghorā durbhikṣaṃ tatra nirdiśet//
u10.53ab/.caturaḥ pañca vā potān yadā sūyati vāyasī/
analyzed: pañca vā potān yadā sūyati vāyasī

original: u10.53cd/.subhikṣaṃ ca bhavet tatra phalānām uditaṃ bhavet//
analyzed: ca bhavet tatra phalānām uditam bhavet

original: u10.55/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin dvāra^lakṣaṇaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi tac chrūyatāṃ/
analyzed: khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin dvāralakṣaṇam nāma adhyāyam vyākhyāsyāmi tat śrūyatām

original: u11.1ab/.māhendram atha divyaṃ ca māṅgalyaṃ pūrvataḥ smṛtaḥ/
analyzed: atha divyam ca māṅgalyam pūrvatas smṛtaḥ

original: u11.1cd/.dakṣiṇe tu diśo bhāge pūṣā ca pitryam eva ca//
analyzed: tu diśaḥ bhāge pūṣā ca pitryam eva ca

original: u11.3cd/.atha vai dhanmitraṃ ca paramaṃ maitram eva ca//
analyzed: vai dhanmitram ca paramam maitram eva ca

original: u11.5ab/.samaṃ syāc caturasraṃ ca vistīrṇā ca^eva mṛttikā/
analyzed: syāt catur asram ca vistīrṇā ca eva mṛttikā
vāstu ratha cakra ākṛti ca yat

original: u11.6cd/.rakta^pāṃśur bhaved yatra rājñāṃ tat tu praśasyate//
analyzed: bhavet yatra rājñām tat tu praśasyate

original: u11.7ab/.trikoṇaṃ kuśasaṃstīrṇam uttānaṃ madhuraṃ ca yat/
analyzed: kuśa saṃstīrṇam uttānam madhuram ca yat

original: u11.7cd/.vyāyām ato jalaṃ ca^eva vāstu tasya dhanauṣadhī//
analyzed: atas jalam ca eva vāstu tasya dhana oṣadhī

original: u11.8cd/.anāvāsyaṃ ca tat proktaṃ yac ca putrakṣayāvahaṃ//
analyzed: ca tat proktam yat ca putra kṣaya āvaham

original: u11.9ab/.yat tu kañjalakakṣais tat tyaktaṃ varṣodakena ca/(p.181)
analyzed: tu kañjala kakṣaiḥ tat tyaktam varṣa udakena

original: u11.10cd/.daśa dvādaśakaṃ vaiśye śūdrasya tatra lekhanaṃ//

analyzed: ca agniśālām tu pūrva dakṣiṇatas diśe

original: u11.13ab/.uttarāyāṃ tu kartavyaṃ varcaḥ sthānām anuttaraṃ/
u11.13cd/.aiśānyām eva sarvāṇi prāsādaś ca puromukhaḥ//

analyzed: sura bhavanānām yathā iṣṭam dvārakāṇi api

original: u11.16ab/.vidviṣasya salokasya dvāre syān nu karagrahaḥ/
analyzed: sa lokasya dvāre syāt nu karagrahaḥ

original: u11.16cd/.mahendre pure vā rājyaṃ sūrye sūraprabhāvatā//
analyzed: pure vā rājyam sūrye sūra prabhāva tā
mṛduḥ mṛge sūraḥ antarīkṣe dhana kṣayaḥ
tu bahu vyādhiḥ bhage bhāgya viparyayaḥ

original: u11.18ab/.puṣpe tu subhago nityaṃ vitathe +apy aśubho bhavet/
analyzed: tu subhagaḥ nityam vitathe api aśubhaḥ bhavet

original: u11.18cd/.śoke bhūta^vikāraḥ syāt soṣe tasya viṣaṇṇatā//
analyzed: bhūta vikāraḥ syāt sa uṣe tasya viṣaṇṇa tā

original: u11.19cd/.hrade reṇu pariśrāva āditye tu kalir dhruvaṃ//
analyzed: reṇu pariśrāvaḥ āditye tu kaliḥ dhruvam
nāga bhayam mahaḥ ced dīrgham āyuṣam

original: u11.20cd/.bhaved asya ca yad dvāraṃ tatra^agni^bhayam ādiśet//
analyzed: asya ca yat dvāram tatra agni bhayam ādiśet

original: u11.21ab/.kṣayaṃ vidyāt tasya tasya dhanasya ca kulasya ca/
analyzed: vidyāt tasya tasya dhanasya ca kulasya ca

original: u11.21cd/.yame mṛtyuṃ vijānīyāt kule śreṣṭha^uttamasya ca/
analyzed: mṛtyum vijānīyāt kule śreṣṭha auttamasya ca
t matimān gandharve gandha mālya tā

original: u11.22ab/.bhṛṅge krodhaḥ kaliś ca^eva pitari bhoga^sampadaḥ/
analyzed: krodhaḥ kaliḥ ca eva pitari bhoga sampadaḥ
su alpa dhanam sugrīve rāja pūjitaḥ
dhana avāptiḥ varuṇe jala citra tā

original: u11.23cd/.asurare maraṇaṃ ghoraṃ roge tu bahu^doṣatā//
analyzed: maraṇam ghoram roge tu bahu doṣa tā

original: u11.24ab/.balīṃś ca upahārāṃś ca pravakṣyāṃi yathāgṛhaṃ/
u11.24cd/.cicitrair vidiśair gandhaiḥ praipūjya baliṃ haret//

analyzed: hetu bījāni madhyame arjitam eva tu

original: u11.25cd/.mahendre mukta^puṣpāṇi pāvake ca payo dadhi//
analyzed: mukta puṣpāṇi pāvake ca payaḥ dadhi

original: u11.26ab/.āditye parideyaṃ tu bhaktaṃ ca^eva priyaṅgavaḥ/
analyzed: parideyam tu bhaktam ca eva priyaṅgavaḥ

original: u11.26cd/.antarīkṣe jalaṃ divyaṃ puṣpāṇi jalajāni ca//
analyzed: jalam divyam puṣpāṇi jala jāni ca

original: u11.27ab/.nandā pratipādā jñeyā ṣaṣṭhī trayodaśī jayā/
u11.27cd/.tāsu tāsu dhruvaṃ kuryāt prājño hy evaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ//
analyzed: tāsu dhruvam kuryāt prājñaḥ hi evam vicakṣaṇaḥ
bhoḥ puṣkarasārin dvāra lakṣaṇam nāma adhyāyaḥ

original: u11.29/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin dvādaśa^rāśikaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhāsyāmi/
analyzed: khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin dvādaśarāśikam nāma adhyāyam vyākhāsyāmi

original: u12.2cd/.dvādaśaiva tu cittās te ye loke pracaranti vai//
analyzed: tu cittāḥ te ye loke pracaranti vai

original: u12.3ab/.tān ahaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi śṛṇu tattvena me tataḥ/
analyzed: aham saṃpravakṣyāmi śṛṇu tattvena me tatas

original: u12.3cd/.dvādaśa^eva tu kuryāc ca maṇḍalāni vicakṣaṇaḥ/.
u12.4ab/.prathamaṃ meṣo nāma syād dvitīyaṃ tu vṛṣaḥ smṛtaḥ/
analyzed: meṣaḥ nāma syāt dvitīyam tu vṛṣaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: u12.4cd/.tṛtīyaṃ mithunaṃ nāma caturthaṃ ca^api karkaṭaḥ//
analyzed: mithunam nāma caturtham ca api karkaṭaḥ

original: u12.5ab/.pañcamaṃ ca^api siṃhas tu ṣaṣṭhaṃ kanyā iti smṛtaṃ/
analyzed: siṃhaḥ tu ṣaṣṭham kanyā iti smṛtam

original: u12.5cd/.tulā tu saptamaṃ jñeyā vṛścikas tu tahtāṣṭamaṃ//
u12.6ab/.dnavī tu navamaṃ jñeyā daśamaṃ makaraḥ smṛtaḥ/
analyzed: tu navamam jñeyā daśamam makaraḥ smṛtaḥ

original: u12.6cd/.kumbhaś caikādaśaṃ jñeyo dvādaśaṃ mīna ucyate//
analyzed: ca ekādaśam jñeyaḥ dvādaśam mīnaḥ ucyate

original: u12.7ab/.horā śarīraṃ jātasya dvitīye cintitaṃ dhanaṃ/
u12.7cd/.tṛtīye bhrātura ca^eva caturthe svajanas tathā//
u12.8ab/.cintyate pañcame putraḥ ṣaṣṭhe maṇḍale śatrutā/
analyzed: pañcame putraḥ ṣaṣṭhe maṇḍale śatru tā

original: u12.8cd/.saptame dārasaṃyogo hy aṣṭame naidhanaṃ smṛtaṃ//
analyzed: dāra saṃyogaḥ hi aṣṭame naidhanam smṛtam

original: u12.9ab/.navame cintyate dharmo daśame darmajaṃ phalaṃ/
analyzed: cintyate dharmaḥ daśame darma jam phalam

original: u12.10ab/.ete dvādaśa^cittās tu yathā dṛṣṭā maharṣibhiḥ/
analyzed: dvādaśacittāḥ tu yathā dṛṣṭāḥ mahā ṛṣibhiḥ

original: u12.11ab/.āgastya pṛcchate kaścit prathamaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/(p.184)
u12.11cd/.śiras tu spṛśate yaś ca śabdaś ca upalakṣyate//
