analyzed: tu spṛśate yaḥ ca śabdaḥ ca upalakṣyate

original: u12.12ab/.vyādhitaṃ ca^eva hy ātmānam āgneyāś ca vinaṣṭayaḥ/
analyzed: ca eva hi ātmānam āgneyāḥ ca vinaṣṭayaḥ

original: u12.12cd/.yadi brūyāt tadā tasya ātmārthaṃ cintitaṃ bhavet//
analyzed: brūyāt tadā tasya ātma artham cintitam bhavet

original: u12.13ab/.kāñcanaṃ rajataṃ tāmraṃ lauhaṃ ca^eva bhṛśaṃ havet/
analyzed: rajatam tāmram lauham ca eva bhṛśam havet

original: u12.13cd/.sa ca sarva^gataś ca^eva agnir aśnāti niścitaṃ//
analyzed: ca sarva gataḥ ca eva agniḥ aśnāti niścitam

original: u12.14cd/.yādṛśaś ca bhavec chabdas tādṛśaṃ tena cintitaṃ//
analyzed: ca bhavet śabdaḥ tādṛśam tena cintitam

original: u12.15ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatya dvitīyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
u12.15cd/.grīvāṃ vā parimārjayed galaṃ ca cibukaṃ punaḥ//
analyzed: vā parimārjayet galam ca cibukam punar

original: u12.16ab/.yadi śabdaś ca śrūyeta dṛṣṭā gāvas tathā^eva ca/
analyzed: śabdaḥ ca śrūyeta dṛṣṭāḥ gāvaḥ tathā eva ca

original: u12.16cd/.īdṛśaṃ ca dṛXṭvotpātaṃ gośabdaṃ tatra nirdiśet/
analyzed: ca dṛxṭvā utpātam go śabdam tatra nirdiśet

original: u12.16ef/.atha vā yādṛśaḥ śabdas tādṛśaṃ tena cintitam//
analyzed: vā yādṛśaḥ śabdaḥ tādṛśam tena cintitam

original: u12.17ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatya tṛtīyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
u12.17cd/.mārjayen mukhadeśaṃ tu strī^cittaṃ tasya nirdiśet//
analyzed: mukha deśam tu strī cittam tasya nirdiśet

original: u12.18ab/.atha śabdo bhavet tatra śrūyantāṃ tādṛśās tu te/
analyzed: śabdaḥ bhavet tatra śrūyantām tādṛśāḥ tu te

original: u12.18cd/.jātaṃ prajātam upajātaṃ tathā jāto bhaviṣyati//
u12.19cd/.atha vā yādṛśaḥ śabdas tādṛśaṃ tena cintitaṃ//
analyzed: vā yādṛśaḥ śabdaḥ tādṛśam tena cintitam

original: u12.20ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatya caturthaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
u12.20cd/.kacchapaṃ spṛśate yas tu kalahaṃ tatra nirdiśet/
analyzed: spṛśate yaḥ tu kalaham tatra nirdiśet

original: u12.20ef/.svajanaṃ vyavahāras tu sati kalahe na saṃśayaḥ//
analyzed: vyavahāraḥ tu sati kalahe na saṃśayaḥ

original: u12.21ab/.ākaṭṭā kaṭṭeti śabdā bhavanti ca nirantaraṃ/(p.185)
u12.22ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatya pañcamaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
u12.22cd/.hṛdayaṃ spṛśate yas tu apatyaṃ tatra cintitaṃ//
analyzed: spṛśate yaḥ tu apatyam tatra cintitam
ca vijñeyaḥ para grāma gataḥ mṛtaḥ

original: u12.23cd/.śastra^dravyaṃ ca yat tasya brāhmaṇānaṃ kule sthitaṃ//
analyzed: ca yat tasya brāhmaṇānam kule sthitam

original: u12.24ab/.atha śabdo bhavet tatra yaṃ dṛṣṭvā tu maharṣibhiḥ/
analyzed: śabdaḥ bhavet tatra yam dṛṣṭvā tu mahā ṛṣibhiḥ

original: u12.24cd/.putraputreti yacchabdo yad gataṃ gatam eva ca/
analyzed: yad śabdaḥ yat gatam gatam eva ca

original: u12.25ab/.puruṣaḥ kaś cid āgatya ṣaṣṭhaṃ tu maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
analyzed: kaḥ cit āgatya ṣaṣṭham tu maṇḍalam spṛśet

original: u12.25cd/.spṛśate ca^api pārśvāni gātracintā tu cintitā//
analyzed: ca api pārśvāni gātra cintā tu cintitā

original: u12.26ab/.vigrahas tu mahā^ghoraḥ śatruś ca^api pravadhyate/
analyzed: tu mahā ghoraḥ śatruḥ ca api pravadhyate

original: u12.26cd/.atha vā tatra ye śabdāḥ śrotavyās te na saṃśayaḥ//
analyzed: vā tatra ye śabdāḥ śrotavyāḥ te na saṃśayaḥ

original: u12.27ab/.ayaṃ tu prakṣaraś ca^eva hataś ca vihatas tathā/
analyzed: tu prakṣaraḥ ca eva hataḥ ca vihataḥ tathā

original: u12.27ef/.atha vā yādṛśaḥ śabdas tādṛśaṃ tena cintitaṃ//
analyzed: vā yādṛśaḥ śabdaḥ tādṛśam tena cintitam

original: u12.28ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatāy saptamaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
u12.28cd/.hastena mardayed hastaṃ tathā nāḍīṃ ca mardayed//
analyzed: mardayet hastam tathā nāḍīm ca mardayet

original: u12.29cd/.tatreme bhavanti śabdāḥ śrotavyā bhūmim icchatā//
u12.30ab/.sthitaṃ niviṣṭaṃ vartañ ca kṛtaṃ hasta^gataṃ tathā/
analyzed: niviṣṭam vartam ca kṛtam hasta gatam tathā

original: u12.30ef/.yādṛśo vā śrutaḥ śabdas tādṛśaṃ tena cintitaṃ//
analyzed: vā śrutaḥ śabdaḥ tādṛśam tena cintitam

original: u12.31ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatya aṣṭamaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/(p.186)
u12.31cd/.udaraṃ ca^eva phicakaṃ dve ime parimārjayet//
analyzed: ca eva phicakam dve ime parimārjayet

original: u12.32ab/.nidhanaṃ dṛśyate tasya maraṇaṃ ca^api dṛśyate/
analyzed: dṛśyate tasya maraṇam ca api dṛśyate

original: u12.32cd/.yadi bhaved bhaven mṛtyur yaś ca^anya^priya^saṅgamaḥ//
analyzed: bhavet bhavet mṛtyuḥ yaḥ ca anya priya saṅgamaḥ

original: u12.33ab/.tatreme śabdāḥ śrotavyā mṛta eva bhaviṣyati/
u12.34ab/.puruṣaḥ kaś cid āgatya navamaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
analyzed: kaḥ cit āgatya navamam maṇḍalam spṛśet

original: u12.34cd/.ūruṃ ca spṛśate bhūyā dharma^cintā ca cintitā//
analyzed: ca spṛśate bhūyāḥ dharma cintā ca cintitā

original: u12.35ab/.tatra śabdāś ca śrotavyā bhavanti hi na saṃśayaḥ//
analyzed: śabdāḥ ca śrotavyāḥ bhavanti hi na saṃśayaḥ

original: u12.35cd/.yaja hi yājakaś ca^eva yajamānas tathāiva ca/
analyzed: hi yājakaḥ ca eva yajamānaḥ tathā iva ca

original: u12.36ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatya daśamaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
u12.37ab/.spṛśate jānunī ca^eva karma^cintāṃ tu nirdiśet/
analyzed: jānunī ca eva karma cintām tu nirdiśet

original: u12.37cd/.tatra śabdā ahbvantīme śrotavyāś ca na saṃśayaḥ//
u12.38ab/.bhūmikarma ca kṣetraṃ ca kṣetrakarma tathāiva ca/
analyzed: ca kṣetram ca kṣetra karma tathā iva ca

original: u12.39ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatya ekādaśaṃ tu saṃspṛśet/
u12.39cd/.jaṅghe tu spṛśate bhūyo hy artha^lābhaṃ vinirdiśet//
analyzed: tu spṛśate bhūyas hi artha lābham vinirdiśet

original: u12.40ab/.tatreme śabdāḥ śrotavyā bhavantīha na saṃśayaḥ/
analyzed: śabdāḥ śrotavyāḥ bhavanti iha na saṃśayaḥ

original: u12.41ab/.etādṛśaṃ ravaṃ śrūtvā hiraṇyaṃ tasya nirdiśet/
u12.41cd/.atha vā yādṛśaḥ śabdas tādṛśaṃ phalam ādiśet//
analyzed: vā yādṛśaḥ śabdaḥ tādṛśam phalam ādiśet

original: u12.42ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatya dvādaśaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/(p.187)
u12.42cd/.pādau ca spṛśate pṛcchan cittaṃ vā^apy anarthikaṃ//
analyzed: ca spṛśate pṛcchan cittam vā api anarthikam

original: u12.43ab/.yas tu tac cintito hy artha^āśā āgantukā ca yā/
analyzed: tu tat cintitaḥ hi artha āśā āgantukā ca yā
vā śabdāḥ śrotavyāḥ nimitta jñāna pāragaiḥ

original: u12.44ab/.nirāśaś ca^eva ghoṣaś ca nirāśaṃ tasya nirdiśet/
analyzed: ca eva ghoṣaḥ ca nirāśam tasya nirdiśet

original: u12.44cd/.atha vā yādṛśaḥ śabdas tādṛśaṃ tena cintitaṃ//
analyzed: vā yādṛśaḥ śabdaḥ tādṛśam tena cintitam

original: u12.46/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin kanyā^lakṣaṇaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhāsyāmi/
analyzed: khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin kanyālakṣaṇam nāma adhyāyam vyākhāsyāmi

original: u13.1ab/.tatvaṃ vijñāyate yena yena śubham upasthitaṃ/
u13.1cd/.ninditaṃ ca praśastaṃ ca strīṇāṃ vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇaṃ//
analyzed: ca praśastam ca strīṇām vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam

original: u13.2ab/.pitaraṃ mātaram ca^eva mātulaṃ bhrātaraṃ tathā/
analyzed: mātaram ca eva mātulam bhrātaram tathā
tithi sampanne nakṣatre ca api pūjite

original: u13.3cd/.tad vijñaiḥ saha saṅgamya kanyāṃ paśyeta śāstra^vit//
analyzed: vijñaiḥ saha saṅgamya kanyām paśyeta śāstra vid

original: u13.4ab/.hastau pādau nirīkṣeta nakhāni hy aṅgulīs tathā/
analyzed: pādau nirīkṣeta nakhāni hi aṅgulīḥ tathā

original: u13.4cd/.pāṇilekhāś ca jañghae ca kaṭinābhyūrum eva ca//
u13.5ab/.oṣṭhau jihvāṃ ca dantāṃś ca kapolau nāsikāṃ tathā/
analyzed: jihvām ca dantān ca kapolau nāsikām tathā

original: u13.5cd/.akṣibhravau lalāṭaṃ ca karṇau keśāṃs tathā^eva ca//
analyzed: lalāṭam ca karṇau keśān tathā eva ca

original: u13.6ab/.romarājīṃ savaraṃ varṇaṃ mantritaṃ gatim eva ca/(p.188)
u13.6ef/.tatra pūrvaṃ parīkṣeta svayam eva vicakṣaṇaḥ//
u13.8ab/.avyāvartāś catvāro yasyāḥ sarve ca^eva pradakṣiṇāḥ/
analyzed: catvāraḥ yasyāḥ sarve ca eva pradakṣiṇāḥ

original: u13.9cd/.dhanyān sā janayet putrāṃs teṣāṃ prītiṃ ca bhuñjate//
analyzed: sā janayet putrān teṣām prītim ca bhuñjate

original: u13.10ab/.yasyāḥ pāṇitale vyaktaḥ kacchapaḥ svastiko dhavajaḥ/
u13.10ef/.ekaṃ sā janayet putraṃ taṃ ca rājānam ādiśet//
analyzed: sā janayet putram tam ca rājānam ādiśet
dāsa kule jātā rāja patnī bhaviṣyati
daśanāḥ yasyāḥ sarve go kṣīra pāṇḍarāḥ
kāraṇḍava prekṣā hariṇa akṣī tanu tvacā

original: u13.14ab/.sūkṣmā ca tuṅganāsā ca muktam āraktimodarī/
u13.14cd/.subhrūḥ suvarakeśāntā sā tu kanyā bahu^prajā//
analyzed: suvara keśa antā sā tu kanyā bahu prajā

original: u13.16ab/.yasyāvartau samau snighdau ubhau pārśvau susaṃsthitau/
analyzed: samau snighdau ubhau pārśvau su saṃsthitau

original: u13.18ab/.ūrū jaṅghe ca pārśve ca tathā vikramaḥ saṃsthitaḥ/
analyzed: jaṅghe ca pārśve ca tathā vikramaḥ saṃsthitaḥ

original: u13.18cd/.rakta^ante vipule netre sā kanyā sukhamedhate//
analyzed: vipule netre sā kanyā sukham edhate

original: u13.19cd/.yukta^nāmā tu yā nārī rājānam upatiṣṭhite//

analyzed: pradakṣiṇa āvartā sā kanyā kula vardhinī
na ati hrasvā su pratiṣṭha tanu tvacā

original: u13.22ab/.kānta^jihvā tu yā nārī rakta^uṣṭhī priya^bhāṣiṇī/
analyzed: tu yā nārī rakta oṣṭhī priya bhāṣiṇī
varayet prājñaḥ gṛha artham sukha medhinīm

original: u13.23cd/.sahasrāṇāṃ bahūnāṃ tu svāminī sā bhaviṣyati//
u13.25ab/.kīrtitās tu mayā dhanyā maṅgalya^lakṣaṇāḥ striyaḥ/
analyzed: tu mayā dhanyāḥ maṅgalya lakṣaṇāḥ striyaḥ

original: u13.26ab/.ūrdhva^prekṣī adhaḥprekṣī yā ca tiryak ca prekṣiṇī/
analyzed: adhas prekṣī yā ca tiryak ca prekṣiṇī
piṅgalā ca eva gaurī ca eva atikālikā

original: u13.29cd/.trīṃś ca sā puruṣān hanti devaraṃ śvaśuraṃ patiṃ//
analyzed: ca sā puruṣān hanti devaram śvaśuram patim

original: u13.30ab/.pārśvato roma^rājī tu vinatā ca kaṭir bhavet/
analyzed: romarājī tu vinatā ca kaṭiḥ bhavet

original: u13.30cd/.dīrgham āyur avāpnoti dīrgha^kālaṃ ca duḥkhitā//
analyzed: āyuḥ avāpnoti dīrgha kālam ca duḥkhitā

original: u13.31ab/.kāka^jaṅghā ca yā nārī rakta^akṣī vardhasvarā/
analyzed: ca yā nārī rakta akṣī vardha svarā

original: u13.31cd/.niḥsukhā ca nirāśā ca varjitā naṣṭa^bāndhavā//
analyzed: ca nirāśā ca varjitā naṣṭa bāndhavā
avaśā nārī bahu putrā su duḥkhitā

original: u13.33ab/.yā tu sarva^samācārā mṛd^vaṅgī samatāṃ gatā/
analyzed: tu sarva samācārā mṛdu aṅgī sama tām gatā

original: u13.33cd/.sarvaiḥ samair guṇair yuktā vijñeyā kāma^cāriṇī//
analyzed: samaiḥ guṇaiḥ yuktā vijñeyā kāma cāriṇī

original: u13.34ab/.yasyā roma^cite jaṅghe mukhaṃ ca parimaṇḍalaṃ/
analyzed: roma cite jaṅghe mukham ca parimaṇḍalam

original: u13.34cd/.putraṃ vā bhrātaraṃ vā^api jāram icchati tādṛśī//
analyzed: vā bhrātaram vā api jāram icchati tādṛśī

original: u13.35cd/.uttaroṣṭhe ca romāṇi sā tu bhakṣayate patiṃ//
analyzed: ca romāṇi sā tu bhakṣayate patim

original: u13.36ab/.yasya hastau ca pādāu ca chidrau danta^antarāṇi ca/
analyzed: hastau ca pādau ca chidrau danta antarāṇi ca

original: u13.36cd/.patinā^upārjitaṃ dravyaṃ na tasyā ramate gṛhe//

analyzed: jñeyā duḥkha bahulā sukham na eva adhigacchati

original: u13.38ab/.yasyāḥ kaniṣṭhikā pāde bhūmiṃ na spṛśate +aṅguliḥ/
analyzed: kaniṣṭhikā pāde bhūmim na spṛśate aṅguliḥ

original: u13.38cd/.kaumāraṃ sā patiṃ syaktvā ātmanaḥ kurute priyaṃ//
analyzed: sā patim syaktvā ātmanaḥ kurute priyam

original: u13.39cd/.na sā ramati kaumāraṃ bandhakītvena jīvati//
analyzed: sā ramati kaumāram bandhakī tvena jīvati

original: u13.41ab/.āvartaḥ pṛṣṭhato yasyā nābhī sā ca^anubandhati/(p.191)
u13.41cd/.na sā ramati kaumāraṃ dvitīyaṃ labhate patiṃ//
analyzed: sā ramati kaumāram dvitīyam labhate patim
sthira jālā ca rūkṣa gaṇḍa śiroruhā
rāja kule jātā dāsī tvam adhigacchati

original: u13.43ab/.yasyās tu hasamānāyā gaṇḍe jāyati kūpakaṃ/
u13.43cd/.agnikārye +api sā gatvā kṣipraṃ doṣaṃ kariṣyati//
analyzed: api sā gatvā kṣipram doṣam kariṣyati

original: u13.44ab/.sama^asama^gatā subhrūr gaṇḍa^āvartā ca ya bhavet/
analyzed: su bhrūḥ gaṇḍa āvartā ca bhavet

original: u13.44cd/.pralambhoṣṭhī tu yā nārī naikatra ramate ciraṃ//
analyzed: tu yā nārī na ekatra ramate ciram
sthūla śirāḥ rakta akṣī piṅgala ānanā

original: u13.45cd/.aṣṭau bhakṣayate vīrān navame tiṣṭhate ciraṃ//
u13.46ab/.na devikā na nadikā na ca daivata^nāmikā/
analyzed: devikā na nadikā na ca daivata nāmikā

original: u13.47ab/.nakṣatra^nāmā yā nārī yā ca gotra^sanāmikā/
analyzed: yā nārī yā ca gotra sanāmikā

original: u13.47cd/.suguptā rakṣitā vā^api manasā pāpām ācaret//
analyzed: rakṣitā vā api manasā pāpām ācaret

original: u13.48ab/.dārān vivarjayed etān yā mayā parikīrtitāḥ/
u13.48cd/.praśastā yās tu pūrvoktās tādṛśīyān naraḥ sadā//
analyzed: yāḥ tu pūrva uktāḥ naraḥ sadā
bhoḥ puṣkarasārin kanyā lakṣaṇam nāma adhyāyaḥ

original: u13.51/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin vastra^adhyāyaṃ vyākhāsyāmi/
analyzed: khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin vastra adhyāyam vyākhāsyāmi

original: u14.2ab/.punarvasuś ca dhanyā syāt puṣye vai vastravān bhavet/
analyzed: ca dhanyā syāt puṣye vai vastravān bhavet

original: u14.2cd/.aśleṣāsu bhaven moṣaḥ śmaśānaṃ maghayā vrajet//
u14.3ab/.phālgunīsu bhaved vidyā uttarāsu ca vastravān/
u14.4ab/.svātyāṃ ca śobhanaṃ vastraṃ viśākhā priya^darśanaṃ/
analyzed: ca śobhanam vastram viśākhā priya darśanam

original: u14.5cd/.uttarā mṛṣṭa^bhojī syāc chravaṇe cakṣuṣo rujaṃ//
analyzed: mṛṣṭa bhojī syāt śravaṇe cakṣuṣaḥ rujam
dhana lābhāya aśvinī vastra lābha dā

original: u14.7cd/.bharaṇī ca bhaya^ākīrṇā caura^gamyā ca sā bhavet//
analyzed: ca bhaya ākīrṇā caura gamyā ca sā bhavet

original: u14.8/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin luṅgādhyāyaṃ pravakṣyāmi/
analyzed: khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin luṅga adhyāyam pravakṣyāmi

original: u15.1cd/.yair idaṃ dhriyate viśvaṃ kṛtsnaṃ sthāvara^jaṅgamaṃ//
analyzed: idam dhriyate viśvam kṛtsnam sthāvara jaṅgamam

original: u15.2ab/.vāpayet tu kathaṃ bījaṃ lāṅgalaṃ yojayet kathaṃ/
analyzed: tu katham bījam lāṅgalam yojayet katham
nakṣatra yogeṣu tithi yogeṣu keṣu ca

original: u15.3ab/.śāradaṃ vā^atha graiṣmaṃ tu kasmin māse tu vāpayet/
analyzed: vā atha graiṣmam tu kasmin māse tu vāpayet

original: u15.3cd/.nimittaṃ kati śasyante kāni vā parivarjayet/
u15.3ef/.kasya vā dāpayed dhūpaṃ kena mantreṇa dāpayet//
analyzed: vā dāpayet dhūpam kena mantreṇa dāpayet

original: u15.4cd/.tadā nāga^mukhī luṅgā dahati citra^mukhy api//
u15.5ab/.darbha^sūcī^mukhī vā^api kāraṇaṃ tatra ko bhavet/
analyzed: vā api kāraṇam tatra kaḥ bhavet

original: u15.5cd/.kati saubhikṣikā luṅgaḥ kati daurbhikṣikāḥ smṛtāḥ/
u15.5ef/.kati varṇāḥ samākhyātāḥ kati varṇā nidarśitāḥ//
u15.6cd/.nirghāto vā bhavet tīvro +athavā^api medinī calet//
analyzed: vā bhavet tīvraḥ athavā api medinī calet

original: u15.7ab/.śasyaṃ phalasya kiṃ tatra nimittam upalakṣayet/
u15.7cd/.sarvam etat samāsena śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ//
u15.8ab/.puṣkarasāriṇo brāhmaṇasya vacanaṃ śrūtvā triśaṅku^mātaṅga^adhipatir idaṃ vacanam abravīt/
analyzed: brāhmaṇasya vacanam śrūtvā triśaṅku mātaṅga adhipatiḥ idam vacanam abravīt

original: u15.9cd/.sāgarād amṛtaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ manthite tu samudbhavaṃ//
u15.10ab/.amṛte bhakṣyamāṇe tu bhāgaṃ prārthitavān dvijaḥ/(p.194)
u15.10cd/.tato dattāḥ surair bhāgā amṛtād daśavindavaḥ//
analyzed: dattāḥ suraiḥ bhāgāḥ amṛtāt daśa vindavaḥ

original: u15.11ab/.tata utpannā ime bījā bhuvi loka^sukha^āvahāḥ/
analyzed: utpannāḥ ime bījāḥ bhuvi loka sukha āvahāḥ

original: u15.12ab/.śyāmakaṃ saptamaṃ vidyād ikṣuś ca^aṣṭamakaḥ smṛtaḥ/
analyzed: saptamam vidyāt ikṣuḥ ca aṣṭamakaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: u15.12cd/.śeṣās tu saṅgatā jātā bahavaḥ śasya^jātayaḥ//
analyzed: tu saṅga tā jātāḥ bahavaḥ śasya jātayaḥ
sarveṣu ye ca anye sattva jātayaḥ
navamaḥ vinduḥ sarva dehe amṛtaḥ abhavat

original: u15.13ef/.mūleṣu ca^eva sarveṣu vindur ekaḥ prapātitaḥ//
analyzed: ca eva sarveṣu vinduḥ ekaḥ prapātitaḥ

original: u15.15ab/.kārttike mārgaśīrṣe vā grīāma dhānyāni vāpayet/
u15.16ab/.trayodaśyāṃ dvitīyāyāṃ tathā hi navamīṣu ca/
u15.16cd/.viśeṣatas tu nimneṣu sarva^bījāni hy utsṛjet//
analyzed: tu nimneṣu sarva bījāni hi utsṛjet
maitre anurādhe ca dhaniṣṭhā śravaṇāsu ca

original: u15.19ab/.grāma^kṣetre ca yad bījaṃ gṛhe ca gṛha^devatā/
analyzed: ca yat bījam gṛhe ca gṛha devatā

original: u15.20ab/.brāhmaṇaṃ kṣatriyaṃ kanyām arciṣmantaṃ ca pāvakaṃ/(p.195)
u15.20cd/.vāraṇa^indraṃ vṛṣaṃ ca^eva hayaṃ vā svabhyalaṃkṛtaṃ//
analyzed: vṛṣam ca eva hayam vā su abhyalaṃkṛtam

original: u15.21ab/.pūrṇa^kumbhaṃ dhvajaṃ chatram āmāmāṃsaṃ surāṃ tathā/
analyzed: dhvajam chatram āma amāṃsam surām tathā

original: u15.21cd/.uddhṛtāṃ dhāraṇīṃ ca^eva baddham eka^paśuṃ dadhi//
analyzed: dhāraṇīm ca eva baddham eka paśum dadhi

original: u15.22ab/.cakra^ārūḍhaṃ ca śakaṭaṃ kāka^ārūḍhāṃ ca sūkarīṃ/
analyzed: ca śakaṭam kāka ārūḍhām ca sūkarīm

original: u15.23ab/.sarve dakṣiṇato dhanyāḥ puraś ca mṛga^pakṣiṇaḥ/
analyzed: dakṣiṇatas dhanyāḥ puras ca mṛga pakṣiṇaḥ

original: u15.24ab/.ajo vā vāmataḥ śasyo jambukaś ca praśasyate/
analyzed: vā vāmatas śasyaḥ jambukaḥ ca praśasyate

original: u15.24cd/.vikṛtaṃ kubja^kuṣṭhiṃ ca mukhaṃ śmaśrudharaṃ tathā//
analyzed: kubja kuṣṭhim ca mukham śmaśru dharam tathā
nirbhartsitam dīnam śoka ārtam vyādhi pīḍitam

original: u15.25ef/.dṛṣṭvā nivartayed bījaṃ punar grāmaṃ praveśayet//
u15.26cd/.śrūtvā hy etāni vrajatāṃ sasya^sampattim ādiśet//
analyzed: hi etāni vrajatām sasya sampattim ādiśet

original: u15.27ab/.rāśisthaṃ grathitaṃ dhautaṃ svasthamaṃ kuritaṃ tathā/
u15.27cd/.śrūtvā saṃmārjitaṃ ca^eva ity āśukṛtinaṃ viduḥ//
analyzed: saṃmārjitam ca evaḥ iti āśukṛtinam viduḥ

original: u15.28ab/.śrūtvā mlānaṃ ca śuṣkaṃ ca manda^vṛṣṭiṃ ca nirdiśet/
analyzed: mlānam ca śuṣkam ca manda vṛṣṭim ca nirdiśet

original: u15.28cd/.śrūtvā nivartayed bījaṃ punar grāmaṃ praveśayet//
u15.29ab/.nīyamānaṃ ca yad bījaṃ varṣate yadi vāsavaḥ/
analyzed: ca yat bījam varṣate yadi vāsavaḥ

original: u15.29cd/.svayam eva tu tac chasyaṃ kāmaṃ kālena bhujyate//
analyzed: eva tu tat śasyam kāmam kālena bhujyate

original: u15.30ab/.nīyamānaṃ ca yad bījaṃ kampate yadi medinī/
analyzed: ca yat bījam kampate yadi medinī

original: u15.30cd/.bhramyate karṣakaḥ sthānān na tac chakyaṃ tu vāpituṃ//
analyzed: karṣakaḥ sthānāt na tat śakyam tu vāpitum
vā vyākulam kuryāt rāja daṇḍa nikṛntati

original: u15.32cd/.dṛṣṭvā nivartayed bījaṃ punar grāmaṃ niveśayet//
u15.33cd/.kṛtvā suvipulāṃ vedīṃ darbhān āstīrya sarvataḥ/
analyzed: su vipulām vedīm darbhān āstīrya sarvatas

original: u15.34cd/.veda^śāntiṃ japet pūrvaṃ śasyāśāntim ataḥ praṃ/
analyzed: japet pūrvam śasyā śāntim atas praṃ

original: u15.35ab/.jayet pārāśaraṃ pūrvaṃ priyataṃ vācayed dvijaiḥ/
u15.35cd/.prathamaṃ prāṅmukhaṃ bījaṃ prakṣiped uttare +atha vā//
analyzed: prāc mukham bījam prakṣipet uttare atha vā

original: u15.36ab/.pipīlikā yadā kṣetre bījaṃ kurvanti saṅcayaṃ/
u15.36cd/.suvṛṣṭiṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca sarva^sasyeṣu sampadā/
analyzed: ca subhikṣam ca sarva sasyeṣu sampadā

original: u15.37ab/.haranti cet tṛṇād bījaṃ tṛṇe śasya^apahā api/
analyzed: ced tṛṇāt bījam tṛṇe śasya apahāḥ api

original: u15.37cd/.prasparaṃ ca hiṃsanti dhānyaṃ ca nidhanaṃ vrajet//
analyzed: ca hiṃsanti dhānyam ca nidhanam vrajet

original: u15.38cd/.dṛṣṭvā tu sañcayaṃ nimne +anāvṛṣṭiṃ ca nirdiśet//
analyzed: tu sañcayam nimne anāvṛṣṭim ca nirdiśet

original: u15.39ab/.yadā tu proṣitaṃ bījaṃ sapta^rātreṇa jāyate/
analyzed: tu proṣitam bījam sapta rātreṇa jāyate

original: u15.39cd/.suvṛṣṭiṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca sarva^śasyeṣu sampadā//
analyzed: ca subhikṣam ca sarva śasyeṣu sampadā

original: u15.40ab/.yadā tu proṣitaṃ bījam ardha^māsena jāyate/
analyzed: tu proṣitam bījam ardha māsena jāyate

original: u15.40cd/.alpaṃ niṣpadyate śasyaṃ durbhikṣaṃ ca^atra jāyate//
analyzed: niṣpadyate śasyam durbhikṣam ca atra jāyate

original: u15.41ab/.tri^rātrāc catūrātrād vā yadi luṅgaḥ prajāyate/
analyzed: catur rātrāt vā yadi luṅgaḥ prajāyate
bhavet tatra para cakra bhayam viduḥ

original: u15.42ab/.luṅgasya tu ye pādāḥ pañca sapta navā tathā/
analyzed: tu ye pādāḥ pañca sapta navā tathā

original: u15.42cd/.suvṛṣṭiṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca sarva^sasyeṣu sampadā//
analyzed: ca subhikṣam ca sarva sasyeṣu sampadā

original: u15.43ab/.syāl luṅgasya tu ye pādāś catvāroṣṭapadā^atha vā/(p.197)
analyzed: luṅgasya tu ye pādāḥ catvāraḥ aṣṭa padāḥ atha

original: u15.43cd/.alpaṃ niṣpadyate śasyaṃ durbhikṣaṃ ca^atra nirdiśet//
analyzed: niṣpadyate śasyam durbhikṣam ca atra nirdiśet

original: u15.44ab/.luṅgasya yadi pādās tu dṛśyante dvādaśa kvacit/
analyzed: yadi pādāḥ tu dṛśyante dvādaśa kvacid

original: u15.44cd/.kvacin niṣpadyate śasyaṃ drubhikṣaṃ kvacid ādiśet/
u15.45ab/.yadā pūrva^mūkhī luṅgā kṣemaṃ vṛṣṭiṃ ca nirdiśet/
analyzed: pūrva mūkhī luṅgā kṣemam vṛṣṭim ca nirdiśet

original: u15.45cd/.yadā paścān mukhī luṅgā ativṛṣṭiṃ ca nirdeśet//
analyzed: paścāt mukhī luṅgā ativṛṣṭim ca nirdeśet

original: u15.47cd/.kvacin niṣpadyate śasyaṃ durbhikṣaṃ tatra nirdiśet//
u15.48ab/.yadā nāga^mukhī luṅgā dṛśyate yatra vā kavcit/
analyzed: nāgamukhī luṅgā dṛśyate yatra vā kavcit

original: u15.48cd/.kvacin niśyadyate śasyaṃ durbhikṣaṃ ca^atra nirdiśet/
u15.48ef/.tatra^aśani^bhayaṃ ca^api bhayaṃ meghān na saṃśayaḥ//
analyzed: ca api bhayam meghāt na saṃśayaḥ

original: u15.50ab/.nākṛṣer dharmam āpnoti nākṛṣeḥ sukham āpnuyāt/
analyzed: dharmam āpnoti na ākṛṣeḥ sukham āpnuyāt

original: u15.50cd/.dharmam arthaṃ tathā kāmaṃ sarvaṃ prāpnoti karṣakaḥ//
analyzed: artham tathā kāmam sarvam prāpnoti karṣakaḥ

original: u15.52ab/.punar api puṣkarasārī brāhmaṇas triśaṅkuṃ mātaṅga^adhipatim etad avocat/
analyzed: api puṣkarasārī brāhmaṇaḥ triśaṅkum mātaṅga adhipatim etat avocat

original: u15.53ab/.kathaṃ pṛthivyāṃ nāgāś ca kena vā vinivāritāḥ/(p.198)
u15.54ab/.kutaś ca^abhrāṇi jāyante nānā^varṇā diśo daśa/
analyzed: caabhrāṇi jāyante nānā varṇāḥ diśaḥ daśa

original: u15.54cd/.kasya^eṣa mahataḥ śabdaḥ śrūyate dundubhis varaḥ//
u15.55ab/.ko hi sṛjati durbhikṣaṃ subhikṣaṃ ca^eva prāṇināṃ/
analyzed: hi sṛjati durbhikṣam subhikṣam ca eva prāṇinām

original: u15.55cd/.kas tatra sa muni^śreṣṭho nāma gotraṃ bravīhi me//
analyzed: tatra sa muni śreṣṭhaḥ nāma gotram bravīhi me

original: u15.56ab/.daivatāni ca me brūhi vidhānāni svayambhuvaḥ/
u15.56cd/.yajñaṃ ca yajña^bhāgaṃ ca hotavyaś ca yathā baliḥ//
analyzed: ca yajñabhāgam ca hotavyaḥ ca yathā baliḥ

original: u15.57ab/.pṛthivyāṃ daivataṃ brūhi āśrame daivataṃ brūhi/
u15.57cd/.deve tu daivataṃ brūhi kena devo sā kalpitā//
analyzed: tu daivatam brūhi kena sā kalpitā

original: u15.58cd/.karake daivataṃ brūhi tathā sthālyāṃ ca daivataṃ//
analyzed: daivatam brūhi tathā sthālyām ca daivatam

original: u15.59cd/.vāyu^skandhaiś ca katibhiḥ śukro vegaṃ pramuñcati//
u15.60ab/.atha triśaṅkur mātaṅga^adhipatir brāhmaṇaṃ puṣkarasāriṇam etad avocat/
analyzed: triśaṅkuḥ mātaṅga adhipatiḥ brāhmaṇam puṣkarasāriṇam etat avocat

original: u15.61ab/.pṛthivī vā vāyur ākāśam apo jyotiś ca pañcamaṃ/
analyzed: vā vāyuḥ ākāśam apaḥ jyotiḥ ca pañcamam

original: u15.61cd/.tatra saṃvartate piṇḍaṃ tato meghaḥ pravartate//
u15.62ab/.eṣa vyāpnoti ca^ākāśaṃ vāyunā janyate ghanaḥ/
analyzed: vyāpnoti ca ākāśam vāyunā janyate ghanaḥ

original: u15.63cd/.vāyur nabho garjayate agnir vidyotate diśaḥ//
u15.64ab/.marutā kṣipyate piṇḍaṃ sannipātaś ca garjate/(p.199)
u15.64cd/.virodhanaṃ tu vāyoś ca agnaś ca anilasya ca//
analyzed: tu vāyoḥ ca agnaḥ ca anilasya ca

original: u15.65ab/.ākāśe vartate piṇḍaṃ paścāt patati medinīṃ/
u15.66cd/.yatra satyaṃ ca dharmaś ca havirmeghaś ca vartate//
analyzed: satyam ca dharmaḥ ca haviḥ meghaḥ ca vartate

original: u15.67ef/.dantāśanī tṛtīyā tu aśanis tu caturthikā//
u15.68ab/.pañcamī krimayaḥ proktāḥ ṣaṣṭhī tu śalabhās tathā/
analyzed: krimayaḥ proktāḥ ṣaṣṭhī tu śalabhāḥ tathā

original: u15.69/.navamī sambaraḥ proktā ity āha bhagavāms triśaṅkuḥ/
analyzed: sambaraḥ proktāḥ iti āha bhagavān triśaṅkuḥ

original: u15.70ab/.etāstv aśanyo vyākhyātās tāsāṃ vai devatāḥ śṛṇu/
analyzed: aśanyaḥ vyākhyātāḥ tāsām vai devatāḥ śṛṇu
brahma sṛṣṭā eṣā jyeṣṭha ādya devatā

original: u15.71ab/.dantāśanī tu sainyānāṃ grahā vātāśanī smṛtā/
u15.73ab/.[samba]rasya tu parjanyam ākhyātāḥ nava devatāḥ/

analyzed: devatāḥ proktāḥ ākāśa gamana artham bodhata
adhi indra daivatyam dakṣiṇaḥ yama daivatam

original: u15.74cd/.varuṇaṃ paścime vidyād uttare dhanadaḥ smṛtaḥ/(p.200)
u15.74ef/..... tyā daivataṃ viZṇur āśramaṃ viśva^daivataṃ//
analyzed: tyāḥ daivatam vijṇuḥ āśramam viśva daivatam

original: u15.77ef/.vāyu^skandhaiś caturbhis tu śukro vegaṃ pramuñcati//
punar api puṣkarasārī brāhmaṇas triśaṅkum evam āha/
analyzed: punar api puṣkarasārī brāhmaṇaḥ triśaṅkum evam āha

original: u15.80ab/.kim artham āśrame nityaṃ hūyate havya^vāhanaḥ/
u15.81ef/.praśamec ca samāsena tad bhava^arthaṃ tu ..... //
analyzed: ca samāsena tat bhava artham tu

original: u15.82/.evam ukte triśaṅkur mātaṅga^adhipatir brāhmaṇaṃ puṣkarasāriṇam etad avocat/
analyzed: ukte triśaṅkuḥ mātaṅga adhipatiḥ brāhmaṇam puṣkarasāriṇam etat avocat

original: u16.2cd/.tatra dagdhā anekā hi nāgāḥ koṭī^sahasraśaḥ//
analyzed: dagdhāḥ aneke hi nāgāḥ koṭī sahasraśas
mahā uraga gaṇāḥ yakṣa rākṣasa pannagāḥ
kṛtāḥ kecid vāhu hīnāḥ kṛta apare
karṇa nāsābhyām kṛtam ca eva akṣi pātanam

original: u16.4cd/.tadā^prabhṛti bhūtānāṃ dṛṣṭaṃ vai trāsitaṃ manaḥ//
u16.5ab/.agninā tāpitāḥ kecid vāṇair anye ca sūditāḥ/
analyzed: tāpitāḥ kecid vāṇaiḥ anye ca sūditāḥ

original: u16.7ab/.sahāmpatis tu nāmnā sa śasya^kāle tadāśrame/
analyzed: tu nāmnā sa śasya kāle tad āśrame

original: u16.8cd/.dig^bhāgeṣu ca bhūtānāṃ teṣām arthaṃ dine dine//
analyzed: ca bhūtānām teṣām artham dine dine
satatam vahnim āśrama sthaḥ api dhārayet

original: u16.10ab/.sadhūmlaṃ jvalitaṃ dṛṣṭvā dīpyamānaṃ tu pāvakaṃ/

analyzed: paricarataḥ asya śasya pālasya ca āśrame

original: u16.13/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin tithi^karma^nirdeśaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
analyzed: khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin tithikarmanirdeśam nāma adhyāyam vyākhyāsyāmi
kathitā riktā grāma sainya vadhe hitā
tu pañcamī jñeyā cikitsā āgamana adhvasu
kṣetre vivāhe vā avāha karmasu mitra eti

original: u17.6ab/.bhadrā ca saptamī khyātā śreṣṭhā sā saukṛte +adhvani/
analyzed: ca saptamī khyātā śreṣṭhā sā saukṛte adhvani

original: u17.6cd/.nṛpāṇāṃ śāsane chatre śayyānāṃ karaṇeṣu ca//
u17.8ab/.agrasenā tu navamī tasyāṃ kuryād ripu^kṣayaṃ/
analyzed: tu navamī tasyām kuryāt ripu kṣayam
daśamī śastā śāstra ārambhe dhana udyate
punar mānyā strīṣu ca māṃsa madyayoḥ

original: u17.10cd/.kārayen nagaraṃ guptaṃ vivāhaṃ śāstra^karma ca//
analyzed: nagaram guptam vivāham śāstra karma ca

original: u17.11ab/.yaśeti dvādaśīmm āhur vaire +adhvani ca garhitā/
analyzed: dvādaśīm āhuḥ vaire adhvani ca garhitā

original: u17.11cd/.vivāhe ca girau kṣetre gṛha^kramasu pūjitā//
analyzed: ca girau kṣetre gṛha kramasu pūjitā

original: u17.12ab/.jayā trayodaśī sādhvī maṇḍaleṣu ca yoṣitāṃ/(p.203)
u17.13ab/.ugrā caturdaśī tu syāt kārayed abhicārakaṃ/
u17.13cd/.vadha^bandha^prayogāṃś ca pūrvaṃ ca prahared api//

analyzed: pañcadaśī sādhvī devatā agni vidhau hitā

original: u17.15ab/.nanda^ādīnāṃ kriyā pūrve ṣaṣṭhy^ādīnāṃ tu madhyame/
analyzed: kriyā pūrve ṣaṣṭhī ādīnām tu madhyame

original: u17.17/.api ca mahā^brāhmaṇa idaṃ pūrva^nivāsa^anusmṛti^jñāna^sākṣāt kriyāyāṃ vidyāyāṃ cittam abhinirṇayāmi nivartayāmi/
analyzed: ca mahābrāhmaṇaḥ idam pūrva nivāsa anusmṛti jñāna sākṣāt kriyāyām vidyāyām cittam abhinirṇayāmi nivartayāmi

original: u17.18/.syāt te brāhmaṇa kākṣā vā vimatir vā anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena brahmā devānāṃ pravaro +abhūt/
analyzed: te brāhmaṇa kākṣāḥ vā vimatiḥ vai anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena brahmā devānām pravaraḥ abhūt

original: aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena brahmā devānāṃ pravaro +abhūvaṃ/
analyzed: aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena brahmā devānām pravaraḥ abhūvam

original: so +ahaṃ tataś cyutaḥ samāna indraḥ kauśiko +abhūvaṃ/
analyzed: saḥ aham tatas cyutaḥ samānaḥ indraḥ kauśikaḥ abhūvam
tatas cyutaḥ samānaḥ araṇemiḥ gautamaḥ abhūvam

original: tataś cyutaḥ samānaḥ śvetaketur nāma maharṣir abhūvaṃ/
analyzed: tatas cyutaḥ samānaḥ śvetaketuḥ nāma mahā ṛṣiḥ abhūvam
tatas cyutaḥ samānaḥ śuka paṇḍitaḥ abhūvam

original: mayā te tadā brāhmaṇa catvāro vedā vibhaktāḥ/
analyzed: mayā te tadā brāhmaṇa catvāraḥ vedāḥ vibhaktāḥ

original: u17.19/.(p.204)tad yathā puṣyo bahavṛcānāṃ paṃktiś chandogānāṃ/
syāt tava brāhmaṇa kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena vasur nāma maharṣir abhūt/
analyzed: syāt tava brāhmaṇa kāṅkṣā vā vimatiḥ vā anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena vasuḥ nāma mahā ṛṣiḥ abhūt

original: aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena vasur nāma maharṣir abhūvaṃ/
analyzed: aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena vasuḥ nāma mahā ṛṣiḥ abhūvam

original: mayā sā takṣakavadhūkāyāḥ kapilā nāma māṇivikā
analyzed: mayā sā takṣaka vadhūkāyāḥ kapilā nāma māṇivikā

original: so +ahaṃ tatra saṃrakta^citta ṛddhyā bhraṣṭo dhyānebhyo vañcitaḥ parihīnaḥ/
analyzed: saḥ aham tatra saṃrakta cittaḥ ṛddhyā bhraṣṭaḥ dhyānebhyaḥ vañcitaḥ parihīnaḥ

original: so +aham ātmānaṃ jugupsamānas tasyāṃ velāyām imāṃ gāthāṃ babhāṣe/
analyzed: saḥ aham ātmānam jugupsamānaḥ tasyām velāyām imām gāthām babhāṣe
tat savituḥ vareṇyam bhargā devasya dhīmahi

original: u17.20/.so +ahaṃ brāhmaṇa tvāṃ bravīmi sāmānya^saṃjñā mātrakam idaṃ lokasya brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra iti vā/
analyzed: aham brāhmaṇa tvām bravīmi sāmānya saṃjñā mātrakam idam lokasya brāhmaṇaḥ iti vā kṣatriyaḥ iti vā vaiśyaḥ iti vā śūdraḥ iti vā

original: ekam eva^idaṃ sarvaṃ sarvam idam ekaṃ/
analyzed: ekam eva edam sarvam sarvam idam ekam

original: putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ duhitaram anuprayaccha bhāryā^arthāya/
analyzed: putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtim duhitaram anuprayaccha bhāryā arthāya
yāvatakam kula śulkam manyase tāvatakam anupradāsyāmi

original: idaṃ ca vacanaṃ punaḥ śrūtvā triśaṅkor mātaṅga^rājasya
analyzed: idam ca vacanam punar śrūtvā triśaṅkoḥ mātaṅga rājasya

original: u17.21ab/.bhagavān śrotriyaḥ śreṣṭhas tvatto bhūyān na vidyate/
analyzed: śrotriyaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ tvattaḥ bhūyāt na vidyate

original: u17.22cd/.śārdūlakarṇaḥ prakṛtis tu bhadrā ubhau rametāṃ rucitaṃ mama^idaṃ/
analyzed: prakṛtiḥ tu bhadrā ubhau rametām rucitam mama edam

original: u17.23/.tatra tāni pañca^mātrāṇi māṇavaka^śatāni uccaiḥ śabdāni procur mahā^śabdāni/
analyzed: tāni pañca mātrāṇi māṇavaka śatāni uccais śabdāni procuḥ mahā śabdāni

original: mā tvaṃ bho upādhyāya vidyamāneṣu brāhmaṇeṣu cāṇḍālena sārdhaṃ sambandhaṃ rocaya/
analyzed: mā tvam bho upādhyāya vidyamāneṣu brāhmaṇeṣu cāṇḍālena sārdham sambandham rocaya

original: na^arhasi bho upādhyāya vidyamāneṣu brāhmaṇeṣu cāṇḍālena sārdhaṃ sambandhaṃ kartum/
analyzed: na arhasi bho upādhyāya vidyamāneṣu brāhmaṇeṣu cāṇḍālena sārdham sambandham kartum

original: u17.24/.atha brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī teṣāṃ nidānaṃ nidāya śabdaṃ saṃsthāpya nipatya ślokena^etān arthān abhāṣata/
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī teṣām nidānam nidāya śabdam saṃsthāpya nipatya ślokena etān arthān abhāṣata

original: u17.25ab/.evam etad yathā hy eṣa triśaṅkur bhāṣate giraṃ/
analyzed: etat yathā hi eṣa triśaṅkuḥ bhāṣate giram

original: u17.25cd/.tatvaṃ hy avitathaṃ bhūtaṃ satyam nityaṃ tathā dhruvaṃ//
analyzed: hi avitatham bhūtam satyam nityam tathā dhruvam

original: u17.26/.atha brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī teṣāṃ māṇavakānāṃ taṃ mahāntaṃ śabdaṃ saṃsthāpya (p.206)
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī teṣām māṇavakānām tam mahāntam śabdam saṃsthāpya

original: ayaṃ bhos triśaṅko brahmaṇā sahāpatinā cāturmahā^bhautiko mahā^puruṣaḥ prajñaptaḥ/ yasya/
analyzed: ayam bhoḥ triśaṅkaḥ brahmaṇā sahā patinā cāturmahābhautikaḥ mahā puruṣaḥ prajñaptaḥ yasya

original: u17.27ab/.śiraḥ satāraṃ gaganam ākāśam udaraṃ tathā/
analyzed: sa tāram gaganam ākāśam udaram tathā

original: u17.27cd/.parvatāś ca^apy ubhāv ūrū pādau ca dharaṇī^talaṃ//
analyzed: ubhau ūrū pādau ca dharaṇī talam

original: u17.28cd/.sāgarāś ca^apy amedhyaṃ vai nadyo sūtra^sravo +asya tu//
analyzed: ca api amedhyam vai nadyoḥ sūtra sravaḥ asya tu

original: u17.29ab/.aśrūṇi varṣaṇaṃ cārasya eṣa brahmā sahāpatiḥ/
analyzed: varṣaṇam cārasya eṣa brahmā sahā patiḥ

original: u17.29cd/.bhavāṃs tu parama^jño +asi tan me brūhi yathā tathā//
analyzed: tu parama jñaḥ asi tat me brūhi yathā tathā

original: u17.30/.iha bhos triśaṅko kim āha svalakṣaṇaṃ brahmaṇaḥ pratyavekṣasva/
analyzed: bhoḥ triśaṅko kim āha sva lakṣaṇam brahmaṇaḥ pratyavekṣasva

original: pitrā ca mātrā ca kṛtāni karmāṇi bhavanti/
analyzed: pitrā ca mātrā ca kṛtāni karmāṇi bhavanti

original: u17.31ab/.gacchanti sattvā bahu^garbha^yoniṃ na ca^eva kaścin manujo hy ayoniḥ/
analyzed: sattvāḥ bahu garbha yonim na ca eva kaścid manujaḥ hi ayoniḥ

original: u17.31cd/.samasta jātau pracaranti sattvā na mārutāj jāyate kaścid eva//
analyzed: jātau pracaranti sattvāḥ na mārutāt jāyate kaścid eva

original: u17.32ab/.svabhāva^bhāvyaṃ hy avagaccha loke ke brāhmaṇa^kṣatriya^vaiśya^śūdrāḥ/
analyzed: hi avagaccha loke ke brāhmaṇa kṣatriya vaiśya śūdrāḥ

original: u17.32cd/.sarvatra kāṇāḥ kuṇinaś ca khañjāḥ kuṣṭhī kilāsī hy apasmāriṇo 'pi//
analyzed: kāṇāḥ kuṇinaḥ ca khañjāḥ kuṣṭhī kilāsī hi apasmāriṇaḥ pi

original: u17.33ab/.kṛṣṇāś ca gaurāś ca tathā^eva śyāmāḥ sattvāḥ prajā hy anyatame viśiṣṭāḥ/(p.207)
analyzed: ca gaurāḥ ca tathā eva śyāmāḥ sattvāḥ prajāḥ hi anyatame

original: u17.33cd/.saha^asthi^carmāḥ sanakhāḥ samāṃsā duḥkhī sukhī mūtra^purīṣa^yuktāḥ/
analyzed: sa nakhāḥ sa māṃsāḥ duḥkhī sukhī mūtra purīṣa yuktāḥ

original: u17.33ef/.na ca^indriyāṇāṃ praviviktir asti tasmān na varṇāś caturo bhavanti//
analyzed: ca aindriyāṇām praviviktiḥ asti tasmāt na varṇāḥ caturaḥ bhavanti

original: u17.34ab/.mantrair hi yadi labhyeta svargaṃ tu gamanaṃ dvijaḥ/
analyzed: hi yadi labhyeta svargam tu gamanam dvijaḥ

original: u17.34ef/.yasmāt kṛṣṇāni śuklāni karmāṇi saphalāni hi/
analyzed: kṛṣṇāni śuklāni karmāṇi sa phalāni hi

original: u17.35/.mānavaka^śateṣu sa tatra vinihato mahā^yaśasā triśaṅkunā puṣkarasārī brāhmaṇo +abravīt/
analyzed: sa tatra vinihataḥ mahā yaśasā triśaṅkunā puṣkarasārī brāhmaṇaḥ abravīt
brāhmaṇaḥ asau mātaṅga rājaḥ hi triśaṅkuḥ nāma

original: bhavān hi brahmā indraś ca kauśikaḥ/
analyzed: bhavān hi brahmā indraḥ ca kauśikaḥ
bhagavān vasu rājarṣiḥ mahā yaśāḥ bhagavān

original: u17.36ab/.jñānena hi tvaṃ parameṇa yuktaḥ svaṣu śāstreṣu bhavān kṛtārthaḥ/
analyzed: hi tvam parameṇa yuktaḥ svaṣu śāstreṣu bhavān kṛtārthaḥ

original: u17.36cd/.śreṣṭho viśiṣṭo paramo +asi loke bhavān hi vidyā^caraṇena yuktaḥ//
analyzed: viśiṣṭaḥ paramaḥ asi loke bhavān hi vidyā caraṇena yuktaḥ

original: u17.37ab/.dadāmi te +ahaṃ prakṛtiṃ mamāmalāṃ śīlena rūpeṇa guṇair upetaḥ/
analyzed: te aham prakṛtim mama amalām śīlena rūpeṇa guṇaiḥ upetaḥ

original: u17.37cd/.śārdūlakarṇaḥ prakṛtiś ca bhadrā ubhau rametaṃ rucitaṃ mama^idaṃ//
analyzed: prakṛtiḥ ca bhadrā ubhau rametam rucitam mama edam

original: u17.38ab/.pragṛhya bhṛṅgāram udaka^prapūrṇam āvarjito brāhmaṇo hṛṣṭa^cittaḥ/(p.208)
u17.38cd/.anupradāsīd udakena kanyakāṃ śārdūlakarṇasya iyam astu bhāryā//
analyzed: udakena kanyakām śārdūlakarṇasya iyam astu bhāryā

original: u17.40ab/.kṛtvā niveśaṃ sa tadātmajasya gatvā^āśrame +asau nagaraṃ yaśasvī/
analyzed: niveśam sa tad ātmajasya gatvā āśrame asau nagaram yaśasvī

original: u17.40cd/.dharmeṇa vai kārayati svarājyaṃ kṣemaṃ subhikṣaṃ ca sadā^utsava^ādyaṃ // iti/
analyzed: vai kārayati sva rājyam kṣemam subhikṣam ca sadā utsava ādyam iti

original: u17.41/.syād bhikṣavo yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vā/
analyzed: bhikṣavaḥ yuṣmākam kāṅkṣā vā vimatiḥ vā vicikitsā vā

original: anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena triśaṅkur nāma mātaṅga^rājo +abhūvaṃ/
analyzed: anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena triśaṅkuḥ nāma mātaṅga rājaḥ abhūvam

original: syād evaṃ ca bhikṣavo yusmākam anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena śārdūlakarṇā nāma mātaṅga^rāja^kumāro +abhūt/
analyzed: syāt evam ca bhikṣavaḥ yusmākam anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena śārdūlakarṇāḥ nāma mātaṅga rāja kumāraḥ abhūt

original: eṣa sa ānando bhikṣuḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena śārdūlakarṇā nāma mātaṅga^rāja^kumāro
analyzed: eṣa saḥ ānandaḥ bhikṣuḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena śārdūlakarṇāḥ nāma mātaṅga rāja kumāraḥ

original: +abhūt/ syād evaṃ yuṣmākam anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena puṣkarasārī nāma brāhmaṇo +abhūt/
analyzed: abhūt syāt evam yuṣmākam anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena puṣkarasārī nāma brāhmaṇaḥ abhūt

original: eṣa śāradvatīputro bhikṣuḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena puṣkarasārī nāma brāhmaṇo +abhūt/
analyzed: eṣa śāradvatīputraḥ bhikṣuḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena puṣkarasārī nāma brāhmaṇaḥ abhūt

original: na^anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena puṣkarasāriṇo brāhmaṇasya prakṛtir nāma māṇavikā duhitā^abhūt/
analyzed: na anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena puṣkarasāriṇaḥ brāhmaṇasya prakṛtiḥ nāma māṇavikā duhitā abhūt

original: eṣā sā prakṛtir bhikṣuṇī tena kālena
analyzed: eṣā sā prakṛtiḥ bhikṣuṇī tena kālena

original: tena samayena puṣkarasāriṇo brāhmaṇasya prakṛtir nāma māṇavikā duhitā^abhūt/
analyzed: tena samayena puṣkarasāriṇaḥ brāhmaṇasya prakṛtiḥ nāma māṇavikā duhitā abhūt

original: sā etarhi (p.209) tena^eva snehena tena^eva premṇā +anandaṃ bhikṣuṃ gacchantam anugacchati tiṣṭhantam anutiṣṭhati/
analyzed: sā etarhi tena eva snehena tena eva premṇā anandam bhikṣum gacchantam anugacchati tiṣṭhantam anutiṣṭhati

original: yad yad eva kulaṃ piṇḍāya praviśati tatra tatra^eva dvāre tūṣṇīṃ bhūtā +asthāt/
analyzed: yat yat eva kulam piṇḍāya praviśati tatra tatra eva dvāre tūṣṇīm bhūtā asthāt

original: u17.42/.atha khalu bhagavān etasmin nidāne etasmin prakaraṇe tasyāṃ velāyām imāṃ gāthām abhāṣata/
analyzed: khalu bhagavān etasmin nidāne etasmin prakaraṇe tasyām velāyām imām gāthām abhāṣata

original: u17.43cd/.etena jāyate prema candrasya kumude yathā//
u17.44/.tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavo +anabhisamitānāṃ caturṇām ārya^satyānām abhisamayāya,
analyzed: tarhi bhikṣavaḥ an abhisamitānām caturṇām ārya satyānām abhisamayāya
adhimātram vīryam tīvra chandaḥ vīryam śabdāpayāmi

original: utsāha unnatir aprativāṇiḥ smṛtyā saṃprajanyena apramādato yogaḥ caraṇīyaḥ/
analyzed: utsāhaḥ unnatiḥ aprativāṇiḥ smṛtyā saṃprajanyena apramādataḥ yogaḥ caraṇīyaḥ

original: drutam eṣāṃ caturṇā duḥkhasya^ārya^satyasya duḥkha^samudayanya nirodhasya nirodha^gāminyāḥ pratipada ārya^satyasya amīṣāṃ caturṇām ārya^satyānām
analyzed: drutam eṣām caturṇām duḥkhasya ārya satyasya nirodhasya nirodha gāminyāḥ pratipadaḥ ārya satyasya amīṣām caturṇām ārya satyānām

original: anabhisamitānām abhisamayāya^adhimātraṃ tīvra^cchando vīryaṃ vyāyāma utsāha unnatir aprativāṇiḥ smṛtyā saṃprajanyena^apramādato yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ/
analyzed: an abhisamitānām abhisamayāya adhimātram tīvra chandaḥ vīryam vyāyāmaḥ utsāhaḥ unnatiḥ a prativāṇiḥ smṛtyā saṃprajanyena apramādataḥ yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ

original: u17.45/.(p.210) asmiṃś ca khalu punar dharma^paryāye bhāṣyamāṇe bhikṣūṇāṃ ṣaṣṭi^mātrāṇām anupādāyāsravebhyaś cittāni vimuktāni/
analyzed: asmin ca khalu punar dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe bhikṣūṇām ṣaṣṭi mātrāṇām an upādāya āsravebhyaḥ cittāni vimuktāni

original: saṃbahulānāṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ brahmaṇāṃ gṛhapatīnaṃ ca virajaskaṃ vigata^malaṃ dharma^cakṣur udapādi viśuddhaṃ/
analyzed: saṃbahulānām śrāvakāṇām brahmaṇām gṛhapatīnam ca virajaskam vigata malam dharma cakṣuḥ udapādi viśuddham

original: ātta^manasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan/
analyzed: ātta manasaḥ te bhikṣavaḥ bhagavataḥ bhāṣitam abhyanandan
iti śrī divya avadāne śārdūla karṇa avadānam
